story:
[NEW] Introduce the SliceCharge 3 MagSafe Mount Edition and MagCharge

Media_Kit

7.5W wireless charging for iPhone 8 or later.

SliceCharge 3 Mount Edition has a built-in 3rd-party MFi-certified Apple Watch Charger, offering a 5-coil charging surface, and leaves a place for the Apple MagSafe wireless charger. The KS special price is $99 and the retail price is $149.95.

MagCharge is a brand new magnetic wireless charger specially designed for iPhone 12. It has 36 built-in magnets that can be perfectly paired with the iPhone 12, providing up to 7.5W of wireless charging power for iPhone and up to 10W of wireless charging power for Qi-compatible devices. MagCharge can not only be connected to a charging cable and used as an ordinary wireless charger, but also can be directly plugged into a MacBook or other USB-C powered devices to use. The KS special price is $29 and the retail price is $49.95.

Introduce the SliceCharge 3 Pro Edition

In the past three years, Hard Cider Labs has been continually adopting new technologies and integrating your feedback. In July, we’ve launched the SliceCharge Hub Edition and SliceCharge 3 Watch Edition. Now, we’re excited to introduce you to the ultimate SliceCharge 3 Pro Edition.

Enjoy both speedy position-free wireless charging and a tidy work environment

Our 6-in-1, 10-coil desktop charging station—SliceCharge 3 Pro Edition, allows you to enjoy both speedy position-free wireless charging and a tidy work environment.

High charging efficiency while balancing the safety at the same time

SliceCharge Pro was the world’s first 5-coil free-position wireless charger. To further improve the charging efficiency while balancing the safety at the same time, we design a 9-coil charging pad that offers you enough charging area.

Wirelessly charge 3 phones + Apple Watch at the same time

With this 9-coil wireless charging area, SliceCharge 3 Pro Edition enables you to charge three phones effortlessly at once. Meanwhile, the unique rotatable Watch Stand not only has a built-in third-party MFi-Certified Watch Charger but it can be adjusted to your ideal position and perfectly match any watch strap.

A 30W Type-C port and 18W USB-A port at the back

SliceCharge 3 Pro Edition is also equipped with a Type-C port with up to 30w of power and an 18W USB-A port to charge your other favorite devices, such as iPad, Switch, and even MacBook Air.

Quick charge 6 devices at most

In total, SliceCharge 3 Pro Edition can charge up to 6 devices simultaneously. This is undoubtedly the perfect desktop charging station you are looking for.

Safe plan for heat dissipation

To guarantee the effectiveness of heat dissipation, we adopted an aluminum alloy unibody design with the heat dissipation silica gel inside, which is noise-free and space-saving.

A perfectly designed stand for SliceCharge 3 Pro Edition

Last but not least, we also designed a magnetic stand for SliceCharge 3 Pro Edition so that you can easily unlock your iPhone with Face ID at any time.

Pledge the SliceCharge 3 Pro Edition now

To tell you the truth, getting all these accessories separately costs over $250 from the apple store! However, you can have the 6-in-1, free-position, 10-coil SliceCharge 3 Pro Edition with all the same functions and more, starting at $99, only through this campaign!

 

Specifications

Compatibility: iPhone 8/8 Plus, iPhone X/Xr/Xs/Xs Max, iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max, Samsung Galaxy S7/S7e/S8/S8+/S9/S9+/S10/S10+/S10e Plus, Apple Watch 1/2/3/4/5/6, and other devices with Qi standard
 

Input: 15V⎓4.3A   65W
 

Output: Qi Wireless 1: 10W Max, Qi Wireless 2: 10W Max, Qi Wireless 3: 10W Max, Verified & optimized for iPhones 8 or later: 7.5W, USB-C port: Up to 30W Max, USB-A Port: Up to 18W Max, Apple Watch Charging: 5W Max
 

 Materials: High-class fabric, PU leather, Aluminum Alloy Body, Plastic
 

 Color: Space Grey
 

 Dimensions: 9.76" x 3.98" x 0.53" / 248 x 101 x 13.5mm
 

 Weight: 16.0oz / 460g
 

Expected Retail Price

 

$149.95- 1 x SliceCharge 3 Pro Edition
 

$149.95- 1 x SliceCharge 3 MagSafe Mount Edition

 

$29.95- 1 x MagCharge

 

$29.95- 1 x Stand Kit

 

About us & Logo replacement

Creating valuable products has always been our philosophy. Hard Cider Labs is a group of designers and engineers who love using Apple products and developing new technology for them. It is our goal to produce the best products we can to make the world just a bit better and hassle-free.

 

Risks and challenges

It’s always challenging to produce a new product, but we have taken the first step. The first batch of SliceCharge Pro has come out and gone through strict quality-control tests. This means we are much more experienced and confident in our ability to succeed in volume production. Despite our good coordination with the supplier, there may be problems with shipping. After our campaign, due to the uncertainty of international shipping, the delivery may be delayed due to unforeseeable circumstances. Even in that case, however, we will strive to communicate with you effectively and overcome the issue. We promise to regularly update all backers on the delivery status once the product has been dispatched and to keep track of all deliveries.

story:
Modot is not just a series of products, but an innovative way to improve your experiences on using modern electronic products.

All the Modot modules are connected by magnetic which allows you to detach and combine them flexibly. NO MORE anxious and worried about cable-connect problems.

All modules are equipped with a built-in rechargeable battery and could work wirelessly.  You can always take your modules with you for convenient use.

Portable and convenient use of the Night Light allows walking through the night without any fears and worries.

There is a specific space on the top of the Soundot to storage some small objects, like glasses, keys, etc., for keeping your desk clean and organized.

All modules could be expanded with other modules!

Turn on the Relaxing Sounds helping to enjoy your bedtime before sleep.

Say goodbye to the cable chaos on your table! Keep your desk organized and clean.

No more wastes on buying those unnecessary cables and power adapters! Only one cable can drive all the modules to work! Keep your consumption More environmentally friendly.

With Shifton, all the modules can be connected to any others freely without worrying about the quantity, the sequence, or method. All the connections are magnetic and no cables are needed. Every time you want to add more features to your current Modot modules, just connect it on.

 

Not just cables and adapters, every time you want to upgrade your current device with extra features, you will probably need to sell it or just throw it away. But now, you don't need to do that anymore. Get what you need at the moment and upgrade features in the future by just adding on different modules, because All the Modules are Expandable to Any of Others!

 

 

By making all the regular features modular and independent from one another, you can feel free to combine them just for what you need!

Are you having two wireless charge devices? Go getting two wireless charge modules.

Need a soft light on the bedside while you are reading? Just add an extra night light module and connect it to any modules you have.

Here are some exclusive packs we specially made for Indiegogo Backers! There will not be sold in a pack after the campaign. We made research in our Facebook group to see what is the famous pack and here they are:

We are always buying a lot of electronic products on tables, like fans, purifiers, humidifiers, etc. And then our desk will be a mess of tangling cables and always insufficient sockets. It is really annoying, especially when you have heavy work to do. And it is not necessary for using a lot of cables on one desk since you don’t always move them, which is a waste and bad for the environment.

Then we realized that we really need to do something about it, and this is the very first idea of Modot.

We are a group of designers, freelance writers, life-lovers, and dream-tracers. Our team was established in 2018 and designed the products for others. We believe that the product demands are getting much various and all the demands should be respected. But sometimes people can only find common goods in the market and nobody is willing to invest in somethings minority. So we were getting together to design products for them, for our own, and this is not the minority anymore, but Mynority.

Modot is our first project and we want to make it customizable and modularizable so that our customers can select whatever modules they want and combine them in any shapes and sequences they want, creating their own Modot. No more worries and waste on those features and products the common market wants you to buy.

 

 

 

Test

test

story:
Overview

Introducing GOSPACE SuperCharger 2.0, the ultimate Fast Charger and Power Bank with File Transfer function & PD technology.

● Access, edit, and transfer your files easily with USB & SD card
● PD Fast Charging technology - charge your devices 3x faster
● 10,000mAh Battery
● Interchangeable Plugs - charge anywhere you go
● Small size perfect for travel
● Smart power detection to protect your devices
● Safe and reliable with 8-layer protection systems

 

 

 

If that sounds like overkill, we agree. SuperCharger 2.0, the ONE which solves all your solutions. We pack a 3-port  charger with 45W Power Delivery (PD), a 10,000 mAh power bank, a hub (support USB & SD Card) for file transfer and interchangeable plugs that support 150+ countries into ONE sleek unit.

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

You could easily access your files with SuperCharger 2.0. We support

● USB

●SD/ SDHC/ SDXC (format up to 2TB)

● File System: FAT 12/ 16/ 32, exFAT

 

With SuperCharger 2.0, you no longer need any additional Card reader. You could read/transfer your files directly just by using SuperCharger 2.0. You could even edit your files with your USB/SD card plugged in. 

 

 

 

 

With the updates on iOS 13, you could even transfer your files with the latest iPhone 11 and iPhone 11 Pro models. SuperCharger 2.0 will be the best accessories for you.

 

 

 

 

 

SuperCharger 2.0 support the latest Power Delivery (PD) technology to offer you the fastest charging experience.

SuperCharger 2.0 equip with a 45W USB-C 3.1 Power Delivery port and two 18W USB-A 3.0 Qualcomm Quick Charge ports. You could easily fast-charge multiple devices at the same time.

 

 

WHAT IS PD FAST CHARGING?

Power Delivery (PD) fast charging is a new technology that delivers much higher levels of power than standard charging. It is a specification for handling higher power and allows a range of devices to charge quickly over a USB connection.

 

 

USES CUTTING EDGE USB-C PD TECHNOLOGY

Comparing to the normal standard charging, we specially designed our USB-C circuit board to withstand the high watt. With the new circuit board design, you could enjoy a faster, safer charging experience.

 

 

SMART POWER DETECTION

The PD technology also allows SuperCharger 2.0 to detect the suitable power needed for each connected devices.  You don't have to worry about damaging your lower power devices with high power. SuperCharger 2.0 is always easy and convenient to use.

 

 

 

 

SuperCharger 2.0 comes with a 10,000mAh battery, which allows you to charge your mobiles several times. SuperCharger 2.0 also compatible with laptops, cameras and other devices. We would always be your support and back up all your power.

 

 

 

 

 

Another feature of SuperCharger 2.0 is its capability to support over 150 countries. Its wall interchangeable plugs allow you to use SuperCharger 2.0 in different countries.

 

 

 

SuperCharger 2.0 could detect different voltage and change its setting automatically. You don't need to worry about the different voltages for different countries.

 

 

 

 

We understanding your worries. We will always have multiple protections to guard your safety. With 8 layers of Protection, we ensure SuperCharger 2.0 is always safe to use. We include Voltage Protection, Temperature Protection, Short-Circuit Protection etc, You will have no worries to use it and share it with your family and friends.

 

In addition, to ensure our quality, we have multiple testings and experiments for our battery and functions. We not just aim to produce good products only. Instead, we aim to provide you the best, safest and highest-quality SuperCharger 2.0. Just to allow you enjoy the brand new File Transfer & Charging experience.

 

 

 

 
We have performed various tests with our demos, trying out different  functions. With the success for our demos, we are more confident to deliver a high-quality SuperCharger2.0  to you all. Here are the videos testing our File Transfer & Charging functions.
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We introduce you the exclusive IGG Special Set, which includes SuperCharger 2.0, interchangeable plugs & a specially designed protective case. You could carry your accessories safer and easier, feeling less worries during your travelling. Order now and enjoy our 50% discount. 

 

 

 

What's in the box:

 

 

1. SuperCharger 2.0

2. US Plug

3. Europe Plug

4. UK Plug

5. AUS/NZ Plug

 

 

 

 

Join our referral program and get our FREE gifts just by sharing our campaign to your friends. 

If your shares successfully bring 1 order, you will get a 3-in-1 Braided Charging Cable or a Extension Cord.

If you bring 3 orders, you will get a Type-C Magnetic Cable/ Cable Reel & a 3-in-1 Braided Charging Cable/ Extension Cord. 

And, if you could bring 7 orders, you will get a Supercharger 2.0, a Type-C Magnetic Cable/ Cable Reel & a 3-in-1 Braided Charging Cable/ Extension Cord.

 

 

 

Remember you have to share your unique URL to your friends to participate in our Referral Program. All Perks pledged through the URL will be automatically counted into the program. Follow below steps and share to your friends now:

 

1. Log in your Indiegogo account and Click below button to get your unique URL link

 

2. Copy the URL link and share it through Facebook, Twitter, message etc.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are a team of professional engineers and designers who have extensive experience in bringing innovative products to the market. We care about every detail of the products we create, from the position of one single screw to the perfect angle of the curve. We have overcome many challenges in bringing GOSPACE to life, it is our pleasure to introduce this wonderful product to you.

 

 

 

 

As with any innovative devices, there are countless challenges related to production and design, but our team’s passion and experience helped us to overcome them. And we will continue to optimize the software and hardware of GOSPACE to ensure that you will receive the best product. 
We try our very best to bring the best product to all our backers, it may take time for us to find suppliers and factories to maintain the quality throughout the manufacturing process. There will always be risks, but we put great effort to make sure the production can run smoothly.

story:
This campaign has ended. You can order your eBlocker at our online-shop: www.eblocker.com/shop




We are a start-up based in Hamburg, Germany. Our team of highly experienced developers and internet security professionals has worked together on our eBlocker project for almost two years. Our first prototypes are already in use and work great.


Get the feeling that online ads are following you? 

You just see the tip of the iceberg. Below lies a detailed personality profile of you, that is built by Internet giants and data brokers while you are browsing the web.
It’s not just anonymous data gathering, but detailed behavior profiling that is linked to your identity. Why? Because when you created a “free” account you accepted this practice. Even logging out, deleting cookies, 'private mode' or 'do-not-track' settings  do not prevent this tracking. You are personally identifiable. Everywhere.

The result is that Internet corporations possess detailed knowledge about your most intimate desires, beliefs and behavior, which is today already being used for

    • Dynamic pricing – Prices are adjusted according to your predicted   buying power i.e. your neighbor can pay less for the same product
    • Credit scoring – Credit applications are rated based on your behavior pattern i.e. gambling online can ruin your scoring and chances for a loan
    • Individual rating – Insurances price individual plans based on your online profile i.e. retrieving infos about stroke or cancer can cause an increase
    • Personnel decisions – Employers hire and promote staff depending on tracking profiles i.e. union support or health issues can be problematic
    • Search personalization – Algorithms determine which info is ”relevant”
      i.e. they can omit (=censor) Republican news because you are a Democrat
    • Personalized ads – Advertisers are bidding on your profile to target ads for manipulating your buying decisions based on your predicted intent

Inappropriate “official” access to sensitive data as well as hacker attacks are on the news almost daily. No data is safe. That’s why we feel especially personal data should not be gathered and stored without your knowledge and explicit consent.
eBlocker puts you back in control. You decide where you leave traces and see ads.

Today, the online industry claims “Data is the new oil”.

We believe that “Privacy is the new green”.

That’s why we built eBlocker.



eBlocker is a small device that connects to your home network. It anonymizes your online behavior, blocks all ads and ensures that only the information you want to share is shared. eBlocker is constantly updated, recognizes all forms of tracking and protects the privacy of all users in your home network individually. It works with every connected device, browser and app. PC, Mac, iPad, smartTV, game console...




We are privacy nerds who have been using different tools in the past to protect us from getting profiled while surfing the Web. Since we couldn't find a tool that fully fit our needs we developed the idea of creating one. We wanted a very easy to use out of the box solution that doesn't have the disadvantages of other tools:
The idea for the eBlocker was born.
 
While trialling the eBlocker we've tried several browser plugins for ad- and tracker-blocking but we were always bound to a specific browser and needed extra software installation and configuration for IP anonymization. 
We've tried local proxies but they only work on specific operating systems, are difficult to configure and didn't work for our family members as they do not support individual settings. 
We thought Internet proxies might be a good idea but they usually decrease browsing speed and are mostly based in countries with lax privacy regulations. Most critically, we needed absolute trust as Internet proxies (or someone hacking them) can tap all data - which, obviously, would breach our definition of "privacy".
Last but not least, we checked several DIY gateways only to find they are difficult to set up, are not capable of handling individual user settings, always encrypt all traffic of every family member via Tor and are simply too complicated for the regular user.

We wanted a solution that works to plug & play right out of the box,  supports individual settings for each user as well as all devices in a network without any software installation or configuration. 


Here is how we compare to other approaches. Even combining several existing tools does not yield to the ease of use and comprehensive protection our eBlocker will be offering very soon.



We are in the final stages of product development in preparation for our initial launch by the end of the year. We have had fully functional MVP-prototypes (Minimal Viable Product) running in our own homes since December 2014 with great success and are now driving development in agile iterations.The core is now ready for the first public release and we are currently working on the automatic update service before we start the 'Early Access Phase' for techies by the end of September 2015.



„I am enthusiastic. Surprisingly, the eBlocker works after only 5 minutes … and instantly protects my communication at home“
developer Blog (review in German)

“…the anonymization works instantly...” 
security-insider.de (review in German)

„eBlocker’s easy setup and protection of all network devices, like smartphones, is unparalleled to other solutions like Adblock or Ghostery that only work in some browsers.”
Willy Tech (review in German)

“This offering feels like a niche product that has potential to play well to techies looking for a more comprehensive response to data collection, as well as others who take privacy to a different level.” 
Geektime (review in English)




We are now ready to start limited pre-sales and 'Early Access Phase'

As we are a small team, we love the idea of giving you access to our technology in an early state. This way you can access the eBlocker in the developmental stages and actively participate in identifying enhancements that will help us to improve. Your feedback and ideas will enable us to fine-tune the eBlocker so it delivers optimal functionality for everyone. During the 'Early Access Phase', early adopters who own a RASPBERRY PI or BANANA PI can install the eBlocker software on their devices themselves.


YOU MAY ALSO USE:


Want to protect your Internet privacy straight away but are not a "techie"?
No problem!


With much love we've handmade a very limited number of eBlockers that are ready to use. They come in a standard case with an eBlocker sticker and though they are not yet as polished as the final product - they deliver the exact same functionality. We will ship them 'plug and play' ready with all cabling and power supplies, all updates (including filter updates) and all new features are available to you until the end of 2016. After 2016 you can subscribe to our automatic update service for a small fee or manually update your eBlocker for free.

Our flagship product eBlocker Box4e even comes with lifetime updates included.

You'll get the full comfort of the future eBlocker at a discount as early as possible!



Though the 'Early Access' eBlocker software doesn't contain all features of the final product just yet, the tracker- and ad-blocking components are already available as well as the automatic configuration. During this 'Early Access Phase' we would love your feedback on what we can improve so that we can prioritize our software development accordingly and add more functionality based on your needs.
The 'Early Access Phase' will end December 31, 2015.





Already implemented features (available in 'Early Access' release) 

  1. Zero Installation (automatic configuration – needs IPv4 DHCP network)
    Alternative: Manual IPv4 configuration, if your network has no DHCP server.
  2. Tracker-Blocking (third party tracker blocker) incl. link-tracker blocker
  3. Ad-Blocking (third party ads)
  4. Whitelisting of individual websites (disables eBlocker for specific site)
  5. Enabling/disabling of eBlocker for individual network devices
  6. Enabling/disabling of Modules (i.e. Tracker- and Ad-Blocking modules)
  7. Block Indicator (shows eBlocker status and how many URLs were blocked)
  8. Controlbar (central user interface for easy access to whitelisting etc.)
  9. Automatic Updates (core software, filter lists, all new features)


EFFECTIVE! AD-BLOCKING


EASY TO USE! CONTROLBAR



ADMINISTRATION INTERFACE





What should be the next features for your eBlocker?

Following features are not yet included in the first Early Access release. They will be released according to your priorities over time by automatic updates. 

    • Tor Support (this is currently in the works and will be released shortly) 
    • Multi-User Capability (eBlocker is run in Single-User mode in initial release) 
    • Enabling/disabling of eBlocker for individual apps 
    • Change of User-Agent (to disguise an iPad as a PC for the website – important for dynamic pricing based on certain devices/manufacturers) 
    • Parental Control (protect your kids from accessing sites not suited for minors)
    • SSL Support (all features for HTTPS websites)
    • Advanced User Interface (even nicer GUI) 

    Alongside the software development we are working on the final casing design, are talking to case manufacturing and fulfillment firms and are selecting our suppliers along the supply chain.

    Currently we expect to be ready for a small series production by the end of the year.

    There is still a lot of work to do and we love to hire more staff to develop business.
    Your support will help us to continue our mission     and get more talents on board. In return we will deliver the easiest and most advanced privacy solution that will protect you and your family from spying eyes.

    We want you to know that we have developed the eBlocker with passion for you and your family's privacy and so we believe in keeping costs as low as possible.

    Please like us and share with your friends to help get this project off the ground and give the world back the privacy protection we all deserve. #switchonprivacy



    Thank you for supporting us!

    We are very happy and thankful about your support and will honor you forever!

    If desired and ok with your privacy preference, we'll put your name up on our 'Honors and Sponsors' blogpage and keep you posted about our progress.

    Indiegogo exclusive offer,  unlimited!

    Estimated delivery: End of September 2015


    Early Access & Updates 2015

    Get completely anonymous and surf ad-free on all your Internet devices in your home network. You will need your own Banana Pi (Pro, M1, M1+,M2) or Raspberry Pi B+ or Raspberry Pi 2. story_txt:
This campaign has ended. You can order your eBlocker at our online-shop: www.eblocker.com/shop





We are a start-up based in Hamburg, Germany. Our team of highly experienced developers and internet security professionals has worked together on our eBlocker project for almost two years. Our first prototypes are already in use and work great.
Get the feeling that online ads are following you? You just see the tip of the iceberg. Below lies a detailed
personality profile of you, that is built by Internet giants and data brokers while
you are browsing the web. It’s not just anonymous data gathering, but detailed behavior
profiling that is linked to your identity. Why? Because when you created a “free”
account you accepted this practice. Even logging out, deleting cookies, 'private mode' or 'do-not-track' settings  do not prevent this tracking. You are personally identifiable. Everywhere.
The result is that Internet corporations possess detailed knowledge about your most intimate desires, beliefs
and behavior, which is today already being used for


Dynamic pricing – Prices are adjusted according to your predicted      buying power i.e. your neighbor can pay less
     for the same product

Credit scoring – Credit applications are rated based on
     your behavior pattern i.e. gambling online can ruin your scoring and chances for a loan


Individual rating – Insurances price individual plans based
     on your online profile i.e. retrieving infos about stroke or cancer can cause an increase

Personnel decisions – Employers hire and promote staff depending
     on tracking profiles i.e. union support or health issues can be
     problematic

Search personalization – Algorithms determine which info is ”relevant” i.e. they can omit (=censor) Republican news because you are a Democrat

Personalized ads – Advertisers are bidding on your profile to target ads for manipulating your buying decisions based on your predicted intent 



Inappropriate “official”
access to sensitive data as well as hacker attacks are on the news almost daily. No data is safe. That’s why we feel especially personal data should not be gathered and stored without your
knowledge and explicit consent. eBlocker puts you back in control. You decide where you leave traces and see ads.

Today, the online industry claims “Data
is the new oil”.
We believe that “Privacy is the
new green”.
That’s why we built
eBlocker.

It anonymizes your online behavior, blocks all ads and ensures that only the information you want to share is shared. eBlocker is constantly updated, recognizes all forms of tracking and protects the privacy of all users in your home network individually. It works with every connected device, browser and app. PC, Mac, iPad, smartTV, game console...We are privacy nerds who have been using different tools in the past to protect us from getting profiled while surfing the Web. Since we couldn't find a tool that fully fit our needs we developed the idea of creating one. story:
WE'VE REACHED OUR GOAL - THANKS EVERYONE!

We did it! We reached our goal, and with time to spare! Team Sportan would like to give a HUGE shoutout to everyone that contributed, and thank everyone that shared our campaign!
Here are a few updates to all those that contributed to the campaign:
  1. Stay tuned to our Indiegogo Updates page for information on the status of your perk. We'll send out personal emails shortly as well.
  2. We mentioned before the campaign begun that the app was 75% completed. As of now, we're approximately 90% done with development. Our testing phase will begin shortly. Which leads to our next point that:
  3. If you contributed $20+, you'll receive early access to the app. That means you'll be part of that pre-launch test phase! Stay tuned for updates on when that will be available.


They say necessity is the mother of all invention. Well, with Sportan it's no different.

The inspiration came when Saqib - a passionate soccer fan - couldn't find anyone in his area to play soccer with. What's worst was that he didn't know of any games happening that very moment either, nor did he know where to look.

It got him thinking: "There's got to be someone in my area who's down to play soccer. But just how do I connect with them!?"

And the rest, as it's said, is history.

WHY WE'RE DOING THIS

While the ability connect with virtually anyone, anywhere, focused to a specific interest, exists via numerous social media and networks, you'd be hard done to find the king-pin social sports network.

The way we connect with each other has evolved, but everyday athletes still have to rely on traditional means - text messages, emails, phone calls - to organize sports with their friends. Organizing or finding public pick-up sports in a defined area, well that just doesn't exist.

Cue Sportan.




1. Will Sportan be free?
Of course :)

2. What devices will it be available for?
At launch, Sportan will be available on both Android and iOS devices. Preparations for a fully functional website has already begun!

3. When will Sportan be available?
Sportan will officially be available to everyone by May, but by contributing $20+ on this very Indiegogo campaign, you can get early access to the app (April).

4. What sports does Sportan support?
Sportan supports the following sports: 1) Soccer 2) Basketball 3) Football 4) Baseball 5) Volleyball 6) Tennis 7) Lacrosse 8) Cricket 9) Ping Pong 10) Bowling 11) Pool 12) Badminton 13) Golf 14) Cricket 15) Hockey

Don't see the sport you want? Don't worry, through Sportan you can create a "Custom Sport" event and gather people to play whatever sport you want!

5. What's the Gamebar?
The Gamebar is this neat little widget that lets the app know you're ready to play. Toggle it on, select the sport you want, and then get ready to play!


6. How does the rating system work?
That's the secret isn't it ;)

7. What about venues?
Selecting a venue through Sportan doesn't technically book the venue. We're working on streamlining that too, but it'll hopefully be integrated by Phase 2 (2015).Until then, the user is still required to call the venue and make the booking.
story_txt:
WE'VE REACHED OUR GOAL - THANKS EVERYONE!We did it! We reached our goal, and with time to spare! Team Sportan would like to give a HUGE shoutout to everyone that contributed, and thank everyone that shared our campaign!Here are a few updates to all those that contributed to the campaign:
Stay tuned to our Indiegogo Updates page for information on the status of your perk. We'll send out personal emails shortly as well.
We mentioned before the campaign begun that the app was 75% completed. As of now, we're approximately 90% done with development. Our testing phase will begin shortly. Which leads to our next point that:
If you contributed $20+, you'll receive early access to the app. That means you'll be part of that pre-launch test phase! Stay tuned for updates on when that will be available.

They say necessity is the mother of all invention. Well, with Sportan it's no different.The inspiration came when Saqib - a passionate soccer fan - couldn't find anyone in his area to play soccer with. What's worst was that he didn't know of any games happening that very moment either, nor did he know where to look.It got him thinking: "There's got to be someone in my area who's down to play soccer. But just how do I connect with them!?"And the rest, as it's said, is history.WHY WE'RE DOING THISWhile the ability connect with virtually anyone, anywhere, focused to a specific interest, exists via numerous social media and networks, you'd be hard done to find the king-pin social sports network.The way we connect with each other has evolved, but everyday athletes still have to rely on traditional means - text messages, emails, phone calls - to organize sports with their friends. Organizing or finding public pick-up sports in a defined area, well that just doesn't exist.Cue Sportan.
1. Will Sportan be free?Of course :)

2. What devices will it be available for?At launch, Sportan will be available on both Android and iOS devices. Preparations for a fully functional website has already begun!

3. When will Sportan be available?Sportan will officially be available to everyone by May, but by contributing $20+ on this very Indiegogo campaign, you can get early access to the app (April).

4. What sports does Sportan support?Sportan supports the following sports: 1) Soccer 2) Basketball 3) Football 4) Baseball 5) Volleyball 6) Tennis 7) Lacrosse 8) Cricket 9) Ping Pong 10) Bowling 11) Pool 12) Badminton 13) Golf 14) Cricket 15) Hockey
Don't see the sport you want? Don't worry, through Sportan you can create a "Custom Sport" event and gather people to play whatever sport you want!

6. How does the rating system work?That's the secret isn't it ;)

7. What about venues?Selecting a venue through Sportan doesn't technically book the venue. We're working on streamlining that too, but it'll hopefully be integrated by Phase 2 (2015).Until then, the user is still required to call the venue and make the booking.

story:
With Mr. Charger 2 you get a wall charger, a portable battery, and a QI wireless charger integrated in one nifty and well-rounded charging accessory. With a US style plug and 3 adapters for EU, UK, and AU, Mr. Charger is the perfect solution for your international travels.

Mr.Charger is the best companion for business trips and traveling!

 

The USB-C Power Delivery port has a total output of 30W (when using it as a wall charger), enough to charge MacBooks and other compatible laptops. Using it in battery mode, the 10,000mAh and 18W USB-C PD output will ensure you have enough power and charging speed to top up an iPhone 8 or later up to 50% in just 30 minutes.

 

Thanks to its PD 30W output, the new Mr. Charger can charge a 12” MacBook Pro, only taking 2.1 hours to charge from 0% to 100%.

 

In battery mode, Mr. Charger 2 outputs 18W of charging power through USB-C PD and USB-A ports (18W is the max value while using one port at a time). For fast charging an iPhone through the USB-C PD port, a USB-C to Lightning cable is required.

 

With a wide compatibility for Qi-enabled devices, you can now charge wirelessly without the need to carry charging cables.

 

 

*Note:

HUAWEI: Mate20/ Mate20 RS

XIAOMI: MIX2S/ MIX3/ 9 Series

APPLE: iPhone 8/ 8 Plus/ iPhone X/ XS/ XS Max/ iPhone 11/ 11 Pro/ 11 Pro Max

SAMSUNG: S10/ S10+/ S9/ S9+/ S8/ S8 Edge/ S7/ S7 Edge/ S6/ S6 Edge/ Note 9/ Note 8

 

With the new Mr. Charger, you can charge up to 3 devices simultaneously, through its USB-C and USB-A ports, and the built-in QI wireless pad.

*Note: The power values of each of the above interfaces, including wireless charging, are only provided on the premise of separate output. In the case of 2 or 3 devices charging at the same time, multiple devices share 5V / 3A total power.

 

With a 10,000 mAh large capacity, Mr. Charger packs enough battery life to keep you charged throughout the day, no matter which device you need to power up – iPad, Nintendo Switch, drone, digital camera or smartphone. 

*Note: Data based on laboratory testing. Actual results may be different.

 

Check your power status at a glance, with a convenient LED indicator.

UK, EU, and AU, 3 international plug adapters, that are easily swappable and slide perfectly on the foldable US plug.

*Note:

British Standard Plug: UK, Singapore, Maldives, Pakistan, United Arab Emirates.

European Standard Plug: Germany, Denmark, Finland, France, Netherlands, South Korea, Portugal, Norway.

Australian Standard Plug: New Zealand, Australia.

 

With a 90° foldable AC plug that neatly tucks inside the casing, Mr. Charger is more portable and won’t scratch any devices you might have next to it.

 

12” MacBook, MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, Microsoft SurfaceBook, Google, DELL, Samsung, Asus, HP, Lenovo ThinkPad, Xiaomi Air.

 

Protection protocols against below

 

With all the major certifications passed, you can rest assured that Mr. Charger will keep you and your devices safe against random malfunctions and reliability issues.

With extensive efforts that lasted nearly 12 months, we’ve perfected the internal and external structure of Mr. Charger with a durable casing that is made out of a fire-resistant ABS material with V0 grade flammability.

 

 

The latest break-through material in charging technology, Gallium Nitride, allows for higher power outputs without increasing the product size. It keeps the temperatures low and makes the charging process safer and more efficient, which also means it can operate at higher voltages and switching frequency which results in smaller and more efficient chargers. 

 

With a 65W power output, you’re able to charge a laptop (e.g. MacBook Pro), a tablet (e.g iPad) and a smartphone (e.g. iPhone, Samsung S9), all at the same time, without sacrificing charging speeds.

The 65W USB-C port with Power Delivery is enough to charge most laptops, from MacBooks to Dell XPS and beyond.

  • Power Input: AC 100-240V , 47Hz/63Hz, 1.6AMax

  • Max Power Output: 65W

  • Ports: 2 * USB-C and 1 * USB-A

  • Single port output power:

        Type-C PD 1: 5V3A, 9V3A, 12V3A, 15V3A, 20V3.25A (65W maximum output power)
        Type-C PD 2: 5V3A, 9V3A, 12V1.5A (18W maximum output power)
        USB-A QC: 5V3A, 9V3A, 12V1.5A (18W maximum output power)

  • Dual port output power:

         Type-C PD 1 + Type-C PD 2: 45W + 18W (63W maximum output power)
         Type-C PD 1 + USB-A QC: 45W + 18W (63W maximum output power)
         Type-C PD 2 + USB-A QC: 5V 3A (15W maximum output power)

  • Three-port output power:

         Type-C PD 1 + Type-C PD 2 + USB-A QC: PD45W + 5V 3A (15w) (60w maximum output power)

  • Protection: Over-current, Over-voltage, Over-temperature, Short-circuit Protection

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What You Care About, We Care for

Beginning with the product concept, through development and countless iterations, we seek perfection in everything we do. While Red Dot Design Awards might be a testament of our efforts, the appreciation of our fans and customers is what matters for us most. This is what led us to improve upon our previous Mr. Charger and add the features that you care about. Now with a more polished design, wireless and USB-C fast charging, we strive to make Mr. Charger the ideal solution for your charging needs. Charge your laptop, tablet, and smartphone, all at the same time at home and on-the-go without sacrificing time or priority.

Join us on our journey, and see where our next endeavors will take us!

story:
We Made A Case

Your smartphone can do it all — your case should too. Introducing the castAway™ case. Designed with the versatility to meet your life’s daily demands, from doubling your screen space to boosting battery life.

Work more efficiently. Play without limits.

The Go-Anywhere, Do-Anything case

Introducing the castAway™ case, a fantastic new platform that adds a variety of accessories to your smartphone, whether you want a high-resolution second screen, a powerful extra battery, or a speaker in your pocket.

Your Smartphone Upgrade... Just Got Its Own Upgrade

We heard you loud and clear. After listening to your feedback, we’re excited to announce that we have expanded castAway™ into a full platform. We’re still delivering a second-screen experience — but now you can customize your case with a variety of accessories as well to meet the demands of your daily life. 

castAway™ one (Your Second Screen)

A second monitor used to be a luxury — now it's a necessity. You don’t leave the need for multitasking behind when you step away from your desktop. That’s why we’re doubling your smartphone’s real estate with the world’s smallest anywhere tablet. Unlock your ability to multitask on the go.

castAway™ coverCharge (Wireless Charging Battery)

Speaking of on the go...stay out longer and forget about finding an outlet with our long-lasting companion battery. Simply fit it in the case, flip castAway open and the battery will start charging — no wires required. It’s extra power whenever you need it.

castAway™ walletMod

We’ve all left our wallet at home at least once. Make sure it never happens again with a wallet that lives inside your castAway™ case. It’s one less thing to remember.

castAway™ walletCharge (Combination Wallet & Battery)

Sometimes you need to have it all. This pack ensures you won’t leave home without the necessities. A slimmer battery accommodates the additional space for a wallet inside your castAway™ case.

 

In-depth with castAway™ Case’s Second Screen (one)

Our journey began by seeking to find a solution to one of modern life’s most common problems: limited screen space on your smartphone. That’s why we first envisioned the castAway™ one (tablet screen) as the perfect companion for your device. 

Quick Facts

  • castAway™ case connects with any iOS or Android phone and continues to work even when detached from your smartphone.
  • Features a dual boot option that lets you quickly turn it into a larger keyboard, trackpad, or game controller for your phone.
  • It is fully-equipped with a hi-res capacitive touch screen, WiFi, Bluetooth, front and back-facing cameras, & audio jack.
  • Integrated SD slot allows you to expand storage and offload photos from your phone
  • The built-in battery can do double duty and be used to boost your smartphone.

Think of the castAway™ case as a perfectly sized tablet that pairs with your smartphone. It’s an anywhere computer that runs the latest version of Chromium via our own implementation.

We intend to seek certification with Google LLC. Both the tablet and your iOS or Android smartphone run our app, code-named MultiTask+™, which pairs the two and enables them to communicate over encrypted WiFi and Bluetooth channels. 

The castAway™ one (tablet screen) allows you to open multiple apps at once, copy/paste, and access files and photos from either screen.  Our app, code-named MultiTask+™, for iOS and Android, is the software experience that enables you to connect your smartphone to your castAway™ case with simple commands and shortcuts. 

A neat feature of the castAway™ case is that you can detach your tablet from your phone, and it will continue to function as a standalone device while continuing to communicate with your phone over WiFi. 

Created by Ken Mages, a 40-year veteran of the electronics industry, the castAway™ case is your second screen. Ken brought on a skilled product designer, Joe Jasinski,  former director of industrial design at Dell, along with two former executives from Microsoft and Intel to create this fantastic device.

Behind the Design & Technology of castAway™

By Design - The castAway™ case design uses an ingenious patent-pending universal magnetic hinge.

Magic Magnets - We spent months exploring unique ways to create a hinge that would give 360° range of motion, fixed positions (flat, back to back, laptop, tented), and the ability to detach and go. We were obsessed with keeping the design simple, slim, and as Joe likes to say, have that "Snap, Crackle, & Pop" that will make it a treat to use. 

The magic part of the hinge is on the second screen tablet side. When the tablet is detached from your smartphone, your phone will look and feel like it would in any other high-end protective case. The hinge design also simplifies the task of supporting the myriad of smartphones.

The smartphone side of the case is a custom fit for each major model type. That said, there are many unique (lower volume) phones for which we are developing a universal case back that works with the hinge. The castAway™ case will be available in 3 model sizes:

one/S with a 5.8” screen for smartphones with screens of similar size

one/L with a 6.3” screen for smartphones with screens of similar size

one/XL with a 6.9” screen for smartphones with screens of similar size

Power Boost - Smartphone out of gas? 38% of people say that battery life is the second biggest criteria when selecting a new smartphone. The castAway™ case has a comparable battery life to your smartphone. We designed the castAway™ case to be able to boost your smartphone using a small accessory cable. 

castAway™ Docking Station - The castAway™ dock is an elegant and compact docking station for home, office, or school. Cradle the castAway™ case with power, HDMI, and LAN connections. 

Which Case Size is Right For You? 

castAway™ case/S

Fits the castAway™ one/S 5.8” screen

iPhone Models:  6, 6S, 7, 8, X, XS, XR, 11, 11 Pro

Samsung Models: S7, S8, S9, S10, Note 7

castAway™ case/L

Fits the castAway™ one/L 6.3” screen

iPhone Models: 6 Plus, 6S Plus, 7 Plus, 8 Plus, XS Max, 11 Pro Max

Samsung Models: S8+, S9+, S10+, Note 8, Note 9, Note 10

castAway™one/XL

Fits the castAway™ one/XL 6.9” screen

Samsung Models: Note 10+

castAway™one/Universal

Pixel Models: Pixel, Pixel XL, Pixel 2, Pixel 3, Pixel 3a, Pixel 4

Pixel Models: Pixel 2 XL, Pixel 3 XL, Pixel 3a XL, Pixel 4 XL

OnePlus Models: 6, 6T

OnePlus Models: 7 Pro, 7T, 7T Pro

And all other phones!

 

Ready to make a pledge?  

When you make a pledge, please email us at mycase@castawaycase.com to let us know your smartphone model. Before shipping, we will send an email to confirm the details. 

Want More Mods? 

After you back our campaign, we'll send you an email with options to purchase additional mods for your castAway™ case. 

If you have any ideas for future Mods you'd like to see us explore, please reach out to us on our website.

Customer Support

If you have questions, please refer to our FAQ here on our website or send us an email.  For questions about:

  • Making a pledge including shipping:   sales@castawaycase.com
  • How the product works or specs:   support@castawaycase.com
  • General business inquiries:  geoff@castawaycase.com 

We will do our best to reply within the same business day.   

We love feedback!  Please email any comments and ideas to suggestion-box@castawaycase.com. 

If you want to get to know us better, please check out our project updates and comments on Indiegogo.  We have spent a great deal of effort to chronicle our progress and provide all sorts of details as to how the castAway™ case is taking shape. 

Hopefully, our passion shines through!

Why We're Using Indiegogo

We've built the prototype and moving into the manufacturing production phase.  We need your help to bring it to the world. When you contribute to our campaign, you will get an early-bird unit for a fantastic price, and you'll help us build something everyone needs: a powerful second screen for the smartphone you already own and love!

How Can You Help? 

Help Build the Buzz - Our Indiegogo campaign was a huge success, and we want to extend a warm thanks to our backers.  We are thrilled with everyone's passion and interest.  We hope to reach $1 Million in sales by the time we start shipping.  If we can do that, we can afford to make a couple of other case material options available as upgrades.  What could they be? You tell us.  To help us get there, we are setting some stretch objectives and a referral program to help motivate the base!   

Stretch Goals   

Help us get to...

  1. $ 500 K - and we will throw in a spare EMR stylus  
  2. $ 600 K - and we will throw in a screen protector for the castAway™ one (tablet screen)
  3. $ 750 K - and we will unlock an option to personalize your castAway™case with your name or initials.  As an early backer, you will be able to pledge this perk for $20 (60% Discount)
  4. $1 M - and we will add 2 other case material options 

New Referral Program 

  1. Refer five new backers - receive a 128 GB SD Card
  2. Refer ten new backers - receive a pair Apple AirPods or Samsung Galaxy Buds 
  3. Top Refer - receive a castAway™ case bundle (any size) 

Click Here to learn how to get credit for your referrals. 

Challenges

Making hardware is difficult, but our team has decades of experience. One unexpected wrinkle in our plan was the spread of the Coronavirus throughout the world; which will have an affect on parts of our supply chain. As of February 2020, we plan shipping the Case & Mods (minus the One Tablet Screen) by August and the castAway™ one by October. 

Going forward, there could always be extenuating issues that could slow down the delivery, but we believe our products will be available as expected.

Fits the castAway™ one/S 5.8” screen
iPhone Models:  6, 6S, 7, 8, X, XS, XR, 11, 11 Pro
Samsung Models: S7, S8, S9, S10, Note 7
castAway™ case/L
Fits the castAway™ one/L 6.3” screen
iPhone Models: 6 Plus, 6S Plus, 7 Plus, 8 Plus, XS Max, 11 Pro Max
Samsung Models: S8+, S9+, S10+, Note 8, Note 9, Note 10
castAway™one/XL
Fits the castAway™ one/XL 6.9” screen
Samsung Models: Note 10+
castAway™one/Universal
Pixel Models: Pixel, Pixel XL, Pixel 2, Pixel 3, Pixel 3a, Pixel 4
Pixel Models: Pixel 2 XL, Pixel 3 XL, Pixel 3a XL, Pixel 4 XL
OnePlus Models: 6, 6T
OnePlus Models: 7 Pro, 7T, 7T Pro
And all other phones!
 
Ready to make a pledge?  
When you make a pledge, please email us at mycase@castawaycase.com to let us know your smartphone model. Before shipping, we will send an email to confirm the details. 
Want More Mods? 
After you back our campaign, we'll send you an email with options to purchase additional mods for your castAway™ case. 
If you have any ideas for future Mods you'd like to see us explore, please reach out to us on our website.
Customer Support
If you have questions, please refer to our FAQ here on our website or send us an email.  For questions about:

Making a pledge including shipping:   sales@castawaycase.com

How the product works or specs:   support@castawaycase.com

General business inquiries:  geoff@castawaycase.com 

We will do our best to reply within the same business day.   
We love feedback!  Please email any comments and ideas to suggestion-box@castawaycase.com. 
If you want to get to know us better, please check out our project updates and comments on Indiegogo.  We have spent a great deal of effort to chronicle our progress and provide all sorts of details as to how the castAway™ case is taking shape. 
Hopefully, our passion shines through!

Why We're Using Indiegogo

We've built the prototype and moving into the manufacturing production phase.  We need your help to bring it to the world. When you contribute to our campaign, you will get an early-bird unit for a fantastic price, and you'll help us build something everyone needs: a powerful second screen for the smartphone you already own and love!
How Can You Help? 
Help Build the Buzz - Our Indiegogo campaign was a huge success, and we want to extend a warm thanks to our backers.  We are thrilled with everyone's passion and interest.  We hope to reach $1 Million in sales by the time we start shipping.  If we can do that, we can afford to make a couple of other case material options available as upgrades.  What could they be? You tell us.  To help us get there, we are setting some stretch objectives and a referral program to help motivate the base!   
Stretch Goals   
Help us get to...

$ 500 K - and we will throw in a spare EMR stylus  
$ 600 K - and we will throw in a screen protector for the castAway™ one (tablet screen)
$ 750 K - and we will unlock an option to personalize your castAway™case with your name or initials.  As an early backer, you will be able to pledge this perk for $20 (60% Discount)
$1 M - and we will add 2 other case material options 

New Referral Program 

Refer five new backers - receive a 128 GB SD Card
Refer ten new backers - receive a pair Apple AirPods or Samsung Galaxy Buds 
Top Refer - receive a castAway™ case bundle (any size) 

Click Here to learn how to get credit for your referrals. 

Challenges
Making hardware is difficult, but our team has decades of experience. One unexpected wrinkle in our plan was the spread of the Coronavirus throughout the world; which will have an affect on parts of our supply chain. As of February 2020, we plan shipping the Case & Mods (minus the One Tablet Screen) by August and the castAway™ one by October. 
Going forward, there could always be extenuating issues that could slow down the delivery, but we believe our products will be available as expected.

story:
ANAVI Infrared pHAT was successfully funded and all perks from the crowdfunding campaign were shipped two months ahead of schedule! Thank you all for the positive feedback and support. If you have any questions, recommendations or if you want to purchase again ANAVI Infrared pHAT please do not hesitate to contact us at info@anavi.technology.

 

What is ANAVI Infrared pHAT?

ANAVI Infrared pHAT is an add-on that converts your Raspberry Pi to a powerful remote control and brings your old TV, HiFi or air conditioning to the era of Internet of Things (IoT). The board features:

  • 2x 5mm IR transmitters (IR LEDs)
  • IR receiver (IR photo sensor)
  • Slots for up to 3 plug and play sensors
  • UART pins for debugging

Getting started with ANAVI Infrared pHAT is super easy. No soldering is required. You can assemble the kit with your bare hands and start using it immediately on Raspbian, the most popular GNU/Linux distribution for Raspberry Pi. Comprehensive user's manual with exact steps is available. Out of the box ANAVI Infrared pHAT supports sensors for temperature, humidity, barometric pressure and light. Free and open source examples written in Python and C are available in GitHub.

ANAVI Infrared pHAT started as a small hobby project of Leon Anavi. The boards are designed, manufactured and assembled in his hometown Plovdiv, Bulgaria, EU.

Can I control my TV and HiFi?

Yes, with ANAVI Infrared pHAT and the open source software LIRC you can scan the remote control of your TV and/or HiFi and after to control the device through your Raspberry Pi.

Can I control my air conditioning?

Yes, although air conditioning remote controls are much more sophisticated you can still scan them and control the air conditioning with ANAVI Infrared pHAT. The user's manual features an example how to configure LIRC to turn on and off an air conditioner. 

Which Sensors Are Supported?

ANAVI Infrared pHAT officially supports the following I2C sensor modules:

  • HTU21 for temperature and humidity
  • BMP180/BMP280 for barometric pressure
  • BH1750 for light

You may also attach any other I2C sensors but you will have to take care of their software integration.

Which Raspberry Pi Versions and Models Are Supported

ANAVI Infrared pHAT is compatible with the following Raspberry Pi models and versions:

  • Raspberry Pi 3 Model B
  • Raspberry Pi 2 Model B
  • Raspberry Pi 1 Model A+
  • Raspberry Pi 1 Model B+
  • Raspberry Pi 0
  • Raspberry Pi 0 W

ANAVI Infrared pHAT is NOT compatible with the earlier 26-pin models of Raspberry Pi 1 Model B & A's.

Is ANAVI Infrared pHAT an Open Source Project?

Yes, ANAVI Infrared pHAT is an open source hardware project powered and created with free and open source software. The board is designed with the free and open source electronics design automation suite KiCAD. The schematics, the PCB design and open source software are available in GitHub. 

Open source sample applications written in Python and the C programming language are provided. Using LIRC, the popular free and open source software for Linux, you may scan IR remote controls and control home appliances such as TV, HiFi, air conditioning, etc.  Have a look at the comprehensive user's manual to learn more.

What Are the Perks?

ANAVI Infrared pHAT IndieGoGo campaign offers the following perks:

ANAVI Infrared pHAT is included in all perks. Raspberry Pi is NOT included in any of the perks.

How Do You Ship the Perks?

Any of the perks are shipped worldwide via the registered airmail service of Bulgarian Posts. The shipping cost depends on the perk and your location.

The shipping price includes packaging in an individual cardboard box and an envelope with air bubbles for extra safety during the transportation.

Why ANAVI Infrared pHAT Needs You?

ANAVI Infrared pHAT has been already a stable product. We have working prototypes and a small-run batch. Now we need your help to gather enough funds and to go for mass production. 

Together we can reduce the manufacturing costs and cut the end product price. Any contribution has an impact and can make the difference. Please help us make ANAVI Infrared pHAT a successful project!

How Can I Get Involved and Help?

Buy any of the available perks, get your hands on ANAVI Infrared pHAT, contribute to our Git repositories and become part of our open source community!

What Are the Stretch Goals?

Our crowdfunding campaign has a very modest goal of $500, but if we hit:

  • 200% there will be awesome stickers for all contributors,
  • 500% we will provide you a free and open source script to simplify the scanning of air conditioning remote controls,
  • 2000% we will provide you a simple, free and open source web interface for monitoring the sensors and sending IR commands.

What Is the Road Map of ANAVI Infrared pHAT?

We already have a stable product and we need your help to go for mass production!

Want to Know More?

Please visit our website at anavi.technology, Facebook and Twitter for more information.

Thank You!

This Infrared pHAT was started as a hobby project by Leon Anavi and it has been moving forward thanks to him and his friends. Special thanks to Rangel Ivanov for his help with the PCB design of ANAVI Infrared pHAT using the free and open source tool KiCAD.
