story:
Missed the campaign?

You can still pre-order Soap at great price at MySoapHome.com  

 

Introducing

The revolutionary new replacement for your router.  Built to put you in control over all the wireless devices in your home.  Soap was created to allow you to decide what information passes through your home.

Soap is your all-in-one wireless home management system.  

Soap is your wireless home management  system.  You have top-level control over everything on your network. Soap is a secure intelligent router that keeps your personal data protected. Control your home from your smartphone, tablet, or Soap device.  Soap gives you control over all your wirelessly connected devices, whether it be the garage door, lights, blinds, computers, smartphones, tablets or game consoles.  You can be in control.  


There are many things that make Soap awesome(click to read more):

  • Soap is a Quad-Band Router
  • Soap is your home automation hub
  • Soap is Cheetah Fast
  • Soap is Secure
  • Soap is Your Parental Control Hub 
  • Soap is an Android Tablet
  • Soap Mesh
  • Soap Models
  • Soap Technical 
  • Soap Accessories and Upgrades
  • Soap FAQ


High Speed Intelligent Quad Band Router 802.11ac

Quad-Band WiFi with Soap Connect changes your perception of what a router should be. With two 2.4GHz band and two 5GHz WiFi bands Soap has speeds unmatched by its competitors.  Soap has more power, speed and ability then any of those grotesque looking routers coming out these days. 

 Soap has quad band and no one else does.

The benefit of such speeds and hardware?

 Soap allows for more devices at faster speeds then any other and Soap is smart enough to assign the right band to the correct device that way you don't have any waste of bandwidth or time. 

  • Quad Band—4 dedicated WiFi producing an incredible combined WiFi speeds with up to 2GB/s with up to 3GB/s with upgrades and even more with the Soap Mesh technology
  • Beam forming technology
  • Gigabit wired—Ideal for HD gaming and video
  • Gigabit WiFi—Future generation WiFI speeds zero lag speeds 3 times faster then your wire
  • Quad core processor—Quad Core 1GHz processor multiple offload processors boost performance.
  • 2 GB DDR3 Ram and 128GB SSD--upgrade as you like
  • First Bluetooth Router-- Soap not only gives you WiFi but it also gives you the ability to route Bluetooth.
  • First Mesh Router--Soap is the first to have it all and can mesh network with the best of them and can still be old school when you need it.
  • Tons of inputs--Soap also boasts a impressive range of connections and inputs: USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATAII, mPCIe, RJ45, HDMI and more.
  • Soap Mesh Technology- With Soap mesh you are able to link two Soap devices wirelessly as one allowing them to become bigger, faster and stronger.  



Soap works with everything

Soap is the most friendly device in world. It has a ton of built-in connectivity including; Wi-Fi, Zigbee, Z-Wave, Insteon, BLE, and many more. With about every different type of connection built into Soap, it will have no problem connecting to every device in your home.

Soap will work with OSX, Windows, Linux and even Google Chrome.


 

 

 

Only router with 7” and 8.4” Displays

The Soap Solo, Dual and Quad all include a 7" HD display and the Soap 8.4 edition includes the 8.4" HD display. The display allows for easy set up and easy access.

Top





Soap is fast, Cheetah Fast!


  • ARM Freescale Processor - With Soap, you have the option of a scorching fast Freescale IMX6 Quad Core ARM processor, Freescale dual core processor and Freescale solo processor. With this much processing power, Soap's possibilities are endless.
  • Storage - 32GB on board storage and 128GB SSD available for so much network storage and personal cloud data you wont understand what the heck your old router was trying to pull.
  • 2GB of DDR3 Ram - You will not find another router on the market that features 2GB of DDR3 Ram. Most only have a wimpy 256MB or just omit that from the data sheet.
  • Double Dual Band Wireless - Soap features two, yes two Wi-Fi Chipsets— a dual band 802.11AC chipset and a dual band 802.11N chipset.
  • Wireless Gigabit Speeds - With 802.11AC Wi-Fi chipset Soap features wireless gigabit speeds, now you can get faster connections wireless than you can wired. With this, ethernet cables may become a thing of the past.
  • Gigabit Ethernet - If you still need to use Ethernet ports, that is not a problem Soap boasts gigabit Ethernet speeds.
  • USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATAII - More inputs then any router or home automation hub.
  • Touch Screen - 7 inch or 8.4 inch HD touchscreen capacitive touch HD LCD.
  • Home Automation - Z wave, Zigbee, WiFi, Insteon, X10, 433 mhz, Audio, IR and more.
  • Soap Mesh - Soap has the unique ability to create a wireless cluster which means, if you have two Soap devices they not only extend the range and signal strength, they work together as one big Soap sharing CPU, Storage and more.

Top


Soap is secure

Soap Virus/Malware Protection

Soap will have built-in and continually updated virus and malware protection. So instead of installing one of those annoying virus protection software packs on each computer in your home, a Soap device will protect them all.


Soap Flypaper

Soap Flypaper is a feature that presents fake vulnerable areas on your network for would-be hackers. Once a hacker has hit these vulnerable areas the hacker is then trapped.

 

Soap Mesh Secure

Soap Mesh gives you unheard of security for your home network. With two more Soap devices wirelessly clustered, it allows Soap to run checks or balances to verify that your home network and all connected devices are always secure.

Top



Home Automation Hub


Soap can communicate with with everything.

With Soap, there is no need to have a hub to communicate with each and every home automation device you have. Soap has all the top home automation protocols built right in;


Zigbee, Z-Wave, Bluetooth, X10, WiFi, 433 Mhz and more


Control everything from one app

Not only will Soap boast more hardware for home automation than any device on the market, it will also offer the Soap Automation app that has the ability to control all your connected devices from an easy-to-use app.

With the recent announcement of the Apple Home Kit, you will now be able to control your Soap device with Siri. "Siri, please close the garage.



Parental Controls 

Soap Bully Protect - Soap has the ability to protect your kids and to notify you when kids are not being appropriate online.  This is done by monitoring what is being said to your kids on social media and other communication platforms—it notifies you when specific content triggers are met. 

Soap Pornography Stopper - Soap can block pornography and other illicit content better than has ever been done before. We don't just rely on slow proxies and and black lists to do it. We have unique never before used techniques to keep your children safe.

Content Filtering - With the Soap content filter, you have the ability to control what content each user on your network has access to.

Time Limits - Soap allows parents to control the amount of time their children have online access as well as specific sites they have access to. Parents also have the ability to control the time of day their children can get online or only allow them to go to certain sites.

Black Listing - The black list feature lets the user set up a list of banned websites on their network. They also can set specific lists per user, not the network.


Soap runs Android


Soap is the only device of its kind that is running the latest Android operating system. This gives Soap a distinct advantage over the competition and allows for a great future of development.

 

 

With the Android OS running on Soap, you have access to all the official Soap apps, along with the hundreds of thousands of third-party apps that are currently available and will be available in the future.



Soap Exclusive Apps


Easy to use interface

 

We plan to launch Soap with the following apps and may add additional apps at future dates.

Soap Automation: This app will serve as your home automation hub, this will basically be the universal remote of home automation. It will allow you to interact with just about every home automation device currently on the market.

Soap Guardian: This will give you the ability to monitor what your children do online and control when and how they access the Internet

Soap Security: This will be essential for protecting your home network from malicious attacks like malware and viruses.

Soap Wi-Fi: Soap Wi-Fi gives the Soap device the ability to be a router, it will include all the basic functionality that a high end network router should have.


 


Soap Models



Top











Soap Mesh 


Soap Mesh is a technology we have created that allows two or more Soap devices the ability to create a Soap Mesh Cluster. What is a Soap Mesh Cluster? The closest example to a Soap Cluster is most similar to what is known as a Beowulf cluster.  So Soap Mesh will allow two or more Soap devices to work together wirelessly as one super computer adding advantages of computing power, storage, security and even creates greater coverage and range of all the wireless connectivity in Soap. 

Every time you add a Soap device to your collective it gets bigger, faster and stronger.  This also has the added benefit of never needing to throw out Soap! The older ones will always beneficial to the hive!


Soap Mobile




Soap will be developing mobile apps for the iOS7, iOS8 and Android. 

We don't have any firm time frames but a Windows mobile app will also be developed (we may do it more quickly if we reach our stretch goal).


Soap Accessories

Soap with no rope - Wireless Ethernet


A wireless 802.11AC USB/RJ45 jack allows a wireless link from Soap to the WAN on your router.  No ethernet cord required!

Soap Dish - Wireless Charge Pad

You might not be aware of this but all Soap devices come with a simple wireless charger (in the case) that integrates with the device. This means that Soap is wireless charger-ready but we think that you might like the Soap Dish better. Just place and charge!

Soap Dish Product Features and Specifications

  • Product is suitable for all Soap versions and Soap accessories
  • Triple-coil wireless charging pad included - no need to line this up just place and go.
  • Will work with other devices
  • Charging Current: 700mA
  • Soap secure TPM to verify authenticity and protect devices
  • 3-Coli transmitter pad
  • Input: DC 5V/1000mAh to 2000mAh
  • Output: 5V 1000mAh
  • Frequency: 100 to 200 KHz
  • Wireless distance: 5 mm
  • Micro USB cable included
  • Size (LW):22 cm x 15 CM

Soap Bar


This is the Soap Automation Swiss Army knife and tracker tag.

With Soap Bar you can now find things, monitor things, trigger things—making your home smart.

We have created a multi-tool in terms of home automation and more. The Soap Bar is a BLE tracker tag similar to the ones found on the crowd funding websites but with our own Soap spin and features specific to the home.

Soap Bar Features and Specifications:

  • Bluetooth 4.0 low-energy, enabling a range of up to 150ft.
  • Operates in LPM (low power mode) preserving battery life and increases wireless performance
  • Is 4 mm thick and replaceable battery lasts up to five years
  • So many sensors—temperature, accelerometer, vibration, light, motion
  • Stick to objects such as keys and will vibrate and alarm via Soap Automation app…
  • Customize its job for scene management and home automation uses
  • Hook it to granny as a fall alert
  • Via Soap Things App you can monitor all your Soap Bars, devices and future accessories
  • Soap secure TPM to verify authenticity
  • Works with 3rd party development and has API

Soap Speak 


Wireless HD Bluetooth Microphone and Speaker with 3.5 MM adapter.

Speak to Soap and let Soap speak to you. Controlling most of our apps via voice. This accessory will allow you to check up on Soap and our different apps via voice from anywhere you place it. You can have multiple units to utilize the voice features anywhere in your house.  Also will integrate with Google Now.  

  • high-output speaker and listening mic.
  • 3.5mm audio jack for connecting to a speaker and mic.
  • Bluetooth 4.0 low-energy, enabling a range of up to 150ft.
  • battery power/micro usb and can be charged with Soap Dish. 
  • super long battery life: 8 hours consistent use and up to 2 weeks of standby time. 
  • voice automated security - Voice recognition for router features like voice WPS.
  • can be used as a home automation trigger and listener.
  • Works with 3rd party development and has API

Soap Color Upgrades

EARN FREE STUFF

Share the Soap Program.

We think everyone needs a little Soap their lives so we are going to offer a few ways to get some free Soap and Soap upgrades. 

For every $200 in contributions from people you refer, we will send you a $20 refund!

How it works: Simply pledge to a Soap device of your choice to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (below the main video at the top of the page). Spread the word about Soap with your friends all over the Internet and you'll earn refunds quickly! Use sites like, Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Stumble Upon, BuzzFeed, forums and blogs are great places to share your URL!

The Easy Way: Facebook users love photos. Sharing your URL with Indiegogo's sharing tools is great, but sharing one of the photos on this page is easy and effective. Here's how you do it:

1.Save a photo from our campaign to your computer.

2.Log in to Facebook, and click "Add Photos/Video."

3.Click on "Upload Photos/Video" and browse to the photo you saved.

4.Write a quick testimonial about our campaign—be sure to share your special URL!

5.Click “Post.”

Free Color Upgrade Program

If you want to earn a free all-color upgrade all you need to do is make sure you logged into your IndieGoGo account, visit our IndieGoGo page and click the share buttons directly under our video.  If you get 15 people to just visit our page via your unique link we will give you a free color upgrade!






Soap as a Router

At the base of Soap is one of the most powerful routers that will be on the market. 

Four high performance antennas 

The primary WiFi chipset has 3 external SMA antenna ports for increasing reception. The secondary WiFi chipset has 1 internal PCB antenna and 1 external SMA connector for antenna ext. for reception.

Freescale ARM processor 

We are using the the following Freescale ARM processors in our Soap devices:  

  • •  Solo- Freescale® i.MX6 Solo ARM Cortex A9 (1.0 GHz, 512KB L2 Cache, )
  • •  Dual-Freescale® i.MX6 Dual ARM Cortex A9 (2 x 1.0 GHz, 1MB L2 Cache, )
  • •  Quad-Freescale® i.MX6 Quad ARM Cortex A9 (4 x 1.0 GHz, 1MB L2Cache,)
  • •  8.4-Freescale® i.MX6 Quad ARM Cortex A9 (4 x 1.2 GHz, 1MB L2Cache, )

Soap Tech Specs


Soap Developer Program

Become a developer for Soap, and we will give you access to everything you need to develop and create your apps for Soap. 

The Soap Developer Program will offer a complete set of technical resources, support and access to pre-release software—providing developers with everything they need to create innovative apps for Soap devices. 

Soap Developer Community 

Soap is also working on the creation of the Soap Developer Community forum.  We want to offer a resource where developers can help other developers with their apps and issues they may run into. 

When will this be available 

The Soap Developer community and SDK access should be ready in late July or early August of this year. 


Why its called Soap

The name Soap comes from the initial idea for the product.  When we originally sat down and discussed what would become Soap, we were designing a product that filtered Internet content that you didn't want your kids seeing online, thus Soap cleans your Internet.  As Soap evolved and became the great product it currently is, the name Soap stuck.  


Made in the USA

Not only was Soap designed right here in Colorado, but we also have done everything we can to keep the production of Soap in the United States and that is why we have chosen to do Soap's manufacturing in Santa Anna, CA with Express Manufacturing Incorporated.   

DEVA/EMI

Here are a some images of the facility in California that is printing and assembling the Soap PCB.


The Soap PCB

We are in the last stage of production as we go into manufacturing our first 5 final retail units. We have worked through 6 different prototype revisions and have settled with this one.

Soap Board Production 

The Soap Board


Soap on IndieGoGo

We have come to IndieGoGo for a couple of reasons. First, we believe that being on IndieGoGo will make Soap a stronger brand and product. Second, we believe that with your help, we can make Soap one of the highest-grossing crowd-funding campaigns in IndieGoGo history and third, we are about to go into production and want to raise as much capital as possible in order to do a large production run. 

About Us

Alex pitching Soap last Thursday June 26, 2014 to Peak Startup.  


Soap in the Press


Soap Radio Interviews

Interview on Bootcamp Radio

Interview on Popular Science Radio


 


In order to bring a product as complex and powerful as Soap you have to have some help.  We have partnered with multiple large companies in the technology industry in order to bring the best Soap product that is possible. 


  • Freescale is supplying the processors for the different Soap models.
  • Congatec is the maker of what we like to call "The Brain." They are a world-recognized SOM vendor and manufacture and we are excited to be working with them.  www.congatec.com
  • RedPine Signals is the provides of our Dual 802.11n(gba) 2.4/5, Bluetooth 4.0 and Zigbee hardware and is a industry leader in wearables, WiFi and Internet of Things devices.
  • Marvell is providing the primary 802.11AC Wi-Fi Chipset that gives Soap the insanely fast Wi-Fi speeds. 4x4 MIMO and Beam-forming technology.
  • Avnet is helping Soap source and secure some of Soap parts. 
  • EMI is our turn-key manufacture and literally does it all. When we give them the go-ahead with Soap, they will print, assemble and even package and ship to you guys. Check them out! 
  • DeVa is our go-to quick turn and rapid prototype able to do small test builds in time that makes us all happy.  We use them to create small builds pre-large-scale manufacturing and to fill in more of the supply chain gaps that can occur with building complex devices such has Soap.
  • HWI is the design and layout house responsible for the retail Soap and we are glad to have them local.  With such industry experts working on Soap we are able to implement amazing solutions to "impossible" problems. http://www.hwimfg.com
  • PLX makes a part for the Soap device that is a real life saver and we are so very grateful to have a a PLX part on board. http://www.plxtech.com/
  • FCC, EU and other country regulatory approval. http://www.emcintegrity.com/


FAQ


When will I get to choose the color of my Soap? 

Following the end of the project, backers will be contacted to confirm color choices.

What are my Soap Color options?

Currently we are looking at the following colors: Silver, Gold, Gun Metal, and Blue.  The Blue will be standard and other may be offered as an upgrade. 

Am I supposed to add shipping if I’m in the United States?

Yes, if you are located in the United States or Canada please add 6 dollars to your pledge, and 6 dollars for each additional Soap devices.  If you forgot to add shipping to your initial pledge, you can just contribute the additional amount and we will match everything up at the end of the campaign.

Am I supposed to add shipping for international orders?

Yes, if you are located outside United States or Canada please add 35 dollars to your pledge, and 6 dollars for each additional Soap devices.  If you forgot to add shipping to your initial pledge, you can just contribute the additional amount and we will match everything up at the end of the campaign.

What is shipping on Soap accessories and hardware upgrades?

There is no shipping charge for Soap Accessories, or Soap hardware upgrades. This applies to both domestic and international orders. 

When are you going to be shipping my Soap device? 

Indiegogo isn't like Amazon or any other online store. When you contribute to Soap you are funding all of our engineering, software, manufacturing and shipping. Everything that is needed to bring a real product to market.

Estimated national and international shipping for early units is October/November 2014 and the rest we are anticipating in late December 2014-February 2015.

How do I change my pledge?

There is not an easy way to do this, but if you email us at info@imsoap we will take care of your request. 

I need to change my address!

We will be contacting all our contributors at the end of the campaign about their product choice. When we do, please respond and let us know the correct address where you would like your Soap shipped.

If I don't get the upgrade do I get access to the Soap Media App? 

 Yes all backers from IndieGoGo/KickStarter will receive the Soap Media App on their Soap devices. Though some of the features of the app will designed with these extra features in mind. 

How Many devices do Soap Audio/Video packs cover? 

 each pledge covers a single device, so if you want one to cover each device you will have to pledge for each additional device.
story_txt:
Missed the campaign?You can still pre-order Soap at great price at MySoapHome.com   


Introducing
The revolutionary new replacement for your router.  Built to put you in control over all the wireless devices in your home.  Soap was created to allow you to decide what information passes through your home.Soap is your all-in-one wireless home management system.  Soap is your wireless home management  system.  You have top-level control over everything on your network. Soap is a secure intelligent router that keeps your personal data protected. Control your home from your smartphone, tablet, or Soap device.  Soap gives you control over all your wirelessly connected devices, whether it be the garage door, lights, blinds, computers, smartphones, tablets or game consoles.  You can be in control.  There are many things that make Soap awesome(click to read more):

Soap is a Quad-Band Router
Soap is your home automation hub
Soap is Cheetah Fast
Soap is Secure
Soap is Your Parental Control Hub 
Soap is an Android Tablet
Soap Mesh
Soap Models
Soap Technical 
Soap Accessories and Upgrades
Soap FAQ



High Speed Intelligent Quad Band Router 802.11acQuad-Band WiFi with Soap Connect changes your perception of what a router should be. With two 2.4GHz band and two 5GHz WiFi bands Soap has speeds unmatched by its competitors.  Soap has more power, speed and ability then any of those grotesque looking routers coming out these days.  Soap has quad band and no one else does.The benefit of such speeds and hardware? Soap allows for more devices at faster speeds then any other and Soap is smart enough to assign the right band to the correct device that way you don't have any waste of bandwidth or time. 

Quad Band—4 dedicated WiFi producing an incredible combined WiFi speeds with up to 2GB/s with up to 3GB/s with upgrades and even more with the Soap Mesh technology


Beam forming technology


Gigabit wired—Ideal for HD gaming and video


Gigabit WiFi—Future generation WiFI speeds zero lag speeds 3 times faster then your wire


Quad core processor—Quad Core 1GHz processor multiple offload processors boost performance.


2 GB DDR3 Ram and 128GB SSD--upgrade as you like


First Bluetooth Router-- Soap not only gives you WiFi but it also gives you the ability to route Bluetooth.


First Mesh Router--Soap is the first to have it all and can mesh network with the best of them and can still be old school when you need it.


Tons of inputs--Soap also boasts a impressive range of connections and inputs: USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATAII, mPCIe, RJ45, HDMI and more.


Soap Mesh Technology- With Soap mesh you are able to link two Soap devices wirelessly as one allowing them to become bigger, faster and stronger.  





Soap works with everythingSoap is the most friendly device in world. It has a ton of built-in connectivity including; Wi-Fi, Zigbee, Z-Wave, Insteon, BLE, and many more. With about every different type of connection built into Soap, it will have no problem connecting to every device in your home.
Soap will work with OSX, Windows, Linux and even Google Chrome.

 
 
 
Only router with 7” and 8.4” Displays
The Soap Solo, Dual and Quad all include a 7" HD display and the Soap 8.4 edition includes the 8.4" HD display.  The display allows for easy set up and easy access.
Top


Soap is fast, Cheetah Fast!



ARM Freescale Processor - With Soap, you have the option of a scorching fast Freescale IMX6 Quad Core ARM processor, Freescale dual core processor and Freescale solo processor. With this much processing power, Soap's possibilities are endless.


Storage - 32GB on board storage and 128GB SSD available for so much network storage and personal cloud data you wont understand what the heck your old router was trying to pull.


2GB of DDR3 Ram - You will not find another router on the market that features 2GB of DDR3 Ram. Most only have a wimpy 256MB or just omit that from the data sheet.


Double Dual Band Wireless - Soap features two, yes two Wi-Fi Chipsets— a dual band 802.11AC chipset and a dual band 802.11N chipset.


Wireless Gigabit Speeds - With 802.11AC Wi-Fi chipset Soap features wireless gigabit speeds, now you can get faster connections wireless than you can wired. With this, ethernet cables may become a thing of the past.


Gigabit Ethernet - If you still need to use Ethernet ports, that is not a problem Soap boasts gigabit Ethernet speeds.


USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATAII - More inputs then any router or home automation hub.


Touch Screen - 7 inch or 8.4 inch HD touchscreen capacitive touch HD LCD.


Home Automation - Z wave, Zigbee, WiFi, Insteon, X10, 433 mhz, Audio, IR and more.


Soap Mesh - Soap has the unique ability to create a wireless cluster which means, if you have two Soap devices they not only extend the range and signal strength, they work together as one big Soap sharing CPU, Storage and more.



Top


Soap is secure
Soap Virus/Malware Protection

Soap will have built-in and continually updated virus and malware protection.  So instead of installing one of those annoying virus protection software packs on each computer in your home, a Soap device will protect them all.

Soap Flypaper
Soap Flypaper is a feature that presents fake vulnerable areas on your network for would-be hackers. Once a hacker has hit these vulnerable areas the hacker is then trapped.


 
Soap Mesh Secure
Soap Mesh gives you unheard of security for your home network. With two more Soap devices wirelessly clustered, it allows Soap to run checks or balances to verify that your home network and all connected devices are always secure.

Top


Home Automation Hub
Soap can communicate with with everything.
With Soap, there is no need to have a hub to communicate with each and every home automation device you have.  Soap has all the top home automation protocols built right in;
            
Zigbee, Z-Wave, Bluetooth, X10, WiFi, 433 Mhz and moreControl everything from one app
Not only will Soap boast more hardware for home automation than any device on the market, it will also offer the Soap Automation app that has the ability to control all your connected devices from an easy-to-use app.
With the recent announcement of the Apple Home Kit, you will now be able to control your Soap device with Siri.  "Siri, please close the garage.
Parental Controls Soap Bully Protect - Soap has the ability to protect your kids and to notify you when kids are not being appropriate online.  This is done by monitoring what is being said to your kids on social media and other communication platforms—it notifies you when specific content triggers are met. Soap Pornography Stopper - Soap can block pornography and other illicit content better than has ever been done before. We don't just rely on slow proxies and and black lists to do it. We have unique never before used techniques to keep your children safe.Content Filtering - With the Soap content filter, you have the ability to control what content each user on your network has access to.Time Limits - Soap allows parents to control the amount of time their children have online access as well as specific sites they have access to. Parents also have the ability to control the time of day their children can get online or only allow them to go to certain sites.Black Listing - The black list feature lets the user set up a list of banned websites on their network. They also can set specific lists per user, not the network.Soap runs Android
Soap is the only device of its kind that is running the latest Android operating system. This gives Soap a distinct advantage over the competition and allows for a great future of development.
 
 
With the Android OS running on Soap, you have access to all the official Soap apps, along with the hundreds of thousands of third-party apps that are currently available and will be available in the future. 
Soap Exclusive Apps
Easy to use interface
 
We plan to launch Soap with the following apps and may add additional apps at future dates.

Soap Automation: This app will serve as your home automation hub, this will basically be the universal remote of home automation.  It will allow you to interact with just about every home automation device currently on the market.  

Soap Guardian:  This will give you the ability to monitor what your children do online and control when and how they access the Internet
Soap Security: This will be essential for protecting your home network from malicious attacks like malware and viruses. 

Soap Wi-Fi: Soap Wi-Fi gives the Soap device the ability to be a router, it will include all the basic functionality that a high end network router should have.
 
Soap Models
 






 TopSoap Mesh 
Soap Mesh is
a technology we have created that allows two or more Soap devices the ability
to create a Soap Mesh Cluster. What is a Soap Mesh Cluster? The closest example
to a Soap Cluster is most similar to what is known as a Beowulf cluster.  So Soap Mesh will allow two or more Soap
devices to work together wirelessly as one super computer adding advantages of
computing power, storage, security and even creates greater coverage and range
of all the wireless connectivity in Soap. 

Every time
you add a Soap device to your collective it gets bigger, faster and stronger.  This also has the added benefit of never
needing to throw out Soap! The older ones will always beneficial to the hive!Soap Mobile

Soap will be developing mobile apps for the iOS7, iOS8 and Android. We don't have any firm time frames but a Windows mobile app will also be developed (we may do it more quickly if we reach our stretch goal).Soap AccessoriesSoap with no rope - Wireless EthernetA wireless 802.11AC USB/RJ45 jack allows a wireless link from Soap to the WAN on your router.  No ethernet cord required!Soap Dish - Wireless Charge Pad
You might not be aware of this but all Soap devices come
with a simple wireless charger (in the case) that integrates with the device.
This means that Soap is wireless charger-ready but we think that you might like
the Soap Dish better. Just place and charge!

accessories

tag.
With Soap Bar you can now find things, monitor things,

We have created a multi-tool in terms of home automation and

funding websites but with our own Soap spin and features specific to the home.
Soap Bar Features and

uses

This accessory will allow you to check up on Soap and our different apps via voice from anywhere you place it. You can have multiple units to utilize the voice features anywhere in your house.  Also will integrate with Google Now.  
high-output speaker and listening mic.

battery power/micro usb and can be charged with Soap Dish.

Soap Color UpgradesEARN FREE STUFFShare the Soap Program.We think everyone needs a little Soap their lives so we are going to offer a few ways to get some free Soap and Soap upgrades. For every $200 in contributions from people you refer, we will send you a $20 refund!How it works: Simply pledge to a Soap device of your choice to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (below the main video at the top of the page). Spread the word about Soap with your friends all over the Internet and you'll earn refunds quickly! Use sites like, Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Stumble Upon, BuzzFeed, forums and blogs are great places to share your URL!The Easy Way: Facebook users love photos. Sharing your URL with Indiegogo's sharing tools is great, but sharing one of the photos on this page is easy and effective. Here's how you do it:1.Save a photo from our campaign to your computer.2.Log in to Facebook, and click "Add Photos/Video."3.Click on "Upload Photos/Video" and browse to the photo you saved.4.Write a quick testimonial about our campaign—be sure to share your special URL!5.Click “Post.”Free Color Upgrade ProgramIf you want to earn a free all-color upgrade all you need to do is make sure you logged into your IndieGoGo account, visit our IndieGoGo page and click the share buttons directly under our video.  If you get 15 people to just visit our page via your unique link we will give you a free color upgrade!

Soap as a RouterAt the base of Soap is one of the most powerful routers that will be on the market. Four high performance antennas 
The primary WiFi chipset has 3
external SMA antenna ports for increasing reception. The secondary WiFi chipset has 1 internal
PCB antenna and 1 external SMA connector for antenna ext. for reception.
Freescale ARM processor We are using the the following Freescale ARM processors in our Soap devices:  
•  Solo-
Freescale® i.MX6 Solo
ARM Cortex A9 (1.0 GHz, 512KB L2 Cache, )

•  Dual-Freescale® i.MX6 Dual ARM Cortex A9 (2 x
1.0 GHz, 1MB L2 Cache, )

•  Quad-Freescale® i.MX6 Quad ARM Cortex A9 (4 x
1.0 GHz, 1MB L2Cache,)

•  8.4-Freescale® i.MX6 Quad ARM Cortex A9 (4 x
1.2 GHz, 1MB L2Cache, )



Soap Tech SpecsSoap Developer ProgramBecome a developer for Soap, and we will give you access to everything you need to develop and create your apps for Soap. The Soap Developer Program will offer a complete set of technical resources, support and access to pre-release software—providing developers with everything they need to create innovative apps for Soap devices. Soap Developer Community Soap is also working on the creation of the Soap Developer Community forum.  We want to offer a resource where developers can help other developers with their apps and issues they may run into. When will this be available The Soap Developer community and SDK access should be ready in late July or early August of this year. 







Why its called SoapThe name Soap comes from the initial idea for the product.  When we originally sat down and discussed what would become Soap, we were designing a product that filtered Internet content that you didn't want your kids seeing online, thus Soap cleans your Internet.  As Soap evolved and became the great product it currently is, the name Soap stuck.  Made in the USANot only was Soap designed right here in Colorado, but we also have done everything we can to keep the production of Soap in the United States and that is why we have chosen to do Soap's manufacturing in Santa Anna, CA with Express Manufacturing Incorporated.   DEVA/EMIHere are a some images of the facility in California that is printing and assembling the Soap PCB.The Soap PCBWe are in the last stage of production as we go into manufacturing our first 5 final retail units. story:
INTRODUCING EZ POWER THE MOST VALUE PACKED 27000 MAH POWER DELIVERY POWER BANK THAT YOU WILL EVER GET AT USD 39

 

KEY HIGHLIGHT FEATURES

 

INTEGRATED ACCESSORIES CARD HOLDER

We all have so many devices, and every device comes with its own set of charging cables. At EZ Power, we got frustrated with all this spaghetti, so we created a slidable accessories  card holder 

 

 

REMOVABLE ACCESSORIES CARD HOLDER

Well you guessed correctly , you may just carry the accessories card holder in the pocket , it is portable and removable. You will get a full accessories urban savior when you are on the move.

MULTI COLOR ACCESSORIES CARD HOLDER TO INTERCHANGE

Break the barrier of tradition power bank , boring and always stick with one color until the power bank dies off, with EZ power mix and match it with 4 colors , black, grey, blue and gold.

Trendy and elegant to suit your outfit of the day because the accessories is attached to the power bank using magnetic base.

 

This is what I meant by suit your outfit of the day, blue outfit vs EZ blue power bank .

 

It doesn't mean that it need to be the same color as your outfit , contrast color will equally looks great as well

Smart outfit vs EZ gold power bank.

You are not going to take out an old power bank with your brand new camera Canon or laptop Macbook that you spend few thousands on , it simply doesn't match . EZ power will fit in nicely !!!!!

 

CRADLE STAND

 

Not quite enough with the feature , EZ power even comes with a cradle stand to watch YouTube or favorite movie .

MULTI COLOR AMBIENT LIGHT

HIGH SPEED CHARGING OUTPUT UP TO 5 DEVICES INCLUDING WIRELESS CHARGING.

 

MAGNETIC HEAD TIP AND CABLE

 

ELEGANT DESIGN 

You cant find any power bank that has this design elsewhere , with integrated accessories card holder and with all the feature that we pack in , EZ power are even offer to participate in Red Dot design and IF award year 2021.

 

 

 

LETS DO A SIMPLE MATH HERE , WHY EZ POWER

Take a look at Anker PowerCore 26800 on Amazon priced USD 59 with lesser features as compared to EZ Power without the accessories & card holder 

Adding an accessories card holder would cost a whopping USD 48 (Kable Card - Amazon pricing) and ESSAGER Magnetic head and tip cost USD 25

EZ Power kill 3 birds with one stone with ONLY USD 39, you'll get  27000 mAh PD power bank plus accessories card holder plus magnetic head tip and cable . An instant saving of USD 93 ,with additional feature like wireless charging, multi color ambient light , PD dual magnetic head cable and tips add on to EZ Power.

 

 

We are offering engraving services as well available on the "add on perk" for Indiegogo backers, engrave your name and be part of the sponsoring team for us. 

 

 

Marketing partner

 

#1 COMPARTMENT ON THE POWER BANK

We create a compartment on the power bank to put in an accessories card holder, to better virtualize how it work, please refer to the below image

In order to make it even more exciting we include all the important accessories into the  card holder that why it is called accessories card holder.

 

 

 

OUR 3D DESIGN MODELLING

 

We use 2 years to evolve and improve the design

 

SIM CARD HOLDER AND INJECTION PIN

 

Now, no matter where you are, you’ve got everything you’ll ever need to stay full of juice. We even included a phone pin in case you need to access the sim card.

#2 INTERCHANGABLE ACCESSORIES CARD HOLDER WITH MULTIPLE COLORS

The slidable accessories card holder  comes with 4 colors (GOLD , BLUE , GREY  And BLACK ), you may change the color depend on your preference and your taste of the day as the card is attached with the power bank using magnetic based

 

 

You must wondering can the carbon Black accessories card holder interchange color with Aluminum version accessories card holder,  Gold , Blue and Grey , the answer is yes you can , we purposely come out the Black Carbon version because we want to make it affordable for everyone to own it.

See the below video illustration for better perusal.   

4 colors options - Grey , Blue and Gold for Aluminum version , Black for Carbon version you may interchange the color for Black carbon with Gold, Blue , Grey Aluminum version and vise versa.

 

#3 MAGNETIC HEAD TIPS AND MAGNETIC HEAD CABLES

If you're anything like us you probably have a number of devices, from MacBook, iPads, another Android phone maybe for your side chicks, headphones and all of these things have different cables. 

So you stuff them into your backpack, case or just have them stuffed in a draw. What if you had a simple solution, one that easily stores all your wires and connectors. Well now you do...

 

Move between devices with ease and speed. Our premium high-quality tangle-free wires with magnetic head  tips, quickly snap on a head depending on the devices you're charging.

since our accessories card holder comes with all the magnetic heads tips as below , not 1 set but 2 sets for  each tip.

you can  mix and match the connection with your wilderness imagination , with our magnetic cable both end  is also able to mix and match . See the below visual for better perusal  

Our cable is made with nylon breaded which can sustain twist and turn.

 

Using super strong magnets, strong enough so you can dangle an iPad even though we don't recommend doing that. Our cables support PD fast charging  so you don't compromise on speed.

 

#4 HIGH CAPACITY, HIGH CHARGING SPEED, 5 DEVICES AT THE SAME TIME

 

27000 MAH SUPER FAST CHARGE POWER BANK

Having solved the problem of all the bloody accessories, we moved on to the bigger problem - power banks. Pocket-sized power banks just aren’t up to the job, you're never going to get enough juice to last you the day.

 

EZ power bank are able to charge 5 devices at once  ,with 100W output and 60W output to charge any laptop  and Nintendo switch, not only that we even throw in 2 quick charge 3.0 for fast charging any mobile devices

This isn't enough we even put in extra wireless charging 10W output .

EZ POWER BANK SPECS

Capacity: 100Wh/27000mAh 

Interface:

Max 100W USB-C Power Delivery 3.0 Input/Output
Max 60W USB-C Power Delivery 3.0 Output
Max 18W USB-A Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 Output x 2
Max 10W QI Wireless Charging

100W USB-C Input/Output PD Profile: 5V/3A, 9V/3A, 12V/3A, 15V/3A, 20V/3A, 20V/5A

60W USB-C Output PD Profile: 5V/3A, 9V/3A, 12V/3A, 15V/3A, 20V/3A

18W USB-A Output QC Profile: 3.6V~12V, Max 18W

Wireless output: 5V/1A, 2.1A, Max 10W

Maximum Power Output: 130W

Maximum Power Input: 100W  

Time to full charge from empty: 1~1.5 hours

DC/DC efficiency: Up to 98% 

Device Operating Temperature: 0~45ºC (Charging), 20~50ºC (Discharging) 

Safety Protection: Over current/voltage/temperature, short circuit protection

*TSA and FAA Certified

PRODUCT DIMENSION / WEIGHT - 86mm x 170mm x 38mm / 800 gram for aluminum and 900 gram for carbon

#5 ELEGANT AMBIENT LIGHT

MULTI COLOR AMBIENT LIGHT

Because we wanted to and also as it look super cool, we added an ambient light with multiple color from yellow, white, green red and blue color.  Nothing like wanting to charge things at night and never seeing what you're doing. 

Also its a device that'll get people talking, being flashy is what everyone loves to do anyway.

 

 

EZ POWER BUTTON FEATURE, ONE POWER BUTTON , SIMPLISTIC YET EFFICIENT DESIGN

 

ON/ OFF PRESS ONE TIME

 

AMBIENT LIGHT BUTTON (LONG PRESS)

 

 

AMBIENT LIGHT BUTTON (PRESS TWICE TO CHANGE COLOR)

 

#6 PASS THROUGH CHARGING

 

Charge up to 4 devices while you charge your EZ power. Get supercharging speeds even with multiple devices connected.

Charge EZ power from empty to full within 1-1.30  hours using PD input 100 Watt .

Double MacBook pro battery life 2 TIMES

iPhone battery life up to 6 Times more

 

 

#7 BUILT IN STAND

 

Sometimes you just want a bit of YouTube or memes in your life, holding up a phone is so long and it can even fall on your head. So we've built in a stand so you can avoid head injuries.

 

 

EZ POWER COMPETITIVE CHART 

 

CARBON EDITION 

Black color

The carbon edition material is premium plastic, similar to most other power banks on the market or accessories.

 

For more image please refer to below link

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1C3s4GlL...

 

 

COMPLETE COLLECTION 4 COLORS ALLUMINUM PLUS CARBON BLACK ONLY AT USD 209

 

 

EZ POWER PROJECT TIMELINE

 

 

THE MAKING OF EZ POWER

( ROME IS NOT BUILT IN ONE DAY SAME GOES TO EZ POWER)

Thinking back it was a glimpse of an eye , it is all started on year 2018 when we decided it is time to do something with our life , we have decided to take on entrepreneurship path and plan to quit from our usual boring MNC  job. Wilson and me David , we love to talk about business and future planning. One day when we travel to Australia from Singapore, and upon  reaching the airport our phone run out of battery and our power bank do not have the compatible cable to charge our phone.

End up we need to buy it at a retailer in Australia,  from there we started to think why not we do a power bank that equip with all the necessary accessories and cable, once we came back to Singapore we start to turn our room into technical lab.

We start to study about power bank , when we talk about that on today we will still laugh as our initial prototype look horrible, we use a cheap 3d printer to print it out  , and buy those component to assemble our self in our room.

Once we completed our first prototype we start to engage manufacturer  to produce it but than we encounter another road block because manufacturer said that our old design is very awkward and they help us to redesign all over again 

We have spend a lot of money in R & D for this power bank until we were really run out of cash and need to leverage on credit card and personal loan to  keep this project running.

Once the R &D finish on this year around AUG , manufacturer told us that they can only produce our baby EZ power if we  have a large quantity of 400 to 1000 units before they commit and they also need us to pay for the molding fee. Once we heard that from manufacturer me and Wilson couldn't  sleep for days and we  go to search for solution in  internet and even trying to approach Shark Tank ,however we are lucky to found out Kickstarter and  Indiegogo platform where  we can fulfill our dream here.

We are glad that we received overwhelming respond on Kickstarter backers and now we are in Indiegogo on demand , we want to said a  thousand thank you for those who support us and bring this project to live , i  also want  ensure you that EZ power is not built in one day but we really  study every details and  feature to make what EZ power  it is today. EZ power is the world first integrated accessories card holder that comes with 27000 mAh power bank that no  other power bank has it, we  can guarantee that , our design is so special and awesome that even the manufacturer themselves said this is the best power bank that they will ever produce so far.

Dear backers we are committed to give the finest quality power bank that you will ever experience , do send  us your support , so we can continue this journey to produce the best quality power bank to you.

TQ

INTRODUCING EZ POWER THE MOST VALUE PACKED 27000 MAH POWER DELIVERY POWER BANK THAT YOU WILL EVER GET AT USD 39
 KEY HIGHLIGHT FEATURES INTEGRATED ACCESSORIES CARD HOLDERWe all have so many devices, and every device comes with its own set of charging cables. At EZ Power, we got frustrated with all this spaghetti, so we created a slidable accessories  card holder   
REMOVABLE ACCESSORIES CARD HOLDER
Well you guessed correctly , you may just carry the accessories card holder in the pocket , it is portable and removable. You will get a full accessories urban savior when you are on the move.
MULTI COLOR ACCESSORIES CARD HOLDER TO INTERCHANGE
Break the barrier of tradition power bank , boring and always stick with one color until the power bank dies off, with EZ power mix and match it with 4 colors , black, grey, blue and gold.Trendy and elegant to suit your outfit of the day because the accessories is attached to the power bank using magnetic base. This is what I meant by suit your outfit of the day, blue outfit vs EZ blue power bank . It doesn't mean that it need to be the same color as your outfit , contrast color will equally looks great as wellSmart outfit vs EZ gold power bank.You are not going to take out an old power bank with your brand new camera Canon or laptop Macbook that you spend few thousands on , it simply doesn't match . EZ power will fit in nicely !!!!! 
CRADLE STAND
 Not quite enough with the feature , EZ power even comes with a cradle stand to watch YouTube or favorite movie .
MULTI COLOR AMBIENT LIGHT
HIGH SPEED CHARGING OUTPUT UP TO 5 DEVICES INCLUDING WIRELESS CHARGING. MAGNETIC HEAD TIP AND CABLE ELEGANT DESIGN You cant find any power bank that has this design elsewhere , with integrated accessories card holder and with all the feature that we pack in , EZ power are even offer to participate in Red Dot design and IF award year 2021.   LETS DO A SIMPLE MATH HERE , WHY EZ POWERTake a look at Anker PowerCore 26800 on Amazon priced USD 59 with lesser features as compared to EZ Power without the accessories & card holder Adding an accessories card holder would cost a whopping USD 48 (Kable Card - Amazon pricing) and ESSAGER Magnetic head and tip cost USD 25EZ Power kill 3 birds with one stone with ONLY USD 39, you'll get  27000 mAh PD power bank plus accessories card holder plus magnetic head tip and cable . An instant saving of USD 93 ,with additional feature like wireless charging, multi color ambient light , PD dual magnetic head cable and tips add on to EZ Power.  We are offering engraving services as well available on the "add on perk" for Indiegogo backers, engrave your name and be part of the sponsoring team for us.   Marketing partner

We even included a phone pin in case you need to access the sim card.#2 INTERCHANGABLE ACCESSORIES CARD HOLDER WITH MULTIPLE COLORSThe slidable accessories card holder  comes with 4 colors (GOLD , BLUE , GREY  And BLACK ), you may change the color depend on your preference and your taste of the day as the card is attached with the power bank using magnetic based  You must wondering can the carbon Black accessories card holder interchange color with Aluminum version accessories card holder,  Gold , Blue and Grey , the answer is yes you can , we purposely come out the Black Carbon version because we want to make it affordable for everyone to own it.See the below video illustration for better perusal.    4 colors options - Grey , Blue and Gold for Aluminum version , Black for Carbon version you may interchange the color for Black carbon with Gold, Blue , Grey Aluminum version and vise versa. #3 MAGNETIC HEAD TIPS AND MAGNETIC HEAD CABLESIf you're anything like us you probably have a number of devices, from MacBook, iPads, another Android phone maybe for your side chicks, headphones and all of these things have different cables. So you stuff them into your backpack, case or just have them stuffed in a draw. story:
A First of Its Kind

Runcible is a smartphone pocket watch. The first true heirloom electronic. 

  • Powerful, upgradeable, expandable electronics
  • The first ever circular touch screen
  • Built by a team of ex-Apple employees
  • Beautifully designed with real hardwood
  • Committed to sustainability, expandability and longevity
  • A device designed to enhance your life, not interrupt it
  • Easily create apps in HTML5 & JavaScript
  • Fully open source, unlocked & truly YOURS


Runcible is a new category of personal electronic which occupies a space between a traditional mobile phone and a wearable device.

Featuring a first-of-its-kind fully round screen and a palm-sized form factor, Runcible is modeled on devices humans have carried around with them and loved for hundreds or thousands of years: the pocket watch, the compact, the compass, the magical stone in your hand.

Announced in early 2015 to overwhelming fanfare, Runcible is now available to early adopters and hardware / software hackers. 

Unlike your smartphone, Runcible is a timeless piece of art and technology to cherish for years or decades.

This is your chance to own a one-of-a-kind, powerful, hackable open source smart device at cost. Join the Runcible dev community with a Dev Kit or own one of the very first Runcible Babbages, Lovelaces, or Faradays.

Manufacturing has been secured and Runcible is ready to ship in fall 2016.


Featured In:

The Verge – IDG Connect – Wired


Runcible Specs

All units come with the same Runcible brain and display:

  • Display: 2.5 inch, thin bezel, 640x640 fully round screen at ~256dpi, capacitive multi-touch Gorilla Glass 3
  • Processor: Snapdragon 410 quad core,  ARM® Cortex® A53 (64bit, 1.2GHz) Qualcomm® Adreno™ 306 GPU with OpenGL ES 3, Qualcomm® Hexagon™ v5 DSP
  • Memory / Storage: 1GB LPDDR3 RAM (533MHz ) / 8GB eMMC 5.0 Flash
  • Wireless: Wi-Fi 802.11b/g/n 2.4 GHz single band, Bluetooth 4.1, 4G/LTE
  • Camera:  Rear-facing, 7MP camera (support for up to 13MP for hackers)
  • Audio: 1x Analog In / Out (other audio I/O options available on the main board)
  • Other Interfaces: 1x USB 2.0 (client or host), 2x BLSP 4-pin port configurable as I2C, SPI, UART or GPIO
  • Location: Qualcomm® IZat™ Gen 8C GPS, GLONASS
  • Vibration: integrated vibration module for optional alerts / feedback
  • Headphones/Mic: supports Bluetooth headsets, optional USB to analog phone jack is being developed (this is the future of all smartphones)
  • OS Support: BuniOS (based on Android 5.1), Linux
  • RoHS compliant


Purchase Options



Runcible Babbage



The Babbage model is designed for the stylish experimenter and for the early adopter alike. This is a full-spec Runcible brain with a durable, organic feeling back made from reclaimed ocean plastic fished out of the Great Pacific Plastic Island.


Runcible Lovelace



The limited edition Lovelace model is designed for the Aficionado. This is a full-spec Runcible brain with an iconic, unique, solid wood back made from local, sustainably harvested madrone wood in Mendocino County, California.



Runcible Backs


Like a smartphone case, Runcible backs are easily interchangeable. Simply twist the back a 1/8 turn to remove it.

All backs are responsibly sourced from sustainable & reclaimed hardwoods in Mendocino, California, or reclaimed plastics from the Great Pacific Plastic Island.

Choose One or Collect All Four:

Madrone - sustainably sourced and crafted in Mendocino, California.

Black Acacia - sustainable sourced and crafted in Mendocino, California.

Reclaimed Ocean Plastic - fished from the Great Pacific Plastic Island and recycled into an organic feeling back.

Sinker Redwood - truly unique and extremely limited quantities.

Sinker Redwood comes from old growth redwood trunks which fell into Northern California rivers from natural causes, one hundred years ago or more. Over time, minerals from the water penetrate the wood creating a truly unique, unmistakable look and feel. A ban is now in place preventing any more sinker redwoods from being extracted from the river. With the help of master craftsmen in Mendocino, Runcible secured a limited quantity of sinker redwood to produce one hundred collector quality Runcible backs.



Runcible Apps

Runcible will initially ship with apps for...

  • Photography and photo editing in collaboration with lite.ly
  • Music playback
  • Various clocks faces
  • Star-gazing
  • Maps and exploration
  • Time and date management
  • Telephony


Both Monohm and partners are working hard on other apps as well but have not yet announced final timelines. Rest assured, we're building Runcible for the sole purpose of creating new and unique experiences.

Additionally, anyone with a bit of software development skills can create apps in HTML5 + JavaScript or as native APK packages. Documentation and tutorials will be available with the Dev Kit as well as to the general public when Runcible ships.


Open Source Hardware & Software

Runcible is repairable and upgradeable. Both hardware and software are fully open source. GPIO headers are exposed for easy installation of custom hardware.

"It's like a supercharged RaspberryPi in your pocket... expandable, repairable, upgradeable and fully open source."


Turn your Runcible into anything your heart desires.

Open source hardware schematics will be available when the device ships.

Runcible runs BuniOS, a fully open source version of Android 5.1 built to run HTML5 and native apps at blazing speeds.



Background

We have spent the last year designing, re-designing, and sourcing components for this initial Runcible release.  While this device isn’t yet the polished, “available at the Apple store” kind of consumer electronic we know it will one day be, it is already useful, playful, powerful and truly something new.  

This version of Runcible features a Snapdragon 410 Quad-core processor, WiFi, Bluetooth, GPS, 1GB RAM, 8GB eMMC 5.0 Flash storage, Rear-facing Camera, BuniOS (based on the Android 5.1), and exposed GPIO  and USB Host for further expansion and innovation by us but also by YOU.  Note that LTE/4g connectivity is a goal but not a certainty for this version (see "challenges" below).

If LTE doesn't make it into this initial version, it will be a simple upgrade shortly afterwards, not a replacement!

Funds from this campaign will go to further polish and hone the process of creating Runcible as scale in a sustainable, responsible way.  We are keeping it local.  The wood backs are made with sustainably harvested and reclaimed wood from Mendocino County, California.  The device will be built right here in the Bay Area by people who live and work here.

Every dollar this initial release generates will go toward making Runcible cooler, better, and more broadly available.



Runcible Founders

Aubrey Anderson, Founder and CEO
Entrepreneur, award winning creative, hacker, brand guy, web technology advocate, musician, audio engineer, fiction writer, and hopeless foodie. Aubrey has previously worked at Apple and founded notable successes in the technology space including Particle and The Barbarian Group.

Jason Proctor, Founder and CTO
A card-carrying software and audio geek who pioneered the declarative web space at Insignia, Particle, Apple and elsewhere and used to be signed to Interscope records.



Frequently Asked Questions


Who is Runcible 1.0 for?

This version of Runcible is for early adopters. Backers can expect beautiful, functional, expandable hardware but the number of available apps will be limited in 2016. Runcible 1.0 is perfect for discerning enthusiasts who want to leave the distraction of their smartphones at work while still staying connected.

What Applications and functionality will be available when it ships?

We will initially ship apps for photography and photo editing in collaboration with ite.ly, music playback, various clocks faces, star-gazing, exploration and maps, and time and date management and telephony.

How do I make phone calls on Runcible?

Your Runcible can be paired with a Bluetooth headset for making calls. We will initially support the native Android dialing and telephony workflows if you have telephony enabled. We are also working on a USB to analog headset jack adapter that will be available in the near future.

What Operating System does Runcible run?

Runcible runs a hybrid operating system we call BuniOS.  BuniOS is build on top of the Android Open Source Project, which means you can run either native Android applications on Runcible or run Web based applications.

What's the status of 4G/LTE support? If not available when it first ships, when? And how?

We will include support for 4G/LTE data and voice in this initial run. We will not know for sure what carriers will do about this, but we think the number of devices will be small enough for this run that it won’t be a significant.  But we’re committed to working with operators and with MVNOs to provide connectivity for Runcible worldwide.

Will Runcible have a headphone or microphone jack?

No.  But we’re working on a simple accessory that plugs into the USB and provides an analog headphone jack directly or through the watch chain.  We are looking at what it would take to add a simple microphone input as as well for voice commands and speech-to-text support.  We definitely want to make this happen!

Will it have speakers or vibration module?

Speakers: initially no, but you can add your own though our open hardware system!  Vibration: yes, Runcible includes a vibration module.

What is the warranty?

We are committed to building the Runcible community and a quality brand. Will support you in every way possible. We will make repairs at no charge.

How will I get it repaired if needed?

Send your Runcible back to us. If it can be fixed, we'll fix it at no charge.

What is Monohm's plans after shipping this first batch?

We plan to jump right into additional accessories and software infrastructure. We have several pending software partnerships eagerly awaiting the first batch of Runcibles.

Why are we funding this way?

The design and engineering needed for Runcible have been complex and often very expensive to do.  We have a terrific design for mass production today, but there is a chicken and egg problem: we want to get a solid platform into your hands as quickly as possible, but we don't want to be tied financially to people who didn’t necessarily share our values and vision for Runcible’s future. We have concluded that appealing to you, the audience, directly was the best approach, though the mixed results so often associated with crowd funded hardware are all too clear to us.


Risks & Challenges

One of the biggest challenges we face with putting Runcible into production is with wireless connectivity and wireless Operators.  Depending on how much you know about this industry, you might have noticed that Runcible doesn’t come pre-associated with a wireless carrier.  It's critical to us that we are not locked into one region or another.  This goes against the normal model in the wireless industry and we expect this to continue to be an uphill battle.  We feel that Runcible has to be about choice though, first and foremost.  We'll be honest because there is no reason not to be: for this release of Runcible, LTE data and voice connectivity will be a bit of an adventure.  We hope you will be willing to work with us in different regions of the world to test and pilot connectivity options.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you like the concept of Runcible, turn that into action.  Even if you aren’t able to get a device right now, you can download the developer tools and play around.  Join the community, file bugs, tell a friend, come have fun with us and let’s change the mobile world together!


Runcible is sustainably made in California

OS Support: BuniOS (based on Android 5.1), Linux
RoHS compliant


Purchase Options


Runcible Babbage

The Babbage model is designed for the stylish experimenter and for the early adopter alike. This is a full-spec Runcible brain with a durable, organic feeling back made from reclaimed ocean plastic fished out of the Great Pacific Plastic Island.
Runcible Lovelace

The limited edition Lovelace model is designed for the Aficionado. This is a full-spec Runcible brain with an iconic, unique, solid wood back made from local, sustainably harvested madrone wood in Mendocino County, California.


Runcible BacksLike a smartphone case, Runcible backs are easily interchangeable. Simply twist the back a 1/8 turn to remove it.All backs are responsibly sourced from sustainable & reclaimed hardwoods in Mendocino, California, or reclaimed plastics from the Great Pacific Plastic Island.Choose One or Collect All Four:Madrone - sustainably sourced and crafted in Mendocino, California.Black Acacia - sustainable sourced and crafted in Mendocino, California.Reclaimed Ocean Plastic - fished from the Great Pacific Plastic Island and recycled into an organic feeling back.Sinker Redwood - truly unique and extremely limited quantities.Sinker Redwood comes from old growth redwood trunks which fell into Northern California rivers from natural causes, one hundred years ago or more. Over time, minerals from the water penetrate the wood creating a truly unique, unmistakable look and feel. A ban is now in place preventing any more sinker redwoods from being extracted from the river. With the help of master craftsmen in Mendocino, Runcible secured a limited quantity of sinker redwood to produce one hundred collector quality Runcible backs.

Runcible AppsRuncible will initially ship with apps for...
Photography and photo editing in collaboration with lite.ly

Music playback
Various clocks faces
Star-gazing
Maps and exploration
Time and date management
Telephony
Both Monohm and partners are working hard on other apps as well but have not yet announced final timelines. Rest assured, we're building Runcible for the sole purpose of creating new and unique experiences.Additionally, anyone with a bit of software development skills can create apps in HTML5 + JavaScript or as native APK packages. Documentation and tutorials will be available with the Dev Kit as well as to the general public when Runcible ships.
Open Source Hardware & Software
Runcible is repairable and upgradeable. Both hardware and software are fully open source. GPIO headers are exposed for easy installation of custom hardware.
"It's like a supercharged RaspberryPi in your pocket... expandable, repairable, upgradeable and fully open source."

Turn your Runcible into anything your heart desires.


Open source hardware schematics will be available when the device ships.
Runcible runs BuniOS, a fully open source version of Android 5.1 built to run HTML5 and native apps at blazing speeds.

Background
We have spent the last year designing, re-designing, and sourcing components for this initial Runcible release.  While this device isn’t yet the polished, “available at the Apple store” kind of consumer electronic we know it will one day be, it is already useful, playful, powerful and truly something new.  
This version of Runcible features a Snapdragon 410 Quad-core processor, WiFi, Bluetooth, GPS, 1GB RAM, 8GB eMMC 5.0 Flash storage, Rear-facing Camera, BuniOS (based on the Android 5.1), and exposed GPIO  and USB Host for further expansion and innovation by us but also by YOU.  Note that LTE/4g connectivity is a goal but not a certainty for this version (see "challenges" below).If LTE doesn't make it into this initial version, it will be a simple upgrade shortly afterwards, not a replacement!
Funds from this campaign will go to further polish and hone the process of creating Runcible as scale in a sustainable, responsible way.  We are keeping it local.  The wood backs are made with sustainably harvested and reclaimed wood from Mendocino County, California.  The device will be built right here in the Bay Area by people who live and work here.
Every dollar this initial release generates will go toward making Runcible cooler, better, and more broadly available.

Runcible Founders
Aubrey Anderson, Founder and CEOEntrepreneur, award winning creative, hacker, brand guy, web technology advocate, musician, audio engineer, fiction writer, and hopeless foodie. Aubrey has previously worked at Apple and founded notable successes in the technology space including Particle and The Barbarian Group.

Jason Proctor, Founder and CTOA card-carrying software and audio geek who pioneered the declarative web space at Insignia, Particle, Apple and elsewhere and used to be signed to Interscope records.
Frequently Asked QuestionsWho is Runcible 1.0 for?This version of Runcible is for early adopters. Backers can expect beautiful, functional, expandable hardware but the number of available apps will be limited in 2016. Runcible 1.0 is perfect for discerning enthusiasts who want to leave the distraction of their smartphones at work while still staying connected.What Applications and functionality will be available when it ships?We will initially ship apps for photography and photo editing in collaboration with ite.ly, music playback, various clocks faces, star-gazing, exploration and maps, and time and date management and telephony.How do I make phone calls on Runcible?Your Runcible can be paired with a Bluetooth headset for making calls. We will initially support the native Android dialing and telephony workflows if you have telephony enabled. We are also working on a USB to analog headset jack adapter that will be available in the near future.What Operating System does Runcible run?Runcible runs a hybrid operating system we call BuniOS.  BuniOS is build on top of the Android Open Source Project, which means you can run either native Android applications on Runcible or run Web based applications.What's the status of 4G/LTE support? If not available when it first ships, when? And how?We will include support for 4G/LTE data and voice in this initial run. We will not know for sure what carriers will do about this, but we think the number of devices will be small enough for this run that it won’t be a significant.  But we’re committed to working with operators and with MVNOs to provide connectivity for Runcible worldwide.Will Runcible have a headphone or microphone jack?No.  But we’re working on a simple accessory that plugs into the USB and provides an analog headphone jack directly or through the watch chain.  We are looking at what it would take to add a simple microphone input as as well for voice commands and speech-to-text support.  We definitely want to make this happen!Will it have speakers or vibration module?Speakers: initially no, but you can add your own though our open hardware system!  Vibration: yes, Runcible includes a vibration module.What is the warranty?We are committed to building the Runcible community and a quality brand. Will support you in every way possible. We will make repairs at no charge.How will I get it repaired if needed?Send your Runcible back to us. If it can be fixed, we'll fix it at no charge.What is Monohm's plans after shipping this first batch?We plan to jump right into additional accessories and software infrastructure. We have several pending software partnerships eagerly awaiting the first batch of Runcibles.
Why are we funding this way?
The design and engineering needed for Runcible have been complex and often very expensive to do.  We have a terrific design for mass production today, but there is a chicken and egg problem: we want to get a solid platform into your hands as quickly as possible, but we don't want to be tied financially to people who didn’t necessarily share our values and vision for Runcible’s future. We have concluded that appealing to you, the audience, directly was the best approach, though the mixed results so often associated with crowd funded hardware are all too clear to us.


Risks & Challenges

One of the biggest challenges we face with putting Runcible into production is with wireless connectivity and wireless Operators.  Depending on how much you know about this industry, you might have noticed that Runcible doesn’t come pre-associated with a wireless carrier.  It's critical to us that we are not locked into one region or another.  This goes against the normal model in the wireless industry and we expect this to continue to be an uphill battle.  We feel that Runcible has to be about choice though, first and foremost.  We'll be honest because there is no reason not to be: for this release of Runcible, LTE data and voice connectivity will be a bit of an adventure.  We hope you will be willing to work with us in different regions of the world to test and pilot connectivity options.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you like the concept of Runcible, turn that into action.  Even if you aren’t able to get a device right now, you can download the developer tools and play around.  Join the community, file bugs, tell a friend, come have fun with us and let’s change the mobile world together!

Runcible is sustainably made in California

story:
Thank You To All Our Supporters!


 

What are some common issues with the Apple Pencil?


No Friction?
Loud Noise?

Alternative Methods such as masking tapes and glue guns brings discomfort during use.

A quick solution to these issues was a temporary cover for the tip of the pencil.

However, it came across problems on its’ own:

The cover easily falls off and is difficult to keep in place when applying it to the tip.​

 

 

Because of these common issues we came up with this:



4 Enhanced Features
 

Stay focused on your work and studies.

Enhance your detailed drawings and perfect your skill!
 

No more off the market products!


Normal
For users who enjoy writing or drawing on a paper with a pencil. A better feel for both experiences and greater detailed projects as the result.

Low- Friction
For a smoother experience which flows off the tip of your pencil. A free handed experience for those who prefer the old style but with a bit of traction for reduced noise.


 

 

1. Remove the Apple Pencil Tip

2. Apply your NEW ifeli tip!


 


Made In Korea
The ifeli tip used used silicon produced by KCC, a company that has secured environmentally friendly management and technical skills. KCC was founded in 1958 and produces silicon sch as Silan/Fluid, Emulson, HTV, LSR, PSA/PRC and RTV. It is produced in Korea using reliable materials.




 

CHECK US OUT AT

 

SPREAD THE WORD THROUGH OUR

story:
Wheeldy – Clip & Go

Wheeldy is an ultra-durable (last for years), mount for mobile, mini-tablet and GPS devices.

Wheeldy  was originally designed as a perfect , smartphone and car cell phone holder that securely fastens to the steering wheel, making phone calls and GPS/traffic use easier and safer. The clip’s compact design is simple in comparison to windshield or other car cell phone mounts, making it the ideal cell phone accessory and the best phone holder for travelers and people on the go. Keep your eyes on the road and hand on the steering wheel while the Wheeldy provides safe and easy access to your smartphone!

As some of people already tryed to use Wheeldy, we have found multiple uses outside the car, such as mounting it on shopping carts, baby strollers, beach umbrellas, exercise equipment and as a kickstand for viewing videos. Wheeldy is a simple and elegant solution to a common modern day problem of staying connected.



Wheeldy unique design is like no other mount available in the market.

Wheeldy literally takes seconds to assemble with no need for any tools.

  It’s 100%adjustable for any phone size up to mini-tablets. 


Featured on:


Our idea is to create a new concept of Mobile phone mounts for You.

We are there not only to get this idea live and going but to get feedback to. We think that this mount for your mobile can help you in lot of situations in you live.

When driving car. When shopping in supermarket. When going out with your baby. When resting on beattch and so on ...


Challenges

The challenge was to create a perfect mobile phone mount that can help you not only in car.

Biggest challenge is to show world that we are there and with this simple device we can make life better J

You like idea ? Grab ne and share with you friends. More peoples will know about this idea faster everyone will get their Wheeldy.


FAQ

1. How do I assemble Wheeldy?

Wheeldyis very easy to assemble. No tools are required.  Just adjust the handles to your phone's size.

2. How do I install Wheeldy in my vehicle?

No installation needed. Just put it in steering wheel and slip your phone into it, both will fit perfectly.

3. Does Wheeldy fit all mobile phone models?

Yes.Wheeldyfits all kinds of mobile phone models and small tablets

4. What GPS / Tablet devices are Wheeldy suitable for?

Wheeldyfor GPS/Mini-Tablet can fit most GPS and Mini-Tablet devices, up to 8" and palm size electronic devices (up to 12oz / 340g).

5. Is Wheeldy water proof?

Yes.

6. How much weight will it support?

About 340gr. / 12 oz.  (Modern smartphones weigh 5 oz.onaverage).

7. Can I charge the Smartphone while using Wheeldy?

Yes. It also does not interfere with theearphone jack. 

© Wheeldy intellectual property rights are protected worldwide.
