story:
Why do I need to control my DoorTone™?

We love customizing things, especially ringtones. Now you can do the same for your home. Check out these killer features:
  • Control Volume - Set the volume your DoorTone plays to your schedule, especially during baby's naptime (or yours)!
  • Control Sensitivity - Be alerted even if a person doesn't ring.
  • Control Access - See who is at the door when your kids are home alone.
  • Control Security - Use a dog's bark as your DoorTone when you're away.
  • Control Image - Rock out with every UPS delivery. Decorate your DoorTone for every Holiday!

How does it work?

It couldn't be easier. It replaces your current doorbell and is controlled from an app on your smartphone, tablet or computer. Use the app to choose your favorite music or message and set your preferred volume. When someone comes to the door, you hear the jam!

Scheduling

The app also lets you control things in advance, like scheduling a song to a particular day, like Halloween or someone's birthday. If the baby naps at a certain time of day, you can set the volume to automatically reduce, go silent, or play a lullaby.

Security

Who would think that a doorbell could provide so much security? Whether you want to keep an eye on who comes to your door while on vacation or at work, or just be able to tell the delivery man where to place your package, DoorJamz can add so much peace of mind.

How can I preorder and become a founding supporter?

If you think this product is as cool as we do, support us now! Let's pull the trigger with our factory and commence production! Every DoorJamz pre-order will include the following:

-Touchless sensor

-Basestation (premium speaker unit) in your choice of color (white, silver or red)

-Free downloadable app for your smartphone or computer

What are other ways I can help?

Help us get the word out! Tell your friends, share online with social websites such as Facebook and Twitter. If you have a blog, please write about us and help us reach our goal!

About Us

It's true! We have been friends since Mrs. Beaties 4rd grade class. And we both have the entrepreneurial bug! This is our third product to commercialize. We're a solid team and trusted partnership with equal ambition. We love dreaming and making cool stuff that people will enjoy and will make their lives better. Our strong technical and engineering backgrounds have allowed us to successfully perform all areas of a start-up company. We've proven this through our previous product launch of the DrawerDecor® system. DrawerDecor has also primed our strategic paternships with great manufacturing and distribution channels such as Daily Grommet.

FAQs 

What songs can I use for my doortone?

You can use ANY song that you wish. It is just like setting an mp3 as your phone's ringtone. When you choose your song on our DoorJamz app or website, it will automatically upload to your basestation/speaker. When someone rings your doorbell, your jam gets played.

Can a song be trimmed to be shorter?

Yes, using our custom app or website you can shorten any song for your DoorTone and select if you want fade-in or fade-out.

Can I install DoorJamz myself?

Yes, it will be super easy...plug and play (pun very much intended). You can plug the basestation/speaker into any wall outlet or, if you want to, you can hardwire into your existing doorbell's power supply.

Where do I specify the color I want?

Please leave a comment with your color choice or we'll contact you prior to shipping to verify.

story:
STAY'nTOUCH

STAY'nTOUCH is a monitoring solution that allows independent seniors to live alone without ever being alone.

Listen, we get it... we're adults & we're busy - so we know how hard it is to find time to call our loved ones to see how they are doing.  Of course, like most adult children, we’re completely reachable and accessible by cell phone, all day, every day, but for many good reasons we avoid using it to check in on our parents.

That's where STAY'nTOUCH comes in.  It is the perfect solution for adults like you with busy lifestyles to quickly know that the elderly people we love are doing their routine activities without you necessarily being in constant contact with them. And for the seniors we love, well it helps them remain independent by tracking their routine everyday movements without being invaded or distracted by invasive video gadgets and pendant gizmos.

What is it?

At first glance, the STAY'nTOUCH sensor looks like an ordinary night light. However, it's much more than that.  It's motion sensor detects your parents’ routine movements and transmits what's going on to an app on your phone.  It can detect movement within a range of about three meters, so it's not a problem if the closest plug is across the room or down the hallway. The STAY'nTOUCH sensor is smart enough to know if there's movement.  So, go ahead and plug it in over the kitchen counter, or in the hallway, or outside the bathroom, or in the family room, anywhere your parents normally move and then let the STAY'nTOUCH do the rest.

STAY'nTOUCH plugs into any standard power outlet, so you don't have to worry about pesky battery life or hazardous dangling cables.  And because it's not some kind of wrist bracelet or neck pedant that must be worn around all the time, it doesn't get any easier for the elderly person(s) you are monitoring - simply plug it in and walk away.  They don't need to do anything different than what they've always done.

How does it work?

What's truly special about the STAY'nTOUCH sensor is what's inside.  It utilizes passive infrared motion technology, Wi-Fi internet communications, and Amazon AWS cloud analytics. 

When paired with the STAY'nTOUCH phone app, it can give you valuable stats on your parents’ activity. It offers settings for the different alerts that you desire. 

The device also alerts you if there are any changes in what you consider normal activity, which could point to an unexpected vacation your parents took or perhaps they've been in bed due a fever or some other illness.

As a motion sensor, STAY'nTOUCH doesn't stream live video or any other sort of audio/visual technology -- which could be extremely intrusive to your parents’ privacy and tax their internet bandwidth.  Instead the STAY'nTOUCH sensor sends only tiny packets of data when there is motion.  The sensors collect data of all these moments throughout the day, which is then securely stored using Amazon Cloud Service.  STAY'nTOUCH analytics engine does all the data crunching using the rules that you set, and notifies you via email or text message.

We've designed things so that up to 4 STAY'nTOUCH sensors can be associated to the same account so you can easily monitor activity in multiple areas of the home.  We also offer multi-person alerting, so instead of paying for a separate system, you can add all your family members to the account and they can select which notifications they wish to receive.

When it comes to overall value, we haven't seen anything that even comes close to STAY'nTOUCH.   Compared to other much more invasive service offerings that carry a significantly higher monthly subscription fee, yet fail to keep you informed that loved ones are moving through their normal and daily routines, there is no better value than STAY'nTOUCH.

What's in the box?

How do I install it?

Set up is as simple as plugging a STAY'nTOUCH sensor into any available power outlet and then use the STAY'nTOUCH phone app to pair the STAY'nTOUCH sensor to the desired wireless SSID and activate it.  Nothing else to it.

Of course, this assumes there is an active internet connection at the home of the loved one you wish to monitor.  If there isn't, not to worry - for locations without an internet connection, a future version will include a cellular modem as an option.

Alerts and notifications

Setting the proper thresholds is key to any monitoring service, so we've gone to great lengths to engineer the STAY'nTOUCH analytics engine to make it easy for you.  We've created a handful of default yet customizable STAY'nTOUCH alerts which notify you when activities change beyond specified thresholds. Good, bad, or otherwise. 

Alerts are grouped together so you're not barraged with a series of notifications.  There's also the ability to set which sensors you wish to receive alerts for and specify times of the day you wish to receive activity notifications.   Notifications themselves can be received by email and/or by text message.

Continuous Improvement Initiatives

Monitoring is an iterative process - you're not expected to get it all right the very first time around.  The STAY'nTOUCH analytics engine we've developed takes a lot of the guess work out of it, but we're not done.  We're already building in new capabilities to the analytics engine to make things even easier.  It'll start with your initial thresholds and iteratively narrow them to eliminate redundant notifications and establish a baseline for normal activity.  Behind the scenes the STAY'nTOUCH analytics engine will watch, iterate, watch some more, and in relatively short order provide a set of recommended thresholds in which you will have total confidence.  It's really that simple.

Development

Fitting so much smarts into a tiny nightlight and making it discrete and elegant without disturbing daily habits is a huge challenge when it comes to the product design.  It also takes loads of caffeine and a wide variety of unhealthy eating habits.  But we've managed to pull it off.

 

Timeline

Conception: December 2016

Product Design: February 2017

Prototype 1, iterate, Prototype 2, iterate: February - October 2017

Beta test: November 2017

Indiegogo campaign: December 2017

Pilot build with production tooling - February 2018

Product Launch - March 2018

Endless Possibilities

STAY'nTOUCH believes there are use cases beyond seniors too. You can potentially use this same technology within smart home and hospital applications, as examples. But right now, the team's focus is on STAY'nTOUCH.  Our mission is in providing a solution that empowers our customers to know the seniors in their lives are living long happy lives at home.

What's next?

We have designed, manufactured and brought other products to market, but for a technology project of this complexity we're using a pool of experts in the field to make sure that STAY'nTOUCH lives up to its name.  These experts will assist with quality control, shipping and other logistics.

We want you to have your STAY'nTOUCH experience as soon as possible. Here’s our plan to achieve that:

December/January: Make lots of new Indiegogo friends, execute manufacturing agreements/standards.  Execute Internal and External user acceptance testing of mobile app.

UL and FCC listed devices inside - our design is focused on safety and best industry practices.

February: Place tooling orders.  Finalize release of Notification server and mobile app.

March: Tooling build-out and procurement of raw materials and components. Part qualification and pre-production builds, pilot production, quality assurance and product validation.

April: Full Product release

Risks and Challenges

No one wants to see a good idea executed poorly. We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for Indiegogo and full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as the risks:

Manufacturing: Creating the tooling to manufacture ANY product requires expert knowledge to get it right. There is typically a 60-day lead time to create the molds for a product like this and this is where delays could possibly occur. To minimize that possibility, we're working with tooling manufacturing partners with a track record for prompt quality and timeliness.

Product Adjustments: As the STAY'nTOUCH gets geared up for production, there will likely be some minor adjustments to improve the final product - could be in the device itself, but also in the mobile app. Pre-production prototypes are made to test and refine the product and allow us to incorporate our adjustments and those suggested by experienced partners. These will always be for the benefit of you, the consumer, and we will let you know exactly how and why any are made.

Fulfillment: Sometimes things go awry that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, a machine breaks down, or a shipment gets lost in transit. Those things could cause a delay. To minimize the possibility of manufacturing setbacks we will enter the manufacturing stage with at least one back-up supplier for each component and our team of experts will seek to ensure smooth sailing from our suppliers and factories.

Thank You

We are working with manufacturers who have years of experience delivering excellent products in tremendous quantities. There will no doubt be some surprises along the road, but any obstacle will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with external expertise, and an overall goal of making the best possible product for you, our STAY'nTOUCH customer.

Any perk brings us one step closer to our goal. Help us make this product a reality by clicking the ‘BACK IT’ button at the top of the page, or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page.

We'll raise a tall glass in your honor, and say THANK YOU for your help!
story_txt: STAY'nTOUCHSTAY'nTOUCH is a monitoring solution that allows independent seniors to live alone without ever being alone.Listen, we get it... we're adults & we're busy - so we know how hard it is to find time to call our loved ones to see how they are doing.  Of course, like most adult children, we’re completely reachable and accessible by cell phone, all day, every day, but for many good reasons we avoid using it to check in on our parents.That's where STAY'nTOUCH comes in.  It is the perfect solution for adults like you with busy lifestyles to quickly know that the elderly people we love are doing their routine activities without you necessarily being in constant contact with them. And for the seniors we love, well it helps them remain independent by tracking their routine everyday movements without being invaded or distracted by invasive video gadgets and pendant gizmos.What is it?At first glance, the STAY'nTOUCH sensor looks like an ordinary night light. However, it's much more than that.  It's motion sensor detects your parents’ routine movements and transmits what's going on to an app on your phone.  It can detect movement within a range of about three meters, so it's not a problem if the closest plug is across the room or down the hallway. The STAY'nTOUCH sensor is smart enough to know if there's movement.  So, go ahead and plug it in over the kitchen counter, or in the hallway, or outside the bathroom, or in the family room, anywhere your parents normally move and then let the STAY'nTOUCH do the rest.STAY'nTOUCH plugs into any standard power outlet, so you don't have to worry about pesky battery life or hazardous dangling cables.  And because it's not some kind of wrist bracelet or neck pedant that must be worn around all the time, it doesn't get any easier for the elderly person(s) you are monitoring - simply plug it in and walk away.  They don't need to do anything different than what they've always done.How does it work?What's truly special about the STAY'nTOUCH sensor is what's inside.  It utilizes passive infrared motion technology, Wi-Fi internet communications, and Amazon AWS cloud analytics. When paired with the STAY'nTOUCH phone app, it can give you valuable stats on your parents’ activity. It offers settings for the different alerts that you desire. The device also alerts you if there are any changes in what you consider normal activity, which could point to an unexpected vacation your parents took or perhaps they've been in bed due a fever or some other illness.As a motion sensor, STAY'nTOUCH doesn't stream live video or any other sort of audio/visual technology -- which could be extremely intrusive to your parents’ privacy and tax their internet bandwidth.  Instead the STAY'nTOUCH sensor sends only tiny packets of data when there is motion.  The sensors collect data of all these moments throughout the day, which is then securely stored using Amazon Cloud Service.  STAY'nTOUCH analytics engine does all the data crunching using the rules that you set, and notifies you via email or text message.We've designed things so that up to 4 STAY'nTOUCH sensors can be associated to the same account so you can easily monitor activity in multiple areas of the home.  We also offer multi-person alerting, so instead of paying for a separate system, you can add all your family members to the account and they can select which notifications they wish to receive.When it comes to overall value, we haven't seen anything that even comes close to STAY'nTOUCH.   Compared to other much more invasive service offerings that carry a significantly higher monthly subscription fee, yet fail to keep you informed that loved ones are moving through their normal and daily routines, there is no better value than STAY'nTOUCH.What's in the box?How do I install it?Set up is as simple as plugging a STAY'nTOUCH sensor into any available power outlet and then use the STAY'nTOUCH phone app to pair the STAY'nTOUCH sensor to the desired wireless SSID and activate it.  Nothing else to it.Of course, this assumes there is an active internet connection at the home of the loved one you wish to monitor.  If there isn't, not to worry - for locations without an internet connection, a future version will include a cellular modem as an option.Alerts and notificationsSetting the proper thresholds is key to any monitoring service, so we've gone to great lengths to engineer the STAY'nTOUCH analytics engine to make it easy for you.  We've created a handful of default yet customizable STAY'nTOUCH alerts which notify you when activities change beyond specified thresholds. Good, bad, or otherwise. Alerts are grouped together so you're not barraged with a series of notifications.  There's also the ability to set which sensors you wish to receive alerts for and specify times of the day you wish to receive activity notifications.   Notifications themselves can be received by email and/or by text message.Continuous Improvement InitiativesMonitoring is an iterative process - you're not expected to get it all right the very first time around.  The STAY'nTOUCH analytics engine we've developed takes a lot of the guess work out of it, but we're not done.  We're already building in new capabilities to the analytics engine to make things even easier.  It'll start with your initial thresholds and iteratively narrow them to eliminate redundant notifications and establish a baseline for normal activity.  Behind the scenes the STAY'nTOUCH analytics engine will watch, iterate, watch some more, and in relatively short order provide a set of recommended thresholds in which you will have total confidence.  It's really that simple.DevelopmentFitting so much smarts into a tiny nightlight and making it discrete and elegant without disturbing daily habits is a huge challenge when it comes to the product design.  It also takes loads of caffeine and a wide variety of unhealthy eating habits.  But we've managed to pull it off. TimelineConception: December 2016Product Design: February 2017Prototype 1, iterate, Prototype 2, iterate: February - October 2017Beta test: November 2017Indiegogo campaign: December 2017Pilot build with production tooling - February 2018Product Launch - March 2018Endless PossibilitiesSTAY'nTOUCH believes there are use cases beyond seniors too. You can potentially use this same technology within smart home and hospital applications, as examples. But right now, the team's focus is on STAY'nTOUCH.  Our mission is in providing a solution that empowers our customers to know the seniors in their lives are living long happy lives at home.What's next?We have designed, manufactured and brought other products to market, but for a technology project of this complexity we're using a pool of experts in the field to make sure that STAY'nTOUCH lives up to its name.  These experts will assist with quality control, shipping and other logistics.We want you to have your STAY'nTOUCH experience as soon as possible. Here’s our plan to achieve that:December/January: Make lots of new Indiegogo friends, execute manufacturing agreements/standards.  Execute Internal and External user acceptance testing of mobile app.UL and FCC listed devices inside - our design is focused on safety and best industry practices.February: Place tooling orders.  Finalize release of Notification server and mobile app.March: Tooling build-out and procurement of raw materials and components. Part qualification and pre-production builds, pilot production, quality assurance and product validation.April: Full Product releaseRisks and ChallengesNo one wants to see a good idea executed poorly. We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for Indiegogo and full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as the risks:Manufacturing: Creating the tooling to manufacture ANY product requires expert knowledge to get it right. There is typically a 60-day lead time to create the molds for a product like this and this is where delays could possibly occur. To minimize that possibility, we're working with tooling manufacturing partners with a track record for prompt quality and timeliness.Product Adjustments: As the STAY'nTOUCH gets geared up for production, there will likely be some minor adjustments to improve the final product - could be in the device itself, but also in the mobile app. Pre-production prototypes are made to test and refine the product and allow us to incorporate our adjustments and those suggested by experienced partners. These will always be for the benefit of you, the consumer, and we will let you know exactly how and why any are made.Fulfillment: Sometimes things go awry that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, a machine breaks down, or a shipment gets lost in transit. Those things could cause a delay. To minimize the possibility of manufacturing setbacks we will enter the manufacturing stage with at least one back-up supplier for each component and our team of experts will seek to ensure smooth sailing from our suppliers and factories.Thank YouWe are working with manufacturers who have years of experience delivering excellent products in tremendous quantities. There will no doubt be some surprises along the road, but any obstacle will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with external expertise, and an overall goal of making the best possible product for you, our STAY'nTOUCH customer.Any perk brings us one step closer to our goal. Help us make this product a reality by clicking the ‘BACK IT’ button at the top of the page, or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page.We'll raise a tall glass in your honor, and say THANK YOU for your help!

story:
SIMPIZ is the fastest portable power bank/battery charger requiring only 18 minutes to fully recharge 9000mAh, compared to other traditional portable power banks which require 8 hours or more to recharge 9000mAh.

In a hurry? Recharging the SIMPIZ between 3-15 minutes will provide enough juice to fully charge these popular devices:

 

      

Living in the modern world, we’re constantly on our smartphones 24/7 — but the problem is most smartphone batteries can't keep up with our lifestyle and the way we use our phones. So, we’re forced to rely on portable chargers to get through the day.  But as most of us can attest, when you need portable batteries the most, like a night out on the town or a quick weekend vacation, you forget to recharge them! So either you leave it behind or you unknowingly bring along a dead portable power bank. We’ve all been there. And we know the frustration. But that aggravation is coming to an end with the SIMPIZ.

 

WE HAVE CREATED 4 VERSIONS! 

**After the campaign ends, you will be able to select one for your hub+dock**

 

 

The SIMPIZ was created for those who are too busy to waste precious hours waiting on a portable charger! SIMPIZ is the fastest portable charger that only needs 3 minutes to charge up enough juice to power a phone. 3 minutes won't fully charge the SIMPIZ, but it's enough power for your phone! 

 

Even if you forget to recharge it overnight, the SIMPIZ only takes 18 minutes to power up, so you can get out the door faster than ever before.

With SIMPIZ's 9000mAh capacity, it can charge most smartphones three times or more after only 18! You're ready to go and conquer the world, knowing SIMPIZ can keep your phone juiced.

 

 [Prototype Demo]

18 - 21 minutes is the normal charging time, it just depends on how much you have already depleted the battery. 

The SIMPIZ also features QC 2.0 output speed to charge QC-compatible phones quickly and easily.

SIMPIZ has an amazing versatile and convenient hub + dock station that allows you to recharge the SIMPIZ while simultaneously charging multiple devices , like your smart phone and tablet. With the hub + dock’s three output ports to charge all your devices, it keeps everything all in one place and reduces outlet use. All your cables and devices will be neatly placed on a surface thanks to SIMPIZ. Lost cables and dead phones will be a thing of the past.

 

  

Instead of fiddling with cables the SIMPIZ hub + dock only takes a quick second to plug in. It's simple and efficient. The dock also features a blue light indicator that blinks while charging and turns solid when the SIMPIZ is fully charged.

 

Safe to use for charging SIMPIZ and your phone. 

SIMPIZ is also one of the longest-lasting batteries, double the cycle life of standard portable batteries. We use special high-efficiency battery cells that are able to handle the power of DUBI 1.0™ and QC 2.0. The result is a speedy two-way charging not found in other chargers.

These special battery cells are similar to those used for electric cars like Tesla. 

 

The smart DUBI 1.0™ technology also protects SIMPIZ and the smartphone to ensure a safer charge. When SIMPIZ is used to charge your smartphone, DUBI 1.0™ will optimize the charging so your smartphone gets the fastest charge allowed. Of course, SIMPIZ won't be able to charge your smartphone in minutes, but it can be more efficient.

It protects against 8 things that worry people the most - overheating, short-circuiting, overcurrent, undercurrent, overcharging, input overvoltage, and output overvoltage. It also maintains dynamic equilibrium. 

 

What is DUBI™?

DUBI 1.0™ is a state-of-the-art chip developed by Simpiz R&D Power Lab. By using this chip, SIMPIZ is able to reach 100w output power and charge fast and steady, while controlling the charging heat. 

How does DUBI™ work?

The special DUBI™ chip precisely optimizes four channels of electricity flow, thereby  decreasing the electricity load on each battery cell. Essentially, it is capable of charging faster under the same battery cell load situation.

Only The Beginning

SIMPIZ is just the beginning. DUBI™ will change the way we use devices forever. One minute to charge a smart watch; three minutes to charge a smartphone; 10 minutes to charge a car — this is not a dream, but a reality made possible with DUBI™ technology. Daily tasks will become much more convenient than you have previously imagined. 

From the activation light to the grooves and angles of its exterior, its design reflects a modern look that is as sharp and sleek as your smart phone. We've also made the design communicate with users -- SIMPIZ hub + dock comes with a blue light that lights up when it's still charging and when SIMPIZ is fully charged, the SIMPIZ's four little battery life indicator lights will shine. With a quick glance, you can easily tell the status of the recharging.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SIMPIZ spent considerable time on design engineering, to ensure a precision instrument for the modern world.

Included with SIMPIZ are the portable charger, hub+dock, hub+dock power cable, micro-USB cable and manual.

Note: The power cable will come in two versions: one compatible with Europe and one compatible with U.S.

 

If you want to know if you have any successful referrals, learn how to check it here: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660683-How-to-Participate-in-a-Referral-Contest

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

Born in the heart of Silicon Valley, Simpiz uses innovation and groundbreaking ideas to create unique, digital lifestyle products with style and modern aesthetics. We have become a fast growing brand, covering mobile portable chargers, Bluetooth speakers, and other mobile protection accessories. With experienced entrepreneurs, Red Dot Award winning designers, and electrical engineers with more than 10 years in the mobile accessories industry, Simpiz wants to gift users the experience of a better digital life. 

 

 

 

Campaign Questions

If Simpiz does not reach their crowdfunding goal, will you still send us the product?

Yes, even if we don't reach our goal, we will still send SIMPIZ out to everyone. We appreciate the support given to this product and we do not want to let our contributors down. :)

Product Questions

What is the difference between the 7600mAh and 9000mAh SIMPIZ?
Both SIMPIZ are of equal dimensions and appearances, and the charging techniques they use are identical as well. The only thing that differs the 7600mAh from the 9000mAh is that marginally smaller capacity of batteries are used inside the 7600mAh SIMPIZ to lighten its weight. Most importantly, it also takes amazingly 18min or so to charge a 7600mAh from depleted to full. 
Which phones are compatible with QC 2.0?

Although SIMPIZ does not use Qualcomm's QC 2.0 chip as the output, it uses a chip similar to QC 2.0 and will be compatible with phones that use Qualcomm's QC2.0 chip. To find out if your phone has that Qualcomm QC2.0 chip, please check here: https://www.qualcomm.com/products/snapdragon/devices/all?feature=Quick%20Charge%202.0.

How large is SIMPIZ?

The SIMPIZ measures is 5” x 2.9” x 0.9” .

 

Can SIMPIZ do flow-through charging?

 

No, we do not recommend doing it because it's not safe. As an alternative, we created a hub + dock so you can charge multiple devices + SIMPIZ at the same time. However, using a regular micro-USB charging cable to charge SIMPIZ then attaching a phone charging cable to charge you phone at the same time is a bad idea.

How long does it take to recharge the SIMPIZ?

The standard recharging time is 18 minutes to fully recharge the SIMPIZ. However it may take 21 minutes if the wall outlet's voltage that SIMPIZ's dock + hub is plugged to is inconsistent.

Is the QC port compatible with iPhone?

QC isn’t compatible with iPhone, that’s why it takes 1 to 1.5 hours to fully charge an iPhone. But if iPhone used this technology, it would be fully charged in a few minutes.

What’s the capacity of the SIMPIZ? Why can’t it be larger?

The SIMPIZ has a capacity of 9000mAh. We are trying to make the capacity as large as possible, while keeping it pocket-sized. Therefore, 9000mAh is the ideal capacity.

What’s the total amps it holds?

SIMPIZ can hold 5 amps.

How does the battery remain undamaged with such a fast recharge? Wouldn’t it heavily degrade over time?

SIMPIZ uses a special DUBI™ chip, which allows  it to fully recharge in 18 minutes, yet without  harming  to the integrity of the battery. SIMPIZ also uses a high-efficient lithium battery that is able to handle the 20V of charging that the SIMPIZ can provide. DUBI 1.0™ optimizes the charging through four channels and protects against the overcharging, overheating, undercurrent, overcurrent and maintains dynamic equilibrium.

Will this charge my iPhone really fast?

Unfortunately, no, because the speed of charging a cellphone depends on the capability of the phone. For safety reasons, we only optimize the recharging of the SIMPIZ. As an alternative, we’ve made SIMPIZ speedier so at least you won’t have to wait for it.

How much battery capacity is SIMPIZ?

SIMPIZ has 9000mAh, which means it can fully charge an iPhone 6s three and a half times.

What is SIMPIZ’s battery life cycle?

 

SIMPIZ has a battery life cycle over 1,000 recharges.

Shipping Questions

When can I expect it to be shipped?

The first batch of SIMPIZs for campaign backers are expected to ship around August 2016.  We will keep campaign contributors updated with our progress on a regular basis. 

Why is shipping to certain countries so expensive?

We've tried to have the shipping cost for every country be as low as possible. SIMPIZcomes with a hub+dock and the portable charger itself so the packaging might be slightly bigger than typical portable chargers that don't come with a dock. We have made the packaging as minimal as possible to cut down the cost without compromising protection.

How much does the package weigh?

Total：28oz (794g)

SIMPIZ portable charger: 9.4oz (267g)

Dock: 10.2oz (290g)，

Dock Cable：0.8oz (23g)

micro-USB cable：1.9oz (54g)

Packaging：5.6oz (160g)

Are there any countries you cannot ship to?

Yes, unfortunately, we are not able to ship to Croatia and Guadeloupe.

story:
Enjoy the peace of mind of never seeing “Low Battery” on your phone ever again. IDMIX is the world’s fastest charging wired and wireless power bank. Offering you two versions for all your needs, either in a 8000mAh or 18,000mAh capacity to keep your devices fully charged. Made to be both a Fast Charging Station as well as a Wireless and portable power bank, it is the solution to all of your battery needs.

 

 

Built with 10W (the highest watt output in a power bank) charging capability and to the WPC Qi standard, IDMIX offers you the fastest wireless charging for Android and iPhone. Just leave your phone on-top IDMIX and it’ll do the rest.

iPhone 8s and X will be able to charge 0-50% in just over 1 hour at 7.5W (the maximum Apple allows) while Androids will charge 0-50% in just under 1 hour at 10W.

 

Using QC 3.0 and PD 2.0 wired charging, IDMIX brings your battery from 0 to 50% in 30 minutes, more than enough to last you a whole day on a single charge.

IDMIX’s USB-C PD 2.0 (Power Delivery) capability charges iOS devices at unheard of speeds by providing 2x the performance of your outlet charger.

 

IDMIX uses QC 3.0 (Qualcomm Quick Charging) to charge your Android 4x faster than a conventional charger, bringing your device’s battery to 80% in 35 minutes.

 

IDMIX bridges the gap between iOS and Android charging by offering wireless and wired PD2.0 charging to certain Android devices and the iPhones 8s and X.

Acting as perfect power bank for all your devices, IDMIX brings you a 8000mAh capacity (18,000mAh for the Monster Version) allowing you to charge every devices multiple times before the IDMIX’s own battery depletes. And the best thing? It charges at exceptional speeds itself; it's own battery charging fully in just 2.5 hours!

 

IDMIX Slim's (8000mAh) dual USB ports and Qi wireless charging allows you to plug in two devices and charge a third wirelessly at once. The IDMIX Monster (18,000mAh) lets you charge 4 devices simultaneously, from smartphones to Tablets and Laptops to your Nintendo Switch.

 

Recharge your IDMIX Slim fully in just 2.5 hours with QC 3.0 charging at 18W of power. You can also recharge your IDMIX Monster fully in just 3.5 hours with a USB-C PD 2.0 connection at 30W. 

 


 

IDMIX is built from V0 ABS and PC Fireproof material to keep you and its battery safe. Furthermore, when using Qi, PD 2.0 and QC 3.0 charging technology you can always depend on IDMIX to deliver the fastest charge without overheating your devices or cables.

Pass-Through Charging and Overcharging

IDMIX also supports Pass-Through Charging, allowing you to safely charge other devices while IDMIX's own battery charges. You also don’t have to worry about Overcharging as IDMIX is fitted with an internal control circuit to regulate the flow of electric current to shut the power bank down when it’s fully charged.

 

 

If you think the IDMIX Slim doesn’t meet your needs then consider the IDMIX Monster! Bigger and better in every way, the Monster offers a larger battery capacity and a higher power output for even faster charging.

 

 

 

 

Using up to an 18W USB-C PD output IDMIX is able to charge your device 0-50% in 30 minutes. USB-C PD charging optimizes power management across devices, so each phone or tablet will only draw the power it requires to charge quickly. At 80% the device internally switches from Fast Charging to Normal Charging so as not to overcharge the battery.

 

IDMIX is built with the latest Qualcomm Quick Charging (QC 3.0) technology allowing it to charge your Android device 4x faster than a conventional charger -  it charges your Android phone’s battery up to 80% in 35 minutes. QC 3.0 employs an intelligent algorithm to allow your portable device to determine what power level to request at any time to enable optimum power transfer.

 

The normal energy output for Qi chargers is currently 5W. IDMIX's wireless output is 10W or double the power of competing chargers, for both Android and iPhones. However, Apple’s limits the wireless charging of it’s devices to 7.5W as the maximum wireless charge, meaning IDMIX can only charge iPhone's at that power output.

 


 

We are an industrial design duo who have won over 5 international design awards over the course of our careers for various projects like the “i-receiver”. We established IDMIX 9 years ago to help simplify people's lives with original designs whose highest priority is the user's experience.

Seaman Duan
Industrial designer with 12 years of experience, 11 of which are as a consumer electronics designer. Winner of the Red Dot Design Award, the International Design Excellence Award, and the International Forum Design Awards.

 

Liang Zhi Jun
Industrial designer with 10 years of experience (9 of which were as a consumer electronics designer). Winner of the 2014 and the 2016 Red Dot Design Awards.

 

Is this compatible with iPhone 8?
Yes, it is compatible with iPhone 8, 8s and X.

Is IDMIX compatible older iPhone models like the 6 and 7?
The IDMIX is only compatible for wired charging for older iPhone models. To wirelessly charge models older than the 8 you would need to purchase a case for your iPhone to make it compatible for wireless charging.

Does it have Pass-Through Charging? can I charge this power bank while charging a phone at the same time?
Yes you can. IDMIX is equipped to handle Pass-Through Charging safely without damaging your device’s battery or its own.

Is the micro-usb input that charges the battery a quick-charge 3 input?
The micro-usb input is fast charge, it is 5V 2A/9V 2A.

Will this fast charge an iPhone 8 or X (50% in 30 minutes)?
Yes, IDMIX will charge your iPhone 8 or X in 30 minutes.

When will you be shipping IDMIX?
We will be shipping out our perks in April and May.

Where will you be shipping?
We are offering global shipping.

Can IDMIX charge my laptop?
The IDMIX MONSTER can charge your laptop. The Slim cannot.

Can I take my IDMIX onto a plane?
Yes you can. IDMIX is built within a fireproof case and is safe for flying. Also, all power banks under 100wh can be brought onto planes.

Are the internal batteries replaceable?
No, IDMIX’s internal batteries are not replaceable.

What are the safety features of the IDMIX?
IDMIX is built out of a V0 level fireproof material and holds many international certifications like the CE, FCC, R-Hose, UN38.3, and MSDS. Further, its internal circuitry stops it from overcharging (the IDMIX shuts down when it reached 100% charge if still plugged in).

How many charges does IDMIX have?
IDMIX has approximately 500 charges.

Does IDMIX support QC 3.0?
Yes, both IDMIX Slim and Monster support QC 3.0

Does IDMIX support PD 2.0?
Yes, both IDMIX Slim and Monster support PD 2.0

Does IDMIX support Qi charging?
Yes, both IDMIX Slim and Monster support Qi Wireless Charging

Does IDMIX support pass-through charging?
Yes, IDMIX does support pass-through charging.

If you are looking to become a distributor of the IDMIX please contact us at sales@idmixcharger.com

story:
Short Summary

Social Hub is a new kind of social media aggregator that focusses on ease of use for regular people, simplifying and enhancing the Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram experience. We are seeking the funds to develop our 2nd generation version, and market it to the world.

Our Story 

Social media is one of the most efficient ways ever devised to communicate with large amounts of people at the same time, making life easier for anyone who wants to maintain many social relationships or interact remotely with the people they care about. They’ve completely changed the way we spend our time, including the way we share our most important moments and organize social circles and events. They are an emerging type of lifestyle management technology which will only continue to improve at an exponential rate. 

Ironically, social media platforms have become so prevalent and varied that there are now too many to choose from and maintain for the average person. Each offers their own unique advantages and abilities, and it’s just too much to handle if you just want an easy way to stay in touch with the people who matter most. We realized there needed to be a way to combine the power of the most popular and capable social media platforms into one place that would be easy to access and control.

Aggregators have sprung up in the market to simplify the way we use the ever increasing number of social media platforms available. Essentially, services like Buffer and Hootsuite allow users to organize their messages across various platforms, leave comments, repost messages, etc. They bring the basic functionality of dozens of other sites to one convenient location. However, each aggregator also has its own problems and complications.

Most aggregators function off the basic premise that the more social media platforms they work with, the better. Some are proud to say they implement even the most obscure services that hardly anyone is using. The irony is that in their attempt to simplify the social media experience, they are just adding extra complexity that a typical use doesn’t need. 

Most also charge a monthly fee for use, and seem designed for professionals like journalists, PR specialists, and advertising managers looking to maximize their ROI. This generally makes their design interface clunky and unattractive for casual users just looking for an easier way to stay in touch with the people they care about. Something had to be done to create a social network aggregator that was pleasing to look at, easy to use, and designed for the common person.

What Makes Social Hub Different

Social Hub is a new type of social media aggregator that does what no other competitor can. We’ve gone out of our way to separate the wheat from the chaff by focusing on the three most popular and useful social media networks on the planet: Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram. Why these three?

Facebook is the most popular social media platform in the world, with 1.23 billion monthly active users, accounting for 20% of all mobile internet traffic in the US and Europe.

Twitter is the world leader for exchanging short text-based messages online. They have captured a unique functionality and audience appeal not covered by any other social media platform.

Instagram is the largest photo and video sharing social media platform, with 15 million pictures shared in 2013.

Together, these three form the primary pillars of modern social media use. Social Hub brings them together, and adds comprehensive functionality including:

  • Powerfully attractive and simple design
  • Cross-posting through the different networks
  • Instagram reposting, and creation of videos with photos and music
  • Scheduled auto-posting
  • Easily monitor friends, followers, posts, reposts, and likes.
In future, our goal is to expand Social-Hub and make it available on Android, Windows phones and Blackberry. We want to create one eco system that will allow users to have Social-hub on their laptops, tablets and smart watches.  

What We Need & What You Get

Social Hub has the ability to completely change the way the world uses social media, but we can’t get there without your support. Right now, we have two major priorities:

1.  Finishing development of an upgraded version of the Social Hub 2.0 platform that will seamlessly incorporate all our features and trump all competitors on the market. Goal: $300,000

2.  Develop an aggressive marketing campaign through strategic search engine optimization on Google and other search engines, building up enough of a customer base to keep us afloat and sustainably growing. Goal: $360,000 per month. 

Total operating costs for first year: $4,620,000

We are monetized primarily through third party advertising, and some additional features. The app will remain forever free to download and use, but we will have inexpensive advanced features and upgrades available. Users will be able to disable advertising for $2.99 per year, or activate other features like birthday reminders and analytics for 99 cents apiece. 

We are offering equity in the company in exchange for the initial funds we need to ensure our success. Communication is a perpetual need, and any technology which can promise an easier and more fluid way to communicate is a smart investment for people who understand the direction this area of the market is moving. By investing with us, you are investing in the networking abilities and quality of relationships of our entire species. We expect to be able to pay back the principle investment in as little as six months.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge we face is just getting enough new users involved and advertisers on board, which we plan to address through our SEO marketing strategies. We know the market exists. It just may take some time to tap into it at the level we would like. Social media demand isn’t disappearing any time soon, so we are very confident in the eventual success of what we are doing. 

Tell Your Friends

If you’ve ever wished it was easier to use the most popular social media platforms, then you should already see the enormous value of Social Hub. We’d like to serve as an inspiration for other entrepreneurs and startup enterprises to get out there and release their innovations to the world through the crowdfunding model. We know a lot of people who need a solution like this, so tell your friends to contribute so we can promote it to the world. Sharing this campaign on your social media profile is just as valuable to us as an actual financial pledge.

story:
Kiq is a product that enables multiple solutions at the same time.

First, Kiq enables us to listen to TV at home quietly. Second, Kiq enables to non-limited users to listen together. Third, Kiq enables efficient and quite conversation of all listeners , without raising your voice in order to be heard. The sound that is produced from the TV will be automatically lowered in a way that everyone in the room will be able to hear each other. The voice is transmitted through a personal microphone of each user’s headphones.

Literally, keep it quite!

Kiq can connect not only to TVs , but to every audio port in computers, sound systems, DVDs and more…


Connecting Kiq is very simple : it plugs directly into the audio port of the TV, 

connects to home WIFI and controlled by a free smartphone application.


Nowadays, millions of wireless headphones are being sold every year by various manufacturers in many designs with extremely high prices sometimes. The sound quality is model dependent, batteries are required, there is a need to find a quite radio frequency and space at home to store the headphones. 

In most cases these headphones will cut you from the rest of the world and you'll need to take the headphones off in order to talk to others. Using Kiq , you are always available; when a call enters ,you can answer immediately while everyone else can continue enjoying TV sound.


Kiq may be charged directly from the TV. The headphones that come with most smartphones has a higher sound quality than most of the wireless headphones that exist on the market today. Since Kiq uses local WIFI to send the audio, there is no noises and sound disturbances.


Kiq is also much more affordable compared to wireless headphones and gives you so much more. We aspire to enable our clients an optimal sound experience by using existing components such as TV, smartphone and headphones. Kiq is a high quality product, long lasting and very compact which can be carried around in every wallet or key chain.

In this campaign we are asking for your help in raising our initial funds in order to efficiently manufacture and market this product. We will be graitfull if you can be a part of the beginning of this revolutionary product.

story:
The elevator pitch
Many of you know the limitations and frustrations of various device software. You can't finish a spreadsheet on your tablet that you started on your PC; You can't pull up the same web sites on your phone as you do your laptop; and jumping from device to device is like having to speak multiple languages. We intend to solve all that.

The Gigastrand OS is a self-supporting PC operating system designed with superior cross-platform compatibility but is safer and less expensive to operate than other systems.

What the heck is an Operating System (OS)?
An operating system is software that runs other programs (apps). Examples of operating systems are Microsoft Windows (TM), Android, and Ubuntu.

What do you mean by Cross-platform?
The Gigastrand OS will be capable of running software from other systems including RedHat (RPM) Packages, Microsoft Windows (TM) software and apps, and some Android apps out of the box.

What do you mean by Self-Supporting OS? 
When you have a problem with your computer, who do you call? Microsoft or your PC manufacturer?

Chances are, that you call your PC manufacturer for support or perhaps some third party. Neither of these seem like the ideal choice to support software developed by someone else. After all, in the example of Microsoft Windows, Microsoft developed the software, wouldn't they be a better choice to support it?

Our goal with the Self-Supporting OS Concept is to utilize various technologies to make the Gigastrand OS provide all of the support from systems and services contained within the operating system itself rather than outside sources or third parties. 

That means you, your users, or your help-desk staff do not need to be fluent in Linux to get help when they need it and to keep things running smoothly.

Ok, so what is the Gigastrand OS?

Gigastrand International is creating a commercial, Linux-based Operating System specifically designed to aid the users of other systems to transition into the world of Linux. We are partnering with Linux distribution and software developers to create a Linux distribution that is not only up to our high user-friendliness standards but will incorporate brand new technologies. The Gigastrand Operating System will:

  • Be easy to use
  • Be purpose-built to aid users in the transition to Linux
  • Come pre-loaded with all the essential software
  • Make it easy to install additional software
  • Have built-in Microsoft Compatibility
  • Include self-support resources
  • Include end-user support resources
  • Give back to the open-source community and the technologies that support the Gigastrand OS.

Platforms

The Gigastrand OS will run on several platforms allowing the end user to use all of their devices the same.

  • PCs
  • Laptops
  • Tablets
  • Game Boxes
  • Set-top boxes
  • Many more....

Gigastrand OS Versions

We are planning 3 versions of the Gigastrand OS. Free, Open, and Premium

The Free Edition will be just that: free. It will include basic software, basic support, and come in 32 bit only. This will be available for download to the public. You can also download the BETA 3 for this version at gigastrandos.com/beta.htm


 The Open Version (above) will feature premium software, basic support and come in your choice of 32 or 64 bit for about $8. This will be distributed through Linux4Everyone in single disc packages.

The Premium Version (above) will have premium software, premium support, and come in both 32 and 64 bit versions. This will be sold in a retail package for about $48.

Community-Enhanced
We believe that those who work so hard to bring us quality open source software deserve to be compensated for their efforts. Therefore, this will be a commercial distribution with much of the profit going to support the free and open source software that supports the OS. 

The Project Today 
The Gigastrand OS of 2013 is an OS that is stable, useful, and easy to use while providing structured support for users, OEMs, and contributors. We have developed the OS to BETA 3.The end goal is to develop the OS to a finished product - Free, Open, and Premium in both 32 and 64 bit versions.

 

What We Need the Money For

On our own, we have managed to raise about 4% ($1600) of our total development costs which has gotten us to the Free Edition BETA 3. We have reached a stage in our development where we will be developing and testing the Open and Premium editions. Because of the premium features and software in these editions the development costs increase substantially.

If we reach our goal, here is a breakdown as to where the dollars will go for the OS development.

Development Expense (Including developer payroll) - $20,000

Legal stuff (including software licenses and legal fees) - $8,000

Hardware (including additional PCs, tablets, and servers) - $4,000

Facilities and utilities (lights, rent, internet) - $2,000

Promotion, fulfillment, and Distribution - $4,000

Fees (from Indiegogo, credit card, and misc) - $2,000

 

Total - $40,000

If we raise - then we will...

Indegogo allows us to keep the money we raise - even if we do not make it all the way to goal. If we raise all $40,000 (fully funded) we will...

  • be able to develop all software to its full potential
  • have end-user support systems developed in full
  • have solutions for laptops, servers, and PCs by March 1, 2014
  • have Game Boxes by May 1, 2014
  • be into the development of smart TV set-top boxes and tablets by September 1, 2014
  • have Linux video security systems developed in 2014

If we raise $20,000 (Half-funded) we will...

  • be able to develop all software to its full potential
  • have end-user support systems developed in full
  • have solutions for laptops, servers, and PCs by May 1, 2014
  • have Game Boxes by October 1, 2013

If we raise $10,000 (Quarter-funded) we will...

  • be able to develop all software to its full potential
  • have partial end-user support systems developed
  • have solutions for laptops, servers, and PCs by May 1, 2014

If we raise the minimum $4,000 (Tenth-funded) we will...

  • be able to develop the Open and Premium Editions of the OS.
  • cover some software licensing for development

Money raised over and above the $40,000 will be used to help fund Linux advocacy programs and distribute free products at Linux4Everyone.
story_txt:
The elevator pitchMany of you know the limitations and frustrations of various device software. You can't finish a spreadsheet on your tablet that you started on your PC; You can't pull up the same web sites on your phone as you do your laptop; and jumping from device to device is like having to speak multiple languages. We intend to solve all that.
The Gigastrand OS is a self-supporting PC operating system designed with superior cross-platform compatibility but is safer and less expensive to operate than other systems.
What the heck is an Operating System (OS)?An operating system is software that runs other programs (apps). Examples of operating systems are Microsoft Windows (TM), Android, and Ubuntu.
What do you mean by Cross-platform?The Gigastrand OS will be capable of running software from other systems including RedHat (RPM) Packages, Microsoft Windows (TM) software and apps, and some Android apps out of the box.
What do you mean by Self-Supporting OS? When you have a problem with your computer, who do you call? Microsoft or your PC manufacturer?


Chances are, that you call your PC manufacturer for support or perhaps some third party. Neither of these seem like the ideal choice to support software developed by someone else. After all, in the example of Microsoft Windows, Microsoft developed the software, wouldn't they be a better choice to support it?


Our goal with the Self-Supporting OS Concept is to utilize various technologies to make the Gigastrand OS provide all of the support from systems and services contained within the operating system itself rather than outside sources or third parties. That means you, your users, or your help-desk staff do not need to be fluent in Linux to get help when they need it and to keep things running smoothly.




Ok, so what is the Gigastrand OS?
Gigastrand International is creating a commercial, Linux-based Operating System specifically designed to aid the users of other systems to transition into the world of Linux. We are partnering with Linux distribution and software developers to create a Linux distribution that is not only up to our high user-friendliness standards but will incorporate brand new technologies. The Gigastrand Operating System will:

Be easy to use
Be purpose-built to aid users in the transition to Linux
Come pre-loaded with all the essential software
Make it easy to install additional software
Have built-in Microsoft Compatibility
Include self-support resources
Include end-user support resources
Give back to the open-source community and the technologies that support the Gigastrand OS.

Platforms
The Gigastrand OS will run on several platforms allowing the end user to use all of their devices the same.


PCs
Laptops
Tablets
Game Boxes
Set-top boxes
Many more....

Gigastrand OS Versions
We are planning 3 versions of the Gigastrand OS. Free, Open, and Premium
The Free Edition will be just that: free. It will include basic software, basic support, and come in 32 bit only. This will be available for download to the public. You can also download the BETA 3 for this version at gigastrandos.com/beta.htm



 The Open Version (above) will feature premium software, basic support and come in your choice of 32 or 64 bit for about $8. This will be distributed through Linux4Everyone in single disc packages.



The Premium Version (above) will have premium software, premium support, and come in both 32 and 64 bit versions. This will be sold in a retail package for about $48.






Community-EnhancedWe believe that those who work so hard to bring us quality open source software deserve to be compensated for their efforts. Therefore, this will be a commercial distribution with much of the profit going to support the free and open source software that supports the OS. 

The Project Today The Gigastrand OS of 2013 is an OS that is stable, useful, and easy to use while providing structured support for users, OEMs, and contributors. We have developed the OS to BETA 3.The end goal is to develop the OS to a finished product - Free, Open, and Premium in both 32 and 64 bit versions.
 

What We Need the Money For
On our own, we have managed to raise about 4% ($1600) of our total development costs which has gotten us to the Free Edition BETA 3. We have reached a stage in our development where we will be developing and testing the Open and Premium editions. Because of the premium features and software in these editions the development costs increase substantially.
If we reach our goal, here is a breakdown as to where the dollars will go for the OS development.
Development Expense (Including developer payroll) - $20,000
Legal stuff (including software licenses and legal fees) - $8,000
Hardware (including additional PCs, tablets, and servers) - $4,000
Facilities and utilities (lights, rent, internet) - $2,000
Promotion, fulfillment, and Distribution - $4,000
Fees (from Indiegogo, credit card, and misc) - $2,000
 
Total - $40,000



If we raise - then we will...
Indegogo allows us to keep the money we raise - even if we do not make it all the way to goal. If we raise all $40,000 (fully funded) we will...



be able to develop all software to its full potential
have end-user support systems developed in full
have solutions for laptops, servers, and PCs by March 1, 2014
have Game Boxes by May 1, 2014
be into the development of smart TV set-top boxes and tablets by September 1, 2014
have Linux video security systems developed in 2014

If we raise $20,000 (Half-funded) we will...

be able to develop all software to its full potential
have end-user support systems developed in full
have solutions for laptops, servers, and PCs by May 1, 2014
have Game Boxes by October 1, 2013

If we raise $10,000 (Quarter-funded) we will...

be able to develop all software to its full potential
have partial end-user support systems developed
have solutions for laptops, servers, and PCs by May 1, 2014

If we raise the minimum $4,000 (Tenth-funded) we will...

be able to develop the Open and Premium Editions of the OS.
cover some software licensing for development

Money raised over and above the $40,000 will be used to help fund Linux advocacy programs and distribute free products at Linux4Everyone.

story:
As a business owner, do you ever have days when business is slower than you would like? Have you struggled to get new and repeat customers?

How would you like to reach your target customers and get them to fill up those empty time slots/tables/bar stools/hotel rooms or just make an impulsive purchase from you?

With this mobile app, you can send attractive discounts to your targeted markets to drive them to your storefront or get them to purchase your products immediately through the built-in shopping cart. You can also build community with your customers by starting relevant conversations with your customers and prospects, thus building and increasing business.

According to new research commissioned by eBay, mobile spending by consumers is set to double by 2014. But did you know that creating a mobile app for your business could cost $50k – $150k? We are planning to create an affordable mobile app for businesses with the world's most popularCRM system to provide you a platform to compete with larger companies.

Major Categories: 
•   Mobile Store 
     Showcase products or services 
     Easy repeat purchasing features. 
     Manage all information a CRM system 
     Track sales efforts and prospecting
     Generate reports of your clients purchase patterns 
     Keep track of income and expenses, so you know your bottom line
•  Communications
    Target clientele with a quick limited time special to drive sales
    Communicate with their prospect list
• Calendar
    Display your upcoming events
    Set appointments:  Customers can scan their personal calendars  
    and yours to find the next best available time slot

Some examples of use:

Restaurants: If it’s a slow day, offer a free appetizer between the hours of __ and ___. Have a “share with friends on Facebook” link so they can advertise for you. 

Educate your customers and prospects with information and start discussions. 

Healthcare professionals: Send out a brief article title and ask a question to start dialogue. “Stanford Research shows Moms were right all along” is an interesting article. What do you think? 

Public Speakers: Get your schedule in front of your audience to drive them to your speaking engagements and then upsell to your audiences using the app! No more lost sales due to impatient customers.

Network Marketing Companies: Send out meeting notices through the app to your distributors to increase attendance. Allow purchases of your products directly through the app, to increase the ease of the purchasing experience.

Retailers: 50% off XYZ product if you buy today by 5 pm through the app! (Should be sent to customers that are specifically interested in that product, to make the offer relevant)

OUR STORY

We are Alice Shikina and Glen Laughton. We love watching the world become more mobile and we are passionate about helping companies transform their businesses by connecting to their customers through smart phone apps. Glen's father AND grandmother were computer programmers, so being a leader in technology runs in his veins. His deep knowledge of databases is what enabled Glen to come up with such a robust app as a business solution. Alice is the creative partner on the team. Her ability to reach out to other strategic partners and utilize her past experience directing and leading teams is among her strong suits.

Risks and challenges

Mobile applications is a fast growing market space and the ability to produce a quality product is the key to our success. There are always bugs in initial releases and we need adequate testing done to insure smooth user experiences, and since this is all NEW time frames may slip as new problems are encountered.

Time, Quality, and Money are key ingredients in a successful product. Money is the main element we are missing and we want to increase the speed to get to market without having quality suffer so need cash to make this happen. Ready to help?

We also realize that several companies will already have their own mobile app and not want to lose their initial investment. We will need to leave some flexibility in the design to add in other features not initially planned for.

Some companies will have a strong preference for a particular database platform. We have chosen Salesforce as it’s the world’s #1 CRM system, but that means they will need to purchase a few administrative licenses from Salesforce. There may be some integration concerns with their existing systems, but this will be a billable scenario for us.

story:
*****Updated Comments From end-User*****(Thanks everyone who noted us !!!)

1)Thanks for Mr.Garrett Benisch offeres question as below:

How can I get one of these? If I contribute on your indiegogo page, am I guaranteed to receive a KeMice?

KeMice Reply :

You could buy 1 unit or more from the link  http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/revolutionary-keyboard-kemice


Our company has enough qualification and confidence to develop this new keyboard, as this why we has been listed and showed on www.indiegogo.com ,After you ordered some from the above link,inform us your shipping address, we promised that you will be first one who will get the KeMice. thanks !!!From KeMice afterservice team

KeMice is a revolutionary keyboard

1.KeMice is small to take away with you.

2.KeMice has two parts, typing more comfortable.

3.KeMice makes the mouse built-in the  keyboard.

KeMice team thanks for your checking our new project. Please check above video to get more details about how we make you free. And thanks again to all contributions, because these would never have been made without your support.- Abner Lee

About KeMice-

KeMice is a simple Keyboard with built-in Mouse, for working comfortably  and  taking with you almost everywhere!

Why should Kemice be a Revolutionary keyboard ?

Firstly : For example the iPad / iPhone / Android mobile equipment virtual keyboard or some bluetooth keyboards are tiny ( keys' size should be smaller), wrong typing is easy to happen, and you feel impatient to type letters on such small screen for a long time. This is the first reason why we designed KeMice keyboard.

Functioning through bluetooth:

However KeMice offers a convenient working solution to help you type easily with Ipads or tablets -

1. Kemice keyboard with standard size keys and enough space beween keys.

2.To make the standard key size and enough space between keys , KeMice has removed functional keys (F1 -F12), and removed the number keys as well. So it is more convenient for taking together with you anywhere.

The common bluetooth keyboard is with all function keys:

KeMice keyboard just has necessary letter keys (A - Z)

How to input numerals and mnotations with KeMice?

For input of numerals and notations, there is a hotkey on right part. Only need to press the hotkey, and it will show your needs ( function keys F1-F12)

Secondly : All most the existing keyboards, including any virtual /ergonomic keyboards, it needs your both hands together all the time to type. You will feel tired after working long time.

However, KeMice as an innovative keyboard, it has been designed into two sperated parts ( one part for left hand typing, another part for right hand typing).

For it has two sperated parts, you could have many different postures freely as you like.

1)

2)

3)

4)

5)

KeMice keyboard is also suitable for iPhone:

Thirdly: From now on, working with KeMice keyboard, there is no need of another mouse, of hands to shift on keyboard constantly, because the mouse has been built in the right hand part of KeMice keyboard.

---When typing, it works as a keyboard:

---When moving, it works as a mouse:

KeMice is a keyboard of excellent quality

For we are the big fans of apple products, we are pursuing best designs for each detail .

Craftsmanship

1. With CNC machine to produce, also with solid billets of aircraft grade aluminum material for the KeMice keyboard, not any through molding or casting production process.

2. First-rate finishing color

KeMice is not only a keybaord but also a good artwork after you touched it by yourself. White or Black finish color for choosing. We are cooperating with some specialized metal finishing companies to help achieve the first -rate finishing color that you could find on Apple's unibody Macbook Pro's and iMacs - its hand buffed, glass bead blasted, electro-chemically micropolished, hard anodized and sealed.

FAQ

Top Question:

Q:How it works?

A:

This question should be most important quation you will ask.

1.KeMice keyboard with left part + right part ,the two parts are independent.

2.Left part just for typing letters,it should be connected with your Ipad/ Iphone ....via bluetooth device.

3. Right part is not only for typing,it works together with left part while you need whole keyboard to typing.The RIGHT PART also could be as a MOUSE while you need.

Q:How the right part works not only as a keyboard but also as a mouse?

A: Also it should be connected with your Ipad / Iphone...Via bluetooth device.

Mouse has built-in right part, we design a infrared ray induction switch on right part of keyboard .When you show a catching / moving action to right part, it could be works as a mouse .Letter “J”- it stands for mouse left location ; Letter “K” - it stands for mouse right location.When typing, it works as keyboard, when moving, it works as a mouse.No need mouse work together with any more, from today.

Q: How is KeMice charged for right part as mouse ?

A: KeMice is charged by a micro USB. A subtle indicator light off to the side indicates power levels.

Q: Why KeMice have removed functional keys (F1 -F12), and removed the number keys at same time ? Whether it could offer all normally keyboard function without any function keys?

A: Based on the standard key size and enough space between keys ,KeMice just has necessary letter keys (A - Z), as for small size, it is more convenient to take together with you in any way.On right part of KeMice ,we design a hotkey(please check the picture as above), just need touch the hotkey , it will show you all function keys demands.

Q: How Long time does mouse'battery last ?

A: KeMice has a lithium lion battery for long battery life and is easily charged by a micro USB. KeMice's battery should last several months normally.

Q: What versions of model tablet will KeMice work with?

A: Once your any tablet have Bluetooth function, KeMice could be matched work with it. Such as Ipad / Iphone /Android mobile equipment working requirement.

More FAQ, please check on http://www.kemice.com/faq.html

 

How can you touch me?

Any technology issues- you can email to techsupport@kemice.com

Any quality &after service issues- you can email to afterservice@kemice.com

Any marketing issues- you can email to marketing@kemice.com

KeMice Team will be so appreciated to reply /answer you once we noted your information! Thanks!
