story:
The campaign has been completed successfully. You can now purchase or donate a Sesame Phone or Tablet at www.sesame-enable.com


We'd like to thank you and the entire Indiegogo community for your contribution in bringing this life-changing solution to existence!



Happy New Year Everybody!



We are extremely honored to be named winners in Verizon's Powerful Answers Award!!! (read about it here)

Since this means we've secured funds to continue development, and in the spirit of the holidays, we've decided to pay it forward and DONATE all funds raised on Indiegogo towards devices that will go to people in need.

So now (and retroactively) every $ you contribute goes directly towards people who will benefit tremendously from a touch-free phone. We invite you to nominate persons or organizations that should receive a Sesame Touch-Free Smartphone from the donation pool: www.sesame-enable.com/nominate

So go on! Give someone his first accessible smartphone! Or half a phone. Or even 5% of one - every donation counts!!


To see our original video, watch here:



DESIGNED BY PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES,

FOR PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES.


Designed by a quadriplegic, the head-motion activated mobile device brings the cellphone revolution to a population that has until now been excluded - people with Spinal Chord Injuries, ALS, Cerebral Palsy, Multiple Sclerosis, and other disabilities that impair the use of the hands and arms.

A Sesame Phone can do all the things a regular smartphone can do, entirely hands-free, providing independence through limitless connectivity.


As seen on:

                           

             

                 

                         


THE STORY OF SESAME 

Sesame Enable was founded by Giora Livne, a quadriplegic for the past nine years, and Oded Ben Dov, an app developer and computer vision expert.


Giora, an electrical power engineer with a maker sensibility, is always coming up with solutions to improve his life. One day, Giora spotted Oded on a television program, where Oded was showcasing a mobile video game he had created that was controlled via head gestures. A lightbulb went off.

Giora saw the potential beyond gaming. With a bit of chutzpah, he was able to track down Oded by calling the TV station, and challenged him to use his knowledge of gesture recognition to create a touch-free phone.

Together they founded Sesame and built the Sesame software technology.

Sesame is committed to setting a new standard in assistive technologies. Our team is driven by a deep belief in equality and universal accessibility, and in developing meaningful devices and ideas.


           

Sesame participated in A3i - the world’s first accelerator for startups that benefit people with disabilities  - made possible through the partnership of PresenTense, Beit Issie Shapiro and the Ruderman Family Foundation.

      


Sesame later joined Raanana's hub for entrepreneurs - Hubanana - and is actively supported by it's community


WHAT IS SESAME? 

Sesame is the first completely touch-free smartphone technology that is controlled entirely through head movements and voice control, without any additional custom hardware requirements.

When you receive your Sesame-powered phone, you'll receive a Google Nexus 5 phone preloaded with our software layer and able to work out-of-the-box, touch-free.

We leveraged advancements in computer vision, user experience, and voice recognition to build a completely accessible, hands-free mobile solution.

Currently, Sesame provides touch-free accessibility for Google’s existing Nexus 5 smartphone. We chose to support this device exclusively in the beginning due to its specific hardware specifications, and plan to support other Android devices in the future which meet Sesame’s unique requirements.

THE GREATER POTENTIAL


The Sesame Phone provides those with limited use of their hands independence and privacy in using a smartphone.

But moreover, with existing Smart Home and Internet-of-Things technology, the Sesame Phone provides access to tens of physical devices through the same Touch-Free interface.

Thermostats, lights, TV's, A/C, locks, shades and so much can now be controlled again by people with limited movement. 

OPEN, SESAME


Since Sesame runs on a standard Android OS, you get access to the millions of apps on Google Play - all completely touch-free! No special setup is required to operate a new app. This means you can tweet, post, share, send instant message, read, play, and be in on the conversation around the latest app.


SO EASY, EVEN A CHILD CAN USE IT

Our goal from the beginning has been to design a phone that can work for the widest range possible of users, regardless of their physical abilities or age. Some of our most dedicated users are kids!

 


You can customize your Sesame Phone so that even people who can only move their heads slightly can benefit from the phone.


WHAT YOU GET

When you receive your Sesame-powered Android Nexus 5 smartphone, here’s what comes with it:

  • Google Nexus 5 smartphone

  • USB charging cables

  • Stereo earbuds

  • Sesame software pre-installed and ready to use touch-free

The Sesame takes great care in ensuring that your Sesame experience goes off without a hitch! All Sesame-powered Google Nexus 5 smartphones we ship will be preconfigured for simplicity. 



TECHNOLOGY BEHIND SESAME

• Google Nexus 5: The Sesame user interface is built into a modified Nexus 5. This model of Android device was selected because it meets the specific functional requirements of the Sesame user interface, however in the future we will continue to add support for additional devices.

• Computer Vision: Through advanced computer vision algorithms, the Sesame Phone tracks your head movements with extreme precision, utilizing only the existing, front-facing camera.  

• Voice Commands: To enable a true touch-free experience, even when the phone is off, just say "Open Sesame" and it will turn on and start tracking head movements.

• Built on Android: We've built on the market-leader Android platform, and made it touch-free accessible system wide through integration with the operating system. You can fully navigate through the phone menu, open applications, write messages, play games, make calls and more!

• Works out of the box: When you get a Sesame Phone, you are getting a device that has already been pre-installed and specially customized to provide the best touch-free experience, right from the first launch.

WHERE WE ARE TODAY

For the past two years we’ve been working non-stop to get the Sesame Phone ready for production. We've experimented with different hardware solutions, tested out a variety of algorithms, and tried out all versions with a broad range of users.

After testing many devices in earlier versions, we are now launching with the Google Nexus 5, because of its superior performance and appropriate size. We are now ready to get the phone out into the world.

The demand is real. With 10 beta testers, and many others already requesting the device, the need for Sesame is already clear.


WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

We are currently in the final stretch of bringing this life-changing product to market.

We have a final working prototype, but are still putting the finishing touches on its software development and design.

Your funds will help us finalize the product and get the word out to everyone who can benefit from the device.

Furthermore, your support will help us demonstrate to large mobile operators and hardware manufacturers that there is a strong demand for supporting people with disabilities.

HOW YOU CAN HELP

1) Backing our Indiegogo campaign will help us launch the Sesame phone into the world to people who can benefit greatly from it. For every $5,000 we raise we'll be donating a phone to someone in need!And if you want to purchase a phone as a gift, we can happily arrange that for you.

3) Connect with us! Stay up-to-date by liking our Facebook page, following us on Twitter, and signing up to our email list.

4) Are you a journalist? Write an article about us! Contact our communications team here.

5) Are you a major company / philanthropist? Become a sponsor and show your support for making technology more accessible

Thanks for getting to the bottom of the page! We're sending you a virtual high five.



Don't forget to share our campaign! Thanks so much!


Questions and Answers

  1. How do I order a Sesame smartphone?
  2. When can I expect to receive my Sesame smartphone?
  3. Shipping Costs
  4. Return Policy
  5. Will the Sesame smartphone work for me?
  6. What will I be able to do on the phone?
  7. What about apps that I download?
  8. What if the Sesame smartphone doesn’t work for me?
  9. How can I turn on and off the device if it’s in sleep mode? Especially if I can’t use my hands at all?
  10. Do I need to use a stand with my Sesame smartphone?
  11. Tutorial Videos
  12. There are so many more uses for this amazing technology! Driving, cooking, playing an instrument… Why aren’t you getting it out to everyone???

How do I order a Sesame smartphone?

We are currently taking pre-orders via Indiegogo so hop on over there and place your order today!

When can I expect to receive my Sesame smartphone?

We are putting the final touches on the phone and going through one more round of testing before we send out the phone. Our projected ship date is Feb 1, 2015 and we are confident we’ll be able to meet our goal.

Shipping Costs

Shipping is free to anywhere in the USA. If you would like us to ship to you internationally, please refer to our shipping guide.

Return Policy

We want you to be 100% happy with your Sesame Phone. If you discover you cannot use the phone due to your physical limitation, simply send it back and we will give you a full refund. Shipping on us! (* We will not accept the phone if it is damaged or broken)

Will the Sesame smartphone work for me?

The Sesame phone works by tracking small head movements which are translated into a “cursor” that appears on the screen of the phone. Since your head movements are what controls the cursor, then some movement of the head is required. As a test, can you perform slight “yes” and “no” gestures with your head? If so, then you should have no problem being tracked and controlling the device. Our goal is to ensure the phone works for as broad a set of users as possible and as such we are continuously testing the device to meet that goal.

What will I be able to do on the phone?

Anything that can be done today using touch can be done on the Sesame smartphone without any touch required. Our users make phone calls, send texts, browse the internet, watch videos on Youtube, socialize on Facebook and even play Angry Birds and Candy Crash.

What about apps that I download?

When you use a Sesame Enable smartphone you have instant touch-free access to just about any app that you download from the Google Play store. No additional set-up required. The same technology that controls the cursor on the phone extends to any app that you download. Imagine that — a whole world of applications that can work for you! We’re pretty excited about the idea.

What if the Sesame smartphone doesn’t work for me?

One of our founding principles is to create a phone that works for people of all physical abilities. Unfortunately, our solution won’t work for every single person. So we offer a full, money-back guarantee if you are unhappy with your device. We will even cover the shipping costs to send the phone back to us. (* We will not accept the phone if it is damaged or broken)

How can I turn on and off the device if it’s in sleep mode? Especially if I can’t use my hands at all?

Just say “Open Sesame” and the phone will turn on and start tracking immediately. If you say, “Close Sesame” you can similarly turn the phone off. If Open Sesame doesn’t work for you, the catchphrase can be customized to your liking.

Do I need to use a stand with my Sesame smartphone?

Depending on where you plan to use your Sesame smartphone, you may find a stand to be helpful. We don’t sell stands directly, but we’ve provided a list of different stands that work with our phone. This list isn’t all-inclusive, so if you already have a stand at home, there’s a good chance it will work with the Sesame as well.

Tutorial Videos

By the time we send out phones video tutorials on how to work the phone will be up and running

There are so many more uses for this amazing technology! Driving, cooking, playing an instrument… Why aren’t you getting it out to everyone???

We get asked this a lot. There are many amazing and innovative companies out there who are using gesture recognition technology in the fields of gaming, entertainment, and other common mass uses. We feel the focus on the disability market is both a mission and an expertise developed by daily visiting different people with disabilities. Nevertheless, as is with many accessibility solutions, once perfected where the need is high and real, it can disseminate to other more widespread uses. Just like a wheelchair ramp is also enabling for baby carriages, bicycles, shopping trolleys, etc.
story_txt:
The campaign has been completed successfully. You can now purchase or donate a Sesame Phone or Tablet at www.sesame-enable.comWe'd like to thank you and the entire Indiegogo community for your contribution in bringing this life-changing solution to existence!Happy New Year Everybody!We are extremely honored to be named winners in Verizon's Powerful Answers Award!!! (read about it here)Since this means we've secured funds to continue development, and in the spirit of the holidays, we've decided to pay it forward and DONATE all funds raised on Indiegogo towards devices that will go to people in need.So now (and retroactively) every $ you contribute goes directly towards people who will benefit tremendously from a touch-free phone. We invite you to nominate persons or organizations that should receive a Sesame Touch-Free Smartphone from the donation pool: www.sesame-enable.com/nominateSo go on! Give someone his first accessible smartphone! Or half a phone. Or even 5% of one - every donation counts!!To
see our original video, watch here:



DESIGNED BY PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES,

FOR PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES.

Designed by a quadriplegic, the head-motion activated mobile device brings the cellphone revolution to a population that has until now been excluded - people with Spinal Chord Injuries, ALS, Cerebral Palsy, Multiple Sclerosis, and other disabilities that impair the use of the hands and arms.
A Sesame Phone can do all the things a regular smartphone can do, entirely hands-free, providing independence through limitless connectivity.
As seen on:
                           



             
                 

                         



THE STORY OF SESAME 
Sesame Enable was founded by Giora Livne, a quadriplegic for the past nine years, and Oded Ben Dov, an app developer and computer vision expert.Giora, an electrical power engineer with a maker sensibility, is always coming up with solutions to improve his life. One day, Giora spotted Oded on a television program, where Oded was showcasing a mobile video game he had created that was controlled via head gestures. A lightbulb went off.Giora saw the potential beyond gaming. With a bit of chutzpah, he was able to track down Oded by calling the TV station, and challenged him to use his knowledge of gesture recognition to create a touch-free phone.Together they founded Sesame and built the Sesame software technology.Sesame is committed to setting a new standard in assistive technologies. Our team is driven by a deep belief in equality and universal accessibility, and in developing meaningful devices and ideas.            Sesame participated in A3i - the world’s first accelerator for startups that benefit people with disabilities  - made possible through the partnership of PresenTense, Beit Issie Shapiro and the Ruderman Family Foundation.      Sesame later joined Raanana's hub for entrepreneurs - Hubanana - and is actively supported by it's community

Google Nexus 5 smartphone

Sesame software pre-installed and ready to use touch-free

The Sesame takes great care in ensuring that your Sesame experience goes off without a hitch! All Sesame-powered Google Nexus 5 smartphones we ship will be preconfigured for simplicity.

The demand is real. With 10 beta testers, and many others already requesting the device, the need for Sesame is already clear.






WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

We are currently in the final stretch of bringing this life-changing product to market.
We have a final working prototype, but are still putting the finishing touches on its software development and design.
Your funds will help us finalize the product and get the word out to everyone who can benefit from the device.
Furthermore, your support will help us demonstrate to large mobile operators and hardware manufacturers that there is a strong demand for supporting people with disabilities.



HOW YOU CAN HELP

1) Backing our Indiegogo campaign will help us launch the Sesame phone into the world to people who can benefit greatly from it. For every $5,000 we raise we'll be donating a phone to someone in need!And if you want to purchase a phone as a gift, we can happily arrange that for you.
3) Connect with us! Stay up-to-date by liking our Facebook page, following us on Twitter, and signing up to our email list.
4) Are you a journalist? Write an article about us! Contact our communications team here.
5) Are you a major company / philanthropist? Become a sponsor and show your support for making technology more accessible
Thanks for getting to the bottom of the page! We're sending you a virtual high five.

Don't forget to share our campaign! Thanks so much!

story: "This is the thinnest charger I have ever seen" - Unbox Therapy
story_txt: "This is the thinnest charger I have ever seen" - Unbox Therapy

story:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
UPDATE 01/01/2013
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
UPDATE 12/23/2013
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We wish you a happy holiday.
And to celebrate we leave some new pictures of the final prototype.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
UPDATE 12/23/2013
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WE HAVE GREAT NEWS FOR YOU

- We have agreement with a manufacturer for production in series.

- We have served your requests and we have 3 important news about CMAGIC:

1 - LED indicator that shows the battery status.
2 - Second USB charging port to charge 2 devices simultaneously.
3 - Now you can also charge the device with the cigarette lighter of your car.

Very soon new pictures...

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


CMAGIC - CHARGE YOUR BATTERY WHEN AND WHERE YOU WANT

This battery charger has appeared because of the need of charging our mobile phone anywhere.

That is the reason why we have designed a special battery charger which apart from charging your mobile phone through the ordinary way, has an internal battery. This internal battery will be used as power source to charge your device everywhere without the need of a socket. It is an internal 4000 mah battery so, we will be able to charge even 2 and a half batteries of iPhone5 with the accrued energy of our CMAGIC.

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

We would really appreciate your funding accomplish this project.

If we were supported by your financing, we would only and exclusively use it to the production of the CMAGIC charger and to get its certificate of approval.

We are going to give exclusive advantages to be able to produce the charger so that you would never run out of battery.

  • PRODUCTION: A certain number of CMAGIC chargers are required in order to give a competitive price to our customers.

  • CERTIFICATE OF APPROVAL: The product must be certified to be introduced to the market.


HOW DOES IT WORK?

This charger is made up of a plug, in which is the charger and the internal battery and of a USB cable.

1. Its operation is simple, in fact, you can use it as an ordinary charger. 

2.However, the huge advantage of this charger is that you can take it with you everywhere. In case you need to charge your phone, it will be enough to plug it directly in the charger. Your mobile phone will be charged with the energy accrued from the internal battery of the charger and you will not have to plug the charger in a socket.

WILL CMAGIC CHARGER WORK WITH MY COUNTRY'S SOCKET?

Do not worry. We have designed four different versions of the charger so that it can be used in almost every country.

WILL I BE ABLE TO CHARGE MY PHONE WITH THIS CHARGER?

If your mobile phone can be charged by USB, you will charge it without problem.

Nowadays the 99% of the mobile phones of the market are charged by USB.


We offer with CMAGIC a pack of three different cables so that you can choose between the one that satisfies your needs:

-Micro USB: 99% of mobile phones with incorporated android use this cable.

(SONY, SAMSUNG, MOTOROLA, HTC, LG, ETC)

- Pin Apple 30: The new thicker cable of Apple used for iPhone4, iPhone3, iPad2, etc.

-Apple Lightning: It is the new cable of Apple which will be placed on its new devices. Nowadays it is incorporated into iPhone5, iPhone 5C y 5S.


TECHNICAL SPECS

Battery 4000mAh Li-Ion Battery (charge even 2 and a half batteries of iPhone5)
Input 90-240V A/C (WORLDWIDE Supported)
Output 5V/1A (Compatible with any USB charging device)

1ST PROTOTYPE



DESIGN

The design of CMAGIC offers the possibility of carrying it anywhere in your pocket, a bag, etc. The battery of your device will never be a problem again.

HOW CAN YOU HELP US?

Apart from giving us the possibility of funding the project, we would really appreciate if you could help us to let people know about CMAGIC ( from the tools we have in Indiegogo or by your own), so that everybody could benefit from it.

Thank you very much to all of you!

WEB:

www.comodore.es

story:
Updates

June 28, 2012: SleepDrops™ and the COOKOO™ watch: The first REAL watch that connects with your smartphone and keeps you alerted, just got better.

What

An app that makes it super fast and easy for you to set time and date schedules, during which notifications get suppressed, either globally or per specific app on your phone. 

With SleepDrops™ you get full control over your notifications. Unlike with the 'Do Not Disturb' function in iOS 6, which suppresses - all - your notifications. 

Plus a whole lot of other badass features.

 

 Planned features

  • Schedule per app and/or per user account
  • Suppress all notifications for a while with the Timer
  • Trigger based on location or available Wi-Fi networks
  • Automatically suspend notifications for certain apps based on your calendar
  • Quickly turn Sleepdrops™ off and on
  • ...

If you have any ideas about things you would like to see developed, don't hesitate to contact me. I'll happily consider every suggestion you make.

How will the money be used?

The money will go to pay the fees of the designer and developer I'm hiring. This is basically a down payment that will secure the services of these very talented people who will help make the SleepDrops™ iPhone app both useful and a delight to use. Revenue will not only to get the app built initially, but will also be used to maintain and update it.

$5,000 is not the entire cost of the app's production; it's not even half of the final cost in fact. But it will allow me to make the initial payments.

Release

With graphics design, laying out the views, then styling the view and writing all of the code, the app will approximately take 2 to 3 months to develop. There's going to be a ton of hours in developing all the awesome features we have planned for you. We plan to start full development as soon as the funding is successful.

In the event that the app doesn't get accepted by the App Store, the app will be released in the Cydia Store. You need a jailbroken iPhone in order to install apps from the Cydia Store.

How to contact me

Do you need any assistance or have any problems with pledging? Do you have questions, suggestions or if you just want to say hi? Please feel free to mail me at aydin@sleepdropsapp.com or @SleepdropsApp.

Other ways you can help

You can also help by spreading the word!

  • Share the link to this project page www.indiegogo.com/sleepdrops-for-ios indiscriminately all over Facebook, Twitter, via email, on your website or on your favorite forum
  • Blog about the SleepDrops™ project
  • Like us on Facebook and share the love
  • Follow us on Twitter, tweet and retweet
  • Tell your friends, family and co-workers about it

 

Thank you very much for your support!
story_txt:
Updates
June 28, 2012: SleepDrops™ and the COOKOO™ watch: The first REAL watch that connects with your smartphone and keeps you alerted, just got better.
What
An app that makes it super fast and easy for you to set time and date schedules, during which notifications get suppressed, either globally or per specific app on your phone. 
With SleepDrops™ you get full control over your notifications. Unlike with the 'Do Not Disturb' function in iOS 6, which suppresses - all - your notifications. 
Plus a whole lot of other badass features.
 
 Planned features

Schedule per app and/or per user account
Suppress all notifications for a while with the Timer
Trigger based on location or available Wi-Fi networks
Automatically suspend notifications for certain apps based on your calendar
Quickly turn Sleepdrops™ off and on
...
If you have any ideas about things you would like to see developed, don't hesitate to contact me. I'll happily consider every suggestion you make.
How will the money be used?The money will go to pay the fees of the designer and developer I'm hiring. This is basically a down payment that will secure the services of these very talented people who will help make the SleepDrops™ iPhone app both useful and a delight to use. Revenue will not only to get the app built initially, but will also be used to maintain and update it.$5,000 is not the entire cost of the app's production; it's not even half of the final cost in fact. But it will allow me to make the initial payments.
ReleaseWith graphics design, laying out the views, then styling the view and writing all of the code, the app will approximately take 2 to 3 months to develop. There's going to be a ton of hours in developing all the awesome features we have planned for you. We plan to start full development as soon as the funding is successful.In the event that the app doesn't get accepted by the App Store, the app will be released in the Cydia Store. You need a jailbroken iPhone in order to install apps from the Cydia Store.

story:
The Technology Revolution Against Thieves

TAP YOUR CREDIT CARD TO BUY STUFF: Today you can buy a train ticket, a coke, a coffee or anything else by simply tapping your debit or credit card against the register and paying in less than a second.

THE PROBLEM: Thieves can also steal your credit card number in less than a second with their Smartphone.

HECTIC LIFESTYLES: How many times have you lost your wallet, phone, valuables or even your child in a store?

THE SOLUTION: Now you can protect your credit cards and your identity with our simple Card Shield. Plus, never lose your wallet, phone, valuables or even your child in a store with our "Wallet Tag" or "Smart Tag"


1. GUARD YOUR CARDS: Insert our credit card-sized shield in your wallet behind your credit cards & the RFID (Radio Frequency Identification) signal CANNOT be read by thieves! For maximum protection we recommend placing a card shield in both sides of your wallet covering all cards from both sides.

RFID/contactless cards (tap-to-pay) will continue to grow - they are the future and you need to protect yourself from loss, fraud & theft.

         

                      

2. WATCH YOUR WALLET: Place our small “Wallet Tag” inside your wallet or purse. If you lose it, your Smartphone will alert you immediately. The Smartphone app will sound an alarm from as little as a few feet away of losing your wallet or purse. If your item has been left somewhere you can view a map pin-drop of where you were when your wallet, purse or other tagged item was separated from your Smartphone! (You can tag up to 4 items) Each tag operates with a single replaceable CR32 battery.

       


3. TAG YOUR VALUABLES: You can clip the "Smart Tag" onto your valuables, your keys, even your kid! When you are separated from whatever you have attached the tag to, an alarm goes off on your phone. And if you lose your phone, you can use the "Smart Tag" to send an audible alarm to your phone - it's as simple as that. And again, if your item has been left somewhere you can view a map pin-drop of where you were when your wallet, purse or other tagged item was separated from your Smartphone! (You can tag up to 4 items) 

An Overview:

In 2014, approximately 250 million credit & debit cards using RFID (Radio Frequency Identification) and NFC (Near Field Communication) technology will be used to make "contactless" payments (tap-to-pay). It is clear that these RFID readers will grow exponentially over the next few years with banks, credit cards, retailers & mass transit. When banks & credit card companies send you replacement cards they will contain these RFID chips. It's also clear that this technology is an easy way for thieves to steal your information, identity and your cash! 

In addition, many passports now also carry an RFID chip; this means that thieves can steal your identity from your passport remotely! So, we have a larger card available which you can place inside your passport too. Two simple cards: one protects your identity, the other protects your credit & debit cards.

While working on developing these shield devices, the question was raised about how to make sure when traveling that you don't lose your wallet and/or passport or other valuable items? That's when the idea for a proximity device called "Wallet Tag" came about. This is a small device placed inside your wallet which operates on Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) and runs off a single CR2106 battery. Insert this slim (3 mm/0.11" thick) tag into your wallet, purse, passport, etc., and when you walk away from your wallet (or other tagged item), your IOS device (Smartphone, iPad, etc.) will emit an audible & visual alarm. If you lose your cellphone, simply press a button on the tag to send an alarm to your phone and it will ring!

  • Protect your identity
  • Protect your cash
  • Never lose your phone or tagged items again
  • Use the tags to find your phone

What We Need Funding For: 

  • For Marketing to help us get the product into the mass market and stop thieves from stealing your identity & your cash
  • To help mass produce these products
  • To market and distribute these products
  • To reach out to promotional marketing companies and attend promotional gift events

  • If we exceed our goal by a substantial amount, we'll also create a professional video to explain the products and build an e-commerce Website for direct orders

  • If we don’t reach our entire goal, those who have contributed will still get their products and we will keep on pushing to get these products to market

In the future:

We anticipate the following pricing levels (or lower) for the units in single quantities:

Credit Card Shield $5.99 + S&H

Passport Shield $7.99 + S&H

Wallet Tag $39.99 + S&H

Smart Tag $39.99 + S&H

With your help we also envisage these products being offered as promotional items for larger corporations to brand their products and services. The credit card shield would be ideal for loyalty or membership cards. We need your help to get these products manufactured and in front of large companies.

  • Loyalty and Membership cards would have information on them to help you while protecting your identity & your cash
  • Small businesses would be able to custom print them for giveaways

Other Ways You Can Help:

If you can't contribute right now, you can still help by:

  • Helping to get the word out and sharing on your social network sites by using the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Sending an email to your friends telling them how cool this idea is and letting them see how it can help to protect their identity
  • If you have a business, why not brand your company on these products to give out as promotional items or sell to your customers?

The Technical Stuff:

  • Compatibility for Wallet Tag & Smart Tag app:
iPhone Versions: 4S/5/5C/5S operating ios 6 and above. iPad Version 3/4 operating ios 6 & above. iPad mini, all versions operating ios 6 & above. iPad Air & iPod touch (Version 4) operating ios 6 & above. 

Samsung: Galaxy Note 3: Android OS, v4.3 (Jelly Bean), Bluetooth v4.0 with A2DP, EDR, LE, Galaxy J: Android OS, v4.3 (Jelly Bean), upgradable to v4.4 (KitKat), Bluetooth v4.0 with A2DP, EDR, LE, Galaxy Round G910S:  Android OS, v4.3 (Jelly Bean), Bluetooth v4.0 with A2DP, EDR, LE, Galaxy Note 10.1 (2014 Edition):  Android OS, v4.3 (Jelly Bean),  Bluetooth v4.0 with A2DP, Samsung I9190 Galaxy S4 mini:  Android OS, v4.2.2 (Jelly Bean), upgradable to v4.3 (Jelly Bean), Bluetooth v4.0 with A2DP, EDR, LE.

Sony Xperia Z1: Android OS, v4.2 (Jelly Bean), v4.3, planned upgrade to v4.4 (KitKat), Bluetooth v4.0 with A2DP, Xperia Z Ultra: Android OS, v4.2 (Jelly Bean), v4.3, planned upgrade to v4.4 (KitKat), Bluetooth v4.0 with A2DP

LG Nexus 5: Android OS, v4.4 (KitKat), upgradable to v4.4.2 (KitKat), Bluetooth v4.0 with A2DP 

HTC One Max: Android OS, v4.3 (Jelly Bean), Bluetooth v4.0 with A2DP

Asus Google Nexus 7 (2013): Android OS, v4.3 (Jelly Bean), upgradable to v4.4.2 (KitKat), Bluetooth v4.0 with A2DP, LE, Asus PadFone mini: Android OS, v4.3 (Jelly Bean), Bluetooth v4.0 with A2DP 

Motorola Moto G: Android OS, v4.3 (Jelly Bean), upgradable to v4.4.2 (KitKat), Bluetooth v4.0 with A2DP, LE

  • Communications Standard: Bluetooth® 4.0 Low Energy Wireless Technology
  • US Patent Pending, European Patent approved
  • Thin credit-card size design "Wallet Tag" slips in your existing wallet and purse easily. (3mm / 0.11" thick)
  • Suitable for use with all contactless credit card-sized devices operating at 13.56MHz. Frequency range: 2.4GHz - 2.4835 GHz
  • Includes protection for all major credit and debit cards, payment cards (including many transportation/metro cards), and the majority of identity cards, in line with the ISO/IEC 14443 standard.
  • Search Cover Range: 164 Ft / 50m 
  • Alert Range: User adjustable up to 50ft
  • Low cost & durable. Exceptionally high value - what value do you put on YOUR identity and data?
The Small Print: In supporting this project and placing an order for any of the products listed above you accept that I/we/VoyagerBlue®, nor any of its agents or affiliates can be held responsible for your identity theft or loss of your tagged items which utilize the RFID Card Shield, Wallet Tag or Smart Tag products as the supplier cannot observe if the products were used as instructed and intended, that batteries were inserted the correct way round and or products were used when batteries were depleted and not changed accordingly for proper operation. Card shields are non-returnable as they have no operational parts. Returns can only be accepted for Wallet Tag or Smart Tag products which do not turn on when batteries are correctly installed. Purchaser will be responsible for all return & re-shipping costs.

Thank You for Taking the Time to Consider This Project

story:
Meet L-Remote

L-Remote – is a intelligent controller. You can stick it on the wall or placed anywhere,  It connected with your phone. via Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy and it has the powerful function to control your devices at home or replace the bulky traditional controllers.  

L-Remote need: iPhone 5S / 5C / 5 / 4S, iPad 4 / 3, iPad mini, or Android phone which supports Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy.

By L-Remote, simply open the phone, you can control your devices at home, including TV, DVD, air conditioning, and so on.  

  • How many times you hope to own the remote controller just around you?
  • How many times you want to combine all your controllers into one?
  • How many times you wish to control your home devices in different rooms?
  • To solve these, you need a L-Remote.

This is L-Remote，a pretty box.


Yes ！You need L-Remote

Due to the compact design, it is so small and completely wireless that you can put it in any place according to your preference, for example, in your bedroom, in the living room and even in your office.


It is very smart, you can combine all your IR-based remote controllers into iOS devices.

It’s very Eco. With the benefit of 3-year experiences in low power design area, Only 2 AAA battery will support L-Remote to work beyond one year.

In the bedroom 


In the living room


In the office 


Multiple connect

A  iOS or android device can connect with multiple L-Remote at the same time.  with a few L-Remote in different rooms inside, you can control device in different rooms at one time


Control devices behind the wall

The L-Remote also allows you to control  devices located behind cabinets or walls. You don’t have to point your mobile phone or remote at your devices anymore. You don’t even have to be in the same room.

As a gift

L-Remote is a gift. It is just like a beauty, with gift package, never worry about Christmas and new year present.

L-Remote is more than a gift. When iPhone meet L-Remote, it becomes a powerful controller immediately. Just put L-Remote besides Christmas Tree you can change the colors of LED with iPhone or iPad. 

 

How does it work?

L-Remote is  a smart bridge to connect mobile and home devices, that it link iPhone or iPad with the technology of Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy and connect our home devices with infrared. 

When you want to control your TV, DVD, or air conditioning, just open the app and tap the button  to send your command to L-Remote.

L-Remote aims to bring people an easy and modern life with our creativities. The innovative technologies behind L-Remote include the following unique features:

A powerful self-learning function

L-Remote could learn from almost all infrared remote control currently on the market and add the function it had learnt to become its own part. Through self-learning function, people can create their personalized remote control by integrating the common use features of TV, set-top boxes, air conditioning, and water heater into the screen of your devices. So open your smartphone or pad and all the home appliances are in your control.

An ultra-low standby power consumption  

The remote control of L-Remote has an ultra-low standby power, which uses the AAA battery and provides electricity for over a whole year.


A complete hardware-level security certification

Through the equipment authorization of the hardware level, the control over your home appliance is in your hand firmly. Only get your authorization, can the mobile devices access the remote control system of L-Remote. So do not worry about security issues, because the unauthorized devices were unable to control your appliance.


Brief and exquisite design

Remote control of L-Remote is naturally merged into wall hangings because of its size. At the same time, L-Remote also supplies the matching accessories for hanging on the wall. With the help of non-streaking technology, it is convenient to change its position without any trace.

Broad coverage 

L-Remote has a broad coverage via a wide angle IR transceiver,  with 8-meter control distance and 90 degree angle.  So it’s possible to control several home devices with only one L-Remote. 

IR Library

We attach a Upgradeable Built-in IR Database to L-Remote，common brands and types of AV ,TV equipment, even Apple TV and PS3 are compatibility.  Unlike learning-only remotes, it can even replace a lost or broken remote. our can add new devices to the database at any time based on customer requests or if a popular new device becomes available that requires a new IR code set.

Home Account

Your remote control settings can be saved to L-Remote home account, after your set up, the whole family are synchronized from your mobile phone.


Excite upgraded feature.

L-Remote is designed for low-power and  easy to use , so it is not available for remote control. Don’t worry about that, L-Smart will conquer everything for you. L-Smart,  one of the member of Lemote system, provides variety of connection solutions and  powerful coordination for every device in the series, which will be launched following L-Remote.  Once you get  L-Smart, existing L-Remote will be upgraded to remote control directly and add lots of additional features. 

The Lemote System


The entire system is very cool, you can control home appliances including switches, lights, air conditioning and TV with any network access in anywhere, such as LAN, WIFI, GPRS, 3G, 4G and so on. 

The series of entire system contains the main sections of L-Switch, L-Smart, L-Light, L-Find, L-Sense, L-Cloud with the most economical, the most convenient and the easiest way to upgrade your room to become a smart space. 

The overall technical solution has been formed and completed the verification. The next step is to trun the design into product one by one, optimize it and improve experience of users.

What do we need funds for?

We spent lots of time in building a functional prototype along with iOS App of L-Remote. Now the work are completed.

However, we are a young start-up team with limited funds and couldn’t have enough money to manufacture them quite well.

So we need your support to optimize L-Remote and then change it into a real product, next make it more easier to use, and finally send it to you as soon as possible.

Risks and challenges

We have worked hard on our Android app, but we still have not completed it . To make the Android App available, we may need more test work with many android device which in different models.

Who we are?

We are Lemphi, a team with passion. The word “Lemphi” is merged by two words Lemon and Phi. The latter Phi comes from the twenty-first Greek alphabet, which stands for the sign of Fibonacci Sequence (Golden Ratio). We expect to provide solutions for wonderful life, just as the perfect Golden Ratio.

Thank you

We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project. 

If you have any questions or you just want to say hello, be sure to contact us at support@ lemphi.com.

Only get your authorization, can the mobile devices access the remote control system of L-Remote. So do not worry about security issues, because the unauthorized devices were unable to control your appliance.




Brief and exquisite design
Remote control of L-Remote is naturally merged into wall hangings because of its size. At the same time, L-Remote also supplies the matching accessories for hanging on the wall. With the help of non-streaking technology, it is convenient to change its position without any trace.
Broad coverage 
L-Remote has a broad coverage via a wide angle IR transceiver,  with 8-meter control distance and 90 degree angle.  So it’s possible to control several home devices with only one L-Remote. 


IR Library
We attach a Upgradeable Built-in IR Database to L-Remote，common brands and types of AV ,TV equipment, even Apple TV and PS3 are compatibility.  Unlike learning-only remotes, it can even replace a lost or broken remote. our can add new devices to the database at any time based on customer requests or if a popular new device becomes available that requires a new IR code set.
Home Account

Your remote control settings can be saved to L-Remote home account, after your set up, the whole family are synchronized from your mobile phone.
Excite upgraded feature.



L-Remote is designed for low-power and  easy to use , so it is not available for remote control. Don’t worry about that, L-Smart will conquer everything for you. L-Smart,  one of the member of Lemote system, provides variety of connection solutions and  powerful coordination for every device in the series, which will be launched following L-Remote.  Once you get  L-Smart, existing L-Remote will be upgraded to remote control directly and add lots of additional features. 
The Lemote System



The entire system is very cool, you can control home appliances including switches, lights, air conditioning and TV with any network access in anywhere, such as LAN, WIFI, GPRS, 3G, 4G and so on. 
The series of entire system contains the main sections of L-Switch, L-Smart, L-Light, L-Find, L-Sense, L-Cloud with the most economical, the most convenient and the easiest way to upgrade your room to become a smart space. 



The overall technical solution has been formed and completed the verification. The next step is to trun the design into product one by one, optimize it and improve experience of users.


What do we need funds for?


We spent lots of time in building a functional prototype along with iOS App of L-Remote. Now the work are completed.However, we are a young start-up team with limited funds and couldn’t have enough money to manufacture them quite well.
So we need your support to optimize L-Remote and then change it into a real product, next make it more easier to use, and finally send it to you as soon as possible.

Risks and challenges
We have worked hard on our Android app, but we still have not completed it . To make the Android App available, we may need more test work with many android device which in different models.




Who we are?
We are Lemphi, a team with passion. The word “Lemphi” is merged by two words Lemon and Phi. The latter Phi comes from the twenty-first Greek alphabet, which stands for the sign of Fibonacci Sequence (Golden Ratio). We expect to provide solutions for wonderful life, just as the perfect Golden Ratio.


Thank you
We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project. 
If you have any questions or you just want to say hello, be sure to contact us at support@ lemphi.com.

story:
Flight facility in Las Cruces, NM - 15,000 sq. miles restricted airspace for drones


We are Unmanned Aerial Systems, Incorporated.       In the last four years we have succeeded in integrating advanced aerial photography into our UAV technology.  As full integration of commercial unmanned air vehicles in US airspace begins we want to introduce you to the next generation of commercial drone aircraft and how we will communicate with them.

The purpose of this Indiegogo campaign is to provide  the funding for the development of a smart phone imaging application. 

Essentially the UAS, Inc. aircraft cameras will uplink precision imagery directly to its secure website.  Contributors will have received (for their contribution) the   software application to load on their desktops, laptops, tablets and smart phones. 

When the whole imaging system is complete, the contributors (who have loaded the software app) will be able to view drone missions (in part or in whole) on their own devices.  These will include samples of precision agriculture, search & rescue, security and pipeline safety operations.

     Flight Test Center - New Mexico

As the system is refined in the coming year, the contributors will be able to view actual missions in near real time.

The contributors will be the market test, a funding source and some of the beta testers of the system.

What We Need 

We anticipate that $200,000 will be sufficient to write and test the drone downlink software; as well as the hardware adjustments that will be necessary.

What You Get

 1st Perk:  $10 Contributor names will be placed on a UAS, Inc. website page as a supporter of commercial work drones that respect public safety and  privacy.  If the contributor provides an email address - they will receive the UAS, Inc. monthly Commercial UAV Update. 

2nd Perk: $100 Contributor receives the 1.0 version of the drone imaging  downlink software application.  Image quality will be affected by the device  screen size (better on desktop than smartphone).  Although user will have  "zoom" function and "Lat-Long" regardless of the device utilized.

3rd Perk:  $500 Contributor will be placed on the supporter website, be sent the 1.0 version of the downlink software and receive a desktop model of the Nightwind II Hybrid Unmanned Aerial Vehicle.

Full Size Model Nightwind II - yours is smaller  

4th Perk: Technically savvy $1,000 Contributors will be asked to examine   functionality of the initial software. Opinions will be sought on clarity of   instructions, ease of use and any apparent glitches. An online or telephonic interview will be requested of each Beta Tester.

5th Perk: $10,000 Contributor receives a $20,000 discount on the purchase of a new Nightwind II Hybrid Drone.   UAS, Inc. is developing this new version of its two meter wingspan electric UAV. It will be powered by a new alcohol fuel cell with backup batteries. The new hybrid powerplant will  allow the drone to stay aloft for up to 12 hours. The additional electricity from the fuel cells will power an improved sensor suite on board the  aircraft.   Open to U.S. citizens only.

    Nightwind II 

The Impact

The commercial drone has been in use around the World for more than eight years (90% of Japan’s crop dusting is now done by drones).  However, by 2015 the commercial UAV will begin common use in the U.S.A.  The operational efficiency, cost savings and increased safety are eagerly anticipated by the people in many industries and public endeavors.

In the last five years the UAS, Inc. team members have developed very small form factor mapping cameras for use in small (6 ft wingspan) drones.    We have engaged in the development of two new powerplants for the same small UAVs; including multi-fuel internal combustion with Ricardo Engineering and the new fuel cell technology with MTI.

According to an AUVSI [Association for Unmanned Vehicle Systems International] study, in the ten years following 2015, the UAV industry will generate $82 Billion in economic impact and 100,000 new jobs nationwide.  People and companies who get involved now will have a tremendous advantage as the industry grows.  A careful company that makes public safety and privacy a prime concern will have an advantage in the years to come.

Please share your thoughts and concerns about commercial drone by using the Indiegogo share tools or emailing us at sales@uasnw.com.

Thank you for your support in this project!     

- the UAS, Inc. Team


Presentation Black Board




The Unmanned Aerial Systems, Inc. Team

 James M. McDonough, CEO/President

After service in the Marine Corps Jim worked for Fortune 500  companies and was a partner in a regional CPA firm.  He founded two service companies and a server computer builder before turning to aerial imagery and unmanned vehicles.


 Dr. William H. Kent, PhD - Chief Technology Officer

Dr. Kent began his engineering career at Bell Labs before moving to Harris Corp.  At Harris he led the design teams for the FALCON and Downed Pilot radios.  He co-founded Geospatial Systems, Inc. a supplier (OEM) of aerial cameras to Leica; including 39 and 50 megapixel designs.


 Thomas W. McClelland, Vice President 

Mr. McClelland began his career as a Risk Analyst and Systems Safety Engineer in the energy industry.  He worked overseas for more than two decades before returning to the U.S.A. and investing in two aviation projects.  Tom guides the drone rotorcraft project for UAS, Inc.


 Jay R. Snyder, USAF (Ret.) Business Development

Mr. Snyder is an Air Force Academy graduate in Astronautical Engineering with  17 years experience as a Fighter Pilot/Mission Commander. After the service, he has worked for over 18 years as a contractor for defense systems.

story:
Mist Shine

Mist Shine is world first smart wearable scent indicator built in aluminum alloy. It allows you to get kinds of spray at anytime or anywhere, it is a perfume bottle which can be worn. Furthermore, you may connect it to your smartphone, to make spray happen when you have an incoming call or SMS.
Please note, there are two versions of Mist Shine, normal type without bluetooth, and another is smart version with bluetooth function, you may choose what you like.                           

             
  

 The core component of Mist Shine is ultrasonic unit, it transforms any liquid into micron mist, quietly and soft. The liquid can be perfume or moisture water or others which you want to "Ultrasonic" it.




Mist Shine is a very interesting companion for desktop. Benefit from bottom mechanical key design, within one press, wonderful spray will be full of your desk.




We adopt removable design for liquid container. Main body and container are connected by 6 magnets, installation can be finished in 5 seconds without any tools. At the same time, there is a window at the back of container, user can see how much the rest perfume is. So you can change them anytime to get different spray, perfume for night, moisture water for skin or others.


Mist Shine is not only an atomizer, it integrates 7 independent highlight LED color, colors can be switched via a key, single hand can handle it easily.



To match 7 LED colors, there are 7 corresponding colorful strings in the package, select it by yourself to get different performance.




Features


Mist Shine main structure 




Why we design Mist Shine?

There are many wearable electrical product in the market, and we think a wearable product should be in an elegant shape firstly, and then it should provide some functions to meet people demand. 

Why we adopt metal material?

We understand plastic is much cheaper than metal, and very easy to produce within some molds. But it will be very strange to wear a piece of plastic on human's body, so aluminum alloy is the best choice for wearable products even if higher cost.

Who needs Mist Shine?

Girl
Boy who loves his girl
Someone needs a surprise


Why we need your help?

We need your contribution to:
Get certification, such as Bluetooth, CE, RoHS, FCC and etc.
Reduce massive production cost.
To expand product line on smart wearable market.

Our Team

Chris Yang, product idea and prototype design

David L., mechanical design 
Michael, Gu, electrical firmware and hardware design

FAQ

Q:When will I get product?
A:We will send goods out in 10 days after Indiegogo campaign.

Q:Why there are two types of delivery cost
A; $7 is for post delivery, slower but cheaper, $25 is for DHL delivery, faster and cost is higher.

Q:How many times Mist Shine can spray per battery charge?
A:About 200 times.

Q:How about perfume container's capacity?
A:2.8ml, can support about 100 times spray.


Help make it happen, for:

Mist Shine


Visit us at
http://www.effisystem.com

story:
Our goal is to turn the app design world upside-down. The system we have developed will revolutionize how apps are used in our personal relationships. The control is ALL yours.

Think about it...you have friends that know things about you that even your parents don't know. Pinky-swear level of secrecy; Things you just don't intend to post out there for everyone to see, inside jokes, hilarious "you had to be there" moments. Keep these priceless moments just between friends with your own app.

You are in the driver's seat. Whether you are looking to have private conversations, keep your pictures and messages off the internet, stay directly connected with people you really want to be connected to, or just simply want to be your unique original you, the 'My Own App' system will give you unprecedented levels of control. (It's going to be amazingly affordable too!)

Simplicity is the name of the game. Having your own app should be a breeze. It only takes a few minutes and a couple of mouse clicks to have your own app ready and submitted. We take it from there and within two weeks you are approved and your app is available to download from the Apple and Google app stores. Design. Submit. Download. It doesn't get any easier than this!


                                    - -   Get your Miss Jackson fix on here.  - -

Mom taught you sharing is good, but not this kind of sharing.

We (iShoutOut) believe that you can be as social or sharing as you want, but not at the price of your own privacy or originality. You don't have to 'just' accept whatever design or policy changes they put in front of you.

The constant change in format, features and privacy policies by social networks is for the birds. And WHO really owns the information you post there? (You may want to read those terms and conditions again.)

Whether you want an app for just (2) people or for a group of friends, team, or organization, you can create your own app and control what is on the app and who can have access to the information.

With your support, you will get your own app in return. Based on your level of support, you will get your own app that will be published into the Apple and Google App Stores for download within 2 weeks of submission. Additional app users can be purchased for $1 per year. There is no fee for the actuall app creation, only for the users of the app. (2) person app = $2 per year. (10) person app = $10 per year.  Design. Submit. Download. It really is that simple.


Jon Berger - After leaving his leadership role at publicly traded NightHawk Radiology (featured in the best-selling book by Thomas Friedman "The World Is Flat" for revolutionizing how healthcare services are delivered around the world) it was clear to Jon that mobile apps were going to be the next phase of technology and communication. With the rise in popularity of social media and a smartphone in every pocket, Jon saw an opportunity to make technology less intimidating for small business owners and individuals. Jon’s vision was to remove the barriers and bring an inexpensive way for businesses and individuals to have their own mobile apps.

Rick Sparks – Rick brings extensive Sales and Marketing experience from Proctor & Gamble, Frito-Lay, and Kraft Foods. Rick’s industry knowledge and hands-on experience with restaurants, grocery stores, and small businesses has influenced iShoutOut’s vision for simplifying mobile engagement for businesses, organizations, and individuals.

Main Website
  • ishoutout.com

story:
Finally, Get control over your car costs!

I've owned many cars over the many years that I've been driving. I never really knew what it cost me to own a car. And like most people, buying a car is one of the most expensive things that I've done in my lifetime. 

But times are different.

Money is tight.

Polution and how it impacts the environment is a big issue.

Fuel efficiency and low emission are new concerns for car owners.

I want to do something to help car owners in this new reality, so I came up with AutoWoopie.com.

Car owners can now record on their computer or on a mobile phone any expense they incur operating their car. They'll also get reminders about key events such as oil change, inspection, license renewal etc.They'll receive tips on safety and good driving habits.

But this is only the beginning. The AutoWoopie site will become the  destination for every person who wants the best information about operating and controlling his/her car. 

The web site is fully functioning.....and it's free! Sign up as an AutoWoopie user and experience it yourself.

I've self funded the project up to this point, but money is needed to tell the driving public about AutoWoopie, and there are lots of people to tell. 

This is a very worthwhile project for drivers and any one interested a safer and more secure environment.

I came to this point rather late in life, when most people are winding down. Not me. It's too important. So this is my new career after a successful career as a management consultant to almost 100 entrepreneurial companies in a dozen different industries.

Let's do it together.

Contribute if you can. Sign up as a user. Tell your friends about AutoWoopie.

Spread the word,

...and, Thanks.

story:
Short Summary

 In 2011, The National Safety Council estimated that at least 28% of all traffic crashes – or at least 1.6 million crashes each year – involved drivers using cell phones and texting. According to studies done by the National Highway Transportation Safety Administration, texting and driving makes a driver twenty three times more likely to crash. 

Unfortunately, the statistics are not just numbers, but are lives that are being lost. As a senior in high school, a classmate and dear friend lost his life in a car wreck. It was later confirmed that he was texting and driving before the wreck. My life, along with many others' lives, were changed forever that day. I committed to coming up with a solution to save lives and save others from the heartbreak of losing a loved on due to such a meaningless death. 

Eyes On The Road is a cell phone application that prevents texting and driving, and establishes an accountability between teen driver and parent. The software locks the teen driver's phone at any speeds over 20 MPH, and allow only a certain number of applications to run, including GPS and calling. If the teen is not driving, he or she can call a parent or guardian with the managerial side of the app to override the system. The teenager's application cannot be uninstalled without permission and access of the parent. 

The application is currently being developed. However, the costs are high, and will continue to rise as the product is rolled out and sent to market. Our mission is to end texting and driving, and save lives. In order to do so, we want to offer our application at an affordable price, so that is can be used and accessed widely. With your help, we can speed up the process of the launch and begin to save lives together. 


 

What We Need & What You Get

Initially, a generous proportion of the funds raised will go to offset the costs of development. The application is detailed and costly, as there are a number of different functions in order to have it perform at our expectations. The remaining funds will be applied to marketing and promotion, in order to have a successful launch and get our application into as many phones as possible. Our goal is to save lives, and put an end to the epidemic of texting and driving. 

We want people who are as passionate about the product as us. We know that texting and driving has negatively affected millions of lives, so we want to have supporters who have the same goal as us, saving lives. For your support, there will be a number of perks to be had. A donation of $25 will secure your name on our donors page on our website, which will be launched when the product is finished. With a donation of $50, you will receive a free download of the finished product, as well as a place on our donors page. Donations of $100 and higher will receive a spot on our main home page, as well as a free download on the Android market. Unfortunately, the application cannot be developed on iOS, so iPhones will not be able to run the application. The app is being developed on the Android system only. 

If the goal is not reached, the product will still be developed and rolled out to market. The price will be slightly higher, depending on the amount of funding received, in order to cover some of the costs that persist. 

The software is currently being developed and is in the works! With your help, we will have the app on the market and on phones across the nation, saving lives together. 

If you have a passion for what we are doing and want to help in another aspect other than money, we would love to hear from you! We are passionate about making roads safer, and saving the lives of as many people as possible. Let us know how you want to help, and we will be happy to come up with something! We want to get the word out to as many people as possible. 


*no ownership rights to the video
story_txt:
Short Summary

 In 2011, The National
Safety Council estimated that at least 28% of all traffic crashes – or at least
1.6 million crashes each year – involved drivers using cell phones and texting.
According to studies done by the National Highway Transportation Safety
Administration, texting and driving makes a driver twenty three times more
likely to crash. 
Unfortunately, the statistics are not just
numbers, but are lives that are being lost. As a senior in high school, a
classmate and dear friend lost his life in a car wreck. It was later confirmed
that he was texting and driving before the wreck. My life, along with many
others' lives, were changed forever that day. I committed to coming up with a
solution to save lives and save others from the heartbreak of losing a loved on
due to such a meaningless death. 
Eyes On The Road is a cell phone
application that prevents texting and driving, and establishes an
accountability between teen driver and parent. The software locks the teen
driver's phone at any speeds over 20 MPH, and allow only a certain number of
applications to run, including GPS and calling. If the teen is not driving, he
or she can call a parent or guardian with the managerial side of the app to
override the system. The teenager's application cannot be uninstalled without
permission and access of the parent. 
The application is currently being
developed. However, the costs are high, and will continue to rise as the
product is rolled out and sent to market. Our mission is to end texting and
driving, and save lives. In order to do so, we want to offer our application at
an affordable price, so that is can be used and accessed widely. With your
help, we can speed up the process of the launch and begin to save lives
together. 

 
What We Need & What You Get
Initially, a generous proportion of the
funds raised will go to offset the costs of development. The application is
detailed and costly, as there are a number of different functions in order to
have it perform at our expectations. The remaining funds will be applied to
marketing and promotion, in order to have a successful launch and get our
application into as many phones as possible. Our goal is to save lives, and put
an end to the epidemic of texting and driving. 
We want people who are as passionate about
the product as us. We know that texting and driving has negatively affected
millions of lives, so we want to have supporters who have the same goal as us,
saving lives. For your support, there will be a number of perks to be had. A
donation of $25 will secure your name on our donors page on our website, which
will be launched when the product is finished. With a donation of $50, you will
receive a free download of the finished product, as well as a place on our
donors page. Donations of $100 and higher will receive a spot on our main home
page, as well as a free download on the Android market. Unfortunately, the
application cannot be developed on iOS, so iPhones will not be able to run the
application. The app is being developed on the Android system only. 
If the goal is not reached, the product
will still be developed and rolled out to market. The price will be slightly
higher, depending on the amount of funding received, in order to cover some of
the costs that persist. 
The software is currently being developed
and is in the works! With your help, we will have the app on the market and on
phones across the nation, saving lives together. 
If you have a passion for what we are doing and want to
help in another aspect other than money, we would love to hear from you! We are
passionate about making roads safer, and saving the lives of as many people as
possible. Let us know how you want to help, and we will be happy to come up
with something! We want to get the word out to as many people as
possible. *no ownership rights to the video

story:
I am raising money to improve and complete the Frog Bombers game for iPhone. Help me create the best gaming experience possible (and develop an Android version)!

FROG BOMBERS

The tiny, terrible trolls have taken control of the swamp! Help Freddy & friends bomb the trolls & collect the lilly pads.

Frog Bombers is a fun, addictive mobile game with a message: Keep Moving Forward. The story begins when Freddy decides to take back the swamp from the tiny, terrible trolls. Every fly Freddy catches turns into a bomb. Different bombs have different powers, creating an exciting and ever-evolving gaming experience. By bombing the trolls and collecting the lilly pads, Freddy can build a lilly pad bridge to rescue Princess Penelope.

My Story

I am a motivational speaker. My favorite motto is "Keep Moving Forward." I love to share it with all the groups I speak to, both students and adults. To better illustrate my motto, I came up with a variety of projects, none of which stuck, including a misguided (according to my wife) attempt to build a lifesize Sasquatch out of LEGOs. Ironically, deciding to develop a game app (with absolutely no prior experience) turned out to be the most authentic Keep Moving Forward project I could have chosen! 

In July of 2010, I met an app programmer at a conference in Georgia. He offered to help me turn one of my books into an app. In true ADD fashion, I sat on that offer for about two years. Finally, last fall, I called him with some ideas. I then flew down to North Carolina for two days, bringing 12 different app ideas along for the trip. Poor guy! He didn't know what hit him!

After wading through all the ideas, and a number of brainstorming sessions, Freddy the Frog Bomber was born.

Over the course of the months that followed, I worked on developing the storyline and the visuals for Frog Bombers while the programmer diligently worked on the programming. 

The game began to take shape: Levels. Special effects. Fancy bombs. Fun sounds. Finally, we got to a point where a few people could beta test the fruits of all our labors. The response was very positive, but the game is still far from where it needs to be to realize our vision.

And that's where you come in!

I need $15,000 in funding to finish developing the game and make it a truly awesome gaming experience. The funding will also allow me to create versions for iPad and Android, and to have a marketing budget.

In return, I have some awesome PERKS - posters, t-shirts, e-books, and more! Even just $1 helps, and I will send you a personal email to say THANK YOU!

Can't donate? Help us spread the word! Make some noise on Twitter and Facebook & share the link to our campaign. Feel free to tag us: #FrogBombers & @simpleadhdxpert.

Ben Glenn has been a full-time speaker since 1995, sharing with church groups, students, and teachers all over the world. His story of growing up with Learning Disabilities and ADHD, as well as his amazing live art demonstration that he performs as part of his presentation, combine into a powerful, as well as entertaining, program. He is the author of "Simply Special: Learning to Love Your ADHD" and "Understanding the Peaks and Pitfalls of ADHD in the Classroom." Apart from helping dispel the many myths and misunderstandings surrounding ADD, Ben also speaks about overcoming adversity, diversity and creativity. He, his wife, and two daughters live in a great little city called Indianapolis.

story:
NEW OPTIONS RELEASED!


Echo’s IronWire Phone cable now for ANDROID and the new MACBOOK!


Introducing the cable strong enough to tow a car,   available for Lightning, Micro USB and USB-C    devices!



Echo Production & Delivery Schedule

   

Help us to keep going and bring an end to poor cables! 

Apple certified braided cable




So, tell me more...

Why are we doing this?

Because, like most of you out there, we're fed up with our cables being destroyed. Beaten by our bags, being trodden on, our pet's teeth, and by life.

Let's face it, we just need something stronger.


Oh yeah, did we mention it was tangle proof? Because of its tough braided exterior, its incredibly difficult to get this into accidental knots.


World Powerlifting Champion wanted to put it's strength to the test...

We put our IronWire to the ultimate test to see if it could compete with the strength of the current Powerlifting World Champion, Dave Watts! Has the IronWire met its match? Let the battle commence....


We thought we'd try our luck in a tug-of-war....


We are proud to bring you Echo’s $10 IronWire - the strongest and most efficient cable on the market, with the best price and a fantastic warranty to match. The cable comes extra long, tangle-free and like all our products is MFi certified and fully compatible with all Apple devices that use a Lightning connector. We have even added some fancy LED lights that flash when your device is fully charged.

Echo’s IronWire is available exclusively on Indiegogo, and our campaign will only run for 60 days. Get yours now while they’re available at this exclusive price.

Echo's PowerConnect:

Our PowerConnect product has been one of our biggest sellers, so we've put it in a couple of the perks! This small device has integrated iPhone (licensed lightning) and micro-usb connectors, and has 4000mAh of power, that's enough to charge an iPhone 6 2.5 times from 0%. AND with two connectors, you can charge yours, and any Android friends' phones, and still have some juice left over!



About Echo

Our aim at Echo is to make tech work better, and compliment your lifestyle rather than provide eternal frustration. We’ve had previous success on Indiegogo, which included a world-firsts to the market - the first ever Apple licensed charge key that can also charge micro-USB devices.

The IronWire cable is our most ambitious campaign yet, but with your help we’re more than confident in bringing the best cable to market for the lowest price you will find.

*Terms and conditions apply. General wear and tear and technical problems covered, but any excessive force, cutting of the cable or attempt to remove parts will lead to a void warranty.
