story:
Introduction

RXN™ Microverter™  is an ultra compact power inverter that provides  output power of up to 1000 Watts. Measuring less than 5" a side, it is over 30x lighter and smaller than conventional inverters with similar power rating! (For those unfamiliar with inverters, an inverter is a device that can power all your household appliances from a battery. It converts the battery voltage into a form suitable for devices that run on utility AC supply)



Microverter™ has an inbuilt battery charger and  switches automatically to the "inverter-mode" in case of power faliure. Owing to its exceptionally compact size, Microverter can also be used as a high power car battery inverter. It will fit into any corner of your car and will power not only laptops and mobiles but anything that you may think of, say, a home theater or a refrigerator, or both!

Gone are the days where UPS (Uninterruptible  Power Supply) systems had to be hidden behind the doors owing to their bulky size and  unaesthetic appearance. RXN™ Microverter™ has a highly integrated mechanical design, with precise machining and good surface finish. It is not simply an extruded piece of aluminium or  hammered and folded sheet of steel.


Compact (and complicated!)

Microverter™  is over 30x smaller by volume than conventional inverters in the market. It is also nearly 25x  lighter.


Independently Smart!

Every second thing that we come across now is supposedly a "smart"  thing. But what makes them so smart is their mere ability to connect to a smart phone! Microverter™  does NOT connect to your smart phone and is still absolutely smart. It has some amazing features that you may like

  • OVER-DRIVE MODE: In this mode Microverter™  can connect to loads higher than its rated capacity. Instead of cutting out during over loads, it will adjust the output voltage to run all the connected loads at partial capacity.
  • WATER LEVEL INDICATOR: By real time solution of Nernst-equation, Microverter™  can indicate the approximate level of water (electrolyte/acid) in the battery. This will alleviate the need to check water level regularly.
  • ANTI SULFATION: With normal routine use, batteries  accumulate solid sulfate crystals on their electrode plates. Sulfate crystals are non conductors of electricity, thus their accumulation deteriorates battery performance and eventually renders them unusable. Microverter™ can periodically desulfate the electrodes, resulting in longer battery life.
  • PURE SINE WAVE: Microverter™ produces a Pure Sine Wave output. This ensures clean and noise-free power , which is essential for sensitive devices such as computers and music systems. (Most inverters produce a Square or Modified Sine Wave output which is noisy in nature and results in a humming sound in fans and music systems)
  • LED DISPLAY: A smart looking LED display as shown above.  The display may be rectangular or square as depicted in the pitch image.


Super -Duper Efficient

The compactness of Microverter™ is a direct consequence of its extremely high efficiency. The more efficient a system, less is the wastage of energy. Saving energy is one thing that everyone is speaking of. Although we must appreciate the novelty of such pursuits, the main reason why Microverter™ is made efficient is not only to save energy, but also to produce minimum heat during operation. This in turn results in a compact thermal management system. Microverter™ has a calculated efficiency of 93.5%, compared to 80 - 85% efficiency of conventional inverters in market. In fact, without such a high efficiency Microverter could not have been as small.

Capacity of Microverter

Microverter™ has an output capacity of 1000 Watts. It can power almost anything in you house.
  • Refrigerator 
  • Food Processor
  • Microwave Oven
  • Washing Machine
  • 10 Light Bulbs (CFL 20W) + 4 Fans + 2 Televisions + 2 Laptops
The driving capability of Microverter is not limited to the appliances mentioned above. It can support any combination of appliances within its power limit
.

Quick Specification

  • Please note that depending upon your country the utility voltage may either be 110V or 230V . Microverter™ will be manufactured for both voltage levels. You will need to specify the voltage while placing order.
  • Also note that this specification is only for immediate reference. A more detailed specification sheet will be made available later.

Purpose of Campaign?

This campaign is to raise money for prototyping a real physical Microverter™. RXN™ Electric Private Limited is a startup company registered in India and Microverter™ shall be the first product. Microverter™ is still in the prototyping stage. Wait! Don't leave right away.

Concept or Reality?

Microverter™  is not simply an idea or a concept. It is a sophisticated combination of electrical, mechanical and thermal model built and simulated successfully on computer. 
So what? What's the big deal with simulations?
In today's world of product designing, simulations are everything! The way in which  new products are designed has come a long way from partial hit and trial method to complete computer aided design. It is highly unlikely that after manufacturing  the characteristics of the real physical system will differ  from that of the simulation. A successfully simulated computer model is just a second away from the finish line!

Is the Work Real?

Yes it is! Now that you appreciate the value of computer simulations, ascertaining the existence of such work is but obvious. However, there is no simple way to disclose the simulation results while still retaining all the confidential data. Also it is not easy to explain the results to non-technical people.  So we have instead provided several  snap shots that would depict the intensity of work that has been done. Please keep in mind that the flashy-rainbow-coloured photos that you will see below  are a result of massive investment of time and not simply paper and paint combined with a wild imagination!


Microverter™  Thermal System

The figure below shows a simplified exploded view of Microverter's thermal system. Two phase thermal conductor with low pressure liquid coolant results in an extremely low profile, compact and efficient design.



Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) Analysis

CFD helps analyse and optimize the path of air flow and the temperature rise of the system under consideration. The figures below depict the fluid path and the temperature rise of the cooling system inside Microverter. These are only a few of over a hundred simulations performed!



PCB Layout Showing the Internal Layers

PCB layout is the second last step (assembly being the last) in the manufacturing process of electronics circuit.


3D View of Populated PCB


Top Layer of PCB Showing Thermal Vias

Unlike most PCBs where electrical performance is of primary concern, Microverter's PCB is optimized for both thermal and electrical performance. Trade off between the two is best decided by experience!



 Timeline

Microverter™, as you may see below, has been a long marathon race and not a 100 meter sprint!


What Next?

We are working nights out to get Microverter™  to the market as soon as possible. If priced correctly, Microverter™ clearly has the DNA of disruptive innovation. The following is an approximate figure of post campaign activities

  • September 2015  PCB manufacturing, component procurement, purchase of  testing instruments and lab setup. 

  • November 2015   Complete and optimize the electronic model for mass production.

  • December 2015   Complete and optimize the thermal system for mass production.

  • January 2016       Manufacture fully functional designs. Launch of INDIEGOGO campaign for marketing of Microverter™.

  • February 2016     Contact distributors and open  service centers.

  • March 2016          Mass production of Microverter™.

  • April 2016            Regular Shipping and distribution begins.  

I must remind that this is a prototyping campaign. The price are therefore roughly 3x lower than retail.

Tentative Price 

Conventional inverters are priced anything between 150$ to 300$. Microverter will be priced at par with the existing market to give a tough competition.
  • Microverter™ Lite       175$ to 200$ (Retail)
  • Microverter™              220$ to 250$ (Retail)
Microverter™ Lite will be a reduced functionality version of Microverter. It will not feature Over Drive Mode, Water Level Detection and Anti Sulfation. It will have a simplified LED display.

Fund Utilization

Apart from a  small portion of money (14%) which will be kept aside as  margin capital, rest of the fund will be used entirely for purchasing materials required for prototyping. Prices are quoted for up to three times redesign/modification and testing.



About Us

MRINAL MANI  has a Bachelors degree in Electrical and Electronics from Delhi College of Engineering. He has a vast  experience in power-electronics and control systems and has already completed two major projects on compact inverter design as a part of his course work. He is the oldest member in the team. 


NAG MANI  has a Bachelors degree in Electronics and Communication form Delhi College of Engineering. He has hands on experience in embedded system and digital electronics.


SHIVAM DAWER  has an integrated Masters degree in Mathematics and Computing form the Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi. He has been the manager and vice president of team events of AIESEC - Delhi.


Help Us!

We have worked to our best of capability and have put in the time and effort that a true startup deserves. One of the team members has even refused campus placement offer and has been working throughout to make Microverter come alive.

 Over here, declining a placement offer after having graduated  is nothing short of madness! Fortunately or unfortunately it appears that we are mad!

We need your help!

Unlike most PCBs where electrical performance is of primary concern, Microverter's PCB is optimized for both thermal and electrical performance. Trade off between the two is best decided by experience!





 Timeline
Microverter™, as you may see below, has been a long marathon race and not a 100 meter sprint!



What Next?

We are working nights out to get Microverter™  to the market as soon as possible. If priced correctly, Microverter™ clearly has the DNA of disruptive innovation. The following is an approximate figure of post campaign activities



September 2015  PCB manufacturing, component procurement, purchase of  testing instruments and lab setup. 

November 2015   Complete and optimize the electronic model for mass production.

December 2015   Complete and optimize the thermal system for mass production.

January 2016       Manufacture fully functional designs. Launch of INDIEGOGO campaign for marketing of Microverter™.

February 2016     Contact distributors and open  service centers.

March 2016          Mass production of Microverter™.

April 2016            Regular Shipping and distribution begins.  



I must remind that this is a prototyping campaign. The price are therefore roughly 3x lower than retail.

Tentative Price 
Conventional inverters are priced anything between 150$ to 300$. Microverter will be priced at par with the existing market to give a tough competition.



Microverter™ Lite       175$ to 200$ (Retail)

Microverter™              220$ to 250$ (Retail)
Microverter™ Lite will be a reduced functionality version of Microverter. It will not feature Over Drive Mode, Water Level Detection and Anti Sulfation. It will have a simplified LED display.





Fund Utilization
Apart from a  small portion of money (14%) which will be kept aside as  margin capital, rest of the fund will be used entirely for purchasing materials required for prototyping. Prices are quoted for up to three times redesign/modification and testing.







About Us
MRINAL MANI  has a Bachelors degree in Electrical and Electronics from Delhi College of Engineering. He has a vast  experience in power-electronics and control systems and has already completed two major projects on compact inverter design as a part of his course work. He is the oldest member in the team. 



NAG MANI  has a Bachelors degree in Electronics and Communication form Delhi College of Engineering. He has hands on experience in embedded system and digital electronics.



SHIVAM DAWER  has an integrated Masters degree in Mathematics and Computing form the Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi. He has been the manager and vice president of team events of AIESEC - Delhi.


Help Us!
We have worked to our best of capability and have put in the time and effort that a true startup deserves. One of the team members has even refused campus placement offer and has been working throughout to make Microverter come alive. Over here, declining a placement offer after having graduated  is nothing short of madness! Fortunately or unfortunately it appears that we are mad!

We need your help!

story:
Read room, water or outside temperatures in real time from anywhere using the iTemp iPhone and Android wireless thermometer.

What if you could keep an eye on the temperature of your pool, your garage, your little greenhouse or the baby room. Not just by going there, but from your iPhone or Android tablet. Always be up to date what's happening, whether when there is a blizzard, when you are in the office or when you are traveling.

iTemp makes this possible: It measures the current temperature and shows it in realtime in you phone, whether you are around or not. And no need to run cables around the house or keep a PC on, the battery-powered iTemp sensor sends it's data to a small gateway near your DSL or cable modem and uploads the data to a server, so the data is always and instantly available to track on your phone.

Features

  • Measures and displays temperature(s) in real time
  • Wireless and battery powered powered, so no around the house
  • Internet gateway that sends temperatures onto the Internet
  • User settable Celcius, Fahrenheit or Kelvin
  • Both iPhone and Android
  • Multiple people can read values on their phones
  • Outdoor, indoor and in the water (less than a foot deep)
  • Read temperature from anywhere: Next room, your office or from the other side of the world

Applications: Use it in your living-room, baby-room, garden, shed, garage, fridge, pool, pond...

        

        

 

The iOS and Android apps show all the temperatures in realtime

We have developed iPhone and Android apps that show the measured temperatures in real time on your smartphone. Either view one temperature or a bunch.

The final app that will be provided when the products are delivered will have more features, possibly including charting.

 

 

 

  

  

 

Your custom webpage charts temperature over time

Data measured by the sensors will also be provided on your own webpage that show the history of your measurements in an interactive chart. 

One temperature sensor or one in every room, one gateway handles them all

Requirements:

  • iPhone or iPad with IOS 3 or higher
  • Android phone or tablet with Android 2.1 or higher

Specs:

  • Technology: 900MHz ISM transceivers
  • Range: 150ft (50m); dependent on walls, floors, etc
  • Battery: Replaceable CR2032 standard coin cell; 1 year battery life
  • Sensor Size: 67x34x20mm
  • Gateway size: 90x64x30 mm 

 

Timeline

We have a tested design that has been run in pilot production. Next steps for is the extended testing, testing with a group of beta testers, finishing up the apps and putting the product in mass production.

Februari:

  • Extended sensor testing
  • Finalise design
  • Beta test
  • Finish App

March:

  • Start first volume production 
  • Decide on packaging/shipping options
  • Submit Apps to app stores

April:

  • Ramp up production volume (all production is planned in Europe)
  • Start first deliveries

May:

  • Delivery to all Indiegogo purchasers

 

Proto PCBs and Assembled Internet Gateway:

       

 

 

 

 

 

About

CloudSensor is an independent electronics development company that develops it's own products and for third-parties. We have more than a decade experience in designing and manufacturing consumer-type electronics and work for small startups as well as large corporations.

iTemp came to live, after two friends independently asked for a way to keep an eye on temperature from the web or their smartphone: One wanted to keep an eye on his greenhouse, the other on the water in his outdoor pool. After some research and testing, the first prototypes were created and soon we realised that that must be more people with similar needs.

Use of Funds

Electronics gateway and sensor node are designed, the app is coming along nicely and a pilot production run was done. Now we need your help to get the iTemp onto the market and in the hands of people. We will use the funds to produce in larger volumes, so the price goes down and hopefully have the iTemp on the shelves of many retail shops.

>> Help us by buying the iTemp and/or sharing this campaign with your friends, families and collegues!

 

FAQ

Can I use more than one temperature sensor?

Yes, you can use upto 30 sensors with one gateway. These will all show on your smartphone.

Does it work with iPhone, iPad, Android phone/tablet?

Yes, our apps work on both IOS 3 or higher and Android 2.1 or higher. They work both on tablets and phones.

Does it show Fahrenheit, Celcius, Kelvin?

The app allows you to set the desired quantity, so you can easily adapt to what you like.

How does my smartphone connect to the temperature sensor?

The temperature sensor talks wirelessly to the provided internet gateway. The gateway is connected with an Ethernet cable to your DSL or Cable modem. Your smartphone gets the measured temperatures from our server.

How far can the temperature sensor be removed from the gateway?

We use a so called low-power ISM transceiver, which allows the signal to travel for about 150 feet (50m) depending on environment (walls, floors etc). Since we use a low frequency and low data-rate compared to wifi, the signal goes very well through walls and floors.

What is the battery life of the temperature sensor and what type of battery is used?

We use a standard CR2032 cell, which you can buy at any supermarket. Battery life is about a year and the battery can easily be replaced with a new one.

Is the temperature sensor water-proof?

Yes, but it is not qualified IP67 or something like that. We advice to put the sensor no deeper than 1 foot (30 cm).

story:
Forget about having lots of remote controls at home, and forget about searching them on the side of the couch, now you can have a very unique Universal Remote, at the palm of your hand.

A great idea, that gets closer to be real.

InstaMote makes a huge difference in terms of durability and functionality, every single InfraRed controlled device is compatible, also, any iOS 5+, or Android 2.3+ device is fully compatible.

Also, this compatibility makes possible the use of any app that controls the Samsung Galaxy IR Blaster, or the designed app for iOS.

The app is being developed as fast as possible, but take a look to some examples:

Don't spend lots of money in senseless "Universal" Remotes, use an unique solution, that will change all your old remotes


We are closer to get this product done:

  • We have done many small projects like this before, and now, we reached a new stage.
  • The InstaMote has a built-in battery that allows to use in a comfortable way it's IR module.  This battery lasts approximately 6 months under heavy usage, and can be easily replaced.
  • Several experiments took place to improve space usage (meaning size of the product) and now we have the first functional prototype, manufactured with the help of a Korean and Chinese company, that builds similar modules
  • The packaging it's intended to save your InstaMote and give a nice aspect on the final product.

The InstaMote, compared to the remote control, has a bigger working range, and more compatibility than a standard universal remote.

Here is a comparative chart:

Specification/Device

InstaMote

Regular Universal Remote

Battery

Single battery, up to 6 months, and easy to replace

2 AA or AAA batteries, depends on the battery, to 4 to 8 months

Compatibility

All IR controlled devices (InfraRed), A/C, fans, DVD, TV, Bluray, PS3, etcetera

Sometimes just TV and DVD’s

Max distance

Up to 15 meters, effective range

Sometimes reach the 5-9 meters, and any obstacle prevents the signal to reach the TV or DVD

Price

Just 8 USD, at early offer, and 12 in standard price

Up to 14 USD, sometimes cheaper, but with low quality and compatibility

Featured on:

We will use the funds exclusively to improve this product

Any help is well received.

Each unit is:

$0.95               IR LED

$1.45               All small electronics

$0.25              Welding

$0.92             Casing (SPEC Plastic)

$1.31              3.5 mm jack, and the rest of the conectors

$1.50              Small battery, high performance

Please add $5 US dollars, for international shipping (outside Switzerland), or we will not be able to send your InstaMote.

NOTICE: YOU ALREADY BOUGHT AN INSTAMOTE FROM PREVIOUS CAMPAIGN??

You will get it, don't worry, contact me at loxmonkox@gmail.com, to redeem, Indiegogo closed my previous campaign and can't contact you, still, we need help to the proyect.

story:
The Pitch

I considered making my own video pitch but I don't know if anyone or anything could more accurately explain the importance of what I'm trying to do more than that video.  As a father and an explorer I want to show the world what I see through my own eyes, on the fly, with no buttons, no pocket searching, no fumbling trough my day pack.  


The Bio

My name is Aaron Barrett.  I am a husband, father, and Airman in the US Air Force. I was raised in the Navy and all along the east coast and I am proud to call North Carolina my home.  I am 9 credit hours from my Baccalaureate of Science in Computer Animation and I hold an associates degree in Aerospace Maintenance Technology.  I am also a Remotely Piloted Aircraft Maintenance Craftsman Stationed in Grand Forks North Dakota.


The Project

I have been very interested in the idea of Google Glass since it’s inception and have recently been selected to participate in the Google Glass Explorer (beta) program.  This program represents a major change in how we see the world both literally and figuratively, and increases our ability to chronicle the story of our lives in a familiar and meaningful way.  I believe that Google Glass can directly lead to change for the better in our world today by showing what humanity sees compared to what I usually see as a person.

By helping me reach my goal and purchase the Google Glass you will directly contribute to the betterment of this program in form and function, to legislation governing it, and to the ability of humanity to more readily record our own story as it unfolds.

The funding will be used as follows:

  Google Glass Explorer Edition - $1500.00

  Prescription Inserts - $225.00

  Stereo Ear Buds - $85.00

  Tax and Handling - $190.00

  Total - $2000.00

I will be blogging my journey and findings, updating and uploading on Facebook, Google+, Reddit, Twitter and any other place that I can get the word out.

My blog/vlog will consist of free access to everyone who is interested as well as a members only section, devoted to you, the contributors, where you can see the unfiltered, unedited stream of data directly from the Google Glass before editing, as well as all the videos and images I will capture during my time learning the interface. 


­

The Backup

I am a techie first and foremost.  I use the best programs for animation, the newest technology for phones and computers, and I was selected from among my peers to maintain the most technologically advanced Remotely Piloted Reconnaissance Aircraft in existence. I don’t do this to brag or to feed my ego; I do it because I believe that I can have a meaningful impact on advancing technology and the path that these technologies take.  I am consistently invited into alpha and beta tests by name because of my reputation for attention to detail and my eagerness to find and fix issues that arise.

If I don’t reach my goal, whatever I do receive will go directly toward the purchase of Google Glass. I may not be abIe to get the prescription inserts or the ear buds, and I may have to take out a loan or put some of it on our credit card but I am dedicated to this cause, I will make this happen because I believe that this is that important.

There are more ways to help than just financially. Help me get the word out about this project.  Tell your friends, your family.  Tell them how important this is. Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word.  Make it known that this is a big deal and it is something that will change our world. 

Any Money raised above and beyond $2,000 will go toward other tech investments or will be used to help fund other people's goals.

story:
Our Story

The H-1 is the most affordable entry-level open source 3D printer available. It is also the FIRST machine to use injection molded parts.  Our H-1 machine is based on a famous open source RepRap machine named Huxley.  We support and appreciate the open source design shared by RepRap Jean-Marc and Adrian Bowyer. Our campaign motto is "Standing on the shoulder of giants".


Our machine is called the H-1 because it isn't a replica. The H-1 plastic parts are all redesigned for plastic injection molding. We found it difficult to source some metric parts in the United States so we designed the H-1 in inch units. To further reduce cost, we injection molded plastic roller bearings instead of buying metal bearings. 


We are using parallel port based electronics compatible with more conventional CNC software like Mach3 or EMC2. So if you want to use the reprap created software, get the $100 parts kit and use any of the great reprap created electronics platforms, but if you're a CNCer like us then get the full kit and print using your favorite CNC software.


With our manufacturing tools and know-how, we are able to provide you with the lowest entry cost available for a new 3D printer. Because we have the ability to make our own injection mold tooling, and injection on our own equipment, we are able cut the cost.


SeeMeCNC is the name brand created by Steve Wygant. SeeMeCNC products are manufactured by PartDaddy.com. While some motors and electronics come from our friends overseas, the H-1 parts and kits are made by us right here in the U.S.A.


The H-1 will bring the "personal manufacturing" experience to many more people than ever before.



What We Need & What You Get


Your contribution to our campaign gets you a perk! PartDaddy (aka Steve) has been in business since 1996. This Indiegogo campaign is going give us the boost needed to finish up in time for the holidays.


We're completing the H-1 in time to ship by mid December, 2011. Regardless of our goal, we'll have the parts perks ready for the holiday season. The low campaign goal is basically just the cost of materials for a few of the remaining injection molds we're working on right now.


On Fridays, during this campaign only, we welcome campaign contributors to the PartDaddy.com shop for a short tour. A contributor must email us before coming and have made a contribution.



Shipping Your Perk


All parts perks will ship by mid December even if you're contributing to a perk with electronics. Perks that include motors or electronics may ship later because they are being imported and might not arrive before the end of the year. Regardless, everyone will be shipped their parts perk.


  • Perks ship via United States Postal Service.
  • Shipping included for contributors within the 48 states.
  • Contributors outside the 48 states will have an extra shipping cost added. We will send a PayPal notification for this additional amount. This additional shipping will be only actual cost to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Visit seemecnc on facebook!

Like our seemecnc facebook page! There might just be something in it for you regardless. ;^)

Tell a friend today!

contributing to a perk with electronics. Perks that include motors or 
electronics may ship later because they are being imported and might not arrive before the end of the year. Regardless, everyone will be shipped their parts perk.


Perks ship via United States Postal Service. 
Shipping included for contributors within the 48 states. 
Contributors outside the 48 states will have an extra shipping cost added. We will send a PayPal notification for this additional amount. This additional shipping will be only actual cost to ship.



Other Ways You Can Help
Visit seemecnc on facebook! 
Like our seemecnc facebook page! There might just be something in it for you regardless. ;^)
Tell a friend today!

story:
Short Summary

Small Businesses in the US are utilizing Microsoft Lync (now called Skype for Business). When these small businesses want to talk to other businesses, vendors, customers or partners, the business has to purchase a service from just 3 providers and pay very high per minute rates to connect with others! 

Tens of thousands of Microsoft partners are seeking the following service:

An unlimited usage at a low fixed cost solution to allow PSTN calls to join Office 365 conferences.

We are seeking capital to build this bridge – the first flat-rate, unlimited-use, PSTN to VoIP conference bridge, application software and the e-commerce site for the self-management of our service. 

To raise the capital we need we are offering five perks.  The first and last perks are immediately available.  Even if we do meet our fund raising goal, the first perk of a teleconference room and the last perk of a residual income business will work forever.   The last perk is unique in the crowdsourcing field... We can put you into a residual income-producing business offering a conferencing service with functionality similar to GoToMeeting® or WebEx®!  You will learn to enjoy making money 24 hours a day.  Every day you receive an email with the daily sales and the previous day's credit card billings.


Let me tell you about the co-founders:

Greg Plum and Herb Levitin have many years of experience providing both teleconference and web conference services.  Greg's expertise is in marketing to the wholesale market.  Herb's expertise is building and running a teleconference business that offers innovative self-help and branded sites.  Together we realized that there is a very large and fast growing market associated with the Microsoft Office 365 collaboration features. 


This is the video from our WebShareSoftware site.  This software is part of the residual income opportunity along with a branded e-commerce site and use of our carrier class toll-free teleconference bridges.

The Impact

The power of Microsoft's Office 365 to easily collaborate will be made much more useful when we offer our unlimited usage at a low, fixed-cost PSTN to VoIP service.  Companies and individuals will use more of the collaboration tools when each user has a fixed cost per month that can be easily budgeted.

Greg Plum has helped grow teleconference companies by marketing wholesale services.  Greg found this particular market by his years of experience and foresight of where the teleconference market is heading.  Greg is currently providing these services to the Microsoft partner market as a service of his company, PlumUC.

Herb Levitin built GoConference with its advanced, self-help, website from scratch.  His first teleconference bridge was purchased on EBay, it belonged to Arthur Anderson in Houston.  That particular branch of Arthur Anderson was telling the world that Enron's books were legitimate.  Arthur Anderson no longer exists, nor does Enron along with their employee retirement funds, but GoConference is still going strong.  Sometimes dinosaur-sized companies need to fail to make room for the nimble mammals. 

We do not have to build the infrastructure to run this business, as it already exists in our facility located in the NevadaNAP.  We do not have to start from scratch on the marketing, as that has been going on for some time now.  The Microsoft partner community is eagerly awaiting a flat-rate conferencing service to augment their Office 365 offering.

Risks & Challenges

A $90,000 project to generate a worldwide base of residual income sounds like a lot to most people, but that is dust upon the accounting dust to this industry.  Microsoft is currently partnering with only three global conference service providers, other major players like AT&T (Only a $250B per year company) is not one of them.  We would like to get funded so we can get our hardware and software built to offer the millions of Office 365 customers a low-cost alternative for telephone access into their Lync meetings. 

We will make the software and hardware work, we have already proven we can do that.  We will be the first to market this service to the Microsoft partner marketplace to grab market share. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We do not have a large group of followers on social websites, we need your help to get the word out.  We want to be one of the mammals that grow and prosper by eating the eggs of the dinosaurs.

story:
Welcome to broadband in-flight Internet world!

  • SynergyView LTD is a startup company, founded by Semion Zelikman and George Wainblat. 
  • Our aim is to develop and operate Internet and Entertainment services on-board commercial airlines.
  • We would like to share with you our exciting vision for broadband in-flight Internet based on our patent pending technology.
  • Using seed investment from Office of the Chief Scientist in the Israeli Ministry of Economy we developed partial\beta prototype system.
  • Our goal is with your kind help\contribution\assistance\donation to complete the development of prototype Internet on-board satellite communication system for commercial aircrafts.

Crowdraising

  • We are asking for $45K funding according to the following breakdown:

  • We would like to complete the development of prototype Internet on-board satellite communication system for commercial aircrafts:
    1. Design and manufacture RF components for the airborne unit
    2. Testing full system (Ground Station, Satellite link, Airborne unit

    Perks

    • Besides standard perks like Thanks you,  Listing as a backer, Stay updated ,Sticker and T-shirt, we offer our supporters an exclusive full access to SynergyView in-flight Internet connectivity and Entertainment services (when these will become available on commercial aircrafts), for the following periods of time from activation (from first use of the service):

    1. 30$ - 1 month
    2. 40$ -  3 months
    3. 50$ -  6 months
    4. 70$ - 1 year
    5. 90$ - 3 years
    6. 100$ - 5 years

    • We find that short periods are more suited to leisure travelers, while long periods are more appropriate to business frequent flyers that are constantly on the go and can expense it.

story:
ZODIAC TECHNOLOGY.
PLEASE WATCH OUR VIDEO LINK UNTIL THE END.

Zodiac Technology is an entrepreneur company specialized in introducing new devices that will add ease and quality to every day needs. 

With the Zodiac Mini PC and TV device, our aim is to share these quality applications with our users so that everybody can enjoy the special features and savings that we offer.  

We assure you that the Zodiac Mini PC and TV is of a high quality, cost effective device that will give you hours of entertainment and fun.

Some of the latest and greatest features we offer with this device include:


•Connecting your Smartphone to your wide TV screen
•Connecting to all streaming and paid channels from all around the world for free (includes: American, UK, Italian, Arabic streams and all Nilesat channels)
•The latest XBMC program that allows you to watch HD and 3D movies for free anytime.
You may add extra gadgets to your Zodiac Technology Mini PC and TV for an extra fee.
Extra gadgets include:
•A wireless air mouse and keyboard that allows ease of use and gives you the opportunity to enjoy playing your favorite games.
•A mini projector that can be connected with an HDMI cable to your Smartphone, which will allow the user to enjoy watching movies, reading projects, while allowing you to view your gallery and much more on your wall. 

Zodiac Technology appreciates your continued support and we wish you share this link with the world.

story:
Vaper's world wide rejoice. We finally have done it! No more lugging around or dropping your Mod! Just attach a tank and VAPE AWAY!

The VapeCase is our own little brainchild here at Lotus Vaping Technologies.  Lotus is one of the nations premier distributors in vapor products and E-liquids.  We take pride in our top notch customer service. This attention to detail has propelled us in the last 90 days to supplying products for nearly 7500 retail outlets nationwide.  But VapeCase is something totally different.  Having smoked cigarettes for nearly 20 years I (Mike Larsen, Director of Sales) rejoiced when I started vaping and threw the cigarettes away for good in the spring of 2012.  But like with all new hobbies, I was soon overloaded with hardware.  I quickly grew tired of lugging around my favorite mod and consistently forgetting it or dropping it.  Then one day it dawned on me....I rarely forget my cell phone....or drop it.  If only I could vape off my cell phone. Think about it, what is always in your hand, or pocket, or sitting on your desk? And we all know that in this day of modern technology our cell phones are basically an extension of ourselves.  So rather than train my primitive brain to remember my vaporizer, why not just attach my vaporizer to the one thing I will never forget or toss across a parking lot!!!!   And that my friends was the best idea my infantile mind had ever managed to spit out.  So here I am.  Why I am here is a different story. See, I kept my little secret as long as I possibly could, at least until the patent was filed (lol).  Now I am ready to share it with the world.  I brought it to my partners and business associates and told them how I wanted to offer it to the vapers around the country before we offered it to the distributors and retail stores. Vaping is an ever evolving industry and I have been shown many cool and helpful gadgets from people....not businesses.  So I want to show the people my idea...before the businesses.  Funds raised through this campaign will allow us to fund the 5,000 I-Phone 5 cases we already have in production which we anticipate having by the end of November and into the hands of our vaping friends that help fund this project in an amount of $100 or more.   By funding this project, we can more quickly move the other models (I-Phone 5C, Galaxy S4, etc.) into production (manufacturing is expensive - lol).  Our initial order of 5000 iPhone 5 cases will be available for shipping (barring any major hiccups) at the end of November. So you can rest assured that you should have them in time to give the world's greatest stocking.- stuffer this Christmas.  Other models will be manufactured using the funds raised in this campaign and should be available in early January, 2014.  So, that's our story....thanks for listening and happy vaping! (and if you still smoke - STOP IT !!! you stink :) )  

 Features include:

  • 2000mah 3.7v Li-ion battery pack
  • 5 Stage Variable Voltage 
  • LED Array Battery Level Indication
  • Ignition Indicator LED Light
  • Mini USB Charging Port.
The VapeCase is already being extremely well recieved on Facebook and Our website. 

What We Need

As far as what we need funding for:

  • Mold Development for new phone models.  Galaxy Note 2, Galaxy Note 3, Galaxy S4, iPhone 5c.  We are raising funds to provide for the ability to provide these highly demanded phone models, sooner rather than later.
  • VapeCase is a revolutionary concept in vaping.  It simplifies things for those who vape!  People are excited! Are you excited yet?

The Impact

Part of what you can feel good about as a supporter of VapeCase is that we are helping people around the country to improve their lives.  And enjoy themselves!   When VapeCase is being used by those in your area you can know you were a part of that.

What We Need

Mold Development for new phone models.  Galaxy Note 2, Galaxy Note 3, Galaxy S4, iPhone 5c.  We are raising funds to provide for the ability to provide these highly demanded phone models, sooner rather than later.
VapeCase is a revolutionary concept in vaping.  It simplifies things for those who vape!  People are excited! Are you excited yet?



The Impact
Part of what you can feel good about as a supporter of VapeCase is that we are helping people around the country to improve their lives.  And enjoy themselves!   When VapeCase is being used by those in your area you can know you were a part of that.

story:
www.centexhosting.com

We asked 100 people if they were happy with their current hosting provider in four different categories: Customer Support, Pricing, Hosting & Server Options, and Security & Privacy

We found there were a total of ZERO people that felt satisfied or better in all four categories. Only 3% of the participants were satisfied or better with at least three of the categories.

What is going on here?

Have we just accepted these sub-standard options that hosting companies are offering us?

In short, YES.

Hosting plans do not cater to the client at the level they are able to and this is a problem that we unfortunately have come to accept among hosting providers.

The reason we all have such low expectations for our hosting providers is because they are all the same. The web hosting industry quickly became a rinse-and-repeat business. The remote access that servers provide allow hosting companies to simply copy the same old format that everyone has been offering for year. This results in standardized options and prices, poor customer service and basic privacy and security.

We at CenTex decided to put an end to this.

How Centex Began

We launched CenTex Hosting less than a year ago in Round Rock, Texas. We created CenTex Hosting with the idea that the customer will always come first, no matter where our business takes us. We launched CenTex as an experiment to see if placing the customer ahead of everything would actually work.

We knew that we could have taken the “easy” route and simply follow the same blueprint that virtually all other hosting companies do:

·  Set up the basic servers

·  Offer basic package

·  Price them as industry average rates

We would have been successful doing that, just like so many other have but that is not what we set out to do. We set out to make an improvement in people’s hosting plans; and we weren’t going to be able to do that if we aimed for the industry standard like everyone else.

CenTex is the type of company that would much rather fail at trying something different than succeed at being middle-of-the-road average. Doing that is the only way that we can offer you better options with your hosting providers.

Enter Self-Hosting

Self Hosting plans have been offered from some hosting companies but they weren’t investing into them as much as they needed to. It is a great option that was being ignored because it didn’t fit the “standard” model that so many companies are using.

We wanted to end that. We wanted to expand on this idea and take it beyond the attempts we have seen before.

Our Result?

It took off like a rocket and was a tremendous success. It was clear within the first month that we have hit on a gold mine. We saw demand for our servers shoot up through the roof.

Which Brings us to Now

The huge spike in demand was great for our company, but now we are unable to keep up with it anymore. That’s why we are here, looking for investors that will allow us to expand and offer are services to meet the high demand.

We don’t have the space to keep up with the demand. As much as we would love to give our self-hosting package to everyone, we simply do not have the server capacity to do that.



This is why we are asking for your help!

With a simple donation, we will be able to begin the creation of our second hosting location. This will allow us to double our customer base, quickly grow to accommodate our new improvements, and continue on the path of becoming the leading hosting company in the area and allow us to extend our reach to even more people that are in need of a better hosting solution.

What is the money breakdown?

Here is what the funds will go toward:

·  $7,200 will go towards setting up a new data center in Austin

·  $500 will be used to pay the ASN fee

·  $3,000 will be spent on IP ranges

·  $6,000 x 2 will be used to finance two New Dell Servers

Notice there is nothing in the budget for advertising? That’s because we don’t need it. The demand for our servers is already higher than we can handle. We want to accommodate everyone as quickly as possible, but we want to allow our donors the first chance at it.

That’s why we have put together four packages for our donors that will allow you to claim first priority when our servers are up and running.


Proven Model

There is no risk involved here. We are simply going to replicate the already-successful model that has allowed us to take CenTex to the level it is at today. It’s simply a matter of scaling up something that we already know is in demand and proven to work.

Further Expansion

Although this campaign will be used to help start the 2nd branch of CenTex Hosting in Austin, TX, which we will then convert into our main data center, we won’t stop there. We want to continue expanding for as long as the demand is there. Our projections show that we should expect to see an increase in demand after we launch our 10th server and beyond.

This means more job creation, we will be able to keep up with the growing demand, and most importantly, we will always be focused on improving our services for our existing customers. This will allow us to continue to offer you an improved experience with us and allow us to continue our expansion as we grow.

What’s Next?

We will continue to grow our company. Once we have our Austin location up and running, we will look to add 10 more servers over the next year.

Long term Crowed Funding Goal is 75k

·  10 Dell Servers (10 @ $6,000)

·  Set up with ICANN to become a Domain Registrar

·  Hiring 1 Network Administrator

·  Hiring 4 Additional Support Staff Members

Within the next year, our goals are to:

·  Goal is to create 5 New IT Jobs in Austin, Round Rock this year.

·  Goal to reach 3500 customer mark this year

·  Become Austin, Round Rock leading web hosting company

Help us get off the ground and begin are journey to the top today!

As you can see, we have extremely high goals for CenTex and we will never stop working on getting there and beyond. Our vision is to become the leading hosting provider by outperforming out competitors in every area.

The demand is there, we have the proven business model to grow our company. Now we just need your help to make this a reality.

Proven Model
There is no risk involved here. We are simply going to
replicate the already-successful model that has allowed us to take CenTex to
the level it is at today. It’s simply a matter of scaling up something that we
already know is in demand and proven to work.
Further Expansion
Although this campaign will be used to help start the 2nd
branch of CenTex Hosting in Austin, TX, which we will then convert into our
main data center, we won’t stop there. We want to continue expanding for as
long as the demand is there. Our projections show that we should expect to see
an increase in demand after we launch our 10th server and beyond.
This means more job creation, we will be able to keep up
with the growing demand, and most importantly, we will always be focused on
improving our services for our existing customers. This will allow us to
continue to offer you an improved experience with us and allow us to continue
our expansion as we grow.
What’s Next?
We will continue to grow our company. Once we have our
Austin location up and running, we will look to add 10 more servers over the
next year.
Long term Crowed Funding Goal is 75k
· 
10 Dell Servers (10 @ $6,000)
· 
Set up with ICANN to become a Domain Registrar
· 
Hiring 1 Network Administrator
· 
Hiring 4 Additional Support Staff Members
Within the next year, our goals are to:
· 
Goal is to create 5 New IT Jobs in Austin, Round
Rock this year.
· 
Goal to reach 3500 customer mark this year
· 
Become Austin, Round Rock leading web hosting
company
Help us get off the
ground and begin are journey to the top today!
As you can see, we have extremely high goals for CenTex and
we will never stop working on getting there and beyond. Our vision is to become
the leading hosting provider by outperforming out competitors in every area.
The demand is there, we have the proven business model to
grow our company. Now we just need your help to make this a reality.

story:
Truly Multi and Beautiful

iTOM designed for simultaneous charging of several mobile devices. It's compatible with most of modern smartphones and tablets. Being elegant (the body made of solid acryl) and equipped with a soft nightglow it can easily fit in any interior.

Comfortable and Functional

You don't have to use any other cables or find an extra sockets. Now you can charge all you gadgets in one place, here. All at once. You just choose the connectors you need for your devices. Nothing more. 

Advantages

  • One single base instead of a pile of wires and adapters
  • Charging of up to 5 mobile devices simultaneously
  • Stable and permanent speed of gadgets charging
  • Compatibility with the most of smartphones and mobile gadgets
  • Luxurious premium-class style 
  • Solid and compact body made of acryl without screws
  • Reliable and durable
  • Soft discreet nightglow (except black)
  • One-year’s warranty 
  • Now fully customizable

Specifications

  • From 2 to 5 ports (connectors) 
  • Operates on AC: 100 V to 230 V in different countries
  • From 1A to 2A on each port, depending from workload of station
  • From 3A to 5A output adaptor
  • Weight: from 200 to 300 grams
  • Dimensions: 100х100х24(30) mm

Now Fully Customizable

iTOM is cross-functional: it can charge both iPhone and Android smartphones together with any devices thanks to the embedded USB-port. And now you can have your personal iTom custom made - from the number and types of connectors to the colour of the power adapter. 

A standard delivery set per 1 piece

  • An iTOM module;
  • A power adapter of a relevant power (300-5000 mA);
  • A box.

Your Support

As all of us know: starting up new business and making first steps require huge investments.

Big part of costs was covered by our own resources. 
We successfully made iTOM V. 1, and for the realization of iTOM Custom (V. 2) we need:

  • Optimization of purchasing parts and materials for production
  • Software development - 3D Configurator iTOM
  • Most modern equipment for perfect quality
  • Expansion of the product line (new designs and accessorizes)
  • Start Worldwide

We are working tight for making our project better and more useful for everyone.

We need your recognition and support to launch the Custom iTom into the world market, to setup and cheap mass production - and finally free you of unsightly cables and adapters! 

Thanks for your support!

FAQ

1. Does iTOM need charging itself?
No, iTOM is a stationary charging station, which is connected to the mains power supply.

2. What is the difference between iTOM V. 1 and iTOM Custom (V. 2)?
iTOM V. 1 has a limited number of configurations, only a few models, and only sold on the local market. iTOM Custom (V. 2) implies the possibilityof choice before buying one of several tens of thousands of possible configurations.

3. Can I use iTOM to charge my device in a case?
You can choose a special level-up connecter to leave your device in its case while charging.

4. When am I going to receive iTOM?
We will start to deliver iTOM Custom to our backers in May 2016.

5. Where can I follow the development of your project?
You can use this page, Facebook, Twitter and the website itom.info.

6. How much will the delivery cost?
The delivery cost will depend on the country you live in. The final price will be calculated automatically.

7. Can it happen so that the charging does harm to my device?
The charging station iTOM operates at a standard power, like any other charging.

8. Will iTOM survive falling down or strokes?
All the electronics is inside a massive and solid body frame;  iTOM will continue to work even after falling down.

9. Will my device be charged faster by iTOM than by just being plugged?
Yes, if you have not put each port to use and if your smartphone supports high-speed charging, iTOM will charge it faster. In case you use all the ports, for example, 3 out of 3 or 5 out of 5, iTOM will charge devices at a standard rate and power 1A for each port. 

10. Can I replace the connectors after buying the charging station?
No, iTOM don't have any replacement parts, that can provide instability. You can choose any of our possible connectors, and get a universal charging station for all your gadgets.

11. How do I choose the configuration of my iTOM, when iTOM Custom company on indiegogo completed?
You can build your own iTOM, your own mod of the charging station, using our new web Configurator.

story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Nicholas Merrill and I am starting a new non-profit organization called The Calyx Institute.  I have a bit of a track record of fighting for the right to privacy on the Internet, and I have a plan to radically transform the way the Telecommunications industry works.

The Calyx Institute is named after my former Internet Service Provider (Calyx Internet Access) which I started in NYC in 1994, and which became the plaintiff in the original challenge against the constitutionality of National Security Letters in the USA Patriot Act beginning in 2004, known as Doe v. Ashcroft, Doe v. Mukasey, Doe v. Gonzales and finally Doe v. Holder.

It all started when I received a National Security Letter from the FBI demanding a long list of information about one of my ISPs clients. With the ACLU’s help, I fought the FBI and DOJ in federal court for six years, under gag order. I was forbidden, under threat of imprisonment, from telling anyone that I had received the letter or that I was the plaintiff in the case.    It was only in 2010 that I was finally able to identify myself.  In 2007, despite the gag order I wrote an op-ed in the Washington Post called "My National Security Letter Gag Order".  Later, after I was un-gagged, I wrote a follow-up op-ed also in the Washington Post talking about my experience.

Soon after, I began to do media appearances and interviews. My first television appearance talking about the case was on Democracy Now.

During the years I was under the gag order, I realized there was a need for an organization to reform the telecommunications industry’s approach to user privacy and freedom of expression. This project aims to turn that realization into reality.

During those years I developed a strong relationship with organizations like the ACLU and EFF, and I realized that they want to do a lot more to protect our rights online. But without an ally in the telecom world, their hands are tied. Calyx will be the ally public interest organizations need in the telecom world to help them fight for users’ constitutional rights.

This project’s goal is to raise funds for my nonprofit organization, Calyx Institute, which will launch a privacy-focused Internet Service Provider and mobile phone service using end-to-end encryption technology.  The software is already under development by another nonprofit foundation called LEAP who has given Calyx the green light to be the first commercial provider. The money we raise will go towards setting up a datacenter and implementing the first mass market deployment of this new Internet communications platform, and in a second stage, a mobile phone platform.

Through other partnerships, we are poised to offer Internet service in 70 markets in the US using wireless spectrum which we will bundle with end-to-end encrypted Virtual Private Network (VPN) technology in order to keep the customer's data as private as possible. The next products on the roadmap include hosted email and cloud storage/sync systems that utilize public key cryptography so that only the user possesses the key required to decrypt their email or files. This means that the provider (Calyx) will not be able to read your email or files even if it wanted to.  And if Calyx can’t read it, it can’t be targeted by unconstitutional surveillance tactics.

The goal the organization has set for itself is to use every legal and technical means available to protect the privacy of customer data. As I said in the recent article about my project on CNET, "It's a really urgent problem that is crying out for a solution.” Please help us by becoming a part of that solution.

What We Need & What You Get

The Calyx Institute needs to raise at least $1-million for a bare-bones launch; $2-million would get things up and running quicker.

The funds will go towards building a small datacenter here in NYC where Calyx is headquartered, and to setting up the associated infrastructure of Internet connections, peering, back-end software infrastructure and some basic salaries for a skeleton staff.

If we don't reach our funding goal, we will use what we do raise to do as much as we can with whatever we can raise.  I have a lot of experience running a business on a shoe-string budget, as I started my original ISP with only $10,000 of initial funds.

The Impact

This project is valuable because it creates a much needed alternative to existing commercial telcos; the ones we all know and most people are unsatisfied with.

In addition, it will develop open-source technology and policies that any ISP or mobile provider can use, which will create a public benefit.

I think this is the sort of transformative and disruptive project that could reverberate nationally and beyond.

This is your opportunity to radically change the landscape of telecommunications in America today, and hopefully in the world tomorrow.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not in a position to contribute financially, I understand.  Things are tough out there these days.  

What you can do if you want to support this effort is to get the word out and make some noise about this fundraising campaign!

Please use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word, use Twitter, use Facebook and other social media, or just tell people who you know that would be interested.

You can follow Calyx on twitter @calyxinstitute and you can like our facebook page

Together we can make a difference!

story:
PhoneGlass is a smartphone case that surely protects the privacy of the users by blocking the screen of the smartphone from prying eyes of people around. Since PhoneGlass is made in case shape, it is dust resistant and can also withstand shock falls as well as protecting your screen privacy safe. With PhoneGlass, keep your screen shield always on.

 
 
 
 
 
 

1.Easy to install and remove 

PhoneGlass can be installed on both sides of the smartphone. When installed on the front, your privacy is guaranteed, and when installed on the back, you can easily share your screen with others as well as protecting the device. Unlike regular screen protectors for the privacy that are not easy to peel off once it’s stuck, PhoneGlass can be simply attached and detached at any time you want to.

 

2. Powerful privacy protection

PhoneGlass designing with a special filter prevents your next person from seeing your smartphone screen.

 

3. Shock-resistant Structure – Air Cushion and Tempered Glass

Transparent air-cushion protectors are mounted around the corners of PhoneGlass, so your smartphone with PhoneGlass is able to survive from drop-damages. PhoneGlass with strong elasticity and flexibility functions of the air-cushion protector entertains great adsorption to your smartphone that protects phone free from external shocks without harm. Besides, it is produced with a 9H strength tempered glass in order to be resistant to scratches. 

 

Additional Features

 

HIGH LIGHT PENETRATION

– SCREEN CLARITY+SUPERIOR TOUCH SCREEN ACCURACY

Due to high light penetration, you can get clear and precise display screen and highly delicate touch. 

 

ANTI-BLUE LIGHT

PhoneGlass protects your eyesight by blocking the blue light. 

 

Special Edition

 

 

 

 

Through this IGG campaign, we would love to provide convenience to the majority of smartphone users around the world. The funds for PhoneGlass from backers will be used to mass-produce and develop the next big thing. PhoneGlass is the start-point for our dream. Afterward another innovation that has a solution for presbyopia will be coming up. We very much appreciate you joining and supporting our campaign. We consistently keep on growing something exciting for the smartphone users and future. 

 

 

 

pixelRo is a startup venture company that was launched as an independent company under Samsung Electronics' internal venture incubation program, called (C-Lab) Creative Lab. We are currently developing functional films and applications for smartphones based on our experience and technical skills.

 

 

- Touch accuracy on your mobile may be less accurate same time working with other screen protectors.

- If you apply too much force to detach, it may break.

- If the glass breaks due to the cause of the backer’s carelessness, it cannot be replaced or returned.

- If you bend the product with too much force, the product may be damaged.

- PhoneGlass products are thoroughly inspected before shipping, but sometimes the product may be damaged during delivery. In this case, it is necessary to contact the customer support before removing the inner-film.

- The design of the privacy case to be released due to the upgrade of the product or the change of the equipment environment is subject to change without prior notice.

- Be careful because the glass material can break and get hurt.

 

Exchange Policy for Damaged Product


Within 30 days of your receipt of the product, you may exchange product backed at our Indiegogo campaign due to damaged or defective goods unless the damage due to user carelessness.
Backer Satisfaction Guaranteed by pixelRo

 

 

Customs

In terms of customs clearance, we are not able to address every claim individually due to different customs duty by country.

While we do everything on our side to limit customs charges, ultimately backers are responsible for clearing customs.

story:
Your “dead battery anxiety” days will very soon be behind you. Lesflux has been designed to serve YOU, giving you double of battery life that you can charge on demand. Never worry about running out of power ever again!

The Lesflux charging case has its own built-in power source that charges your smartphone whilst on the GO. Our leading-edge technology means that you no longer need to carry wires or power banks with you.

Lesflux gives you the ability to share power easily with friends, colleagues and family anytime, anywhere, and on the move.  

                                  

Giving you the ultimate convenience, you can charge the case via cable or wireless charger pads such as the Samsung Dock and other wireless charging spots. You simply put your phone case on the wireless charging pad and it charges the phone and case at the same time.

 

     

Lesflux wireless charging case. With its Qi compatibility an wireless charger on the GO technology, you can use the case without interrupting the aesthetic design of your smartphone.

 

    

 The Lesflux charging case may be one of the best products around but we still want to make sure it delivers on the security front. Our built-in RFID card protector will prevent thieves from stealing details from your bank cards, keeping you safe and secure at all times.

 

 For the past 2 years, we have been designing and customising the technology down to fit in a charging case suitable for your smartphone. And we’ve done it! The Lesflux wireless charging case is finally here, we just need you to help with continuing our journey.

  

You can charge the case via cable or wireless charger pads such as the Samsung Dock and other wireless charging spots. You simply put your phone case on the wireless charging pad and it charges the phone and case simultaneously

 

You can currently order the case in  Black, Grey, Rose Gold, Red and Blue. Add some colour to your Lesflux experience!

 

We have years of experience designing case, electronics product and this allows us to offer protection whilst retaining a slim and sleek design gel case and leather case.

 

 

 

Depends on the smartphone size, normally it is 3mm more than the phone size on each side.

 

 

Hey, I’m Diini Omar, Product Designer and creator of the Lesflux wireless charging case. This journey started whilst I was studying Product Design at Middlesex University. Smartphone battery life is an issue all around the world and I knew there had to be a solution. With a carefully selected team I took the long road to fixing the issue by developing new technology. Lesflux is the realization of that journey.

Add some colour to your Lesflux experience! We have years of experience designing case, electronics product and this allows us to offer protection whilst retaining a slim and sleek design gel case and leather case.   Depends on the smartphone size, normally it is 3mm more than the phone size on each side.  Hey, I’m Diini Omar, Product Designer and creator of the Lesflux wireless charging case. This journey started whilst I was studying Product Design at Middlesex University. Smartphone battery life is an issue all around the world and I knew there had to be a solution. With a carefully selected team I took the long road to fixing the issue by developing new technology. Lesflux is the realization of that journey.

story:
UPDATE MAY 2014!


Fancy Remote Low Cost version here !


Fancy Remote + 2 Fancy Plug All in one!

Connect 2 devices/appliances to the board and connect the board to your router. You will access to your devices with your Mobile Device via internet (web environment). 




You can get it now! Look at the perks!


______________________________________________________________________


Meet Fancy Remote.



Your mobile device connects to Fancy Remote via Internet. Fancy Remote connects with Fancy Plugs wireless.

Fancy Remote consists in 2 devices:

1. Fancy Remote: This is the Central Unit used as a bridge between mobile software and the plugs.

2. Fancy Plug: This is the device which allows you to control every device/appliance.

So, you always need Fancy Remote (Central Unit). You can get the Fancy Plugs you want. There is no limit.


______________________________________________________________________


   Control your home from your Mobile Device 

Fancy Remote is connected hardware that allows you to automate, customize and remote control your devices/appliances at home. It comes with zero effort installation and context-aware automation. Connect your Fancy Remote to your router and start controlling every device at home. You can control the device at home and also around the world via internet.



______________________________________________________________________


                                It fits everywhere 



We will send you the socket you need for your country. If you want a different socket from the country you order, please let us know.


______________________________________________________________________


                                   Plug & Play 

It is plug & play:

1. Connect the Fancy Remote cable to your router.

2. Download the application from our Website, Android Play Store or Apple.

3. Plug the appliance/device to the Fancy Plug and manage your home/office with your mobile device.

That's all! It is not necessary to configure anything else!


______________________________________________________________________



______________________________________________________________________

                        

                               Mobile Software


Manage inside & outside your home

You can manage your Fancy Plugs inside & outside your home. If your Smart Phone is connected to your home wifi the software will use it to connect and if not your mobile device will connect through your operator.


Compatible with Android and iPhone.



App Screenshots:

                            

                                         


______________________________________________________________________


                How to join to Fancy Remote?

How many Fancy Plugs do you need? We are offering a variety of Perks which should cover all your needs. Order in quantity to take full advantage of our reduced prices.



_______________________________________________________________________

             

               Meet the Fancy Remote Team

                                     

 Pablo, Cofounder & CTO - pablo@fancypi.com

 Luis, Cofounder & CEO - luis@fancypi.com

   


 Carlos, Software Engineering - carlos@fancypi.com

  


We have been developing automation solutions for the last 10 years. In addition to our core team, we've assembled an incredible group of engineers, designers, and industry experts who are collaborating with us to create the best product possible. Because our experience manufacturing automation systems, we have found the solution to manufacture FancyRemote.


_______________________________________________________________________

             

           Why we need your support

We have chosen Indiegogo because we want to release to the market Fancy Remote. We think Fancy Remote is for everybody because simplicity and easy installation and use. 


_______________________________________________________________________

             

                          Questions & Answers


1) BUYING & SHIPPING (Shipping costs, International, Timeline)

1a: What are the shipping costs and tax?

Europe:

All shipments has 19€ charge. 21% VAT will be charged, except companies with Intracomunity Operator Number. In this case, specify it.

Rest of the world:

All shipment has 30€ charge. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country.


1b: When is the soonest I can receive my Fancy Remote?

Estimated shipping dates for Smart Remote will be during June 2014. Our goal is to have the shipment ready and sent to you earlier but we have seen some of the challenges of others, and we wanted to make sure not to overpromise. This we promise: we are working around the clock to bring this to market, and as soon as it’s ready, it will be sent out to you!


2) TECHNICAL

2a: Which voltage does Fancy Remote Support?

Fancy Remote comes with an AC power adapter to plug your device into the wall. It will be shipped with an international switching power supply capable of 100v - 240v cable.


2b: How Can I connect the FancyRemote?

You can connect the Fancy Remote to your router with the cable you will receive with your Fancy Remote.


_______________________________________________________________________

             

Thank you

Any more questions? Ask away!  fancyremote@fancypi.com

You can follow us on Twitter @FancyRemote

Thank you for participating in this campaign. We hope you join us!

story:
Please allow me to  introduce myself

I'm Mark Huijs from the Netherlands. My dream is to get everybody a Grippee. For half a year now, I've been working with friends and even my mom, to get you a Grippee. We’ve been busy creating different models, checking production possibilities, getting the patent, making the website, etc.

This campaign is very important to us, because it gives us the chance to make the perfect start. For us: strength is in numbers: to make Grippee affordable to everyone.. and that's what we want!!

So please support me, my friends (and my mom) and get yourself a Grippee!

 

What We Need & What You Get

No matter how small, We can use every contribution! As we already ordered the first production batch of Grippee's, You will always get your return on investment. But more important: the more investors we get, the cheaper production will be. Which means:   the more we can give back to you!

Our promise to you is to give you at least what’s in the perk, and hopefully more!!

The world needs Grippee!

  • Use your phone as supposed to... with one hand
  • No more need for those ugly bumpers
  • No more falling phones
  • Change your style as you go
  • Start using your phone with one hand!!

 

Grippee PURE

Exclusive package

 

Unique package

Check out our website for more package details: www.grippee.com

We will make sure you allway recieve a Grippee. It doesn't matter if we reach our goal.

You will be contributing to our fundraising, not buying any good or services!

story:
Zuva is a durable, temperature resistant, water resistant solar flashlight with a rubberized exterior for added strength, a 3-watt, 185 lumen LED, and a 2,200 mAh (milliamphere-hour) rechargeable lithium-ion battery capable of fully charging an iPhone or Android phone through the USB port built into the handle. 

What it means for you is a versatile device that you can use at home or outdoors, every day or in emergencies to both provide light and power the devices that keep you connected to the world. All in a size that will easily fit in a pocket.


Why Zuva?

"Zuva" means "Sun" in the Shona language spoken in Zimbabwe. We chose it not only because our light is solar-chargeable, but because we believe that, like the sun, our Zuva has the ability to help improve human well-being in the developed world as well as the developing world.

You might already know that the International Energy Agency estimates that there are over 1.3 billion people in the world without access to electricity. More than 95% of these people are either in Sub-Saharan Africa or developing Asia.

We spent several years living in Mozambique, and witnessed this shortage first-hand. While in Mozambique, we realized that the people there are basically like people everywhere.

They struggle on a daily basis to make life better for themselves and their children.

They gather together to share the joys and sorrows of their lives.

They do all of the things that all of us do every day. The difference is that they are hindered by lack of access to many necessities, one of the most vital of which is electricity. 

In the developed world, we tend to take the importance of reliable electricity for granted. It drives an economy. It provides light in times of darkness. It powers the devices that keep us connected to the world. 

The importance of cell phones in the developing world cannot be over-estimated. They are life-lines that not only drive economic development, but also provide safety and security.

How Does Zuva Address the Need for Energy and Communication?

We saw a need for a device that could reliably provide both light at night and power for cellular phones in those places where you cannot readily plug into a dependable power grid.

Zuva is all of these things. It is durable enough to be used in the harshest of conditions. It has a lithium-ion battery that can be charged by the sun, or by a micro-USB port and has enough power to fully recharge the most demanding of cellular phones. It has a 1.5 watt LED that provides 125 lumens of light. And it is affordable enough that it is accessible to a large portion of the world's population.

I Want to Make a Difference in the World, But Do I Get Anything Else?

Sure you do! 

Helping promote sustainable growth and self-reliance in developing countries is definitely a good incentive to contribute, but the best incentive, we think, is that this is a really cool device. You get a device with the capabilities of lights that cost over $100, and at a fraction of the price.

How will you use it? That's entirely up to you. We've made a device that's durable and versatile enough that you can use it just about anywhere. 

Just imagine how helpful Zuva will be during sustained power outages or other emergencies. With one device, you'll be able to handle multiple emergency needs.


How to Charge your Zuva

Here is the best way to charge your Zuva light:
1. Unscrew the end cap (counter clockwise).
2. Using a micro USB cable, plug your Zuva light into any USB port.
3. Once the battery is fully charged the red light will change to green.
4. Remove the cable, replace the end cap, and place your Zuva in a sunny window, with the solar panel facing toward the sun. This will keep the battery fully charged.

International Shipping

We've had several questions about this. International shipping is not included in the pricing, so if you are outside the USA and would like to purchase Zuvas, the shipping cost is a flat $10 (no matter how many ZUVAs you buy). 

We have already reached our funding goal, but now we are extending this offer to increase our reach.

About Zuva

Features

Durable, rubber-coated, poly-carbonate body

Water/Heat Resistant

Sleek Design

Standard USB port will charge any iPhone or Android phone

The ZUVA can be charged two ways: 1) A micro-USB port is built into the handle of the light that quickly charges the battery. 2) an efficient solar panel provides emergency charging capability. Although the micro-USB port is the principle charging method, Zuva can be fully charged through the solar panel. 

Multiple illumination levels - First click for 80 lumens, second click for 185 lumens

Never need to replace LED or battery.

Specifications

Length: 6 inches

Color: Hi-vis Yellow

Composition: 100% polycarbonate (for strength)

Battery: 2,200 mAh rechargeable lithium-ion battery

Light: 40,000 hour, 3.0 watt LED 

Charging: Micro-USB and Monocrystalline Solar Panel


About Us

We're Loren and Tina Spendlove. We lived and worked in Mozambique and Angola for nearly 5 years and gained a great love and appreciation for Africa and its wonderful people. We have a great deal of experience bringing products to market in the United States through traditional means. This is our first crowd-funding project, and we're launching it because we don't just want to bring another product to market. We want Zuva to make a difference in the lives of people like those we met in Mozambique, and feel that it has the potential to do so. We have 5 adult children, and 8 grandchildren!

Loren:

PhD, Education – University of Wyoming.  MBA – California State University, Fullerton. BS, Finance – Brigham Young University.  Certified Financial Manager (CFM).  Certified Management Accountant (CMA).

Tina:

MA, Health Psychology – Northcentral University.  BA, Psychology – Southern Utah University.
