story:
Wouldn’t it be great if, as a brand you could generate more hits on your website or social media? Well now you can...


Our idea is an exciting new mobile app that uses clever image recognition technology. It allows potential customers or clients to find your brand and connect with you by simply taking a photo of your logo on a smartphone.

Why Cliqit…

You spend so much money on branding and have your logo on all your products and marketing material so why not let it work harder for you?

After a user has taken a photo of your logo it will take them directly to your personalised profile page on Cliqit. Giving them direct access to all your social media and a link to your website.

The user now has a quick and easy way of finding you, even if they are really bad at remembering names or just don’t want the hassle of manually searching on social media.

Our app benefits everyone from large global organisations to small indie bands who want potential customers or followers to be able to connect with them.

As a brand you will also be able to advertise your latest offers, promos or anything else you want your followers to see all. You could also use the app to give discounts or maybe use a logo for a teaser campaign to generate a buzz on your next up and coming product or offer...the possibilities are endless!

We are also looking to offer you first hand valuable data that tells you how many people are searching your logo. This will tell you if your recent marketing campaign has worked or where you need to concentrate more of your efforts to get a bigger following. Analytics that can save you throwing money at campaigns that are not working!! #winning

About Us...

Before the Cliqit team was formed we were graphic & interior designers, but more importantly friends, that go back over 20 years. We were going through life bored of the routine and always had it in our plan to do something that would be meaningful and make a change! We are in talks with a dedicated team of software programmers who share our passion and will be developing the app closely with us.

The idea to create an app initially came to us when we were searching for someone on Facebook and we only had a name to go by. We couldn’t find him because he shared the same name with so many other people! We thought there should be an easier way to search for someone. After some extensive research, and speaking to other social media users we found this to be a common problem. We came across face recognition technology and found no other app out there that lets you search for someone in this way…so we created one and the idea has developed further from there!

What will we do with your pledges?

At present we are in the final stages of designing the app and about to start the development phase and need the cash injection to complete this. Your pledges will also help us develop strong advertising and marketing campaigns to expand our clique, which of course, benefits you. 

Once the Indiegogo campaign comes to an end and we have raised the funds to complete our project we expect a maximum of 6 months to complete the development and testing phase of the app before it is available to download on iPhones, Android and Windows smartphones.

Our research and development team are also looking into adapting our app for Google Glass. You would be able to connect with all the brands in real time as you see the logo!

Our current audience reach throughout our social media is over 3000 and growing at a steady pace. With your help, we can gain the traction to make our dream your reality.

So join our CLIQ… together we can change the way you search!


Risks and challenges

• Fulfillment is delayed due to problems with design, manufacturing

• We have worked very hard to de-risk as much as we can before this campaign starts and all possible issues we may encounter have already been considered and we have contingency plans in place

• However, there is always the risk of unforeseen challenges when developing software and we have a dedicated development team on hand to iron out any issues

• If an unexpected issue arises with the app usage, we have feedback section within the app which notifies us of any bugs that need fixing at the same time our developer will be monitoring the app for any unexpected issues

•	If an unexpected issue arises with the app usage, we have feedback section within the app which notifies us of any bugs that need fixing at the same time our developer will be monitoring the app for any unexpected issues

story:
Living on Brazil is one of the most painful things for gamers.
Not only we have a super high inflation because gaming is considered a type of gambling the PS4 is not produced here so the taxes are even higher.
I have been saving for quite awhile and ended up being fired 2 months ago. A store is going to make an awesome deal for me but I wont meet the deadline for the special deal since I am still missing half of the sum needed.
I seriously hate having to do this but it is my last option to try and achieve one of the things I waited and worked so hard for.
Help a desperate gamer out!

story:
"What is PaddockScene and why should I care?"

It is estimated that nearly 1 in 10 people consider themselves automotive enthusiasts. With that kind of audience, it makes sense that there are thousands of events for every kind of gearhead.

Finding automotive events should be easy. Think online shopping-easy. Like shopping, there are loads of event options of various styles and costs, right? You can go to a car show, an auction, a track day, a race... you just have to find them. How hard can it be? As it turns out, it is far more difficult than it should be! So, I've set out to fix this. 

PaddockScene (www.PaddockScene.com) is an online event center for automotive addicts that puts the races and shows you want to find all in one place. It's like a TV Guide and social platform for real car and motorcycle events. Search for and discover everything from national pro races to local shows in your neighborhood.

 

"Get on with it already..."

During the 2012 calendar year, I worked on a simple, yet arduous, personal project using Excel and Google Calendar to remind myself when automotive events I liked were coming up. I wanted to simplify the automotive landscape by taking the dozens of schedules online, and thousands of scattered events, and drop them into one complete place - sorted by special criteria and location. 

Early on, it occured to me that these spreadsheets and reminders could actually be useful to everyone else, by sharing the calendar and opening it up for contributions from people like you. To do that effectively, I decided to build a website called PaddockScene.com.

 

"And this is different how??"

Unlike a few other sites that just list the dates of a select few races, PaddockScene is completely independent, and can highlight events for all car and bike enthusiasts. The site will include every level of competition, including non-competitive local gatherings. You will find pro races like Rolex Series racing or MotoGP. Even if an event happens outside the US, you can find when it will air on TV. You will also find amateur-level racing, like track days, club racing, or autocrosses. And of course, the festival events and shows, like your local "Cars & Coffee" gatherings and auto shows. 

PaddockScene spans car culture. The design of the site lets you choose your own interests to find out what is happening nationally OR locally to you. I understand that every enthusiast is interested in different things; that is why the site is a custom design using a proven content management system that lets you decide what you are looking for. It does this by filtering and sorting categories and event types. 

While the website will be free for all users, building one is not. PaddockScene is getting some very expensive custom features that enhance your user experience. If you donate, you will help keep the development team true to the launch timeline. PaddockScene is tracked to go live in June of this year! 

 

"I am skeptical... can you really pull this off?"

Yes. This is a simple idea! Maybe it has crossed your mind as you skimmed a bunch of websites for local tracks and car clubs, and thought "there has to be a better way!" You were right. Other industries, like music, have already capitalized on the idea of making upcoming concerts more visible and accessible, based on bands and venues you like. It's brilliant, and now I know when my favorite bands are playing near me. 

For example, say you like rally racing: right now, you would have to go to a minimum of 5 different websites to see what's happening in the world of rally. Try SPEED for WRC TV highlights, Rally America for pro events, SCCA and NASA for club events, and Global RallyCross for closed course. That doesn't even begin to scratch the surface of all the owners clubs that organize TSD (time-speed-distance) rallies, hillclimbs, and international off-road competitions like Dakar and Baja.

Alternatively, you can head over to PaddockScene, sort by "Rally" as a filter or search term, and find everything going on in your specific region, or even nationally.

 

"You can't know when ALL these events are happening, can you?"

Okay, the truth is, I don't know everything. But, I do promise to launch the site with at least 50 professional racing series that you can attend in the U.S. or watch on TV. Even after dedicating too many lost nights to fancy spreadsheets, organizing and categorizing dates and types of events (some of which I had never even heard of), I know there is much more to do. 

Here is another promise: YOU, the user, will be able to help. If you find an event that you plan to attend that is not on the website, add it yourself. You will be empowered to upload events that have yet to be created on the site. It makes sense to do this, too, because once an event is live you can share it with your friends and other users and actually help grow that event. It's a win-win for the event organizers and the attendees. 

 

"Do you have any experience managing projects?"

Why yes, I do! In fact, I know more than a a thing or two about project management and marketing. I spent over three years working at a Fortune 50 automaker. With only a small team, we created and managed over 200 events per year in line with strategy and budget. 

 

"You say this is a simple idea. How far along is it?"

The idea is simple, but the execution is not. There are many stages of development, many of which are very complex. The good news is that most of them are already completed:

  • Business case - Done (3rd Quarter, 2012)
  • Request for proposal to development agencies - Done (4th Quarter, 2012)
  • Agency selection - Done (1st Quarter, 2013)
  • Timeline - Done (1st Quarter, 2013)
  • Site concepting (UX, Design, Development strategy) - Done (1st Quarter, 2013)
  • Wireframing - Done (1st Quarter, 2013)
  • Site construction - Underway (2nd Quarter, 2013)
  • Launch - Target early June release!!

 

"I'm a grump and don't like new things. What say you?"

There are a lot of "old boys clubs" out there today - especially local clubs - that like the way things operate but also bemoan the fact that there is a lack of fresh blood coming in to sustain their group. Ten year old websites that can't be found just don't cut it anymore. In an age where community engagement is instant, it is time to play by new rules to make organizations and events more accessible to a new generation of car enthusiasts. PaddockScene will throw open the doors of car culture and motorsports, and shed new light on challenges and events of all varieties, accessible to all. 

 

"Do you plan on making money?"

Yes. Maintaining a website is expensive and time-consuming. In order for it to be free for users, I will work with sponsors and vendors with everyone's best interests are at heart.

There are five separate revenue channels that I have identified as viable, cost-effective options. I plan to launch the site with the short term goal of building the user base through online advertising, maximizing SEO, and word-of-mouth. The longer term goal of the site is to maintain a 99% accuracy rate for event listings, as well as to diversify the revenue channels to reinvest in the site, keeping it updated and fresh for the users. 

I am opening communication channels to work closely with race directors, marketing managers (series and venues), and club coordinators to make sure the best events are always successfully promoted. I have a history of doing this well in a previous career.

 

"Fair enough, you've got a point. What do I get for MY money?"

My goal is to be as transparent as possible throughout the campaign. I am trying to raise at least $20,000 to offset a portion of the heavy development and launch costs.  Therefore, I have opted for a "Flexible Funding" campaign, which means you can't have buyers remorse and hope the campaign fails to get your money back.

What I am NOT trying to do is ask you to pay for my pipedream. Campaigns fail because of a lack of value to the investor ("buy me a Lamborghini;" "pay for my vacation;" etc). I see tremendous value in the PaddockScene platform and I sincerely hope I've conveyed a genuine benefit so that future users are comfortable supporting it. I have already invested a significant amount of my own money into this project to coax it to where it is today, and I will continue to invest as long as I see the value in it for the automotive community as a whole.

What you are helping me pay for:

  • Hosting costs
  • Geo-IP capability (monthly fee)
  • Design and theming (see logo for a sample of design quality)
  • Vendor development costs (custom advanced Drupal 7 interface)
  • Assorted production expenses
  • PR and advertising costs to ensure future success

As an early investor, you are offered several perks to get excited about PaddockScene. Almost all of these items are going to be a limited run, and while other items may become available for sale down the road, chances are you'll never be able to get another one of these once PaddockScene takes off. 

The descriptions are self-explanatory, but I do want to explain one option further:

Invest $200 or more in the site, and I will give you a sneak peak at how the homepage, categories, event pages, and user pages will be laid out according to the wireframes. I feel this is an important offering to prove that a) yes, this is real, and b) we are nearly launch-ready. 

 

"Just kidding, I don't have any money."

That's fine, too! While every penny helps, I do hope you feel as passionately about PaddockScene as I do. Like the Facebook page and follow PaddockScene on Twitter! Chances are, if you like the idea, some of your friends will too. You are doing a huge service to the site by just passing this on and making some noise about my campaign! You can send the URL directly to a friend or use the Indiegogo share tools.

If you are a little hesitant to give anything, ask me questions. I love skeptics. They keep me challenged and on my toes. If you can't tell, I am one myself. I will post all the questions I get and update the campaign frequently.

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
WELCOME!

Thanks for visiting our campaign page, we are the juabar team and we're excited to share our story with you. We are a team of designers and researchers who came together as students at the California College of the Arts. Last summer Olivia, Eric and Anna (see us below) conducted research in Tanzania on how solar could provide clean energy options for 90% of the population who currently lack access to electricity.

 (Pictured: Anna Acquistapace, Rachel Gant, Sachi DeCou, Eric Persha, Olivia Nava)

From that research we conceived of "juabar - Community Power Hub." Juabar is a solar-powered mobile phone charging station. Mobile phones are the only form of telecommunications for many Tanzanians, and we believe mobile technology will lead the demand for clean energy solutions.Today, only 10% of the Tanzanian population has access to grid electricity, yet an astounding 60% of the population owns a mobile phone. This is amazing to us and where we feel we can meet a clear need.

Juabar starts as a mobile phone charging station but is designed to adapt and grow based on community needs, from mobile charging to a wifi hub to a micro-utility for off-grid communities.

An intial prototype of the juabar is sponsored by CCA's Center for Art and Public Life IMPACT Social Entrepreneurship award in collaboration with the Appropriate Rural Technology Institute outside of Dar es Salaam, Tanzania (TZ). With your help we can expand our reach and bring juabar solar opportunities to additional communities, both in TZ and beyond.

We are seeking funds to expand the reach of juabar to additional communities and organziations while we are on the ground in TZ. The impact of juabar is far reaching, from offering off grid communities access to solar energy solutions, to closing the global digital divide by increasing access to communications resources and economic opportunities.

(Pictured: Olivia conducting research during juabar's 2011 trip to Dar es Salaam)

Your donations will fund additional solar components for each juabar and the development of training and financing mechanisms to facilitate long term impact. We are raising funds for the creation of four additional juabars. No matter what, your funds will be used toward the furtherance of juabar, whether they go to purchase a solar panel or the nuts and bolts to mount it, it's all important.

Your donations are much appreciated and your support goes a long way toward the creation of solar opportunities. We love you even if you can't afford to donate! Please spread the word about juabar.

Thank you!! Olivia Nava, Rachel Gant, Sachi DeCou (Co-Founders)

story:
Maintaining multiple resumes is difficult

The best way to land an interview is to have a resume that focuses on your experience and skills that best fit the job description. Making a "one size fits all" resume isn't the optimal way to catch an employer's attention. Attaché makes this easy by storing all of your credentials in a master document. When it comes time to publish a resume, you get to pick the best information for the position.

Keeping your resumes up to date is easy because all of your published resumes on Attaché reference your account's master document. Meaning, you only need to make changes to your master document for all of your resumes to be up to date. No more keeping track of locally saved Word documents.

We already have a prototype up and running

To see a proof of concept, we have a prototype up and running right now at www.attacheinc.com (best viewed in Google Chrome). Sign up and start using our service. Every account is given one free resume to publish online, but you can print out as many as you like. Be sure to give us your feedback!

Change how your resume looks with a single click

Attaché breaks down the development process by separating the the work of inputing new information and the work of designing your resume. Once you've picked the information that you want to publish, you can choose the design that best suits you. We have three designs at the moment, but with your donations we plan on commissioning more.

Save as a PDF, print, or publish to the web

Once you've picked your information and a style, you can choose to save your resume as a PDF, print it out, or publish it to the web. When you publish it online, we host your resume on a page that puts your information front and center. You won't find any ads here. We wanted to make a page that you would feel confident sending off to an employer or putting on your business card.

We want to make sharing your resume as easy as handing off your business card 

We already have a mobile app in development, which will give you access to the published resumes you have on your Attaché account. That means when a moment of opportunity strikes, sending off your resume will be as easy pulling out your phone.

Why we need your help, Indiegogo

While we've been working on this project, we've received feedback on many ways to improve Attaché. We've also noticed that expanding our application will be expensive, as there are many costs we need to consider:

Improved hosting

We currently have our prototype and SQL database, but we want to handle heavier traffic load and constant up time, so we need to purchase superior (and far more expensive) hosting services.

Hooking in with LinkedIn's API

We want to remove any barrier to entry to begin using Attaché, and since LinkedIn is a web service many use to list their credentials, we want to make importing that info into a stylized resume as easy as possible.

Commissioning more premium styles & Attaché Designer

We currently have three CSS styles right now, but we want to expand our library and offer more choices to style your resumes. We also want to offer those who are particularly creative the ability to design and customize their own style with the Attaché Designer. We'll need your donations to make it a reality.

Keeping Attaché free

Probably the most important reason why we're holding this campaign is because we want Attaché to be available to everyone. With the current unemployment rate at 7.8%, it's obvious why we want Attaché to stay free. We want it to be more than a web service; we want it to be a tool that simplifies resume development and maintenance.

 

To learn more about the team behind Attaché, check out this page: http://www.attacheinc.com/team

We want it to be more than a web service; we want it to be a tool that simplifies resume development and maintenance.
 
To learn more about the team behind Attaché, check out this page: http://www.attacheinc.com/team

story:
At the close of our campaign on January 7th, we surpassed our initial goal of $5,000 as well as two stretch goals, ending up with a grand total of $7,909. Incredible!

Thank you to all who gave for their support and believed in our budding company's mission. With the campaign behind us we are excited to move forward and introduce Kadi's innovative technology to the West African market. With your help, we will be able to manufacture, ship and retail our Ray 20 device to Ghanaian consumers in the next six months. Follow us on Facebook for the latest updates: https://www.facebook.com/kadienergy

Thank you, again, from the bottom of our hearts!

(Photos by ©VeraPhotography)

Be part of Ghana's Energy Solution

Mobile technology has changed the way people receive health care, educate their children, and do business in Sub-Saharan Africa. Yet a glaring challenge remains: power.

Kadi Energy Company seeks to meet immediate energy needs as dependence on cell phones and mobile technology grows. Our Ray 20 solar-powered mobile charger will increase energy independence and security, and provide thousands of Ghanaians with jobs and micro-businesses.

A message from our founder

Growing up in eastern Ghana, my siblings and I struggled to complete our homework at night, my mother's trading business was constantly interrupted by blackouts, and we had trouble keeping in touch with relatives who moved away. When I was fifteen, I began my mission to tackle these energy problems by developing a solar collector to power community center lights in my village. I have since continued my education in Hong Kong and the United States, but my heart is still in Africa.

I founded Kadi Energy Company with my incredible team in 2013 to increase energy sustainability and reduce unemployment in Ghana and other developing countries.

I hope our campaign page can help you understand how Kadi will improve the everyday lives of Ghanaians, and the weight of your contribution toward launching our first product line. Thank you for your support!

Paul

Meet the Ray 20

Kadi's mobile device chargers use original battery technology to harness solar and AC power for long periods of time. The Ray 20 can charge up to 14 iPhones after sitting in full sun for a day.

Offering Versatility and Sustainability

Our Ray line products come in various sizes for personal, family, communal, or business use. The charger's small size allows for portability.

Providing Local Job Opportunities

Unemployment rates are high among educated and talented youth in areas where reliable energy is needed, meaning there is a strong employment base for the company. We will challenge young Ghanaians to build their own micro-companies marketing and selling Kadi products.

 

Why Kadi Energy?

For the last two decades, demand for electricity in Ghana grew at an average annual rate of between 10-15%, a trend that is expected to continue. Over 75% of Ghana’s electricity consumers are served by hydroelectric power, and the country experiences generation shortfalls during drought conditions. This means frequent blackouts. Millions of mobile phone users also live off of the electrical grid entirely.

Mobile phone use in Ghana dramatically improves quality of life and connectedness in a country that simultaneously prizes familial ties while it experiences significant urbanization. Popular mobile apps allow for mobile banking, mobile money transactions, and minute-to-minute crop price updates. Mobile learning increases access to educational materials, and cell phones have been shown to dramatically reduce maternal mortality and improve health outcomes in Ghanaian villages.

Where Your Money Goes

At this stage Kadi Energy seeks initial capital for further proof of concept through sales. All funds raised during this Indiegogo campaign will go toward manufacturing, shipping, and retailing the Ray 20 to Ghanaian consumers.

Where We Are Now and Where We're Going

Initial operations will be focused in Ghana. Kadi plans to expand to surrounding countries, beginning with Togo and Burkina Faso, in the next five to ten years.

Today, our efforts lie primarily in creating a solid foundation for our featured product: the Ray 20. Extensive market research has broadened Kadi’s understanding of the industry in which it competes as a registered LLC in Ghana: Renewables for Sustainable Village Power (RSVP). During the summer of 2015, we plan to review proof of concept sales and tailor our operations strategy and upcoming products in the Ray line series to fit specific consumer demands.

As a multi-phased company, we have already started preliminary work on a product that will be used to power certain medical devices within rural clinics. Further work in this area will depend heavily on the traction obtained by the Ray series within our target market. We will continually channel resources toward modification and developing products better suited for the African market.

Risks and Challenges

We've been working hard to create a product that fits the needs of rural African families both in terms of energy and job creation, but the main challenge we face is establishing brand. Our product outperforms competitors in energy storage capacity and versatility, but many companies have superior distribution channels and a higher marketing budget. We plan to combat this with grassroots efforts employing locally knowledgeable, well-educated African women and men to break into unsaturated markets. We also have a partnership with Burro, an established distributor of energy and technology products in Ghana. This will increase recognition of Kadi's brand and products.

 

Our Campaign in the Press

Colorado Springs Gazette: Colorado College student works to bring more reliable energy to his homeland

Tech Cocktail: Energy Access is a Portal to Prosperity

htxt.africa: Ghanian startup hits crowdfunding target for solar power supply

Other Ways You Can Help

Not in a position to donate financially? We understand. We’d love any and all of your help getting the word out about Kadi Energy Company and our featured Ray 20 product. Ask your family, friends, and co-workers to help spread the word about our campaign on social media and by email. We greatly appreciate all your support!

 

Thank you!

Photos by ©VeraPhotography

story:
Nowadays, we realize people charge their phone more frequently than anytime before. Think about the cables we broken because of repeated plug-in and out; think about these cables in a mess at your working desk or in your car; think about the long cable when you using the power bank. Now it is time to change! 

With a full research on the current phone wireless charger products, we found none of them satisfy us. As a result, MAGQI team comes up with the magnetic design concept and implement it in all MAGQI products. Finally, after a year, we get the design, prototype, sample production and sample testing done. Now we just need your help to reduce the unit cost and have the mass production done. 

 

Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | YouTube | Google+

 

 

 

MAGQI Magnetic Wireless Desk Charger is designed to use at home or in the office.  You can just take your phone from MAGQI when you wake up in the morning and put it on MAGQI before sleep, it will be fully charged next morning. 

You can put several MAGQI desk chargers around your apartment. It looks so clean and very convenient for you to charge your phone.

In the office, MAGQI desk charger stands right beside you, so it will be easy for you to view message or read news while it is charging. 

During the break of work, MAGQI desk charger can work as a stand for your phone while you want to watch the movie and videos on the phone. 

 

MAGQI Magnetic Wireless Car Charger is not only a wireless charger but also a very convenient car mount for the phone. It will be super easy for you to take a phone call, navigate or play music while it is charging. 

The air vent bracket comes with the charger is super easy to install, plus the air conditioner can help to cool the phone down while it is charging. 

The bracket for the charger can be 360 degrees rotating, so you can set the right angle for the view. 

The MAGQI car charger kit also comes along with a windshield bracket for your preference. 

Because of the magnetic design in MAGQI, the car charger can hold your phone firmly even on a bumpy road. 

 

MAGQI Magnetic Wireless Power Bank is designed to use when your phone is out of power outside. It can not only work as a wireless power bank, but also QC2.0 fast charge when you charge with cable.

You just need to place the phone on the top of the power bank,it will start charge. There is no need to bring the long charging cable with you in order to charge your phone with the power bank now. 

Because of the magnetic design, the power bank can hold the phone firmly even on the move. 

 

There are many phones out there on the market, there are 4 types MAGQI adapters: 

1. Micro-USB adapter 

2. Lightning adapter 

3. USB Type C adapter 

4, magnetic adapters for phones with built-in wireless charging receiver

 

What adapter do I need for my phone?

Don't worry, when the campaign is ended, we will send out a survey to all the backers, then simply give us your phone info, we will supply you with the right adapter. 

 

 

Feelingtech (own MAGQI) was founded by a group of like-minded professionals who has been in the electronics industry with more than 10 years of experiences collectively from all over the world. The company is currently based out of Shenzhen and Hong Kong China. The sales forces of the company are professionals from multinational FMCG companies around the world.

 

 

 

With your invaluable help, we will finalize all the manufacturing processes necessary for delivering your MAGQI. We get the design, prototype, sample production and sample testing done for the past year. Now we just need your help to reduce the unit cost and have the mass production done.  

Tell your  friends about us on your social media platform (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+) ! we hope you enjoy more convenient solutions as much as we do, and make this a reality.

Thank you again!

 

sales@feelingtech.cc 

 

Q1, When will you ship MAGQI?

The MAGQI will ship to you in March, 2017. 

Q2, My phone has built-in wireless receiver, do I still need the adapter? 

Yes, for these phones already with built-in wireless receiver, MAGQI have the magnetic patch, otherwise, the phone will not be hold by MAGQI products. 

Q3, Must I wear a phone case in order to use MAGQI? 

Yes, although the MAGQI receiver patch can stick to the bank of the phone, but we highly suggested to use the phone case to protect the receiver patch. 

Q4, How thick the phone case is good for MAGQI? 

The working distance for Qi technology is ≤10mm, most of the phone case should not reach 10mm. 

Q5, How strong the MAGQI magnetic design is? Will my phone falling from the charger while I am driving? 

We have tested the magnetic design? It can hold your phone firmly even on the bumpiest road, same when using the power bank. 

Q6, How fast the MAGQI charging speed? 

The efficiency of the MAGQI wireless charger is up to 80 percent, so the speed is very close to cable charging. 

Q7, Will the MAGQI Wireless Receiver Patch compatible with other wireless charger? 

As long as your wireless charger is Qi standard, it will be compatible. But bear this in mind, other wireless charger may not have the magnetic design, so your phone will not be hold firmly. 

Q8, Will the magnets damage my phone? 

We have tested the sample repeatedly on different phones  in the past several months, there is no negative impact for the phone at all. 

Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | YouTube | Google+

 

100K USD Stretch Goal

Hello Guys, 

This is such a great moment!! MAGQI has reached its goal within 2 days!! Now we need your support to make it go further. And as a return for your support, below is our 100K USD  stretch goal. 

Once MAGQI reaches the 100K stretch goal, all the backers（except backers for the receiver patch only）will get a: 

3 in 1 Clip-On Mobile Phone Lens Kits 180 Degree Fisheye Lens + 0.36X Wide Angle Lens + 20X Macro Lens. 

Now please share our Indiegogo Campaign with the friends around and on all your social networks such as Facebook, Twitter etc. Let's reach the 100K Stretch Goal Together.

story:
(Check out new videos in our gallery tab!)

About Touch Sticker Technology (TST):

Touch sticker technology is a patented new human-object interface that is capable of transforming all non-conductive surfaces with limited thickness (wood, glass, etc.) into touch sensors or screens.

Despite of its huge impact on all peoples' lives, it is considered one of the simplest innovations amongnon-conductive all sensing and screening technologies.

 Only by sticking transparent stickers placed on opposite side of operation interface, it invisibly turns non-conductive materials into touch surfaces that can interact with human contact. materials into touch surfaces that can interact with human contact.

The idea mainly relies on the effect of electrostatic energy inside the human body. When physical contact occurs between human body and any insulating surface like wood, plastic glass, marble or textile, these stickers sense the position and movement of the human contact and thus transmit it though Wi-Fi environment into the main controller, which accordingly order actuators to take the matching action.

Vision:

The vision of ViViFi is to turn your everyday interactions with technology as simple as one touch, giving you an unforgettable touch experience.

Providing the market with interactive surfaces by converting any device to touch sensitive surface which will interact with real-time touches in an innovative way better than the existing touch systems available today.

Mission:

In order to create a unique touch experience for its customers, vivifi's touch sticker technology which will be applied on, electrical switches, interactive advertising, E-Learning tools, smart homes, interactive furniture, automobiles sensors, and touch menus.

Where we are

  • We are raising U$D 1,000,000 in order to build our production facility in Malaysia, and importing Machines from USA, and other machines we will have to construct specially for our unique technology.

Where The Money Will Go

The $1,000,000 we raise will roughly break down like this:

  • $474,700 - Production machinery and equipment (General machinery, Welding machinery, soldering machinery, Painting machinery, Lab equipment, CNC machinery, Design equipment).
  • $590,000 - Converting electrical circuits into microchips (Logic analyzer, 1Ghz Digital oscilloscope, Function generator, Spectrum analyzer, PCB line, Software, Design, Fabrication).

What we have for you

  • Check out our amazing gifts, signed switches, lessons, signed certificates by the inventor himself, and much more!

What investments have we secured?

  • “We have successfully closed a $70K round from outside investors, which we used to convert our idea to prototype and then to a product."

Why is ViViFi interesting for investors?

  • “International trends are heading towards controlling everything around us through touch technologies, and ViViFi’s touch sticker technology is a world innovation in this field. It’s the future of touch technology, this is how you’ll be able to convert any non-conductive surface with limited thickness into touch interactive surfaces! 
  • We are looking forward to penetrating the African, North American and European markets, through dealership with large technology manufacturers. We focus on the big market of mobile, touch screens and other technology manufacturers, who all potentially want to use touch sensors in their products. This includes automobile manufacturers, home appliances manufacturers, and others.
  • We hold local patents and are working on all relevant international patents. Having the inventor of the new Touch Sticker Technology in-house is also a success factor of ViViFi. We have all the keys of the game and invite interested investors to see our business plan for more info.”

ViViFi team in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia - meeting with potential partners

Where we have been showing?

- CeBIT 2013 (Hanover, Germany) 

- DEMO Africa 2013 (Nairobi, Kenya)



Where you can read more about us?

  • Forbes.
  • CIO Magaizne.
  • Human IPO.

You can also help by :)

  • Sharing our campaign, maybe someone there can fund us.

story:
Say Hello to Keys, a new kind of music keyboard. 

Keys was developed with the belief that music devices should be portable, flexible and accessible. It's the first modular music keyboard designed to turn your audio workstation into a traveling creative studio - just pack it up and go.

And, whether you're a pro or beginner, learning, playing and creating music should be a fun, exciting and inspiring experience.

Our frustration.

When you're on the road, it's either impossible or inconvenient to bring along your entire kit and set up. Equipment is large, clunky and setup is a hassle - not to mention all of the cords to get your kit just the way you like it.

Other mini keyboards have tiny keys - awful for big hands - or rubber touchpads that just don't have the right feel, and durability issues.

And, for people who want to learn how to play music, lessons can be expensive, time consuming and intimidating. Online tutorials are often confusing, boring and not interactive at all.

That's why we created Keys.

Keys is the first music keyboard and MIDI controller that's completely modular, linking together through magnetic technology, called AMON. It's a musician and producer's dream, featuring:

  • A sleek, portable and ultra durable design that will last
  • Keys with full scale width for superior touch and control you can feel
  • Works with iOS, Android, and any program that supports USB-MIDI
  • 8-hour battery life for continuous playing
  • Rich and vibrant LED lit keys to breathe life into your performances
  • Change sounds and octaves with a wave of your hand
  • Two apps for beginners to learn their favorite songs


We aren't the only ones who think Keys is amazing.

Stretch goal reached!

We hit $125K thanks to all of our backers, and will include a designer felt travel bag with each Keys ordered during this campaign.


Keys is modular.

You can expand to a full sized keyboard in seconds - without cords - by simply magnetically linking multiple Keys together, and easily breakdown to pack Keys away in your backpack. 

And, with 8 hours of battery life you can take Keys anywhere and get nearly a full day of playing.



Works with your favorite apps.

Keys is also fully USB-MIDI compliant and works with iOS and Android devices, along with hundreds of apps such as GarageBand, Ableton, and more, so you can plug in and get set up quickly and easily.


Size and portability matter.

Keys is built to be compact, travel friendly and durable. We use plastic reinforced with PCB and built Keys on top of a solid metal baseplate to add durability and rigidity. 

We also stripped out all of the unnecessary keyboard features that just take up space and go unused. And, at only one pound it's light enough to bring anywhere.

Full scale keys.

From the stunning illuminated keys to full scale key width, spacing and feel, every aspect of Keys was carefully considered by our creative and engineering team.

And, each key features velocity sensors to expand on the sounds you can make, creating a more rich user experience than touchpads.


You've never seen anything like this in a keyboard.

Keys is equipped with next-generation gesture recognition technology so you can adjust octaves and control tones just by waving your hand above the keyboard.

Keys' built-in LEDs support hundreds of thousands of rich, vibrant colors transforming your music making experience into something out of Tron.


What if I'm not a musician or DJ?

Not to worry! We created two awesome applications for iOS called Learn and Play to help anyone (yes that includes you!) learn theory, how to read sheet music and how to play their favorite songs.


Never sit through another boring tutorial.

Our groundbreaking Play app lets you immediately play hit songs "Guitar Hero" style like a pro regardless of skill level.

The "Rock Band" of keyboards.

Select from a number of instrument sounds, three difficulty levels, and two play modes. Notes can either flow across the screen right to left "Guitar Hero" style, or fall vertically.  When a note appears it will light up a corresponding key on the keyboard for you to play.

  • Choose from classical songs to the hits
  • Play includes 20 great songs to start and access to buy hundreds more
  • See what songs your friends are playing within the app
  • Get your stats and see how well you played at the end of each song
  • Rock out in free play mode, or set a tempo in practice mode


Our Learn app lets you master playing music and learning theory at your own pace.

Say goodbye to expensive lessons.

Simply follow the audible instructions of our verbal instructor combined with sheet music on screen, and color cues on Keys to learn chords, scales, and songs.

As your skill level improves, use our duet functionality to play more complex arrangements in time with the instructor.

Every lesson is graded so you can see just how well you did and unlock new lessons as you achieve mastery.  Keys is the easiest way to learn to play the piano or keyboard.


Tech specs.

Keys is beautifully designed and precision engineered.



    • Dimensions: 20 mm x 320 mm x 106 mm  (approx. 0.78" x 12.59" x 4.18")

    • Weight: 1 lb.

    • Materials: Plastic reinforced with PCB (fiberglass) keys connected to a metal baseplate to add durability and rigidity

    • Octaves: 24 keys (use gestures to transpose through 7 full octaves)

    • Gesture sensors: Sensitive proximity sensors that are capable of recognizing gestures and can be used to modulate parameters like pitch, sustain, and mapped midi parameters

    • Processor: Texas Instruments 80Mhz ARM Cortext M4F

    • Output: Mini USB -- charges Keys and can be used as a USB-MIDI connection

    • Power: Rechargeable LiPo Battery

    • Battery Life: Up to 8 hours

    • Keys Device / OS Compatibility: USB-MIDI compatible with CoreMIDI on iOS, Mac, PC, and Android. Connect quickly and easily to your computer via Mini USB or to your iPhone / Android using the optional dock.

    • Learn and Play App OS Compatibility: Keys Learn and Play apps will only be supported on iOS when we ship this summer, but Keys works with any MIDI-compatible app for Android, so you can play using over 150 available apps right away.

* Final specs subject to change.  

The team.

Opho was founded by Idan Beck as Incident in 2010, originally launching the gTar in a wildly successful crowdfunding campaign in 2012.  After successfully developing, manufacturing, and shipping thousands of gTars, Incident became Opho with a focus on an internet of music, and started to develop Keys in 2013.  

From everyone at Opho (including Nola!) thank you for supporting Keys!


Perks.


Timeline.



A portion of all proceeds will be donated to Immunity Project.  Immunity Project is a non-profit initiative dedicated to developing a free HIV vaccine.


Have more questions?

Check out our full FAQ here.
story_txt:
Say Hello to Keys, a new kind of music keyboard. Keys was developed with the belief that music devices should be portable, flexible and accessible. It's the first modular music keyboard designed to turn your audio workstation into a traveling creative studio - just pack it up and go.And, whether you're a pro or beginner, learning, playing and creating music should be a fun, exciting and inspiring experience.

Our frustration.
When you're on the road, it's either impossible or inconvenient to bring along your entire kit and set up. Equipment is large, clunky and setup is a hassle - not to mention all of the cords to get your kit just the way you like it.
Other mini keyboards have tiny keys - awful for big hands - or rubber touchpads that just don't have the right feel, and durability issues.
And, for people who want to learn how to play music, lessons can be expensive, time consuming and intimidating. Online tutorials are often confusing, boring and not interactive at all.
That's why we created Keys.
Keys is the first music keyboard and MIDI controller that's completely modular, linking together through magnetic technology, called AMON. It's a musician and producer's dream, featuring:

A sleek, portable and ultra durable design that will last
Keys with full scale width for superior touch and control you can feel
Works with iOS, Android, and any program that supports USB-MIDI
8-hour battery life for continuous playing
Rich and vibrant LED lit keys to breathe life into your performances
Change sounds and octaves with a wave of your hand
Two apps for beginners to learn their favorite songs




We aren't the only ones who think Keys is amazing.
Stretch goal reached!We hit $125K thanks to all of our backers, and will include a designer felt travel bag with each Keys ordered during this campaign.Keys is modular.
You can expand to a full sized keyboard in seconds - without cords - by simply magnetically linking multiple Keys together, and easily breakdown to pack Keys away in your backpack. And, with 8 hours of battery life you can take Keys anywhere and get nearly a full day of playing.

You've never seen anything like this in a keyboard.
Keys is equipped with next-generation gesture recognition technology so you can adjust octaves and control tones just by waving your hand above the keyboard.


Keys' built-in LEDs support hundreds of thousands of rich, vibrant colors transforming your music making experience into something out of Tron.

Our groundbreaking Play app lets you immediately play hit songs "Guitar Hero" style like a pro regardless of skill level.
The "Rock Band" of keyboards.Select from a number of instrument sounds, three difficulty levels, and two play modes. Notes can either flow across the screen right to left "Guitar Hero" style, or fall vertically.  When a note appears it will light up a corresponding key on the keyboard for you to play.
Choose from classical songs to the hits

See what songs your friends are playing within the app
Get your stats and see how well you played at the end of each song
Rock out in free play mode, or set a tempo in practice mode

Every lesson is graded so you can see just how well you did and unlock new lessons as you achieve mastery.  Keys is the easiest way to learn to play the piano or keyboard.





Tech specs.
Keys is beautifully designed and precision engineered.






Dimensions: 20 mm x 320 mm x 106 mm  (approx. 0.78" x 12.59" x 4.18")
Weight: 1 lb.
Materials: Plastic reinforced with PCB (fiberglass) keys connected to a metal baseplate to add durability and rigidity
Octaves: 24 keys (use gestures to transpose through 7 full octaves)
Gesture sensors: Sensitive proximity sensors that are capable of recognizing gestures and can be used to modulate parameters like pitch, sustain, and mapped midi parameters
Processor: Texas Instruments 80Mhz ARM Cortext M4F
Output: Mini USB -- charges Keys and can be used as a USB-MIDI connection
Power: Rechargeable LiPo Battery
Battery Life: Up to 8 hours
Keys Device / OS Compatibility: USB-MIDI compatible with CoreMIDI on iOS, Mac, PC, and Android. Connect quickly and easily to your computer via Mini USB or to your iPhone / Android using the optional dock.
Learn and Play App OS Compatibility: Keys Learn and Play apps will only be supported on iOS when we ship this summer, but Keys works with any MIDI-compatible app for Android, so you can play using over 150 available apps right away.


* Final specs subject to change.

Opho was founded by Idan Beck as Incident in 2010, originally launching the gTar in a wildly successful crowdfunding campaign in 2012.  After successfully developing, manufacturing, and shipping thousands of gTars, Incident became Opho with a focus on an internet of music, and started to develop Keys in 2013.  




From everyone at Opho (including Nola!) thank you for supporting Keys!









Perks.







Timeline.

With ChargingCords this will be the last cord you buy for your Phone !

  • Visit Us Online At www.chargingcords.com

  • Charging Cords Is Available For All Your Charging Needs!

    iPhone 4/4S,iPad 1/2/3 Compatibility 

    Charging Cords will be producing charging cables for the 30Pin iPhone 4/4S , iPad 1/2/3. Yes there is no worry! The cables are compatible with the iPad too! Also all the cables are compatible with iOS7 & iOS8 

    Micro USB Compatibility 

    Have you been looking for that nice looking cable instead of the stock black one? Well Charging Cords can help you with this. The Micro USB connector works on almost anything! Such asAndroid Phones, Tablets, MP 3 and MP4 Players. Navigation Systems,  Cameras and going on.

    MINI USB Compatibility

    Same with the Mini USB! Almost Compatible with EVERYthing! Sat Nav's, The Older Samsung's, Nokia's, Gaming Controller's, Camera's,Bluetooth Mic's and so on!

    iPhone 5S/6 Compatibility

    Are you tired of purchasing cables over and over again from websites like eBay or Amazon? As Well as cables not working or you iPad's. Well Charging Cords can help you with that! All our cables come with LIFETIME WARRANTY!  Also not to forget they are all compatible with theiPad's Too! We've never had a problem with our cables not working for the iPhone's, They are simply made to perfection! They are all compatible with iOS7 + iOS8 As well as the iPhone 5S & iPhone 6 and 6 Plus. The cables are compatible with the devices, iPhone 5,5S,5C,6,6 Plus, iPad 3/4, iPad Air, iPad Mini, iPad Mini 2.

    What Are The Causes Of The Bad Quality Cables ?

There Are Many Causes why after secondary are made and bad quality!

  • 1. Most "secondary" cables use very poor materials when manufacturer cables.
  • 2.There is no extra protection added to the ends of the cables to make them extra strong and sturdy.
  • 3. There is no warranty so you need to purchase over and over again
How Charging Cords Can Help? 

  •  1. All ChargingCords Cables Are Made With High Quality Materials When Manufactured.
  • 2. All Our Cables Have Been Manufactured With Stronger Ends To Last 10X Longer.
  • 3.All Cables Purchased From Charging Cords Have LIFETIME WARRANTY!

Whats The Difference Between Apple's Cable & ChargingCords? 

  • Apple's Charging Cable Is a stock cable which is white.
  • The Cable gets really dirty fast because of the color.
  • It only comes in one length! 
  • Cable is really unreliable with no stronger ends.
  • No warranty after purchase
  • Length is only 1M,3FT

OH YEA!

Our Cable is Twice (2) The LENGTH! 2 Meters 6 FOOT! No need to struggle anymore from reaching out from your bed to reach you phone. Or slouching while on the phone and your phone charging!

Retail Difference Between Indiegogo!

The Retail Difference is quite a lot. The cable will be up for sale for $20.95 for the iPhone 5S/6 Fabric Cable, $17.50 for the iPhone 4/4S, Micro USB & Mini USB Charging Cable and $15.45 for the Auxiliary Fabric Cable. By pledging our Indiegogo project you will receive exclusive discounts on further purchases on our website.

And What Are The Rewards?

story:
THE WORLDS FIRST AND ONLY SOLAR, BATTERY CHARGER, DRYBOX ALL IN ONE.

The Pioneer Series is the world’s first and only product to combine solar charging, battery charging and rugged waterproof storage into an all-in-one lightweight solution. Built for the toughest conditions passing Military Standard 810G drop testing and IP67 waterproof certification, RokPak gives you the freedom to go anywhere in the world with power. Dual smart USB charging ports with 2.4A output (each) allow for fast charging of ANY USB device including smartphones, tablets, cameras, GPS, etc. with the 12,000-mAh lithium ion battery.

  • Rugged Solar Panel
  • 12,000-mAh Lithium Ion Battery 
  • Rugged Waterproof Storage - IP67 Rating
  • LCD
  • Dual 2.4A Smart USB Ports
  • Water Activated LED SOS Beacon
  • Military Standard 810G Drop Tested
  • 4 Function LED Flashlight
  • Interior LED light
  • Works in Extreme Heat 80°C (176°F)
  • Works in Extreme Cold -20°C (-4°F)
  • Lightweight
  • Floats

There are dry boxes, solar panels, flashlights and battery chargers, but you want to bring as little as possible when outdoors. RokPak has combined all the things you need into one rugged solution allowing you to save space and travel lighter.

Fishermen / Hunters / Hikers / Campers / Boaters / Sailors / Kayakers / Climbers / Bikers / Spelunkers / Skiers / Snowboarders / Bird Watchers / Surfers / Beach Goers / Horseback Riders / Rafters / Canoers / Golfers /  Adventurers / Explorers / Travelers / Stand Up Paddle Boarders

Water Activated LED SOS Beacon. The water activation feature can be disabled by switching it OFF inside. We know this is important if you're hunting around water and your flashlight starts blinking, scaring away the wildlife you spend hours or even days trying to find.


Charge 2 Devices Simultaneously. Charges smartphones, tablets, cameras, camera batteries, GoPro's, GPS, and any other USB device. Even charge 2 tablets at the same time. 

 

Military Standard 810G Drop Proof Design and IP67 Waterproof


Rugged on the outside, but soft on the inside. Silicone interior protects your things from drops. Our design includes a removable net so you can organize everything and keep it in place. Plenty of room for storage and charging 2 devices at the same time.

We started with the 4 products that every outdoor enthusiast needs: Waterproof storage, solar power, battery power and a flashlight. Then we analyzed all the products on the market. We saw so many options for each individual item, but nothing that created an all-in-one solution. This was a major problem that we wanted to solve. Getting outdoors is about enjoying activities, family, friends and of course nature, so we wanted our solution to be something convenient that would enhance the experience for all outdoor enthusiasts. 

Our vision was simple: A world where our need to be connected to a power source does not limit our passion to explore and enjoy the outdoors. So we created our company RokPak with one goal: to create innovative technology products for outdoor enthusiasts around the world.

BATTERY SYSTEM - Not all batteries are created equal.We only use the highest quality batteries that are custom made for RokPak. They include a PCM (protection circuit module) built into the battery pack. This will prevent a Li-Ion battery pack from overcharging or over-discharging. Not many battery packs on the market integrate a separate PCM on the battery, but we do. It's important to us that we provide the highest quality and safest battery products on the market for our customers.


The RokPak Pioneer series is available in three colors, camouflage, safety orange, and marine blue. The colors represent a perfect combination to cover all outdoor people.

RokPak was formed by a passionate father son team with a combined 30 years experience in manufacturing and product design. From concept to final product we have taken our time to make sure we developed the perfect product. Along the way our team has grown including many outdoor enthusiasts who have tested the RokPak Pioneer Series to the extreme. From backcountry skiing in the middle of nowhere Canada to jumping off 30ft. cliffs while Canyoning, the RokPak held up to these extreme conditions. It was also put to the test fishing, hunting, kayaking, sailing, mountain biking, and many other activities.


Our logo represents the RokPak family. Each peak stands for one of the 5 family members who started the company. 

                                           







Thank you for reading all the way to the end. We hope that you’re just as excited about the RokPak as we are, and that you’ll join us in making the RokPak possible. We’re so pumped about how much love and support we have received from all of you and are honored to share it with the Indiegogo community.

It's important to us that we provide the highest quality and safest battery products on the market for our customers.

RokPak was formed by a passionate father son team with a combined 30 years experience in manufacturing and product design. From concept to final product we have taken our time to make sure we developed the perfect product. Along the way our team has grown including many outdoor enthusiasts who have tested the RokPak Pioneer Series to the extreme. From backcountry skiing in the middle of nowhere Canada to jumping off 30ft. cliffs while Canyoning, the RokPak held up to these extreme conditions. It was also put to the test fishing, hunting, kayaking, sailing, mountain biking, and many other activities.





Our logo represents the RokPak family. Each peak stands for one of the 5 family members who started the company. 


Our product will be delivered in September 2016. 














                                           
































Thank you for reading all the way to the end. We hope that you’re just as excited about the RokPak as we are, and that you’ll join us in making the RokPak possible. We’re so pumped about how much love and support we have received from all of you and are honored to share it with the Indiegogo community.

story:
The BEST Phone Case EVER!  iPhone & ANDROID Cases Available!

FINALLY a slightly bigger MUCH BETTER phone case...for your life!

Life-Case has enough space to store the essentials YOU NEED to get through the day.  Whether it's a house key, car key, $100, ID, debit cards, credit cards, business cards or even condoms, Life-Case is the only phone case you'll need.

Order your case now or reserve a case from our next production run.

$40 gets you an all black case from our 1st limited production run NOW.  

Life-Case = Phone + Keys + ID + Credit Cards + Debit Cards + Cash + Biz Cards & MORE (or less)

$5 reserves your case from our next production run in approximately 45 days.

What Makes THIS Phone Case so Cool?

This isn’t rocket science but it’s certainly revolutionary.  Other wallet cases are too small.  With Life-Case, you can finally carry everything you need in one case – your phone, keys, money, ID, debit card, credit cards, business cards, and more.

With a silicone core, each snap on polycarbonate case features a folding compartment to hold everyday essentials. No need for pockets or additional accessories.  Now you can literally have your life – your world – in one place.

Committed to building a kick-ass product to meet real people’s needs, Life-Case is self-funding.  Instead of securing outside funding to create slick marketing materials and videos, we’re focusing on creating the best phone case EVER.

We truly believe in the power of the crowd so we hope you’ll help and spread the word.  Please??!!!

Why Life-Case?

If you're like most people, your phone is your lifeline - frankly it may be your life.  Isn't it frustrating when you get a case and think it'll store everything you need to get through the day, only to realize the stupid wallet case you bought only holds your ID, a credit card and $20?  You still end up stuffing things into your pockets or bringing along a bag.  And it sucks!  It's frustrating and stupid because the solution is so obvious.

Life-Case allows you to safely protect your phone along with everything else you actually need to get through the day.  Far from bulky, you can now easily store the essentials you need to get through life in one safe place - and still have your phone at your fingertips.  No digging through your bag or pocket.  

With Life-Case, your phone is still the focal point so you're always in touch.  Quickly answer calls, send texts or take pictures because your essentials are stored in a discreet flip top compartment on the back.

For $40, you can order your case NOW from our first limited production run.

$5 reserves your case from our next production run and keeps you in the loop as we roll out a slightly larger design this summer.

People come in different shapes and sizes and we believe phone cases should too.  Maybe you'd like your case to protect your phone, hold a few essentials AND your cigarettes.  Or maybe you're a woman who'd like to discreetly store some personal items.  Either way, you're you and our goal is to create a phone case for your life.

Nothing too big.  Something just right.  Life-Case is your phone case for real life!

Spread the Word.  Get Prizes!

We're monitoring how and who spreads the word because we want to be able to thank you personally.  Whether or not you contribute now, be sure you use IndieGoGo's sharing features for free prizes and cool rewards.  Thanks!

This isn’t rocket science but it’s certainly revolutionary.  Other wallet cases are too small.  With Life-Case, you can finally carry everything you need in one case – your phone, keys, money, ID, debit card, credit cards, business cards, and more.
With a silicone core, each snap on polycarbonate case features a folding compartment to hold everyday essentials. No need for pockets or additional accessories.  Now you can literally have your life – your world – in one place.
Committed to building a kick-ass product to meet real people’s needs, Life-Case is self-funding.  Instead of securing outside funding to create slick marketing materials and videos, we’re focusing on creating the best phone case EVER.
We truly believe in the power of the crowd so we hope you’ll help and spread the word.  Please??!!!


Why Life-Case?
If you're like most people, your phone is your lifeline - frankly it may be your life.  Isn't it frustrating when you get a case and think it'll store everything you need to get through the day, only to realize the stupid wallet case you bought only holds your ID, a credit card and $20?  You still end up stuffing things into your pockets or bringing along a bag.  And it sucks!  It's frustrating and stupid because the solution is so obvious.
Life-Case allows you to safely protect your phone along with everything else you actually need to get through the day.  Far from bulky, you can now easily store the essentials you need to get through life in one safe place - and still have your phone at your fingertips.  No digging through your bag or pocket.  
With Life-Case, your phone is still the focal point so you're always in touch.  Quickly answer calls, send texts or take pictures because your essentials are stored in a discreet flip top compartment on the back.
For $40, you can order your case NOW from our first limited production run.
$5 reserves your case from our next production run and keeps you in the loop as we roll out a slightly larger design this summer.
People come in different shapes and sizes and we believe phone cases should too.  Maybe you'd like your case to protect your phone, hold a few essentials AND your cigarettes.  Or maybe you're a woman who'd like to discreetly store some personal items.  Either way, you're you and our goal is to create a phone case for your life.
Nothing too big.  Something just right.  Life-Case is your phone case for real life!


Spread the Word.  Get Prizes!

We're monitoring how and who spreads the word because we want to be able to thank you personally.  Whether or not you contribute now, be sure you use IndieGoGo's sharing features for free prizes and cool rewards.  Thanks!

story:
The ONEPOCKET inventors are pioneers in creating the first ever magic wallet to fit large number of cards which, also works as a case and stand, specially designed for iPhones 5S & 5.

Over the past 16 months, every day our team just thought about "how to make ONEPOCKET project possible". In January 2014 we sold a car to finance the construction of the injection mold. Now only US$ 3000 is missing, which will be used to cover the costs of packaging, production and assembly for the ONEPOCKET project become reality.

If you like our idea and wish to put your hands on a genuine ONEPOCKET, please help us to spread the word by sharing this webpage within your social network. The higher the number of people interested in, the higher will be the chances of this product becoming a reality.

Our pages and social networks:

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Google+
  • Instagram
  • Youtube
  • Vimeo

The ONEPOCKET idea is to keep your iPhone protected and, by allowing you to keep the contents of your wallet together with it. The ONEPOCKET will also help to minimize the chances of leaving important belongings behind as everything you need will be in one place and will also fit in one single pocket!


.::. Easy-Slyde .::.

The way the ONEPOCKET has been designed it was done in such a manner that the iPhone sits behind the magic wallet and that was one of the challenging parts of our project since there was no space to make a hole for the back camera lenses. Initially we thought about making a hole for the lenses within the magic wallet compartments as others do, however with the cards inside the space would have been covered either way. Therefore we needed to find another solution and, after several days brainstorming, we came up with the “easy-slide” idea. To use your camera in this case, you can simply slide you iPhone through the slick and purpose built design and, there it is, the lenses are free and you can take your picture with no troubles. The system works perfectly.

On the top of the ONEPOCKET there is a locking system which will allow it to hold your iPhone on a safe and secure manner though, to avoid it sliding out accidently. However, at the same time, it will also allow you to slide it out whenever necessary too.

.::. Extra Features .::.

The ONEPOCKET also features two hooks allowing you to attach your keys, pen drives, arm straps or whatever else you need. 

The ONEPOCKET also counts with two lateral openings for easy access to the volume and silent key controls and also one on top for the power button. In addition to it you will be able to use earphones with it and charge your iPhone without the need to take it out.

The ONEPOCKET will even work as a stand for your iPhone allowing you to watch your favorite movies or place those so anticipated Facetime and Skype video calls.

.::. Colors .::.

The ONEPOCKET will be available in two colours: black piano and snow white.

Differently from our prototypes, which have a matt finish, the final ONEPOCKET piece will be polished and clean.

.::. Why should you choose the ONEPOCKET? .::.

We must say that the ONEPOCKET is not the only kind of iPhone case to try on the wallet idea. However, the so called “iWallets” out there are very limited and can hold at their best two or three cards and maybe a couple of notes. Therefore our product is unique and unprecedented in the sense that it is a more versatile, complete and well thought idea and more improved version of any case or iWallet that are now or have been available in the markets across the world.

Marrying the ONEPOCKET idea with the magic wallet concept using of elastics to hold it together you can carry around up to ten or more cards and notes without any prejudice to its function of case or stand either.

ONEPOCKET is up to 37% thinner than average leather wallets and the iPhone together.  

.::. Material .::.

Being against animal cruelty, we have chosen not to use leather and have made the ONEPOCKET with ABS plastic, which has allowed us to create a very detailed, smart and clever design. The ABS also provided us with the resistance and flexibility we needed to protect you iPhone from inevitable falls.

.::. Prototypes .::.

During the period of creation and tests, we made several ONEPOCKET prototypes.

We started with an initial version made from cupboard and adhesive tape. We followed it with a soft material and after a few days of tests we saw that, despite of the proven functionality of the idea, we really would need a premium material and for that reason we agreed on using plastic.

From then onwards we started its design by using a 3D software and from the first to the final 3D print the initial product has found its way and the perfect design to meet our needs. There have been many, many tests for that!

.::. Background .::.

In the beginning of 2013, the three friends Danilo Lombardi, Rodrigo Vinciprova e Emmanuel Rodrigues came up with an idea, why not to combine the popular "Magic Wallet" with an iPhone case? 

And the ONEPOCKET project was born! After months of hard working, what was a simple concept became reality through a 100% functional prototype printed on a high resolution 3D printer. 

Six months ago we tried to fund ONEPOCKET on Kickstarter (another crowd funding site), but we have no success, so we stopped, rethink our campaign, though about all we did wrong and here we are, trying again, much more experienced and lots of steps ahead compared to where we were six months ago.

Through Kickstarter campaign, Caio Masi knew the product and was passionate about the idea and the ONEPOCKET concept. Caio became a partner and knowing the high cost involved to build the injection mold, Caio sold his car and used the money to finance the machining of the mold.

Now ONEPOCKET team has four members who, for the last 16 months, have spent a lot of time brainstorming about the product, have made several drafts, prototypes, tests and finally have agreed on a final product at a price that is definitely worth your money.

Today the machining of the mold is already in progress and the delivery of the first ONEPOCKET's batch will happen on July 10th. 

We are very happy to get it this far with our idea and we count on your help supporting us in this last stage of our project. 

Thank you folks for your support!

ONEPOCKET: more than a case, more than a wallet.

Caio became a partner and knowing the high cost involved to build the injection mold, Caio sold his car and used the money to finance the machining of the mold.Now ONEPOCKET team has four members who, for the last 16 months, have spent a lot of time brainstorming about the product, have made several drafts, prototypes, tests and finally have agreed on a final product at a price that is definitely worth your money.Today the machining of the mold is already in progress and the delivery of the first ONEPOCKET's batch will happen on July 10th. We are very happy to get it this far with our idea and we count on your help supporting us in this last stage of our project. Thank you folks for your support!ONEPOCKET: more than a case, more than a wallet.

story:
Paw-PC 
Paw PC is about building a computing platform that changes the way people use their software, desktops, data and more. The goal is to make computers that are "man’s best friend" and always there for you, just like your dog. Paw-PC moves your entire desktop to the cloud, and allows you to access it wherever you have an internet connection, and on most devices - Finally, you can have what you need when you need it. That capability has some wonderful benefits right away. For example: You can start writing a memo on your home computer, revise it on your phone or tablet at your favorite coffee shop, and then send it from your office computer. This allows your busy schedule and technology to meet. You can save money on software and stop wasting time e-mailing things to yourself or checking to make sure your storage syncs. Paw PC is more than just storage and software.  Almost any computer that can access the internet can be used to run Paw PC and that means that the computer you have now could be the last one you ever need. As you move your processing capability, memory, and hard drive space into the cloud the computing power of the device in front you matters less. Plus, Paw PC comes with excellent customer support to keep it running smoothly. Your Paw PC will get better and better as it supports more and different types of programs and media, as well as the ability to easily share things with others - like documents, music, and movies.  Paw PC means less waste, less software and hardware purchases, and less frustration from inaccessible data and software.

Turning your desktop into a Paw PC means that you’ll feel at home in front of almost any computing device such as a desktop, mobile device, public computer, or work location. It means you won’t need to buy multiple versions of software just so you can access them on your home desktop, a personal laptop, or a work location.

What We Need & What You Get 
What we need is more hardware to be able to provide service for more users. We're going to use these contributions to build the remaining infrastructure needed.  In exchange, you'll be one of the first people to gain access to Paw PC as well as providing the valuable testing and feedback we need in order to build an amazing service. Check out the rewards on the side of the page here and we'd be surprised if you didn't find something that was valuable to you right away. In the end, just about everyone who donates about $10 or more will have access to their personal computer in the cloud with all the great features we've outlined, but even if you can only contribute a small amount we'll let you know when we launch so you’ll have priority access!  

We know that it can be a little worrisome to contribute to something that may not reach its funding goal so here are two things that should ease your concern. 1) We set our goal low because a lot of our requirements are based on how many people we're supporting. We really want to start providing this fantastic resource to more people. However, 2) even if we don't meet our goal we have the resources to start providing services to a handful of users and leverage any contributions to be able to support more. What it really comes down to is if you support us we've made sure we can support you.   

The Impact 
Your data will be backed up and secure, your computer can run faster and you can get to your desktop anywhere.  All these benefits can impact your life in a big way, depending upon how you use them.  For example, as a student you won’t have to worry about losing that precious term paper and you won’t need to e-mail it to yourself to keep it safe. For the mobile worker, it can be wonderful to have all the tools from your desktop right there on your mobile device. Once you start using a computer that is always there we think you will find more benefits every day. Our goal with Paw PC is to create the tools we need to move more of our computing into the cloud. It will be a long term project and we are working constantly to add more features. In the long run it is possible it can be instrumental in driving down the cost of computers as we know them and at the same time increase our expectations of what computers can do for us. We expect to see the day when computing is made cheap enough that anyone who wants one can have a computer to call their own. 

Other Ways You Can Help
Certainly for those with great dogs a computer will never truly be someone's best friend, but if you’re like many people you may feel like you're always struggling to get your computer to do what you want.  We think it's time to change that. If you want to be a part of making that change possible then any contribution is appreciated, from telling a friend to helping fund your cloud computer.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
