story:
Verti Bluetooth Smart Tags

Phones, keys, purses, pets, luggage, you name it - Never lose another thing!

Powerful cloud based mobile app with a lot of cool features!

Six stylish colors to choose from


               ~ Our Journey ~

        From Concept to Reality

Three years ago I lost my keys on the beach. What started off as a relaxing Sunday afternoon, soon turned into a frustrating scavenger hunt. I was one of the lucky few to find my treasured keys in the sand, but not before getting sunburned, dehydrated, and frustrated beyond comprehension.  I thought, “There has to be a better way to keep up with keys.” With my deep background in Network Engineering, I put my skills into action to solve an age-old problem by creating a simple and affordable device to locate lost valuable items.  Now fast forward to today -  the Verti Smart Tag is here!

Ideation. The 1st concept drawing of Verti on an envelope.

By far, the most stylish Bluetooth item finder in its class

Prototyping, Hardware Design & Engineering. 

We've come a long way! From an idea to a workable product.

I was excited at the thought of building something that would help solve an age old problem that we all can relate to, “Losing our things.” From a concept scribbled on a piece of envelope to a workable real world product,  we've come a long way!  But we're just getting started and we need your help to bring Verti Smart Tags to the masses...........
Keeping track of what's important to you! 







Proud to announce that Verti is Made in America!

story:
The Hologram Screen

We are developing and producing interactive, holographic, screen protectors for your mobile devices, from cellphones to iPads, using a technique that records amazing three dimensional scenes onto a plastic layer. Our holographic screen protectors are projected in the same space as a video animation to create compelling visual displays that merge the arts and this new technology. Details at holoart.ca

Who We Are: PHASE Lab

Prof. Michael Page, OCAD University, Visiting Professor at the Institute for Optical Sciences, (University of Toronto), heads up a team of academics, professionals, and graduate & undergraduate students, that make up the PHASE Lab (Prototype Holographics for Art & Science Exploration).The PHASE Lab is currently conducting research in the field of digital holography by merging interactive apps they program with the holograms they print on a photo-polymer flexible plastic. Please donate to help us develop these stunning new products for mobile devices with Michael Page's team of students. 

What We Need & What You Get

Funds go to hiring undergraduate and graduate students who conduct the work under the direction of educators and industry professionals. Funds also go towards the maintenance of the facilities (including lasers and holographic recording materials). 

In exchange for you support we have some funders incentives where you can receive a working prototype hologram for the screen of your mobile device. Details at holoart.ca


The Impact 

At the Phase Lab our current vision is to continue developing and producing new applications for holography. To our knowledge we are the only researchers working in this area. We want to advance the field of holography and make accessible these visually compelling and interactive holographic layers for your device, as well as get other artist and designers involved in this experimental, creative, and technologically challenging field. 

Other Ways You Can Help 

We are looking for creative thinkers to contribute their own ideas on how to deploy this exciting new technology.

You can also help us by spreading the word. Please for ward this to those interested in furthering this exciting new technology. Details at holoart.ca

We want to advance the field of holography and make accessible these visually compelling and interactive holographic layers for your device, as well as get other artist and designers involved in this experimental, creative, and technologically challenging field. Other Ways You Can Help We are looking for creative thinkers to contribute their own ideas on how to deploy this exciting new technology.You can also help us by spreading the word. Please for ward this to those interested in furthering this exciting new technology. Details at holoart.ca

story:
Everyone’s got something they want to fix about the world, for me it was noisy keys. After months of prototyping different key holders - I had an epiphany! Why not use magnets?

Introducing MAGKEY: the most effective, minimal, lightweight, and functional smart key holder out there. Just peel, stick and snap. Voilà - no more noisy keys!

We designed MAGKEY to be the SIMPLEST and SMARTEST key holder out there. All you have to do is stick the magnets on to your keys and that's it. The magnets attract each other so that no matter what configuration your keys are in, they always pull back together. 

Stick magnets on both sides of every key except for the two outer keys. For these two keys only add magnets to the inside face. Your setup should look like this:

MAGKEY is a little company based in San Francisco with the goal of eliminating key-jingles forever. We do so with the integrity and philosophy of always doing our best to deliver quickly, with an honest appreciation for our customers. We have a small team, but we give you big thanks for giving us the chance to create products for you.

This is where you come in.  We need your help to make this project happen! If you guys and gals bring us to our pledge goal, we promise to change the way you handle your keys.

story:
What is GaragePen?

GaragePen is a multi-tool wrapped in the shape of a pen.   It has 7 functions: pen, bottle opener, phone stand, flat / Phillips screw driver, touch stylus and ruler.  We designed the GaragePen to be a light-duty complement to your existing  tools in your garage.  We especially wanted our GaragePen to accommodate the use of smartphone in the garage.  Gear (nerd) heads rejoice!  GaragePen is here.



1. Bottle Opener - Because it's a necessity.


2. Phone Stand - Because you need to watch your TopGear episodes... Wait...


3. Touch Stylus - Because who wants grease on the screen?


4. Philips Screwdriver - Because it never hurts to have another one.


5. Flat-head Screwdriver - Because of the other half of the screws with flat-head.


6. Ruler - Because you can measure the lengths of various...


7. Pen - Because you mark things with it.





Specifications

  • Aluminum + copper body
  • Size : 142mm x 10mm (5.5in x 0.875in)
  • Weight : 0.03kg (0.06lbs)
  • Twist ball-point pen
  • 2.5mm Phillips screwdriver / 2mm flat-head screwdriver
  • Ruler measurement in mm / inch
  • Phone stand fits smartphones of thickness up to 12mm - depicted is iPhone 6 Plus with a thick case.
  • Standard D1 size (0.7mm) ball-point pen ink



Rewards


  • We thank you for any contributions!
  • Make sure to let us know if you have any questions (info@hybridprojectny.com).
  • Did we say thank you?



Project Timeline


We have taken all necessary steps in order to get the GaragePen out to the market.  We need your support to kick off the mass production.



Founders

With a solid background in design with bachelor’s degree in Digital Arts from University of Oregon, Peter has acquired diverse entrepreneurial skillsets over 6 years in the consumer electronics field, from print, package design, web application, mobile application development to sales, marketing, distribution and retail.

Situated in Italy, Giuseppe has over 10 years of experience in the consumer electronics field. His extensive production expertise extends to a large network of industry-leading factories located globally. One of Giuseppe’s strongest skillsets is his ability to predict the trend, plan and develop a product that stays ahead of the market.

story:
After more than a year of hard work, we are finally ready to introduce our project! Meet the CarMinder, small device that can help cares about the safety of children. CarMinder is an hands free Bluetooth speaker and alert system that designed to provide notification to check the car before you leave, that no kid or valuable has been left inside the vehicle. The system is designed to be easily installed in any vehicle, The device is installable in a cigarette lighter socket . The device also has charging ports for additional USB items, such as cellular phones.                                          

                

The user may sync their alert system via Bluetooth technology to their smartphone and use the free app provided to receive an additional alert from the smartphone. 

                   
      
The system has a wide selection of languages to choose from. When the user leaves the car or steps outside a certain radius of the vehicle and the car is turned off, a speaker will provide a vocal alarm. This alarm is designed to alert the user to check the inside of the vehicle to see if a child has been left behind. the alert volume is fixed and loud where the notification can be heard. When the car is turned off, the audio notification is sounded, but in addition, a reminder is sent to the smartphone if the user has downloaded the free application.


 This allows the user to receive notifications in several ways to ensure that a child is not left behind. If the user does not confirm that they have received the reminder, SMS message will be sent to a pre-programmed contact person  with GPS coordinates of the device (if Gps activated). There is no need to remember to charge the device since it operates while plugged into the lighter. When car turn off, the reminder alert sounds. 

Support 8 Languages: English,France,Italian,Russian,Germany,Hebrew,Arabic,Spanish.


USB to Cigarette Lighter adapter.

The CarMinder is FCC/CE Approved. 
    


Article


            


Who we are 

We're a team , who believe our kid safety is above all.

   David Israel - CEO Management.

   Refael Israel - CTO Hardware.

   Ron Erez - Designer

  Valentina Rizkov - Marketing.

story:
About
 

NuDock by Baseus is a smartphone docking station that charging your phone while simultaneously giving you everything you need for entertainment and work in one place, just as convenient as your laptop.

 

NuDock seamlessly transforms your smartphone into an entertainment and work center.The list of things you can connect to your smartphone is almost endless:

  • Flash drive
  • Hard drive
  • Projector
  • TV screen
  • Monitor
  • Mouse
  • Keyboard
  • Game controller
  • SD and MicroSD card

All of these connect to your smartphone through NuDock, while keeping your phone charged.

 

 

A powerful portable dock provides all the necessary ports you need in daily life: 3 x USB 3.0, 4K@30Hz HDMI, SD & MicroSD card slots, 3.5mm AUX and PD supported USB-C enabling a dynamic power transfer of 5V/9V/14.5V/20V@3A max with a maximum power delivery of 49W. 

Here is an youtube review video!

 
 

NuDock lets you push to slide the top lid of the box open and close with one hand in order to reveal the USB-C connector. Simply push to slide the top lid of the box open and close with one hand to reveal the USB-C connector. Then plug in your smartphone and the top lid acts as a phone stand which secures your phone at a perfect viewing angle. Connect anything else you need and see how easy it is to utilize all the functions of your phone. Keep its USB-C input connected to the adapter to provide power for all of your other ports as well as your smartphone. 

NuDock allows you to navigate your smartphone like you’re on a laptop, increasing your work efficiency. Editing files, emails, pictures can be annoying and inconvenient on the small screen of your smartphone, but with NuDock you can turn your smartphone into a mini-desktop computer. Connect a mouse, keyboard and a flash drive to USB 3.0 ports on the product, and you can edit documents and transfer files from a flash drive.

Easily give presentations or share slide shows stored on your smartphone with others on a projector or monitor. No need to bring your laptop! NuDock gives you the edge over others when on a business trip because now you can show a presentation in a conference room from your phone instead of lugging around your laptop.

Simply plug your phone into NuDock to seamlessly stream 4K 30Hz HDMI video to your UHD TV or music to an A/V receiver. You can control your phone from the comfort of your couch and NuDock charges your phone while in use so you don’t have to worry about draining the power of your smartphone while enjoying the big screen. It’s the perfect way to turn your home into a home theatre and enjoy ultra-high definition video and audio at home with your family!

Note: The final output resolution and image quality is limited by the capability of your smartphone, monitor/screen and HDMI cable. Please ensure your devices and cables support 4K resolution. 

Play mobile game like you’re on a PC! With NuDock you can connect to a bigger screen, use a mouse, type on a keyboard or even use a game controller to play Android games more easily. It enables better vision, easier targeting and more flexible control. And it keeps your phone charged the entire time as well!

The SD and MicroSD card readers in NuDock support cards up to 2 TB and speeds up to 104 MB/s. Simply plug in SD and microSD cards to copy, move and delete the files. With NuDock you can transfer tons of images in just a few minutes.

Three USB 3.0 ports allow ultra-high transfer speed at 5Gbps (640MBps)—over 10X faster than the traditional USB 2.0 ports. Transfer large files between your phone and flash drive in just seconds. For example, you can transfer a 1GB movie in just 3 seconds!

NuDock works best with a variety of USB-C PD (Power Delivery) wall chargers rated from 5V/9V/14.5V/20V@3A max. This gives you 49W of maximum power to power all of the ports and still charge your phone fast!

Note: A PD wall charger is not included. Please use your original mobile charger with NuDock to get the best charging performance.

NuDock is seamlessly compatible with lots of smartphones across different platforms. Ditch your laptop and turn your smartphone into a desktop. 

NuDock is compatible with:

Samsung S8/S8+/S9/S9+/Note 8/Note 9 

  • Huawei Mate 10 /Mate 10 Pro /P20 /P20 Pro， 
  • LG G5/G7 
  • Lumia 950 
  • SONY Xperia XZ2 Pro 
  • Google pixel2 
  • Pixel 3XL
  • Other Type-C smartphone models.

Compatible systems:

  • Windows 10（Phone）
  • Android 8.0.0 and higher
  • Phoenix OS

 

PROTOTYPE TEST VIDEO

 

TIMELINE

ABOUT US

NuDock, powered by Baseus

Baseus is a technology company composed of a group of skilled and energetic talents who are experts in breaking limitations, excavating ideas from daily life, and bringing the most convenience to everyone. The Baseus team aims to solve those neglected details and helps more and more people achieve the best user experience. Apart from focusing on highly precise technology, the team also pay great attention to stylish design and products with extremely exquisite craftsmanship. We do small things, but we do them perfectly. Make your life easier with the Baseus team.  

A Big Thanks To:

Featured on BackerPlanet - IDEAL PLANET FOR CROWDFUNDING ENTHUSIASTS.

story:
Private Enjoyment Comes from Comprehensive Control Health Protector in Smart Home: Intelligent Voice Controlled Bidet Toilet


Major Objectives for Product Innovation :

Let Meitangua become the most friendly and intelligent partner in lavatory, providing all users unprecedented toilet experience. It is not only human-based, but also intelligent, and furthermore, is of enjoyment.


What is an intelligent voice controlled bidet toilet?

Old people and children, who stay at home longer, are those who use home toilets most frequently. Even though bidet toilets are capable of forward cleaning, rearward cleaning, drying, instant heating, and so forth, real core users cannot benefit from bidet toilets, which are designed to result in convenience, in daily life because the fonts or icons marked on the toilets are too small or difficult to understand, such that there is raised obstacle in use. Moreover, with the concept of smart home, intelligent analyzes are provided by combining IoT (Internet of Things) and Big Data for many household items.

A bidet toilet has functions as conventional toilet and cleaner after defecation. It can control ejection of warm water to effect cleaning by forward flushing, rearward rinsing, and drying. It is the best choice which is convenient and takes care of females in menstrual cycle, females during pregnancy, people with constipation, people with hemorrhoid, old people, children, and disables etc. Furthermore, it is evident from clinical medicine that hemorrhoid may be reduced and defecation may get smoother if anus is rinsed with warm water for 3 to 5 minutes after defecation every day. Bidet toilet, which is designed of warm water rinsing, is resulted in response to requirement of modern human beings in daily life.


Features of Intelligent Voice Controlled Bidet Toilet :

A. Innovative voice control without texts

Users of bidet toilets may benefit from simpler operation. For old people and children who cannot recognize texts, Need creates an extreme solution by applying voice control to smart toilets. Voice control is criticized usually by statement recognition and linguistic difference. Need will develop an intelligent voice controlled bidet toilet capable of recording individual voice controlled statement and of being multilingual, such that "flush", "drain" and even "rain" may indicate the same function easily. In addition, it is world-ready by using multilingual voice recognition system.


B. Phone APP is Intelligent Controller

Modern people carry phones and may use them for control easily anywhere, so that older users may use them without obstacle by means of larger fonts and icons.

Settings for individual habits may be saved, such as seat warming time and water temperature preference, so that toilet becomes health protector for family due to ergonomic design.


C. Eco Saving & Intelligent Power Saving

By handling intelligent voice controlled bidet toilet, you may enjoy authentic intelligent energy saving by turning on the toilet only when you need without constant standby.


D. Ergonomic Design in Compliance with Human Feeling, Enjoyment

Need design team has studied, tested and made design integrally for different body forms of consumers by fitting sizes for both depth and height of toilets to realize the best design example of ergonomics.


Product Development Phase

  In the initial phase of product development, we desired to create a new experience of unique bathroom service. The most popular intelligent terminal devices nowadays were employed, and Bluetooth was used for data transmission and control protocol to achieve various expected control requirements. In field proof test phase, however, we discovered that the service would be terminated due to lack of intelligent devices in bathroom for the entire service design scheme. Therefore, the team speculated immediately how to use existing people, events and things in space as major control effectively. Then, we decided to focus on voice control service technology after review and evaluation by using developed items as minor auxiliary control tools.

After switching the major control item from intelligent device to voice control, the first development challenge we encountered immediately was professional talents of such item because no existing member in the team was proficient in that field. The technical threshold of that professional technique was pretty high, so that we had to invite others to assist us in developing the core item of this product. We got information about III (Institute for Information Industry), Taiwan due to reasons. IDEAS Connect Manufacturing Service Platform provided guidance and consulting in such professional field. With multiple communications and discussions, both parties reached initial agreement and signed MOU (Memorandum of Understanding) for cooperation in May, 2015 to cooperate for R&D of this product item.


After revising circuit design and firmware for many times, we entered PCB manufacturing phase. Power for the product came essentially from household electricity through plug, so that the power was regulated and rectified, and then output to the circuit board. Since factors such as relatively significant moisture in bathroom were under consideration, we have made multiple tests and experiments to identify that the product is capable of long term operation to provide service in bathroom. Waterproof material was also included to treat issues such as moisture effectively in order to provide guarantee for consumers more comprehensively.


Meitangua Products installation


FAQ

1. Is there any information for buyers to install the product conveniently in the installation instructions?

A : Yes! User manual and installation instructions will be attached in delivering the product, and video of installation instructions is also ready on internet (YouTube) with installation procedure in detail.

2. Is water temperature adjustable for cleaning portion provided by the smart bidet toilet?

A : Yes! There are three levels (mildly hot, warm, general) of water temperature for adjustment/control now.

3. Is seat temperature adjustable for seat cover of the smart bidet toilet?

A : Yes! Four levels (mildly hot, warm, general) may be adjusted/controlled for water temperature currently.

4. How does phone communicate with and control the product?

A : Currently, Bluetooth is used for communicating with and controlling the smart bidet toilet essentially.

5. How many toilets at most can be configured and controlled by one phone now?

A : Currently, at most 8 different toilets can be controlled via APP setting, respectively.

6. What is the maximum distance that the smart toilet can be controlled?

A : Currently, wireless control is available within 4 meters for APP side.

7. Is battery replacement necessary for keeping the smart toilet in normal operating mode?

A : No! Design and record of the toilet itself are retained in APP of personal phone, and essential toilet operation and other functions are powered through socket power.

8. Are module items attached to the toilet capable of waterproof?

A : Yes! Its designed pack has been tested in compliance with IP65 waterproof specification.

9. What system versions are supported by phone App services now?

A : Currently, Android APP and iOS APP are available to download for use free of charge.

10. Is there exception issue when phone App is controlled by many people simultaneously?

A : No! Only one-to-one pair is supported for Bluetooth control mechanism currently. Nevertheless, there is relative fool proof mechanism configured on toilet side, the connection would be disconnected automatically if there is no operation for a period of time (10 min.).

11. Are localized versions supported by App free for download?

A : Both English and Traditional Chinese interfaces are available for App now, and download is free of charge.

12. In addition to basic control, are there additional recording or analysis capabilities for App?

A : Connection to cloud service functions and platforms is not yet available now.

13. What is the accuracy of voice control now?

A : Current accuracy of voice recognition is up to 90%, but there is difference due to accent and tone in practical use.

14. What languages are supported for voice control now?

A : Available languages supporting voice control are English and Chinese now.

15. Would voice recognitions differ due to gender?

A : No! However, there is still somewhat impact if oral content is stated too ambiguously.

16. How many instructions supporting voice recognition now?

A : Currently, 15 instructions are available to control voice recognition. (There are total 27 instructions for remote controller.)

17. What countries are available for transportation/sales now?

A : Effective transportation is available all over the world now. However, country specific electricity criteria have to be remarked in placing order such that valid version of voltage module in compliance with the designated country may be provided smoothly.

18. What is the expected arrival date of the product?

A : It is expected that shipment is available on April, 2016.

cannot recognize texts, Need creates an extreme solution by applying voice
control to smart toilets. Voice control is criticized usually by statement
recognition and linguistic difference. Need will develop an intelligent voice
controlled bidet toilet capable of recording individual voice controlled
statement and of being multilingual, such that "flush",
"drain" and even "rain" may indicate the same function
easily. In addition, it is world-ready by using multilingual voice recognition
system.
B. Phone APP is Intelligent Controller
Modern people carry phones
and may use them for control easily anywhere, so that older users may use them
without obstacle by means of larger fonts and icons.
Settings for individual
habits may be saved, such as seat warming time and water temperature
preference, so that toilet becomes health protector for family due to ergonomic
design.C. Eco Saving & Intelligent Power Saving
By handling intelligent voice
controlled bidet toilet, you may enjoy authentic intelligent energy saving by
turning on the toilet only when you need without constant standby.D.
Ergonomic Design in Compliance with Human Feeling, Enjoyment
Need design team has studied, tested and made design integrally for
different body forms of consumers by fitting sizes for both depth and height of
toilets to realize the best design example of ergonomics.Product Development Phase
  In the initial phase of product
development, we desired to create a new experience of unique bathroom service.
The most popular intelligent terminal devices nowadays were employed, and
Bluetooth was used for data transmission and control protocol to achieve
various expected control requirements. In field proof test phase, however, we
discovered that the service would be terminated due to lack of intelligent
devices in bathroom for the entire service design scheme. Therefore, the team
speculated immediately how to use existing people, events and things in space
as major control effectively. Then, we decided to focus on voice control
service technology after review and evaluation by using developed items as
minor auxiliary control tools.After switching the major
control item from intelligent device to voice control, the first development
challenge we encountered immediately was professional talents of such item
because no existing member in the team was proficient in that field. The
technical threshold of that professional technique was pretty high, so that we
had to invite others to assist us in developing the core item of this product.
We got information about III (Institute for Information Industry), Taiwan due
to reasons. IDEAS Connect Manufacturing Service Platform provided guidance and
consulting in such professional field. With multiple communications and
discussions, both parties reached initial agreement and signed MOU (Memorandum
of Understanding) for cooperation in May, 2015 to cooperate for R&D of this
product item.After revising circuit design and firmware for many
times, we entered PCB manufacturing phase. Power for the product came
essentially from household electricity through plug, so that the power was
regulated and rectified, and then output to the circuit board. Since factors
such as relatively significant moisture in bathroom were under consideration, we
have made multiple tests and experiments to identify that the product is
capable of long term operation to provide service in bathroom. Waterproof
material was also included to treat issues such as moisture effectively in
order to provide guarantee for consumers more comprehensively.Meitangua Products installation
FAQ
1. Is there any information
for buyers to install the product conveniently in the installation
instructions?
A : Yes! User
manual and installation instructions will be attached in delivering the
product, and video of installation instructions is also ready on internet (YouTube)
with installation procedure in detail.
2. Is water temperature
adjustable for cleaning portion provided by the smart bidet toilet?
A : Yes! There are
three levels (mildly hot, warm, general) of water temperature for
adjustment/control now.
3. Is seat temperature
adjustable for seat cover of the smart bidet toilet?
A : Yes! Four
levels (mildly hot, warm, general) may be adjusted/controlled for water
temperature currently.
4. How does phone communicate
with and control the product?
A : Currently,
Bluetooth is used for communicating with and controlling the smart bidet toilet
essentially.
5. How many toilets at most
can be configured and controlled by one phone now?
A : Currently, at
most 8 different toilets can be controlled via APP setting, respectively.
6. What is the maximum
distance that the smart toilet can be controlled?
A : Currently,
wireless control is available within 4 meters for APP side.
7. Is battery replacement
necessary for keeping the smart toilet in normal operating mode?
A : No! Design and
record of the toilet itself are retained in APP of personal phone, and
essential toilet operation and other functions are powered through socket
power.
8. Are module items attached
to the toilet capable of waterproof?
A : Yes! Its
designed pack has been tested in compliance with IP65 waterproof specification.
9. What system versions are
supported by phone App services now?
A : Currently,
Android APP and iOS APP are available to download for use free of charge.
10. Is there exception issue
when phone App is controlled by many people simultaneously?
A : No! Only
one-to-one pair is supported for Bluetooth control mechanism currently. Nevertheless,
there is relative fool proof mechanism configured on toilet side, the
connection would be disconnected automatically if there is no operation for a
period of time (10 min.).
11. Are localized versions
supported by App free for download? 
A : Both English
and Traditional Chinese interfaces are available for App now, and download is
free of charge.
12. In addition to basic
control, are there additional recording or analysis capabilities for App?
A : Connection to
cloud service functions and platforms is not yet available now.
13. What is the accuracy of
voice control now?
A : Current
accuracy of voice recognition is up to 90%, but there is difference due to
accent and tone in practical use.
14. What languages are
supported for voice control now?
A : Available languages
supporting voice control are English and Chinese now.
15. Would voice recognitions
differ due to gender?
A : No! However,
there is still somewhat impact if oral content is stated too ambiguously.
16. How many instructions
supporting voice recognition now?
A : Currently, 15
instructions are available to control voice recognition. (There are total 27
instructions for remote controller.)
17. What countries are
available for transportation/sales now?
A : Effective
transportation is available all over the world now. However, country specific
electricity criteria have to be remarked in placing order such that valid
version of voltage module in compliance with the designated country may be
provided smoothly.
18. What is the expected
arrival date of the product? 
A : It is expected
that shipment is available on April, 2016.

story:
Take Back Your Phone Line

Moxivo uses your home's phone line wiring to give you multiroom sound you can control with a mobile device. After completing a successful Kickstarter Campaign, we've had a lot of people asking where they can buy Moxivo. That's why we're here on Indiegogo giving everyone a second chance to take back their phone line!

Please note that Moxivo cannot be used in conjunction with a land-line telephone, fax system, or phone-line internet like DSL.

Music in Every Room

Play music from a single audio source throughout your home. Listen to internet radio without moving the computer, or entertain a house full of guests with a single mp3 player.

Remote Control

Play music from a computer and control your music from anywhere using free mobile apps like "Retune" or "Remote".

Keep What You Have

Purchasing a wireless audio system is an expensive option, and the selection is narrow compared to wired speakers. With Moxivo, use the stereos and speakers you already have to create a multiroom audio system instead of buying a wireless set.

Choose Your Cables

Cables A, B, and C are for analog systems used by most DVD players, MP3 players, headphones, and stereos and can be used in any combination. Order one cable for each stereo you have and one for your audio source.

Cable D is for digital systems (i.e. Dolby Digital) over phone lines. Analog systems cannot be used in conjunction with digital systems.

Moxivo Around the World

Moxivo is designed for homes that use an RJ11 (or RJ12) type phone jack. Use the map below to give you an idea of what the standard is for your country.

Moxivo Guidelines

Here are a few guidelines that will help you know whether Moxivo is right for you.

  • Moxivo is for you if your home is wired for a land line and you're not already using it for anything (Phone, Fax, DSL, etc.).
  • Moxivo is for you if you want to play music on self powered speakers like computer speakers or stereo systems.  The speakers need to have their own volume control so that volume can be balanced independently in each room.
  • Moxivo is for you if your land line wiring has at least two connections (most have four). If you're using an analog audio system and you only have two connections, you'll only be getting the left or right speaker input.  Put both the audio source and receivers in "mono" mode in order to get sound out of both speakers, or switch to a digital audio system.

Using Moxivo

Disconnect Your Phone Service

Find the box where the main phone line comes to your house from the street or alley, disconnect you phone line from the utility, and say goodbye to the 90's.

Install Moxivo Cables

Connect an audio source to a phone jack using a Moxivo cable. Use more Moxivo cables to connect each stereo to other phone jacks.

Use Audio Source at Max Volume

Set your audio source to maximum volume. This minimizes the amount of amplification your receivers have to perform and reduces interference or “white noise” on the line. This step can be critical in some homes.

Enjoy!

Listen to as many stereos as you’d like throughout your home. If you’d like to control Moxivo via a mobile device, download an app like “Retune” for iTunes or “Remote” for Spotify.

Our Story

My family and I are here on Indiegogo because we love music.  We listen to music as we cook in the kitchen, as we eat in the dining room, as we work in the office and the garage, even in our bedrooms.  We use internet radio services like Pandora and Spotify to keep our music fresh.  We needed a way to use a single computer, laptop, or MP3 player to play music throughout the house.  This would allow us to listen to internet radio as we move throughout the house without the need for a computer in every room.

A few weeks later, Moxivo was born. Moxivo is a set audio cables that connect an audio source to stereo receivers using your existing phone land line.  It’s simple, effective, cheap, and easy to use.  Alternatives like built in speaker wiring and wireless transmission networks can cost thousands of dollars and can be complicated to use.

Please note that to use Moxivo, your home must be wired with a phone line that you are not using for a telephone, fax, internet, or anything else.  For the growing percentage of the population that uses cell phones instead of a land line, this won’t be problem.

story:
RepRap Graphic LCD Controller with Fan Output

This is an easy to use expansion board for the popular Sanguinololu, Melzi & RAMPS electronics.

It adds the most of the available addons for the Sanguinololu in oner board.

The Controller features

  • Clickwheel for Menu control
  • Hotend fan control (importatant for PLA printing)
  • Stand alone printing from micro-SD card
  • 128x64 dots graphic LCD display
  • Beeper

Plug and Play installation

Simply plug the adapter to the Sanguinololu expansion connector and connect the controller board with the included ribbon cable.

 Available LCD Colors

Easy user interface

Status screen with animated icons. These icons give a quick overview of the status of the printer. It shows an animated fan icon, when the hotend fan is operating. Heating of the hotends and the heatbed is indicated with small dots inside the icons. Printing progress and the actual extruder position on the bed is displayed via progress bar / coordinates. Communication with the user via a nice graphical user interface which allows to set most of the relevant parameters by turning and clicking the menu-wheel.

Impressions of the User Menu

 

 

 

 

 

 

Required firmware

To make use of the graphics LCD, Erik Zalm's Marlin and 128k flash are recommendet. This means that the Sanguinololu/Melzi should be equipped with an ATmega1284P device. Marlin can be downloaded from GitHub (https://github.com/ErikZalm/Marlin), all other functions are compatible with most of the other firmwares for the Sanguinololu/Melzi.

All pictures show the prototype design. The final design comes with a totally black PCB and micro SD-connector. With Melzi the onboard fan switch is disabled because Melzi has its own swich output for the fan.

 

FAQ:

 Q: What will i get in detail?

 A: All perks except the 1€ perk contain the LCD controller board, equipped with LCD display, fan output, click wheel encoder, beeper and µSD card connector, a ribbon cable with connectors and the adapter for the Sanguinololu expansion header. The perks differentiate by the LCD coulour and backlight.

 

Q: Is overseas shipping possible?

A: Yes, we ship worldwide. We ship with DHL (online package tracking). Shipping is included in your perk

 

Q: When will i get my RepRap Graphic LCD Controller?

A: As soon as the goal is reached, we'll start the production. This might happen earlier than the deadline. Lead time is approx. 3 weeks.


Q: What is the size of the board?

A: 100 x 65mm²

 

Q: Is the fan shown on the pictures incuded?

A: No.

 

Q: What is the reason for the different prices?

A: The LCD display itself cost for every colour the same, but the backlight prices differ with the colour.

 

Q: The board looks nice, but i have no Sanguinololu.

A: It might be worth looking at this campaign: RepRap easy electronics

story:
Invest in us, we are selling shares'. You can buy one starting from 20 euro at www.symbid.com!

Click here to pre-order a Stealth Nighthawk F-117A!

 

Vote for us for the Innovation Awards 2013

Click on the banner now!!

 

 

Stealth Nighthawk F-117A

Voor mensen die geen PayPal of Credit Card hebben, je kan vanaf nu op onze website via iDeal betalen:

http://www.anaar.nl/products-page/media-center/stealth-nighthawk-f-117a-pre-order/

Vertel het door!

 

Follow our blog to get the latest updates about this project:
http://blog.anaar.nl

Blog updates:

Design giftbox
http://www.anaar.nl/design-giftbox/

Apple airplay support
http://www.anaar.nl/airplay-support/

Where is the remote?
http://www.anaar.nl/where-is-the-remote/

Stealth Nighthawk F-117A TVDongle
http://www.anaar.nl/stealth-nighthawk-f-117a-tvdongle/

 

 

Why Stealth Nighthawk F-117A

Stealth Nighthawk F-117A is an easy to use multi media center device, small and fancy design twice as big as a regular USB stick.

Because our device does not have internal storage, you are free to use your own micro SD-Card, where you can expand this upto 32GB.

You can share your media files from your network to the device through WiFi-N. So you don't have to pull a networking cable through your room.

On Stealth Nighthawk F-117A you can attach your hard drive or other expansions through a powered USB HUB. The device is plug and play for your television and once it is inserted in the HDMI slot of your TV, it will be invisible just like a real Stealth Nighthawk F-117.

With the device it is possible to automatic create a index of all your media files that are availble througout your networks and devices.

What’s in the box

  • One Stealth Nighthawk F-117A
  • One microUSB cable
  • One HDMI extension cable
  • 1x 4GB SDHC MicroSD card with latest XBMC OS

 

 

Stretch Goals!

We are happy to offer some stretched goals that will benefit all our backers at $80 pledge level and higher. As we gain:

  1. $ 50.000 - Will get Stealth Nighthawk F-117A with one 8 GB SDHC MicroSD card class 10 with OS preinstalled 
  2. $ 100.000 - Will get Stealth Nighthawk F-117A with one 16 GB SDHC MicroSD card class 10  with OS preinstalled and will get a T-shirt with our company Logo
  3. $ 150.000 - Will get Stealth Nighthawk F-117A with one 32 GB SDHC MicroSD card class 10  with OS preinstalled and will get a T-shirt with our company Logo
  4. $ 250.000 - Will get Stealth Nighthawk F-117A with one 32 GB SDHC MicroSD card class 10 with OS preinstalled and will get a 2x T-shirt with our company Logo and a Big Poster with our company Logo

 

Perks explained

Update: Only three perks are available: $59, $69 and $80

Update: Later on you can buy extra accessories just like, USB soundcard and USB to ethernet adapter. 

 

 

Design

       dimension

  • Length: 95.9mm
  • width: 33.8mm
  • Height: 11mm

                

Design pictures:

 

 

Specs

  • SOC: Broadcom BCM2835
  • CPU: 700mhz
  • GPU: Broadcom Video Core IV, OpenGL ES 2.0, 1080p 30 h.264/MPEG-4 AVC high-profile decoder and encoder
  • Memory: 512MB
  • USB: one usb 2.0 port
  • Video: HDMI 1080P
  • Audio: HDMI
  • Storage: SDHC Micro SD Card above 2GB, upto 32GB higher than Class4
  • Network: WIFI 802.11n
  • Power: 5V 1A, microUSB

 

Function Features

  • Based on XBMC Lunix O.S.
  • Support SD card
  • Easy control through HDMI-CEC, 2.4G wireless Mouse, Computer/Android phone/iPhone/iPad(through WiFi).
  • Support DLNA and Airplay for wireless share.
  • Wirelessly stream favorite movies from PC to TV.
  • Wireless stream favorite TV shows from your PVR device.
  • Able to play online videos/music/pictures.
  • Low power consumption(<1W).

 

Risks and challenges

We have spent a lot of time thinking and developing our Stealth Nighthawk F-117A. We are confident about our Stealth Nighthawk F-117A, however we feel that there are a few challenges to overcome.

Our first challenge is the fulfillment process. Once we have reached our goal on Indiegogo we will search for a factory that will meet our standard for to start the production process. The injection molds are completed, so once we have found a factory and achieved our goal, we will start right away with the production process.

By the end of the Indiegogo Campaign

  • Search for a factory
  • Start with sample production

By July

  • First samples will be tested by friends and families and early adopters

By August

  • Start shipping the Stealth Nighthawk F-117A

Our challenge number two is customer confidence and satisfaction. We want to make sure that once our backers have the Stealth Nighthawk F-117A, they know how to use it to its full potential and are fully satisfied. We will complete our manual and provide this with the device and put FAQ's on our website and will make some demonstrating video's how you can get the best out of your device.

We want to make sure, that at the end everyone can enjoy the full entertainment from this small device!

 

Help us!

If somehow you are interested in our project but you can’t contribute, help us by making others aware about our project, share this project among your family and friends and use the share buttons to spread the word out on twitter, facebook and others.

We want to make sure, that at the end everyone can enjoy the full entertainment from this small device!

 

FAQ

Q: Are the MPEG-2 / VC-1 License included with the device?
A: Yes the licences are included with the device. 

Q: How can I remote the device?
A: You can download the software xbmc remote form the Google Play and App Store, you can also use the remote of your Television if your television supports CEC. See the following image:

Q: Is CEC supported?
A: Yes it is supported, you can use your own television remote control!

Q: I need an remote control because my television does not support CEC
A: You can order an optional remote control at release

Q: How do I know if my television supports CEC over HDMI?
A: See our blog at: http://www.anaar.nl/where-is-the-remote/

Q: Is 1080P supported?
A: Yes 1080P is supported.

Q: What software/firmware does the Stealth Nighthawk F-117A uses?
A: The firmware and software provided with the device can be used only with Stealth Nighthawk F-117A

Q: Is there an option to attach a networking card?
A: Yes, you can attach a USB networking card 

Q: Can I attach an harddrive to the device?
A: Yes it is possible, but only with an powered USB hub.

Q: Where can we find the software/firmware?
The software will be available from our website and from other sources, such as www.raspbmc.com and our website www.getf117a.com.

Q: How big is the internal memory?
A: 512MB

Q: How much are the shipping cost?
A: When Stealth Nighthawk F-117A is ready for shipping you will get an option to pay for the shipping. We ship through POSTNL and TNT.

The estimate shipping price is $20,- with Track & Trace.

Q: Can you ship to my country?
A: Yes we ship everywhere in the world.

Q: Is there a combine shipping if I order more then two?
A: Yes there is, upto 3 devices can be deliverd as combine shipping.

Q: Are there already addons pre-installed with XBMC OS?
A: No, we don't really know which addons people want to install with their device so XBMC OS will be delivered clean with no addons at all, however you can install them when you receive the Stealth Nighthawk F-117A

$ 100.000 - Will get Stealth Nighthawk F-117A with one 16 GB SDHC MicroSD card class 10  with OS preinstalled and will get a T-shirt with our company Logo

$ 250.000 - Will get Stealth Nighthawk F-117A with one 32 GB SDHC MicroSD card class 10 with OS preinstalled and will get a 2x T-shirt with our company Logo and a Big Poster with our company Logo

 
Perks explained
Update: Only three perks are available: $59, $69 and $80

Update: Later on you can buy extra accessories just like, USB soundcard and USB to ethernet adapter. 
 
 
Design
       dimension

Length: 95.9mm

width: 33.8mm
Height: 11mm

                
Design pictures:
 



 
Specs

SOC: Broadcom BCM2835
CPU: 700mhz
GPU: Broadcom Video Core IV, OpenGL ES 2.0, 1080p 30 h.264/MPEG-4 AVC high-profile decoder and encoder
Memory: 512MB
USB: one usb 2.0 port
Video: HDMI 1080P
Audio: HDMI
Storage: SDHC Micro SD Card above 2GB, upto 32GB higher than Class4
Network: WIFI 802.11n
Power: 5V 1A, microUSB

 
Function Features

Based on XBMC Lunix O.S.
Support SD card
Easy control through HDMI-CEC, 2.4G wireless Mouse, Computer/Android phone/iPhone/iPad(through WiFi).
Support DLNA and Airplay for wireless share.
Wirelessly stream favorite movies from PC to TV.
Wireless stream favorite TV shows from your PVR device.
Able to play online videos/music/pictures.
Low power consumption(<1W).

 
Risks and challenges
We have spent a lot of time thinking and developing our Stealth Nighthawk F-117A. We are confident about our Stealth Nighthawk F-117A, however we feel that there are a few challenges to overcome.
Our first challenge is the fulfillment process. Once we have reached our goal on Indiegogo we will search for a factory that will meet our standard for to start the production process. The injection molds are completed, so once we have found a factory and achieved our goal, we will start right away with the production process.
By the end of the Indiegogo Campaign

Search for a factory
Start with sample production

By July

First samples will be tested by friends and families and early adopters

By August

Start shipping the Stealth Nighthawk F-117A

Our challenge number two is customer confidence and satisfaction. We want to make sure that once our backers have the Stealth Nighthawk F-117A, they know how to use it to its full potential and are fully satisfied. We will complete our manual and provide this with the device and put FAQ's on our website and will make some demonstrating video's how you can get the best out of your device.
We want to make sure, that at the end everyone can enjoy the full entertainment from this small device!
 
Help us!
If somehow you are interested in our project but you can’t contribute, help us by making others aware about our project, share this project among your family and friends and use the share buttons to spread the word out on twitter, facebook and others.
We want to make sure, that at the end everyone can enjoy the full entertainment from this small device!
 
FAQ
Q: Are the MPEG-2 / VC-1 License included with the device?A: Yes the licences are included with the device. 
Q: How can I remote the device?A: You can download the software xbmc remote form the Google Play and App Store, you can also use the remote of your Television if your television supports CEC. See the following image:

Q: Is CEC supported?A: Yes it is supported, you can use your own television remote control!
Q: I need an remote control because my television does not support CECA: You can order an optional remote control at release
Q: How do I know if my television supports CEC over HDMI?A: See our blog at: http://www.anaar.nl/where-is-the-remote/
Q: Is 1080P supported?A: Yes 1080P is supported.
Q: What software/firmware does the Stealth Nighthawk F-117A uses?A: The firmware and software provided with the device can be used only with Stealth Nighthawk F-117A
Q: Is there an option to attach a networking card?A: Yes, you can attach a USB networking card 
Q: Can I attach an harddrive to the device?A: Yes it is possible, but only with an powered USB hub.
Q: Where can we find the software/firmware?The software will be available from our website and from other sources, such as www.raspbmc.com and our website www.getf117a.com.
Q: How big is the internal memory?A: 512MB
Q: How much are the shipping cost?A: When Stealth Nighthawk F-117A is ready for shipping you will get an option to pay for the shipping. We ship through POSTNL and TNT.
The estimate shipping price is $20,- with Track & Trace.
Q: Can you ship to my country?A: Yes we ship everywhere in the world.
Q: Is there a combine shipping if I order more then two?A: Yes there is, upto 3 devices can be deliverd as combine shipping.
Q: Are there already addons pre-installed with XBMC OS?A: No, we don't really know which addons people want to install with their device so XBMC OS will be delivered clean with no addons at all, however you can install them when you receive the Stealth Nighthawk F-117A

story:
Short Summary

G-LINK is a niche electronics company creating high end AV products for the four and five star hotels. 

We recently introduced Obsess, the world’s first Wireless HDMI Media Console for smartphones and tablets.  Obsess allows you to wirelessly play videos, movies, games, music and more on any HDTV right from your phone or tablet.

We are seeking to raise capital to bring Obsess to the consumer market.

More About G-Link

G-LINK is the AV hospitality division of Communications Integrators Inc (CII).  CII has been in business for 25 years.  Originally specializing in furniture power and communication, CII rapidly moved into the Hotel AV market with the volcanic rise of personal electronics. 

G-LINK’s original products were connectivity panels that allowed guests to connect their laptops, MP3 players, camcorders or portable game consoles to the in-room HDTV.  G-LINK shifted focus to tablets and smartphones to keep pace with travelers’ mobile lifestyles.

Our expertise lies in our ability to create a very simple and hassle free user experience.  At G-LINK we recognize the average hotel guest will probably spend less than a minute trying to make in-room technology work before giving up.  We focus on intuitive ways to make things happen.  This mindset has led to a number of guest room innovations.  We introduced the industry’s first auto sensing and auto switching HDMI media panel.  This enables guests to put their content on the screen simply by plugging their device into a G-LINK panel.  The G-LINK device detects the input and automatically turns on the TV and switches the TV to the correct input.  Your movies, your videos, your games are instantly presented in life sized clarity on the in-room HDTV. 

The Obsess HDMI Media Console is equally intuitive.  Simply plug in your device, choose your movie and press play.  Obsess does the rest.  The HDTV will turn on and play your movie in big, beautiful HD vibrancy. 

G-LINK’s easy to use mentality lends itself well to the consumer market.  The Obsess Wireless HDMI Media Console can be set up in less than five minutes.  It requires no networking knowledge or additional equipment.  Simply plug it into the wall, connect the receiver to the TV and you're ready to go.  It couldn’t get any easier.  


The Campaign

G-LINK is seeking funding to help adapt their Wireless HDMI Media Consoles to the consumer market.  The funds will be used to develop packaging and marketing material to push the G-LINK brand into consumer retail.

We hope to raise at least $250,000 in this campaign.  We will use the capital to create a consumer specific product and package (with consumer centric messaging, new receiver and updated inputs). We will also increase our sales, marketing and communications, and build stock for initial sales and sell in.

What It Means To Us

A successful campaign will help us move and market in a direction we never thought possible until now.  This funding will create new products and new positions for the consumer market.  We will require, Industrial Design, Graphic Design and Engineering here in the US.  We will expand our sales force and enter into an incredibly exciting, fast paced consumer retail market.

We believe that our hospitality niche is a giant benefit.  In essence, each guest room is a little showroom for our product.  Each guest who uses Obsess becomes a fan.  We know we have an exciting product.  Thousands of guests can’t be wrong.  We hope this product will become iconic.  We hope 20 years from now people will look back and say, “I remember when that product took off!” 

What It Means To You

We hope you can get as excited about this product as we are.  We hope you want to be part of a major change in entertainment.  

About the Perks

In addition to the Obsess, we are offering some of our other products for those who would like to contribute in any way possible.

Essentials Executive Desk Power Hub: Provides 2 AC outlets and 2 USB charging ports in an elegant package specifically designed to be placed on the desk.


Desire HDMI Media Console: A wired media console that connects to your television via HDMI.  Inputs include HDMI, VGA, Aux audio, and RCA.  Also includes 2 USB charging ports


Obsess Wireless HDMI Media Console: A media console that transmits uncompressed HDMI wirelessly to a receiver connected to your television.  Inputs include HDMI, Apple 30 pin connector, and Aux audio.  Also includes 2 USB charging ports.


Other Ways You Can Help

Help us spread the word. 

Share our short video and put it on your Instagram (#ObsessedWithG-LINK). 


Tweet us and tell us what apps you would share on the big screen with a G-LINK Obsess (@GLINKconnect, #ObsessedWithG-LINK)

story:
Short Summary

WataSensor is fundamentally changing the security market by delivering a simple to use, low cost, and easy to install security appliance based on a patented revolutionary sensing technology for the residential and automotive markets. Unlike IP Camera based security devices that depend on line-of-sight or unreliable motion detectors, the WA1 from WataSensor can detect a door/window opening, or glass breaking anywhere in the house or car. WA1 does not need to see the event or require expensive sensors on the doors or windows. It can detect it even when it happens at the other end of your house, records it and sends alert to your smart phone.  There is no need to add wiring to install WA1 in your home or car. Simply wirelessly connect it to your smart phone over the internet and you are installed and protected. Only one device is needed to protect your entire house or car.

The key to WA1 is our sensor technology which is now field proven with an earlier version of the product.  We have incorporated everything learned and added exciting new features to create the WA1.

We will deliver a unique security solution that is capable of protecting your family and your property in your car or home.  Please take a look and I am sure you will agree that having a WA1 will give you peace of mind knowing that everything you care about is protected and can be easily monitored from your smartphone . 

What We Need & What You Get

We are targeting to raise $100,000 for manufacturing tooling for WA1 and to complete development of our smart phone applications.  We have already delivered an early version of our appliance so most of the technology hurdles are behind us.  We have also identified our volume manufacturing partner so once we have funding we can precede rapidly to production.

From receipt of funds we will have early production units in four months and full production three months later.

The Impact

By delivering low cost, easy to use portable security appliances we can help protect the 90+% of homes that are not secured. Because our appliance is not “built-in” you can take it with you when you move to a new apartment or house.  You can also use it to protect your car by taking it with you and leaving it anywhere in your car, out of sight, even in the trunk or glove box. 

According to the FBI, we can expect one in every thirty-six homes in the United States to be burglarized this year resulting in an average loss of $1,675.  That means a home burglary happens once every 15 seconds.  It is really not a question of if you will have a break-in but when.  Auto theft is one every 45 seconds in United States.  Unfortunately home and car security systems are expensive, difficult to install, and require monthly service fees.  Many cannot afford this expense and they just hope they will be lucky.

WataSensor provides a low cost, easy to use alternative to protect your family and your property.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that many of the people who need us most just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help.  Please tell your friends about WataSensor and our portable security appliance.  Help us to protect your family and property by bringing this revolutionary product to market.

story:
Soseek is a search engine. You can persue your interests like with every other search engine. Special about Soseek is, that it donates 80 % of its profit to Doctors Without Borders. Every search request helps. If you search with Soseek , you are not only committed socially. Soseek is operated ecologically. We use efficient and energy saving servers. Our search results are powered by Yahoo.


We placed ads next to our search results. Since these are our only source of money, the amount of money we donate depends on the ads. Every month we donate 80 % of our profit to Doctors Without Borders. The other 20% will be invested in the search engine for the first time.


  • We donate 80% of our profit to Doctors Without Borders.
  • You search anonymous. We don't record personal data.
  • Your connection is encrypted using SSL.
  • Our servers are operated with ecological power.
  • For the first time, Soseek is available in 5 languages. There'll be more soon! Languages: English, German, Spanish, Polish and Italian.


We are oriented technically, are both in education and 16 and 17 years old . We think, that there aren't enough other options to the big search engines in the internet. Because of this, we want to offer an alternative for social oriented people. We hope, we'll encounter resonance.


We work in small steps, to realizing two important aspects for our users. Consisting of privacy, anonymity and the associated user-friendly front-end. Soseek gets large monthly updates, which brings new features and safety standards. Our results we obtain from the databases of Yahoo.


At first, we need a big server that can withstand many visitors. Also it costs a lot of money to start a company. Furthermore there are a lot of security issues like SSL encryption, which are very expensive. Additional costs are for example domains, legal hedging and things we cant do by ourselves. The money we'll collect at Indiegogo will be used to improve Soseek. The money we'll collect after our goal will be donated to Doctors Without Borders.

story:
Improving the way you interact with your mobile device.  

You have a smartphone, right?  Well, there times when it's not so smart.  There are times when your phone isn't always accessible or its difficult to use a touchscreen.  GoGlove™ allows you to interact with your phone without ever taking it out of your pocket.

How it works  

With sensors placed in the fingertips and a magnet in the thumb, the Bluetooth remote connects to your phone allowing for easy control. Our free app opens many features and lets you to customize which functions you want to use to interact with your phone. You can control any music app remotely when you are running, biking, skiing, at the gym, or simply walking to work.  

We initially built GoGlove to control our music while we were skiing.  It works great for that application but GoGlove can go beyond music.  You can control your camera from a distance, or start and stop your GoPro® so no more guessing if you captured that great shot.  You can control other apps while you are listening to music.  Almost anything your phone can do, you can control with GoGlove. 


The Design  

GoGlove uses Polartec® material in a thin glove liner that can be worn on its own or underneath another glove. With our patent pending AirTap™ technology, you can wear any outer glove without losing functionality. We included an "activate sensor" at the base of the index finger so you don't accidentally make an unintended change. Since we are using Bluetooth Low Energy, the battery will last up to 6 months of daily use.  We believe the normal user will get over a year of use on one battery.  You will never need to charge it and when the battery runs out, you can simply replace it with an inexpensive and commonly found coin cell battery.

We have extensively field tested GoGlove and received tons of user feedback.  Everyone says how much they love the material and how easy it is to use.  And, by field testing, yes... we mean we went skiing a few times this winter!!


Remote Module

The GoGlove remote can be easily removed from the zipper pouch in the wrist of the glove and used on its own. The buttons on the top of the remote are activated when detached from the glove. Now you can use a stand-alone phone remote to make GoGlove a truly all-year round product. Clip it to your shirt, strap it to a bike, put it on a key chain, or wear it on your wrist. Now you have seamless device control anywhere, anytime.  Enjoy your run without messing with your phone.

GoGlove is in the News!  Check us out on CNBC

Functionality

While GoGlove is perfect for controlling music, it can do so much more. Here are some awesome developments: 

  • Camera Remote
  • GoPro® control
  • Free app for iOS and Android for customization
  • Cloud services powered by Spark IO

We will be releasing the initial software in the free app when we ship the first gloves.  We plan to release multiple software updates following the schedule below.  Your bluetooth remote can be used for so much more than controlling music.  No need to purchase another smart button since the module can do anything with the Internet of Things.  Turn on your lights, or open your garage door... Anything that is connected to the internet of things can be controlled with GoGlove.  Check out the awesome capabilities you will get when you buy the module or the GoGlove!!


While developing GoGlove we have created a Bluetooth LE control board that works with the Spark IO Cloud for devices connected to the internet. This allows you to get  real-time updated software to your GoGlove for increased functionality.  What you buy now will only get better!

Tech Specs

  • Bluetooth LE 4.0
  • iOS 7+ (requires iPhone 4s or later, iPad 3 or later)
  • Android 4.4+ (requires BLE enabled device)
  • Battery Life up to 6 months of daily use

Supports:

  • Native Apps (iTunes, Google Play, iTunes Radio, etc) 
  • 3rd Party Apps (Pandora, Spotify) 
  • Activate Siri - iOS 7+ only
    • Supporting any level of funding will make GoGlove a reality. We are so excited to bring this product into full production. See our website for more information.  www.goglove.io
Awesome Shirt
You know you want one... or ten!!!


Delivery Timeline

We have fully developed GoGlove and are placing our manufacturing orders at the end of this campaign.  We will deliver your order in JULY 2015!!  

Previous Campaign

Yes, you may have already seen GoGlove.  Our campaign goal is so low because we are already building GoGlove!  We recently raised over $45,000 on another crowdfunding site and hit our goal.  This has really kickstarted our project and we are currently building units for those backers.  We are opening up this opportunity right before we place our manufacturing order to anyone who wants to be the first to get GoGlove.  We have heard from many people that missed our campaign and still want to get a pre-sale price and join the exclusive group of initial GoGlove users.  This is your last chance!!!  


- The GoGlove Team

We will be releasing the initial software in the free app when we ship the first gloves.  We plan to release multiple software updates following the schedule below.  Your bluetooth remote can be used for so much more than controlling music.  No need to purchase another smart button since the module can do anything with the Internet of Things.  Turn on your lights, or open your garage door... Anything that is connected to the internet of things can be controlled with GoGlove.  Check out the awesome capabilities you will get when you buy the module or the GoGlove!!While developing GoGlove we have created a Bluetooth LE control board that works with the Spark IO Cloud for devices connected to the internet. This allows you to get  real-time updated software to your GoGlove for increased functionality.  What you buy now will only get better!Tech Specs
Bluetooth LE 4.0
iOS 7+ (requires iPhone 4s or later, iPad 3 or later)
Android 4.4+ (requires BLE enabled device)
Battery Life up to 6 months of daily use
Supports:
Native Apps (iTunes, Google Play, iTunes Radio, etc) 
3rd Party Apps (Pandora, Spotify) 
Activate Siri - iOS 7+ onlySupporting any level of funding will make GoGlove a reality. We are so excited to bring this product into full production. See our website for more information.  www.goglove.io
Awesome ShirtYou know you want one... or ten!!!



Delivery TimelineWe have fully developed GoGlove and are placing our manufacturing orders at the end of this campaign.  We will deliver your order in JULY 2015!!  
Previous CampaignYes, you may have already seen GoGlove.  Our campaign goal is so low because we are already building GoGlove!  We recently raised over $45,000 on another crowdfunding site and hit our goal.  This has really kickstarted our project and we are currently building units for those backers.  We are opening up this opportunity right before we place our manufacturing order to anyone who wants to be the first to get GoGlove.  We have heard from many people that missed our campaign and still want to get a pre-sale price and join the exclusive group of initial GoGlove users.  This is your last chance!!!  - The GoGlove Team

story:
Place the magnet on the back of your phone, tablet or laptop and plug in the Xdapter. All the functions of the Xdapter works without any third party app and connect automatically.

 

 

Gamers around the world have been using cable internet for pc- and console gaming for a long time. We thought it was time for the mobile gaming community to start enjoying the perks of faster speed, stable connection and data security.

 

 

 

 

The Kickback stand works great for securing a safe grip while you are playing mobile games, and to stabilize your phone while you are watching streams.

Most new phones do not have an audio jack anymore. Since this is a very important feature in gaming, and in everyday life, we made sure to include an audio jack.

 

With the Xdapter you are able to charge your device at all times with USB-C.

 

 

 

You can have a complete gaming station origin from your phone. Experience your favorite mobile games like never before.

 

 

Skip your bulky computer at work a few days of the week. With the Xdapter you can have a  complete workstation while using your phone.

 

 

 

 

 

https://www.facebook.com/flashegaming/

https://www.instagram.com/flashegaming/

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpXObpNkyxzo4Xdw7g6KYyA

story:
•  With 100W, high power output for charging any device
  •  3 x USB-C ports and 1 x USB-A enables four devices to be charging simultaneously 
  • GaN( gallium nitride ) technology has made a credit card sized adapter possible
     

USB-C, which is now widely used, can greatly increase the charging speed of devices and is used in all devices such as iPhones, Androids, tablets, PCs, and game consoles. Therefore, higher outputs and quicker charging, in a shorter time frame, are becoming more desirable.

We are confident that the CIO 3C1A with high-power, multiple-port, and compactness, will definitely become common in the future.

 

CIO 3C1A Charger

This adapter is equipped with GaN ( gallium nitride ), which enables it to be the size of a credit card. This supports high power charging of up to 100W per port. Since it has multiple ports, you can charge multiple devices at the same time.

 

 

Press Release

 

Features 

  • GaN technology enables it to be the smallest possible size

  • High 100W output

  • Multiple ports: USB-C × 3 and USB-A × 1  

  • 65W + 30W specifications: it can charge Macbook and other tablets 

  • USB-A supports QuickCharge3.0, of up to 30W  

 

As Seen On:

 

Smallest Possible Size with GaN 

CIO 3C1A Charger is equipped with GaN, a next-generation semiconductor technology. It realizes the smallest possible size; the size of a credit card.

 Overwhelmingly compact, power-efficient and with excellent heat resistance.

 

 

 It is surprisingly compact and lightweight compared to the Apple 96W adapter. In addition, CIO 3C1A has 100W output and it also has multiple-ports. 

 

As shown in the proof of concept video, CIO 3C1A can output 100W with one USB-C port. This enables the simultaneous 3x USB-C and 1x USB-A port charging possible.

Also, the product size and volume is the world's smallest and lightest!

 

100W, High Power Charging 

CIO 3C1A can charge at 100W via the USB-C port, which allows it to charge a MacBook Pro (16-inch, 2019), which requires 96W of power supply. 

 

 

It is a next-generation, high-power charger that can fully support 100W devices that will appear in greater and greater numbers as time progresses. 

 

 Multiple ports: 3 x USB-C, 1 x USB-A

Usually, high output adapters only have one port, which makes it inconvenient to charge multiple devices, or you have to carry around a few chargers.

If you have a CIO 3C1A, you can charge your laptop (MacBook and Surface, etc.), tablets (iPad or Android tablets), smartphones, earphones, or other game consoles with only one charger! It also switches the power supply, in order to be suitable for each device.

 

 Simultaneously charge a Macbook, and Tablets, at high power 


          Even when charging multiple devices, a MacBook can be charged at 65W and smartphones and tablets can be charged at up to 30W.

 Furthermore, it can charge at a 45W + 30W + 18W configuration, so you can charge a 13 inch Macbook Pro, iPad mini5, and your iPhone at the same time!

This charger may just be small, but it makes it possible for you to charge multiple devices with its high power.

 

USB-A port: the High Output of 30W
 

Galaxy S10 / S10 Plus and note10 / note10 Plus can all be charged with 30W AFC. In addition, since it supports QC3.0 / QC4, it is possible to charge Android devices with 18W quick charging.

 

High quality and overwhelmingly compact with GaN
 

Our charger is equipped with GaN ( Navitas high-quality IC chip: NV6127 chip ). Overwhelmingly compact, power-efficient and with excellent heat resistance.

 

Product Specifications 

 

 Design concept
 

The built-in foldable plugs (Plug Type A) can be ready to use with only one hand. In addition, we added a little dent on the side so that it will be easy to remove the charger from the outlet plug. The blue LED will also tell you that the electricity is flowing.

 Designed not to interfere with other outlets
 

Designed to keep the thickness within 33.8mm (30mm) so as not to get in the way of other outlets. This way, the charger and other electronic devices will not interfere with each other.

 

CIO 3C1A Proof of Concept

We recently demonstrated a working prototype of the CIO 3C1A and shot the following video. This is proof that CIO 3C1A can output 100W. 


 

 

 

SMARTCOBY10000: Credit card size 10000mAh power bank

Compatible with PD 18W so SMARTCOBY can be fully charged in just 3 hours with CIO 3C1A Charger.

While using CIO 3C1A's first USB-C port for another device at 45W, its second USB-C port can be used for SMARTCOBY at 18W, at the maximum speed, so it is very convenient.

 

Project Schedule

 

  •  2019 November  Initial Product Concept
  •  2019 December  Product Design
  •  2020 January  PCBA Design & Submit PSE Certification
  •  2020 March  Kickstarter Launched
  •  2020 April  Complete PSE Certification
  •  2020 May  Indiegogo Launched/Begin Manufacturing
  •  2020 June  Shipping to Distribution Centers
  •  2020 July-August  Reward Shipping to all Backers

 

Thoughts on this project

"I want a high output charger." "I want a multi-port AC adapter." "It is okay as long as the AC adapter is compact." We, as a charger manufacturer, has been striving to reflect these thoughts on products every day.

Meanwhile, by using GaN, heat is suppressed, even while the adapter becomes more compact. Therefore, it is now possible to manufacture high-spec, and safe, AC adapters.

While overseas manufacturers are releasing AC adapters that make full use of GaN technology, Japanese manufacturers were reluctant to step into the latest technology.

We want to manufacture and release the ideal AC adapter based on the experience and opinions we learned from our Japanese customers, who we have been selling chargers to for many years. We want to deliver more convenient and safe products.

By using our products, we want you to realize the differences in specifications of adapters and how useful light, fast and multi-functional adapters can be.

CIO Charger will be a trigger to pursue your life in a more convenient way by space-saving and reducing charging time.

This project was started with that thought.

 

Our Team

Techgadget Japan is founded by three Japanese gadget lovers. We want to deliver convenient products with the latest technology and high quality. While maintaining Japanese high quality, we also focus on cost-effectiveness.

We have experience in launching several projects, Super Mobile Charger and deskHack on a Japanese crowdfunding site and successfully raised over $ 81,000 on each project.

We have been striving to deliver Japanese high quality and cost-effective products to our customers. We are thrilled and really appreciate this opportunity.

 

Risk and Challenge

* Depending on the monitor, the color of products shown on this page may appear different from the actual product color. * Some design changes such as USB colors and logo color may occur. *Estimated shipping time may be delayed if the number of backers is higher than anticipated due to production delivery or manufacturing process delays. * Refunds for the backers will be made only in cases where there are initial functional failures. *If the number of backers is higher than anticipated, the regular sales price may be lower than the planned cost, according to lowered production costs. * Similar products may exist, so please support at your own discretion, but we won’t let you down!

story:
Lightr is back!

The smallest and most powerful powerbank is back in business with even more to offer. After a successful crowdfunding campaign Lightr is back stronger, smarter and better than before.

 

Upgrading and turning the charging game on to the new level. Take a look at Lightr 2 with thiner and slicker design. Now it is even smaller and brings even more battery power.

The new light indicators are there to make Your life easier. Practical solution to once bothering problem.

Lightr 2 is still the same thing of beauty as its design is practical and you will be able to carry it anywhere and have your 1800 mAh of charge on the GO!

Lightr is still slim, tiny and comfortable to carry with you everywhere you go. It does fit into any possible pocket. The size and power are still the most important thing for Lightr 2.

Lightr 2 is still same old Universal Charger. It is same customized universal magnetic system that brings the power to your device.

The specially developed magnetic system is made in accordance with the needs of the modern customer. A lot of prototypes and the concepts were developed.

Lightr 2 is not afraid of height and neither should You. Lightr 2 is made secure and protected from high drops and shock.

Thanks to developed ABS plastic, Lightr 2 is 10 times more shock resistant, don't be scared if you accidentally drop it. 

No ponds, rain drops or spilled liquids can cause a problem to Lightr 2. Lightr 2 is made in accordance with IPX 7. 

Lightr is not afraid of water. Be safe and do not bother now water will not cause a disturbance. Now your Lightr can't get too wet!

All Lightr 2s come with the wireless charging option. New power profile allows a faster and secure charging for Lightr 2. 

Don't forger the Lightr's very own Qi charging pad the Air Charger. Create an ecosystem with Lightr's chargers, do your device a favour.

Developed Lightr means new solutions. Our team of developers have worked endlessly on the development procedure of Lightr. The new Lightr 2 has redesigned materials, special PCB and new power profile. The Lightr strive for greatness and we hope we will bring the best possible products to your pocket,
