story:
HALO: Wireless Solar PowerBank with Light

The Best Solar Light & Power Supply for All Your Adventures

2,365 orders shipped in total, please click HERE to download the shipping list.

HALO is the best power bank designed for your daily charging and outdoor activities. The wireless charger, built-in solar charger, LED light makes Halo the most versatile portable power station in the world. HALO is IP65 waterproof and dust-proof, it can get you solid power supply/lighting in any harsh environments. Get HALO to go wireless, power your phone at Full-Speed anywhere, anytime.

HALO is the Largest Capacity Portable Power Station that you can take in the carry on luggage to fly with.

Why You Need HALO

 

Seen On

WaterProof Test Video by TK Bay

 

Review Video by Scott Dumas

“I think it is an extremely useful product for everybody, especially if you ever go road trip, if you ever go camping, hiking, or any situation that may need power supply.”
 

Review Video by Electrified Reviews

"It can charge all my stuff, it can get me back home if I need light. Its just like one thing, one thing that I bring with me that can do everything. "

Read the full article on mybeerbuzz.com

Reviewed and tested by Winsor Dobbin, a senior journalist with 30 years experience on gadgets, sports. travel and wines. Click here to read the full review article

Reviewed by Kathleen, a gamer, bookworm and film nut, a geek and a mommy. Click here to read the full review article

 

Get Rid of Your Cables

True Wireless

 

20,000mAh

Extend Your Phone Battery Life by 7 Times

 

Waterproof & Dust-proof

For harsh environments

 

Ultra Portable

The Astronautic High Density Li-Polymer battery, provides larger capacity with smaller size. Halo is a bit bigger than iPhone, weight 19 Oz,  just 2.7 times the weight of iPhone 8 Plus.

 

2x Faster Charging Speed

85% charge in 45 minutes for iPhone

 

Power 4 Devices At Once

With the extra USB ports and Wireless Charging Pad, HALO can charge 4 devices at the same time.

Ultra-efficient Source of Light & Power

100% Solar, 100% Green Energy! 

HALO is great for camping, hiking, emergencies, gazebos, use as a night light, stargazing... or wherever your adventures may take you.  Go sustainable living, Save the earth!

LED Light

Up to 70 hours,3 light modes up to 786 Lumens 

SOS Flashlight

For emergency

3 flashing modes for emergency on the road, camping or any other outdoor activities

 

Safe

Reliable and Endurable

Over a dozen international certificates and saefty features ensured the reliability and endurance

Power Your Devices Anytime, Anywhere

In the car

Charge your phone easily while driving, pick up anytime without worrying about cables.

In the office

Use HALO to charge various devices on the table, take Halo with you to join a meeting and continue on your emails/messages.

At home

Put your phone on HALO at night, pick it up in the morning with full power.

On the go

Cannot find a power outlet? Take out your HALO to charge the phone while using Google Maps.

Camping

Need a light? HALO can work as a bright light up to 70 hours. It can also power your phone 7 times, enough for 1 week mobile life without power outlet.

 

Mass Production

 

Gallery

 

Tech Specs

 

Features Comparison

 

Perks

 

Stretch Goals

Timeline

About ChargeLabs

ChargeLabs is a team of designers and engineers with a mission to bring the best portable charging products to everyone. Fun, breakthrough, and innovation are our tags. The team has won Reddot Design Award and a series of other design awards during the past few years. Our engineering expertise and supply chain efficiency ensured that we can create best in-class products that everyone can enjoy.

While we have been manufacturing best-selling electronic products for years, we also helped designed and manufactured a number of products for other brands. Halo is the second product that we launched on Indiegogo thus far. We believe that this versatile smart power station will bring you convenience and solid power supply from green energy .

We have spent months developing, testing and prototyping, even completed the molding before the campaign started. We need your support to start the mass production and get the CE/FCC/RoHS certified.

 Go sustainable living, Save the earth!

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

General
Technical
Payment and Shipping
 
 

General

 

How long is thewarranty on Halo?

We are offering a 1-year warranty. Warranty is only for exchange of a defective unit. 

 

Is there any stretch goal for backers (ie. pouch, extra mAh, colored LED, etc. )

There are stretch goals, you can check it in the story page.

 

Technical

 

How long it takes to completely charge the halo with the built-in solar panel?

The capacity of Halo is 20,000mAh or 74Wh, which is quite high, so it will take some time to fully charge Halo only with the solar charger. But you can get enough power to fully charge the iPhone in a few hours.

 

Will the solar panel charge the battery in low light and cloudy conditions? Changeable weather often results in strong sunlight, cloud cover and gloomy daylight all in the same day. Is Halo’s solar panel capable of (re)charging its battery in these conditions? 

The "Solar" indicator will light green if the solar panel is working. The panel even works in the house. However, the efficiency may be different.

 

Is Halo capable of pass thru charging? 

Yes.

 

If Halo’s battery is low/spent can the solar panel generate juice and pass it through the battery to power its USB ports? Or does the battery require fully recharging first?

The battery shall be recharged first if the power is low.

 

I heard that using micro USB to charge the device is much slower than using Type C cable.

The charging speed depends on the voltage and current of the output, not just the type. 

 

What is the maximum standby hours of fully charged Halo.

The standby time is quite long (months) if it's fully charged.

 

Can I still use the wireless charger capability of the product while having a phone case?

Yes, I'm using it right now, iPhone X with a case. But the case shouldn't be too thick, 1mm thickness should work.

 

I am wondering if it’s possible to increase the full charge-discharge cycles to 1000 ?

The 500 full charge-discharge cycles spec is quite good score actually, even for iPhone or MacBook batteries. I may take 3 years to get 500 cycles since the capacity is 20,000mAh. It can powers your iPhone for 7 times at one cycle. And the battery is still good after after 500 cycle, just the capacity will be a bit lower (may be lower than 85%).

 

Payments and Shipping

 

 

Risks and Challenges

We are confident that we have done everything possible to minimize risks and challenges to Halo Solar Wireless Power Station backers.

All the molds needed has been produced and fully tested. We've also produced 50 units as the first batch and sent them to media/vloggers for reviews. We only need your order to start the first mass production batch.

There is possibility that the supply of components and parts may be tight since the wireless charging are becoming more and more hot. With our expertise and supply chain resources, we will minimize the risk and place order as soon as we get the first batch orders with your support.

 
Legal Disclaimer

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

Its just like one thing, one thing that I bring with me that can do everything. "Read the full article on mybeerbuzz.comReviewed and tested by Winsor Dobbin, a senior journalist with 30 years experience on gadgets, sports. travel and wines. Click here to read the full review articleReviewed by Kathleen, a gamer, bookworm and film nut, a geek and a mommy. Click here to read the full review article Get Rid of Your CablesTrue Wireless 20,000mAhExtend Your Phone Battery Life by 7 Times Waterproof & Dust-proofFor harsh environments Ultra PortableThe Astronautic High Density Li-Polymer battery, provides larger capacity with smaller size. Halo is a bit bigger than iPhone, weight 19 Oz,  just 2.7 times the weight of iPhone 8 Plus. 2x Faster Charging Speed85% charge in 45 minutes for iPhone Power 4 Devices At OnceWith the extra USB ports and Wireless Charging Pad, HALO can charge 4 devices at the same time.Ultra-efficient Source of Light & Power100% Solar, 100% Green Energy! HALO is great for camping, hiking, emergencies, gazebos, use as a night light, stargazing... or wherever your adventures may take you.  Go sustainable living, Save the earth!LED LightUp to 70 hours,3 light modes up to 786 Lumens SOS FlashlightFor emergency3 flashing modes for emergency on the road, camping or any other outdoor activities SafeReliable and EndurableOver a dozen international certificates and saefty features ensured the reliability and endurancePower Your Devices Anytime, AnywhereIn the carCharge your phone easily while driving, pick up anytime without worrying about cables.In the officeUse HALO to charge various devices on the table, take Halo with you to join a meeting and continue on your emails/messages.At homePut your phone on HALO at night, pick it up in the morning with full power.On the goCannot find a power outlet? Take out your HALO to charge the phone while using Google Maps.CampingNeed a light? HALO can work as a bright light up to 70 hours. It can also power your phone 7 times, enough for 1 week mobile life without power outlet. Mass Production Gallery Tech Specs Features Comparison Perks Stretch GoalsTimelineAbout ChargeLabsChargeLabs is a team of designers and engineers with a mission to bring the best portable charging products to everyone. Fun, breakthrough, and innovation are our tags. The team has won Reddot Design Award and a series of other design awards during the past few years. Our engineering expertise and supply chain efficiency ensured that we can create best in-class products that everyone can enjoy.While we have been manufacturing best-selling electronic products for years, we also helped designed and manufactured a number of products for other brands. Halo is the second product that we launched on Indiegogo thus far. We believe that this versatile smart power station will bring you convenience and solid power supply from green energy .We have spent months developing, testing and prototyping, even completed the molding before the campaign started. We need your support to start the mass production and get the CE/FCC/RoHS certified. Go sustainable living, Save the earth! Frequently Asked Questions 
GeneralTechnicalPayment and Shipping 
 

General
 


How long is thewarranty on Halo?
We are offering a 1-year warranty. Warranty is only for exchange of a defective unit. 
 
Is there any stretch goal for backers (ie. pouch, extra mAh, colored LED, etc. )
There are stretch goals, you can check it in the story page.
 
Technical
 
How long it takes to completely charge the halo with the built-in solar panel?
The capacity of Halo is 20,000mAh or 74Wh, which is quite high, so it will take some time to fully charge Halo only with the solar charger. But you can get enough power to fully charge the iPhone in a few hours.
 
Will the solar panel charge the battery in low light and cloudy conditions? Changeable weather often results in strong sunlight, cloud cover and gloomy daylight all in the same day. Is Halo’s solar panel capable of (re)charging its battery in these conditions? 
The "Solar" indicator will light green if the solar panel is working. The panel even works in the house. However, the efficiency may be different.
 
Is Halo capable of pass thru charging? 
Yes.
 
If Halo’s battery is low/spent can the solar panel generate juice and pass it through the battery to power its USB ports? Or does the battery require fully recharging first?
The battery shall be recharged first if the power is low.
 
I heard that using micro USB to charge the device is much slower than using Type C cable.
The charging speed depends on the voltage and current of the output, not just the type. 
 
What is the maximum standby hours of fully charged Halo.
The standby time is quite long (months) if it's fully charged.
 
Can I still use the wireless charger capability of the product while having a phone case?
Yes, I'm using it right now, iPhone X with a case. But the case shouldn't be too thick, 1mm thickness should work.
 
I am wondering if it’s possible to increase the full charge-discharge cycles to 1000 ?
The 500 full charge-discharge cycles spec is quite good score actually, even for iPhone or MacBook batteries. I may take 3 years to get 500 cycles since the capacity is 20,000mAh. It can powers your iPhone for 7 times at one cycle. And the battery is still good after after 500 cycle, just the capacity will be a bit lower (may be lower than 85%).
 
Payments and Shipping
 
 
Risks and Challenges
We are confident that we have done everything possible to minimize risks and challenges to Halo Solar Wireless Power Station backers.
All the molds needed has been produced and fully tested. We've also produced 50 units as the first batch and sent them to media/vloggers for reviews. We only need your order to start the first mass production batch.
There is possibility that the supply of components and parts may be tight since the wireless charging are becoming more and more hot. With our expertise and supply chain resources, we will minimize the risk and place order as soon as we get the first batch orders with your support.
 Legal Disclaimer
"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

story:
It’s a wireless passthrough charging power bank, a 3-Axis Stabilizer, a Selfie Stick, a photo and video editor, magnetic system, and a tripod all wrapped into one beautiful package.

 

 

This will be the last accessory you’ll ever buy for your phone. It does everything.

 

Running, jumping, rolling, whatever. It doesn’t matter what you’re filming, you’ll get perfect videos & photos every time.

No shakes. No blurs. Just Perfection.

Effortlessly achieve cinematic perfection with S1’s stable 3-axis gimbal, straight from your pocket

 

Just have the Powervision app running in the background while you’re using whatever app you're using for PowerVision S1's PowerFollow feature.

 

 

Say goodbye to being out of frame. AI facial recognition and body tracking lock onto you and follows you around the room.

Not just body-shape recognition. PowerVision S1 tracks individual faces, bodies, and even objects.

Once you’ve gestured to lock in AI tracking on you, you’re it. You’re the center of attention no matter where you move even in a group.

This is your phone.

This is your phone on power vision.

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

Charge PowerVision S1 at the same time as your phone. Extend your charging options wherever you are so you always have a way to juice your phone and your PowerVision S1

 

 
 

Which Makes Us The Smallest Micro 3-Axis Camera Stabilizer in The World. It’s made to go with you everywhere. If it’s not in your hand, then it fits compactly in any bag.

 

 

Never say pictures don’t do it justice ever again. Capture the high-quality imagery and content you really want to replay share.

 

 

 

Let’s talk perk options. It’s pretty simple. We have one main option.

 

 

 

 

You will select your magnetic mount via survey after our campaign ends.

 

Accessories will be available after our campaign ends. 

 

 

 

We have three color choices for whatever fits your fancy: Black. Blue. Green.

 

Our phone cases come in the same color options.

Select color after our campaign ends! Our Clamp Combo pack only comes in black.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The PowerVision Group was founded in 2009 and is a company with a clear mission to innovate the future. It pushes the boundaries of possibilities, with the aim to change the world through innovative artificial intelligence. At the heart of the company is a corporate culture that prides itself on continuous learning, innovation, and technological excellence. PowerVision is the only company in the world producing aerial, water surface, and underwater robotic devices.

We are excited to bring you our newest innovation.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see the reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

We plan to ship starting in June 2021*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

 

If your friends are as half as cool as you, they need to see this. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend, family member, coworker, acquaintance, or your whole contact list.

story:
65W adaptive power, two USB-C ports, two USB-A ports and one 4k HDMI socket can easily meet all your daily life, business travel, commercial affairs and entertainment needs.

 
ADPDOCK can replace plenty of complicated devices on your desk and simultaneously provide power to multiple devices and process data transmission, which helps you to get rid of the mess.
 
 
 
Connect ADPDOCK in one second to work seamlessly on multiple devices. Imagine that you only need to plug in the type-c interface of your laptop and you will have immediate connection to multiple devices such as the screen, hard disk, mouse, keyboard etc.
With PD3.0, 65W power output, it takes 1.5 hours to fully charge a 13.3 "MacBook Air. With USB3.0 interface and 5Gbps transmission speed, a 1G file can be transmitted within 3 seconds!
 
 
 
With portable projection function, ADPDOCK provides the easiest way to duplicate or extend your screen for multitasking, viewing spreadsheet data, editing documents,giving presentations,watching movies and playing video games. It supports 4K resolution video at 30Hz. Enjoy the 4K resolution with no delay!
 
 
 
 
 
Unique structure design for one-hand operation which helps you to easily unplug devices.
 
Fashionable structure design for one-hand operation allows you to part from the old way, and unplug devices elegantly.
 
 
When you travel or go on business, do you bring many different plugs? Now, you just need a ADPDOCK ！ADPDOCK uses the latest GaN semiconductor materials and weighs only 180g. It can be easily put into your pocket and backpack.
 
 
ADPDOCK & ADPDOCK Lite support worldwide universal 100-240V voltage and come with UK/EU/AU pin converters. Feel free to connect anywhere in the world.
 
 
 

[GaN] is a new kind of semiconductor material. It has features of big forbidden broadband, high thermal conductivity, high temperature resistance, radiation resistance, acid and alkali resistance, high strength and high hardness etc. Using GaN gallium nitride components, the charger can not only achieve small size and light weight, but also has more advantages than ordinary charger in calorific value and efficiency conversion.

 

 
 
 
 
 
 

Post the social media link on the comments and leave your comment about "what do you like about ADPDOCK?" with your #order number# on our comment page. For example: "#233# I am a big fan of ADPDOCK. Love the one-hand operation! " We will give you a Free Travel Pouch!

  • How to share?

Following us on Indiegogo!

Share ADPDOCK on Facebook

Share ADPDOCK on Twitter

Share the referral link with everyone

story:
Long Range (LoRa), personal wireless network without carrier infrastructure

  • Typical range

    • 5 miles to 15 miles in open field,
    • 1 mile to 5 miles in urban area
  • Low bit rate to maximize the range: 1 kbps to 10 kbps
  • Extend the coverage with other users with the relay capability

​

User Scenarios

Stay in touch with your loved ones

or

Track your pets and valuables

Features

Base-to-Base communications

Tag-to-Base communications

 Drop Tag

 

Specifications

Drop Base

Standalone version

The standalone version will work with Android and iPhones with the following OS requirements.

  • LoRa radio and processor
  • Android requirement: Android OS 7.0 or higher
  • iOS requirement: iOS 10 or higher
  • 3000 mAh Li-Ion battery
  • Phone charging capability: can charge your smartphone with up to 3A current
  • BLE 4.2 connectivity to your smartphone

 

Drop Tag

  • LoRa radio
  • Low power CPU for data and power management
  • GPS receiver
  • 6-axis motion sensor (gyro & accelerometer)
  • Sound buzzer
  • Alert button
  • Rechargeable battery
  • Wireless charging receiver
  • Waterproof

 

 

Drop Docking Station 

  • Wireless charging transmitter for Drop Tag
  • 3200 mAh Li-Ion battery

​Endorsement

Bill Braiser

VP of Engineering at Quartzview | Former VP of Engineering at Plantronics

Drop Station: App Software

Text messaging and location sharing 

 

Drop Peer-To-Peer Package

 

 

Drop LoRaWAN Package

 

Frequently Asked Questions

What is LoRa?

LoRa, which stands for Long Range radio technology, was originally designed to provide an extended communications range for building Internet of Things (IoT) networks.  However, the standard LoRa system requires a centralized network infrastructure.

How is the Drop different from LoRa?

The Drop optimized the LoRa protocol for peer-to-peer communications.  The optimized protocol allows the Drop to operate with much lower processing overheads compared to the standard LoRa system.

What is the communications range?

In an open area, the radios are capable of communicating over 15 miles.  However, in a more challenging environment such as urban jungle and heavily wooded areas, the range is expected to be between 1 mile to 5 miles.

Will the Drop Base be compatible with iPhones and other Android phones?

The Drop Base interfaces with the phone via Bluetooth.  The Base can work with most Bluetooth-capable phones.  However, the base will have custom covers to fit with Moto Z anad iPhone 6/6S/7.  A standalone version (without an integrated phone cover) will be offered for Android OS.

How long would the tag battery last?

In a typical scenario where the GPS is off and the radio is running in low power mode, the tag is expected to last over weeks.

How can I turn on the GPS?

The GPS in the tag can be turned on from the base by clicking on the command.  It can also be triggered by the motion sensor to wake to full operation.

Perk Packages

Base/Tag Combo Packages

Dual Base Packages

Wireless Charger Package

Drop Rejuvenation Initiative

The Drop team will match your donation such that the combined amount will be used to purchase recycled phones as well as Drop packages to provide means of communications to people who otherwise do not have ways to connect with their family members or to the outside world.  We will carefully review and select the charity organization to work on this initiative.

Timeline

Team

story:
A concept changing new generation of chargers designed and developed by the dedicated enthusiasts, design award winners and field professionals. Lightr is a step forward to the innovative the world of powerbanks and charging devices. This is unique combination of technology and comfort that aims to simplify your routine.

 

 

 

 

 

Lightr is slim, tiny and comfortable to carry with you almost everywhere you go. It just fits in your smallest pocket. We have chosen the size as the top priority of comfort for our users.

 

Your 100% charge is always with you. Lightr takes less space than the majority of your everyday items.

 Lightr sends smart notifications when your phone really needs charging.

 

 

 

 

Lightr is the world’s most powerful charger of it’s size.

 

Lightr has enough energy to charge your device up to 100%. Lightr fits two powerful 750mAh slim batteries, which is enough to save your day and keep your device functioning.

 

 

 

 

Lightr uses universal custom made magnetic connectors for the best performance of charging. With these connectors Lightr can be used with almost any modern device (supporting Lightning, USB-Micro, USB Type-C).

 

 

You can easily charge your iPhone, Android phones, iPad, tablets, eBooks, Macbook's (and other laptops with USB Type-C), AirPods and thousands of other devices.

 One Lightr can save many, help out your friends with extra charge and remember, sharing is caring!

Lightr App also collects some insights of your phone usage. This helps the Lightr smart system to create a charging schedule, customized for your phone, also to remind you when you will need the Lightr.

 

 

 

Lightr is made with modern technologies and aged experience. Every single detail of this device was developed after months of research.  Lightr's both batteries have separate integrated safety chips. The PCB is developed with the most modern and advanced components and systems. On practice, Lightr cannot be damaged by a short circuit, overcharge or discharge. Below is the chart of tech specs and characteristics.

 

 

Lightr's design solutions with its almost unlimited colors make it even more fascinating.

 

 

 

 

 

This was back in October 2017 when Hayk, the founder and CEO of the company started to concern about an effective and efficient way of charging the phone, a way that would be to most comfortable for anyone. This was the time when he came up with the idea of Lightr. With the dedicated team, the dream of the most comfortable way of charging became a reality!

And today, after months of hard work, Lightr has a team of bright enthusiasts and professionals, who seek to generate innovative solutions to world’s everyday problems. Our model is based on a team spirit and an independent working environment where real collaboration of ideas and concepts turns into reality. Lightr always welcomes individuals with passion towards change and dedication to the idea of making our Earth a better place for everyone.

story:
With USB 4, Thunderbolt and USB will converge. HALOBAND USB 4 Super Cable is powerful and durable, and the price is reasonable, your cable nightmare might be over.

USB 4 is an upgraded version of Thunderbolt 3 and has better compatibility. A few years ago, Intel announced that it would make Thunderbolt available to everyone without any royalty fee. So the USB-IF is taking advantage of that by integrating Thunderbolt 3 specifications into USB 4.

 

Stretch Goad 

FASTER DATA TRANSFER

 

Transferring data between Thunderbolt3 /USB4 devices at up to a staggering 40Gbps.

This cable can transfer 25GB of data in ten seconds. Faster than ever.


 

FAST CHARGING

Super Cable can also supply up to 100W of power delivery.

You can quickly charge your laptop, mobile phone, etc.

SUPPORTS ULTIMATE HIGH DEFINITION DISPLAYS

High volume data capability makes the USB4 Super cable ideal for high definition video.

Supporting Dual 4K and Ultra HD displays, sharing content between screens is easy, without compromising quality.

Dual 4K/5K/8K

Supports external GPU



 

You can use it to connect EGPU to play games.


 

Or improve work efficiency.

Obviously, you can also use it to connect a Hub.

Super Cable is made of high-quality coaxial cable, with braided layer and reinforced design, which means good data transmission quality, and tough and soft.

 Stretch goal unlocked:  1200D Kevlar fiber will be added. 

5 times stronger than steel, It will make the cable tougher.



Italian vegetable tanned leather cable tie

 

Super cable has a very good leather cable tie. Easy for you to organize and commute.





 

Specs

•Name: HALOBAND USB 4 Super Cable

•Length: 1M/3.3FT

•Weight: 45g

•Color: Black

•Material: High quality customized coaxial cable, Kevlar fiber.

•Data Speed: 40Gbps

•Fast Charging: Yes, up to 100w, E-mark chip inside.

•Display: Dual 4K/5K/8K

•Connector: USB-C (USB 4)

•Compatibility: Work flawlessly with any device that use a USB-C connector, backward-compatible with USB 3.x, 2.x and 1.x devices

About us

Our product vision: simple, durable, worry-free. We seek the strongest and best materials to develop products with ergonomic designs.

Our team is based in San Francisco, Shenzhen and Osaka. Craftsmanship is what we pursue. We have excellent product development engineers, and we have a mature production and manufacturing supply chain to ensure that our products are of high quality from design to output. Our first generation Super Cable have received a great response since they were put into the market. Now we are developing a new generation products, which we believe will bring surprises to our users.

 

Design Concept and Why Crowdfunding

The cables is one of the most commonly used products in our daily life, but is usually of simple and poor quality. We hope to create some products that are more exciting.

We made our first designs focused on the appearance. We require the joints be very smooth and also be durable. After some brainstorming, we were able to come up with the design we wanted.

After many instances of mold-opening, we finally got what we wanted.

We are proud of it. We chose Crowdfunding for two reasons, one is to verify our ideas, and the other is to promote the mass production of products to get better quality and cost. If you are interested in our products, or would like to bring our products to your market, please feel free to contact us.

Risks and challenges

As a hardware project, there are natural risks and challenges in engineering and manufacturing. Due to supply chain issues and other reasons, the final manufacturing schedule may be delayed. However, we will be as transparent as possible to keep you informed and work to resolve any issues that may arise. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.
story_txt:
With USB 4, Thunderbolt and USB will converge. HALOBAND USB 4 Super Cable is powerful and durable, and the price is reasonable, your cable nightmare might be over.

USB 4 is an upgraded version of Thunderbolt 3 and has better compatibility. A few years ago, Intel announced that it would make Thunderbolt available to everyone without any royalty fee. So the USB-IF is taking advantage of that by integrating Thunderbolt 3 specifications into USB 4.

 
Stretch Goad 

FASTER DATA TRANSFER
 
Transferring data between Thunderbolt3 /USB4 devices at up to a staggering 40Gbps.
This cable can transfer 25GB of data in ten seconds. Faster than ever.
 

FAST CHARGING
Super Cable can also supply up to 100W of power delivery.
You can quickly charge your laptop, mobile phone, etc.

SUPPORTS ULTIMATE HIGH DEFINITION DISPLAYS
High volume data capability makes the USB4 Super cable ideal for high definition video.
Supporting Dual 4K and Ultra HD displays, sharing content between screens is easy, without compromising quality.

Dual 4K/5K/8K
Supports external GPU



 
You can use it to connect EGPU to play games.
 
Or improve work efficiency.
Obviously, you can also use it to connect a Hub.

Super Cable is made of high-quality coaxial cable, with braided layer and reinforced design, which means good data transmission quality, and tough and soft.

 Stretch goal unlocked:  1200D Kevlar fiber will be added. 
5 times stronger than steel, It will make the cable tougher.

Italian vegetable tanned leather cable tie
 
Super cable has a very good leather cable tie. Easy for you to organize and commute.
 
Specs
•Name: HALOBAND USB 4 Super Cable
•Length: 1M/3.3FT
•Weight: 45g
•Color: Black
•Material: High quality customized coaxial cable, Kevlar fiber.
•Data Speed: 40Gbps
•Fast Charging: Yes, up to 100w, E-mark chip inside.
•Display: Dual 4K/5K/8K
•Connector: USB-C (USB 4)
•Compatibility: Work flawlessly with any device that use a USB-C connector, backward-compatible with USB 3.x, 2.x and 1.x devices

We made our first designs focused on the appearance. We require the joints be very smooth and also be durable. After some brainstorming, we were able to come up with the design we wanted.
After many instances of mold-opening, we finally got what we wanted.
We are proud of it. We chose Crowdfunding for two reasons, one is to verify our ideas, and the other is to promote the mass production of products to get better quality and cost. If you are interested in our products, or would like to bring our products to your market, please feel free to contact us.

story:
DuoPad is a multi-touch trackpad enabling PC and Laptop owners using Windows 8, 8.1 or 10 all the touch screen features and functionalities of their favorite smartphone and tablet apps onto any PC or Laptop monitor.

PC and Laptop owners with Windows 7 can use the DuoPad after they upgrade to Windows 10 .

We have reimagined the trackpad and added a touchscreen mode that switches on automatically when using touch apps on your PC or laptop. Using touch apps with a mouse can be frustrating since they are designed to work with a touchscreen. The Windows Store on your PC and laptop offers thousand of touch apps that you use on your smartphone and tablet everyday. DuoPad extends that experience onto your PC and laptop. With DuoPad, you still have a full-featured trackpad mode allowing you to navigate, as you would with a mouse, when using traditional desktop applications.

DuoPad's name was inspired from what makes it stand-out from all other trackpads – it's amazing capacity to intelligently operate in two modes.
 

  • It knows which apps you are running and switches modes automatically from desktop applications to touch apps. 
  • It makes your Windows 8, 8.1 and 10 PC or Laptop run seamlessly with every kind of software. 

Toggle nimbly between a traditional trackpad experience and DuoPad’s touch screen mode automatically, based on your needs.

DuoPad is amazingly accurate and responsive. Your hand gestures on it's surface appear identically and simultaneously on your monitor, with no delay. 

Using the DuoPad is just like using any mouse or desktop trackpad. Ergonomics are not compromised as when using a desktop touch screen. Especially when working for periods of time longer than a few minutes, the sheer weight of your hand and arm can really tire you quickly as you are constantly raising your hand to touch the vertical monitor. 

It’s easy to configure DuoPad to control exactly how you work and play on your PC. Define custom actions, choose your personal DuoPad Touch Mode display color from dozens of options, and even specify your transparency/opacity preferences.

In Trackpad Mode, the DuoPad is a precision Multi-touch Trackpad like the one on your laptop and includes the same standard functions and gestures you're already accustom to. Like the mouse, it moves the arrow cursor on the screen and also has left and right  click buttons so you can access the same drop down menus as you would with a mouse. Tap, tap to drag and double tap are also fully supported.

  

The DuoPad gives your laptop a Touchscreen Mode for your favorite touch apps, and a larger Multi-touch Trackpad for mouse cursor control and standard trackpad gestures when you use your desktop applications. 

 

The DuoPad is a powerful tool for many uses. It offers a superior trackpad experience, but goes one better by bringing all the fun and productivity of your favourite touch applications to any desktop or laptop monitor. 

Enjoy games like Fruit Ninja, Angry Birds, Candy Crush Saga and many more other games using touch, just as you would on your tablet or smartphone.

 

The latest version of Microsoft Office supports touch, making it a breeze to zoom in and out, move and edit items quickly with the touch of your fingers. You also have your physical keyboard to let you type with speed and comfort. So it all becomes productivity heaven with Office on your PC or Laptop.

 

 In trackpad mode, DuoPad works like your mouse and gives you full control of your desktop applications that are designed to be used with the mouse cursor.

 

 

THANK YOU TO ALL OUR SUPPORTERS FOR REACHING OUR INITIAL GOAL!

LETS TRY TO MAKE IT TO OUR STRETCH GOAL!

 

  

Are you a Windows 7 user?  When you upgrade to 10 you will be ready to use the DuoPad! And you can also upgrade from Windows 7 to Windows 8 or 8.1 to use the DuoPad!

 

 

 
We have been working closely over the last 2 years with a company specializing in electronics design and manufacturing to make sure that we can make the DuoPad a high quality product at the right price. However, problems can evolve at any stage during  manufacturing, therefore we have developed relations with experts that will assist us with every step of the DuoPad manufacturing process.
We have two manufacturers capable of producing the DuoPad. One manufacturer is better suited for a lower volume production and the other can produce in higher volume. We would like to sell as many DuoPads as our early adopters desire, but we have also planned and are able to satisfy any demand that will come for this new and exciting product. For reference, there are more than 200 million Windows 8, 8.1 PCs in use today that could benefit from the enhanced DuoPad features.

The DuoPad includes software that has been in development for a few years already, so the software part is close to ship ready stage. Adjustments to the software will be required when the DuoPad makes it off the production line, however these adjustments will be minor. And our experienced software development team has produced commercial grade products in the past.

 

We are a group of technologists, engineers and seasoned product developers who are passionate about technology and want to improve how people can interact with computing devices. Some members of our team have participated in the evolution of computers since the early days of the PC. As computing devices evolve, so does software (apps) that we use everyday at home, at work and on the go. Our goal is to make it as easy and as seamless as possible for people to use their apps at any time, the way they like to, and the DuoPad is a first step in that direction. 

Lanomat Inc. is the name of our company that makes the DuoPad.


What if I forgot to pay for International shipping?

No problem. Click the "Contribute Now" button at the top of the page and manually enter the International shipping amount. It will be added to your pledge amount. Just make sure to enter the same personal information you provided with your initial order. We will do the matching ourselves at the end of the campaign.

Do I have to manually add shipping if I'm not in the US or Canada?

Yes, if you're outside the US or Canada, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk before checkout! When you pledge, add the International shipping amount indicated in your perk as an "additional gift".

How do I install the DuoPad?

It's very simple, plug-in the DuoPad's cable into any available USB port on your PC or laptop then download and install the driver from our website and you are good to go.

Is the DuoPad's touchscreen mode better than a PC touch monitor?

Yes it is. It is very important that you have the proper posture while using a PC, and the DuoPad's touchscreen mode allows you to have that proper posture while doing touchscreen type input. A PC touch monitor requires you to lift and hold up your arm in the air to touch the monitor's touchscreen, and this is bad posture that causes your arm to fatigue!

How does it feel to use the DuoPad's touchscreen mode?

It takes on average a couple of minutes to get used to the DuoPad's touchscreen mode. If you frequently use your smartphone or tablet, which both have touchscreens, you will feel at home with the DuoPad very quickly.

How responsive is the mirror image of my hand on the screen in touchscreen mode?

It is real time, there is no lag time what so ever between your hand's movements on the DuoPad and your hand's movements displayed on the screen. You really feel like  you are touching the screen while your hand is comfortable in the horizontal position on the DuoPad.

Does the DuoPad's trackpad mode work like any other trackpad?

Yes, it is fully compatible with the standard trackpad functions and gestures of Windows 8, 8.1 and 10. In other words, it works the same as the trackpad on your laptop or an external trackpad. 

How do I switch modes?

The DuoPad will automatically switch modes for touch apps or desktop applications. You can also manually switch modes by holding 5 fingers on the DuoPad for a moment. 

What apps can be used with the DuoPad?

The DuoPad will work with all touch apps (some are preinstalled with Windows and you can also quickly download the very popular touch apps from the Windows Store), it will also work with all desktop applications that can run on Windows 8, 8.1 and 10. 

Is the DuoPad a pointing device?

Yes, it provides the pointing device functions for Windows, touch apps and desktop applications and the physical keyboard sitting next to it in front of the screen provides text input and other keyboard functions. 

How large is the the DuoPad and where do I place it for use?

The DuoPad takes no more space than a standard size mouse pad on your desk. You place it on the left or right side of your keyboard that is in front of the screen. We have optimized the size and shape of the DuoPad to provide a comfortable use and an easy and fast travel of your hand from the keyboard to the DuoPad. 

How does it compare to the mouse?

You could say it is better since it provides the mouse functions through it's trackpad mode and also gives you full control of touch apps through it's touchscreen mode. 

Can I still use my mouse together with the DuoPad?

Yes, you can do that. But we feel that most users will prefer to use the DuoPad's trackpad mode instead since it is very intuitive for using desktop applications. 

Why is the DuoPad the next generation trackpad?

It is so because it allows us to use the constantly growing library of touch apps on a PC in a comfortable manner. And at the same time the DuoPad supports the very vast library of desktop applications that were designed for the mouse, therefore  protecting the investment you made in that software. 

I'm a member of the press, how do I contact you?

For press enquiries or questions, please contact us here. Our media kit can be found  here.

There are many ways to contribute! Even if you don't have the money right now, you can help us turn DuoPad into a reality by sharing this campaign with your friends. Just click on any of the Facebook, Twitter, and other sharing buttons and let the world know about our awesome DuoPad. 

Thank you for your support!

story:
SPUD is a completely new type of product: the world’s first large AND portable display. 

From watching movies on the go to being more productive while away from your office, SPUD optimizes the visual experience on practically any device.

Just for our earliest community of supporters we are offering discounted pricing from the $549 projected retail price.

NBC's the Today Show highlighted our SPUD prototype as a 2017 Tech Trend!

SPUD pops-up to a huge, 24-inch diagonal display. When fully expanded, the device is 21 inches wide, 11 inches high, 14 inches deep (61 cm diagonal, 53 cm wide, 28 cm high, 36 cm deep).  

The 24-inch display is the size of a large desk monitor, with almost 4x more screen area than a 13-inch laptop screen, and 23x more screen area than a 5.1-inch smartphone! The screen is also highly durable. Unlike breakable glass screens, SPUD uses a flexible polymer that can’t get cracked or chipped. If you happen to get it dirty, it’s washable. Further, the attached casing keeps your SPUD protected as you take it wherever life takes you. Plus, you can mount SPUD on a tripod (standard tripod mount 1/4-20 UNC threads) and position the screen any way you need it!

When SPUD is collapsed, it’s about the size of a book: 5.64 inches wide, 2.17 inches high, 7.52 inches long (17 cm wide, 5.5 cm high, 19 cm long).

Because of SPUD’s lightweight (less than 3 pounds) and compact form factor, when collapsed, it fits in your purse, backpack, laptop bag, or even your jacket pockets! Take SPUD anywhere!

One of the most exciting things about SPUD is the many different ways that you can use it. For entertainment, SPUD is basically a portable TV or movie screen.

For work, having a dual-screen setup is great for productivity, but you can also use it for presentations and as a collaboration tool. It’s great for trade shows, sales visits, or any kind of field work.  

 

SPUD combines a projector and projector screen into a complete, easy-to-use system. Unlike a traditional projector, SPUD does not need dim lighting, a wall, or a long projection distance. With our innovations, you can use your SPUD anywhere, with confidence. Three patent-pending innovations make this possible:

The Projection Screen  

SPUD uses the only projection screen designed to fully collapse. The screen material has been carefully crafted by our team to optimize image quality while minimizing screen wrinkles.  

 SPUD Screen vs Other Projector Screens:

The arms “pop-up” like a ruggedized umbrella, making setup a one-step process. The cover over the arms blocks out ambient light and helps to maximize brightness and contrast.  

The Custom Optics  

The optical design enables SPUD to project a high quality image over a much shorter distance than a standard projector.

 

When you want the simplicity of a wired connection, just use an HDMI cable to connect SPUD to any HDMI-compatible device. No additional setup is required!

When you want wireless (e.g. Chromecast, Microsoft Wireless Display Adapter, Fire TV Stick, Roku Stick), just plug your wireless adapter’s HDMI port into the SPUD HDMI port and the power for the adapter into SPUD’s USB port. No wires needed to stream your favorite content!

Easily select the brightness you want (between 350-785 nits) using the convenient brightness dial.

 

 

 

  

 

  

SPUD is a whole new type of product: the first collapsible display! To bring SPUD to life, our team has a diverse range of expertise across product development, optical engineering (telescope, lasers, projectors!), mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, and manufacturing.

 

 

    

Dragon Innovation, who helped bring Pebble and Makerbot products to market, certified SPUD for manufacturing through their Dragon Certified program. Dragon Certification consists of a detailed design review for manufacturing, COGS analysis for manufacturing, and manufacturing strategy creation.

The National Science Foundation (NSF) awarded the first funding to SPUD through their innovation corps (I-Corps) program, which provides $50,000 grants to innovative projects. The National Science Foundation (NSF) is an independent federal agency created by Congress in 1950 "to promote the progress of science; to advance the national health, prosperity, and welfare; to secure the national defense..."

Intelligent Product Solutions, a world renowned engineering firm, helped improve SPUD’s patented one-step and easy to use pop-up display mechanics.

SPUD was first made at TX/RX Houston’s Hackerspace which is one of the largest hackerspaces in the United States.

Andromium turns Android into a desktop operating system. With SPUD and Andromium you have the world’s first portable, 24 inch desktop. Andromium are also the makers of Superbook, which received over $2.9 M in funding on Kickstarter.

Here's a top level timeline of our past and future development schedule.

 We're having a great time using our current prototype... here's a quick demo:

 

We’d love to hear your thoughts on some less obvious ways you can use SPUD. Let us know in the Comments section… we may be able to show those ideas in action using our prototype. Here are some of the setups we’ve explored already:    

  • Connect an Intel Compute Stick to SPUD, add a wireless mouse and keyboard, and you have a 24-inch collapsible desktop! 
  • Connect SPUD to a Raspberry Pi and develop on the go! 
  • Bring your SPUD + XBOX One/PS4 to a friend’s house for video games and in-person trash talk.
story_txt:
SPUD is a completely new type of product: the world’s first large AND portable display. SPUD is the only HD, 24-inch display with the awesome benefit of ultra-portability. It collapses just like an umbrella to the size and weight of a paperback book - making it ideal for anyone on the go. When expanded, SPUD uses custom optics combined with the latest DLP technology to produce the sharp, bright image that you need. Either with an HDMI cable or wireless adapter, SPUD can be connected to a smartphone, tablet, or laptop - no matter where you are! From watching movies on the go to being more productive while away from your office, SPUD optimizes the visual experience on practically any device.Just for our earliest community of supporters we are offering discounted pricing from the $549 projected retail price.NBC's the Today Show highlighted our SPUD prototype as a 2017 Tech Trend!SPUD pops-up to a huge, 24-inch diagonal display. Plus, you can mount SPUD on a tripod (standard tripod mount 1/4-20 UNC threads) and position the screen any way you need it!When SPUD is collapsed, it’s about the size of a book: 5.64 inches wide, 2.17 inches high, 7.52 inches long (17 cm wide, 5.5 cm high, 19 cm long).Because of SPUD’s lightweight (less than 3 pounds) and compact form factor, when collapsed, it fits in your purse, backpack, laptop bag, or even your jacket pockets! Take SPUD anywhere!One of the most exciting things about SPUD is the many different ways that you can use it. For entertainment, SPUD is basically a portable TV or movie screen.Whether you’re traveling, camping, hanging out with friends at a coffee shop, or just lounging around your house, it’s the big screen you can use anywhere.    For work, having a dual-screen setup is great for productivity, but you can also use it for presentations and as a collaboration tool. It’s great for trade shows, sales visits, or any kind of field work.  SPUD gives you that flexibility you need no matter the situation. And it’s great because it’s a complete solution in a small package that you can take anywhere! SPUD combines a projector and projector screen into a complete, easy-to-use system. Unlike a traditional projector, SPUD does not need dim lighting, a wall, or a long projection distance. With our innovations, you can use your SPUD anywhere, with confidence. Three patent-pending innovations make this possible:The Projection Screen  SPUD uses the only projection screen designed to fully collapse. The screen material has been carefully crafted by our team to optimize image quality while minimizing screen wrinkles.   SPUD Screen vs Other Projector Screens:The Collapsible Design  The arms “pop-up” like a ruggedized umbrella, making setup a one-step process. The cover over the arms blocks out ambient light and helps to maximize brightness and contrast.  The Custom Optics  The optical design enables SPUD to project a high quality image over a much shorter distance than a standard projector. When you want the simplicity of a wired connection, just use an HDMI cable to connect SPUD to any HDMI-compatible device. No additional setup is required!When you want wireless (e.g. Chromecast, Microsoft Wireless Display Adapter, Fire TV Stick, Roku Stick), just plug your wireless adapter’s HDMI port into the SPUD HDMI port and the power for the adapter into SPUD’s USB port. No wires needed to stream your favorite content!Easily select the brightness you want (between 350-785 nits) using the convenient brightness dial.        SPUD is a whole new type of product: the first collapsible display! To bring SPUD to life, our team has a diverse range of expertise across product development, optical engineering (telescope, lasers, projectors!), mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, and manufacturing. 

 
 
    
Dragon Innovation, who helped bring Pebble and Makerbot products to market, certified SPUD for manufacturing through their Dragon Certified program. Dragon Certification consists of a detailed design review for manufacturing, COGS analysis for manufacturing, and manufacturing strategy creation.

The National Science Foundation (NSF) awarded the first funding to SPUD through their innovation corps (I-Corps) program, which provides $50,000 grants to innovative projects. The National Science Foundation (NSF) is an independent federal agency created by Congress in 1950 "to promote the progress of science; to advance the national health, prosperity, and welfare; to secure the national defense..."

Intelligent Product Solutions, a world renowned engineering firm, helped improve SPUD’s patented one-step and easy to use pop-up display mechanics.

SPUD was first made at TX/RX Houston’s Hackerspace which is one of the largest hackerspaces in the United States.

Andromium turns Android into a desktop operating system. With SPUD and Andromium you have the world’s first portable, 24 inch desktop. Andromium are also the makers of Superbook, which received over $2.9 M in funding on Kickstarter.

Here's a top level timeline of our past and future development schedule.
 


 We're having a great time using our current prototype... here's a quick demo:

 

We’d love to hear your thoughts on some less obvious ways you can use SPUD. Let us know in the Comments section… we may be able to show those ideas in action using our prototype. Here are some of the setups we’ve explored already:    

Connect an Intel Compute Stick to SPUD, add a wireless mouse and keyboard, and you have a 24-inch collapsible desktop! 
Connect SPUD to a Raspberry Pi and develop on the go! 
Bring your SPUD + XBOX One/PS4 to a friend’s house for video games and in-person trash talk.

story:
Short Summary

(versione italiana in fondo alla pagina)

Bored of taking selfies of jut yourself and... your arm?

You want to take a REAL selfie, or a selfie together with your friends?

But who will hold the camera?

Your keyring!


Pick it from your pocket, place it on a flat surface, put the phone in it, and take your selfie. You don't even need to detach the mySelfie from your bunch of keys. And you can even screw it on a standard camera tripod thanks to its standard Whitworth screw.

Use it together with iSmile remote contro for better selfies!


What We Need & What You Get

  • Printing the mySelfie using Shapeways or similar online services costs us 7€ per piece (9€ if coloured); but the raw material costs is probaly just around a few eurocents! So we need either industrial scale production to reduce costs, or to buy our own printer to print the myselfies on demand.
  • We need a professional printer, priced 1500$ and above, else we get bad results: green = industrial printer, blue = cheap printer,  black = professional FDM printer:



  • Producing plastic objects by industrial injection molding requires a minimum order of some THOUSANDS of pieces (and some thousands of euros). So we need your help to raise up 3000 € to get 3000 pieces printed at 1€ each.
  • Those of you who will more believe in us by donating 20$ will also receive the on-demand print of our new project, the micro-tripod for pocket cameras:

  • It is as small as a crayon, but it is a fully functional camera tripod with foldable legs, movable head and standard whitworth screw compatible with all cameras... and with mySelfie!


What if our campaign fails?

  • If we can't reach the planned goal, we will use available funds to buy a cheap FDM printer and print simplified version of the mySelfie; "simpliefied" means that it will be a little more squared and linear than the one you see in pictures, to make it compatible with cheaper FDM printers.

The Impact

  • Every one carries a keyring and a smartphone in his pockets. He just lacks the “missin ring”, the mySelfie keyring!
  • No more dirty/scratched/fallen phones while taking group selfies!
  • We presented mySelfie (with name “techno keyrings”) at MakerFaire Rome 2014 with great success, even at 3€ cost; we plan to sell it for 2€ or less.


Risks & Challenges

  • There are no risks envisaged in the project:
  • we daily use a mySelfie printed by Shapeways professional printers, so we know the design is working fine;
  • we successfully printed a mySelfie using a Ultimaker2 FDM printer (thanks to the she-exhibitor at MakerFaire Rome 2014), with good results (only a slightly reduction of sharp angles is needed for better results)
  • We successfully tested mySelfie on several “official” tripods and several phones with no issues.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • By sure you know people interested on a cheap keyring allowing shooting selfies; but maybe they don’t know mySelfie and Indiegogo! Share this project with them if you want the campaign to finish sooner and have your mySelfie in your pocket as soon as possible! 

VERSIONE ITALIANA

Sommario

Stanco di fare autoscatti di te stesso da solo... e del tuo braccio?

Vuoi farti un VERO autoscatto senza dover reggere il telefono in mano, o insieme ai tuoi amici? Ma chi reggerà il telefono?

Il tuo portachiavi!


Lo prendi dalla tasca, lo appoggi su una superficie piana, ci incastri il telefono e ti fai un selfie. Non devi nemmeno sfilare il mySelfie dal portachiavi, è già pronto all'uso. E volendo puoi persino avvitarlo a un treppiede professionale, grazie all'attacco Whitworth standard di cui è dotato.

Usalo col micro-telecomando iSmile per la massima comodità!



Cosa chiediamo e cosa ottieni in cambio

  • Stampare un mySelfie con servizi di stampa 3d online come Shapeways ci costa 7 euro a pezzo (9 se a colori); ma di materiale saranno pochi centesimi di euro! Abbiamo quindi bisogno di una produzione industriale su larga scala per ridurre drasticamente i prezzi, o di acquistare una stampante 3d per stamparci i mySelfie in proprio su richiesta.
  • Produrre industrialmente oggetti in plastica tramite pressofusione richiede ordini minimi di migliaia di pezzi (e migliaia di euro). Quindi dobbiamo raccogliere almeno 3000 euro per poter produrre 3000 pezzi pagandolo 1 euro l'uno
  • Ai più generosi che sosterranno la campagna con una donazione di 20 euro invieremo anche il prototipo del nostro nuovo progetto: il micro-treppiede per macchina fotografica:

E' più piccolo di un pennarello, ma è un treppiede completo di zampe ripiegabili, testa orientabile e attacco standard Whitworth compatibile con qualunque macchina fotografica... e col mySelfie!

E se non ci riusciamo?
  • Se non riuscissimo a raggiungere la quota prevista, anche una somma inferiore sarebbe sufficiente per acquistare una stampante 3d a filamento (FDM), magari una versione ecnomica; questo ci obbligherebbe a produrre una versione un po' semplificata del mySelfie, ma solo nel senso che dovrebbe essere un po' più squadrata e lineare, per via dei limiti fisici di queste stampanti economiche.

Gli impatti 

  • Gli impatti di questa mia invenzione saranno devastanti! :-) Milioni (miliardi?) di persone hanno in tasca un cellulare e un portachiavi; il mySelfie è l'anello mancante che li unisce, e viene incontro alla moda del momento del "selfie", un tempo noto come "autoscatto".
  • Mai più cellulari sporchi/graffiati/caduti nell'appoggiarli su un muretto per fare un autoscatto!
  • Abbiamo presentato il proptotipo del mySelfie al MakerFaire Rome 2014 con grande successo, persino se venduto a 3 euro; l'idea sarebbe di venderlo a 2 euro, se non addirittura 1.


Rischi

  • Non prevedo rischi di alcun genere in questo progetto:
  • uso spesso io stesso il mySelfie attaccato al mio portachiavi stampato tramite Shapeways, quindi so per certo che funziona;
  • sono riuscito a stampare un prototipo anche con una stampante a filo, la Ultimaker2 FDM printer (ringrazio la ragazza che la esponeva al MakerFaire Rome 2014), ottenendo buoni risultati (bisogna solo smussare un po' qualche angolo e rafforzarne qualche altro per rendere il design più compatibile con questo tipo di stampanti).
  • Ho testato senza problemi il mySelfie su vari cavaletti per macchine fotografiche e con vari telefoni.

Altri modi in cui puoi aiutare

  • Sicuramente conosci qualcuno a cui piacerebbe avere un "portachiavi per selfie"; ma magari loro non conoscono Indiegogo e mySelfie! Condividi con loro questo progetto: più persone aderiscono, prima si chiuderà la campagna, prima potrai avere in tasca il tuo mySelfie!

story:
What is Mobile United?

Mobile United is the first wholesale club for cell phone service. When you join, you get the same Sprint, Verizon and AT&T networks --- but at much less than you pay today. The more people contribute, the less everyone pays.

Quick Facts

Same networks and coverage

We're rolling out Sprint, Verizon, then AT&T.

Wholesale voice, text and data

$16.99 for unlimited. See below...

You can keep your number

Or get a brand new one.

Members-only phone discounts

Our goal is to beat Best Buy's new unlocked phones by 20%.

Contract-free

No ETFs, "admin" charges, or activation fees.

How is that possible?

We became industry insiders after building cell phones designed for seniors citizens. Folks at the phone companies know that's no small task. That gave us the street cred to negotiate wholesale rates with them.

That chart isn't marketing, that's really what it looks like:

1.  You pay $46 so they can get new customers.
2.  You give them $41 as profit.
3.  And only $8 goes to network expenses. The rest goes to maintaining a giant company.

Mobile United Doesn't Have That Overhead

Instead, we want you to be so happy that you'll tell your friends. And instead of hiring a big ad agency, we'll give you referral bonuses because you're part building the community. Plus, we don't have to run the network: we buy wholesale packages. Carriers like this. Feel free to ask us why.

Membership Has Its Privileges

And it's how we keep the lights on. We have an annual $55 membership fee. And it gives you access to members-only rates, phone discounts, and specially-chosen accessories. But the members-only part is also important for the reasons you'll see right now.

What's the catch?

This catch helps about 9,999 out of 10,000 people because it keeps the community's rates low. And we want to be gracious and generous, but not taken advantage of.

Some folks run call centers and telemarketing services using "unlimited" services. One family bought two unlimited plans from another company and used them as a 24x7 baby monitor. That's not in the spirit of why we offer unlimited and can raise prices for thousands of others.

What we ask is that folks check in on our website for more minutes as they need them. So we'll allocate something like 2,000 minutes (TBD), and if you use them, great. Check in for more as often as you like.

When folks check in, our web portal will let them know if we spot patterns not in the community spirit. If we do, we'll let them know. If they get too many reminders, we'll need them to turn in their virtual membership card. We're trying to be fair, and we think it's fair to ask. You will probably never run into this, we just wanted to mention it upfront.

Telecom 2.0

The old 1.0 carriers have business models that make customers pay for the privilege of acquiring others. You can see that in the chart above. The more customers they get, the higher they can keep your rates.

Mobile United is a membership community.  We appreciate any amount you can back us with. A super-low yearly membership fee of $55 keeps the lights on, and we know your membership will probably pay for itself in two months or less.

So tell a friend. Tell your family. Tell the guy stuck in traffic next to you. Indiegogo backers receive the sweetest deal we offer – always.

story:
We have spent several years creating a code-free platform for people to maintain custom applications on the web.  We are currently rolling out the platform and require funds for expenses until revenues start to come in.  The following describes the business.

Our customer is:
Pursuing a purpose by engaging people and organizations, tracking physical and virtual addresses, driving events and activities, monitoring resources, and implementing processes.

The customer values:
Creating an instant application, and changing it as the purpose, people, places, events, resources, and processes change.

Our business is to offer:
A platform to deploy and evolve applications without coding.

Please check out the current state of our project at:
http://www.wilderbase.com
